gi sgra sgrogs pas stong khams thams cad dus gcig tu 'jig pa/ ye shes me yi thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/ steng 'og med par kun tu skyi bung zhes byed pa/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa/ zhabs rnam pa

brgyad du gtams pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje mthing ga khyung gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog

par bkab pa/ khros pa'i rgya mo mthing nag 'bar ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so/ /gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du ma hA de ba dang / 'dod pa'i lha gan rkyal du brtul ba'i

steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das bud d+ha he ru ka sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams ba'o/ /bde gshegs khros pa'i

rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gshin rje gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rad na he ru ka sku mdog

sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rna rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la

khri dang nyi zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal po dang 'khor lo nag po b+h+ring gi ri ti gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna

tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gnod sbyin stobs bzangs gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan

la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad par gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang

'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /de nas dreg pa'i chen po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying

rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtum pas rngam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid sku gzi brjid chen po'i mdangs su gyur te/ thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul

dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad chen po 'di dag phyung ngo / /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang rol kun drangs/

yan lag kun bcad gtubs te sha zos/ khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 'chos so/ /de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis hU~M hU~M hU~M b+h+yo e a ra li dzA dzA zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang

bcas pa yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsduso/ /de nas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi rje bo'i yang rje'o/ /dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/ srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang / tshangs ma dang /

khro mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar po dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhib mo dang / be chen mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag thung mo dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid

'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chen mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang / gsus

'dzin sngo nag chen mo la sogs pa dang / yang bran dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang bsdus so/ /de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du mdzad de sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM AHhU~M/ badzra pad+ma pra be sha pad ma hU~M a la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas gsang ba rgyas par

byas nas khab len gyi rdo la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i sku la mi srin mo la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das

sngo nag chen po'i sku la bdud rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i sku la me mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/ /

de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis hU~M zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu bcum par gyur to/ /de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa brgyad las dkar po la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag

cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon par gyur to/ /'thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so/ /de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes

pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te mthong nas yang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bar khyams su snying rje 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis gnas so/ /de

nas dgyes te phaT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus pa na 'gro ba rnams kyi don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul

ba dang / yid chos dbyings nas rol te spror byed nyi zer zhags pa can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te/ 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gsher spel ba'i gdan stengs su rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis shar

phyogs nas 'khor par gnas so/ /de nas dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje srings 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs

tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du gnas so/ /de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las bud d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod pas thams cad khros

nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par dgye'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa cig char zhugs te sku gsung thugs rdo rje las

'di dag phyung ngo / /oM badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi a~M a~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i snam logs nas 'thon to/ /mdam khu blud de dran pa

rnyed do/ /de nas khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun ya mtshan chen por gyur te cho 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo / /de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na gnas pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams dus gcig tu btul bar mthong ste/ shin

tu zhum zhing bred nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi/ /'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/ /mgo dang lus kyang brgyar 'gas shing / /snying yang gas shing btubs gyur cig /rul myags tshis nas

rlag pa dang / /dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog ces 'bangs su mchi bar rang rang gis dmod btsugs so/ /de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/ de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/

rang rang gi chung ma dang / bu mo dang / rang rang gi ma dang / sring mo rnams dkyil 'khor du phul te/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang / /ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/ /dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol/ /dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes

su gsol/ /bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/ /ming tsam 'dzin par su bgyid pa/ /nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar/ /de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyid/ /ces dmod btsugs so/ /de

nas de'i ma dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu mo rnams yud tsam gyis phyin par 'ongs nas las kyi dngos grub stsol ba las/ de nas khrag 'thung ye shes chen pos ming btags/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje bran dang pho nyar dbang bskur

ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i don phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rgyal mo de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par gyur nas sku gsung thugs

rdo rje bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo / /e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/ /mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las/ /mkha' la bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shar/ /khri btsugs nyi dkyil gdan stengs su/ /de la lha tshogs gdan du bting / /hU~M

'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su/ /khri bshams nyi dkyil ya bdud gdon/ /de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /byang chub sems las sku bskyed pa/ /dpal chen bla med he ru ka /dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de/ /spyan yang 'bar ba nyi shu

bdun/ /dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan gsol/ /zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du gtams/ /rdo rje mthing ga khyung gi gshog /'jig rten khams kyang yog par bkab/ /sbrul nag 'jigs su rung ba dang / /dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /

dbu gsum dang la byung ba ni/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal/ /rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum gyis/ /khams gsum mya ngan zlo ba'i zhal/ /dbu gsum bar nas rngam pa ni/ g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal/ /

thabs dang shes rab sems kyi dbu/ /srid gsum dbyings su rdzogs pa'i zhal/ /dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni/ /g.yas mthing g.yon mthing dbus mthing zhal/ /khams gsum re ba skong ba yi/ /lung dang man ngag sems

kyi dbu/ /'gyur ba med pa'i mthing nag zhal/ /skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems/ /dbu dgu rol pa'i byin brlabs las/ /g.yas gsum glog stong lce 'byin cing / /g.yon gsum 'brug stong sgra sgrog pa/ /dbu gsum rdo rje ser

chen 'beb/ /spyan dgu dang la gzigs pa ni/ /chos dbyings kun tu bzang po dang / /kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la/ /'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gzigs/ /spyan dgu bar nas gzigs pa ni/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye
shes kyis/ /srid pa'i sems can thams cad la/ /byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan gyis gzigs/ /spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni/ /g.yas gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan/ /gzigs pas bdud dang mu stegs sgrol/ /
g.yon gsum byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan/ /gzigs pas mtha' yas bde la 'jog /dbu gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan/ /gzigs pas skye 'gro gnas su stob/ /dbu dgu rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan dgu/ /lnga dgu

bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yang / /bud d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brgyan/ /stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /khyab bdal chen po'i rtags su bsnams/ /bcwa brgyad phyag na rol pa yis/ /stong pa bcwa brgyad dbyings su sbyor/ /zhabs brgyad nga rgyal dregs pa

'joms/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje mthing ga gshog pa brkyang / /bcwa brgyad phyag na bsnams pa yis/ /rdo rje glo snying zhing chung g.yas/ /ban da zhing chen stir chen g.yon/ /nang zhags nyi ma khyung chen g.yas/ /zhing chen

zla ba 'ug pa g.yon/ /me dang rgya mtsho ga 'u g.yas/ /rlung dang rin chen ri rab g.yon/ /yon tan bcwa brgyad dbyings su rdzogs/ /dang po rdo rje dung chen ni/ /khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas kyang / /bdud dang mu stegs kun 'joms pa'o/ /

gnyis pa stir chen glo snying ni/ /srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun/ /dam tshig sta na dbyings su sgrol/ /gsum pa stir chung ril mid ni/ /dug gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags/ /bzhi pa stir chen nang zhags ni/ /rgyud lnga'i sems

can dbyings su 'dren/ /lnga pa nyi zla zung du 'dzin/ /byang chub sems las g.yos pa med/ /drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad 'khol ba'i rtags/ /bdun pa me dpung rlung gis 'thor/ /srid pa'i bag chags thal bar

rlog /brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho rnams/ /thams cad ma lus g.yeng gnas shing / /'byung ba lnga la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /dgu pa rin chen ga 'u ni/ /dngos grub sprul pa 'byung ba'i rtags/ /dgu gnyis zung du ldan pa las/ /stong pa bcwa

brgyad dbyings su rdzogs/ /dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/ /thod skam 'bar ba phreng ba yis/ /zhi ba phyogs gcig mya ngan zlo/ /mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku brnyes pa'o/ /thod rlon 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'di/ /khams gsum dbang du

bsdus nas su/ /sprul pa'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /thod pa phyed tshal phreng bas ni/ /dug lnga bdud rtsir sbyor ba ste/ /longs spyod sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /zhing chen rlon pa'i na bza' ni/ /chos dbyings mnyam pa chen po ste/ /

chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs ni/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /sbrul nag chun 'phyang mang po ni/ /ye shes thams cad 'byung ba'i rtags/ /

rtag chen sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /zhabs brgyad lha brgyad brdzis pa ni/ /nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'khros pa'i rgyal mo ni/ /kro d+hi shwa ri yum gyi gtso/ /mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ /rgyan dang cha lugs

gtso dang 'thun/ /'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/ /ban da rak+ta gtso la stob/ /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/ /shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na/ /khri dang nyi dkyil nyi zla'i gdan/ /de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /

gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur pa/ /khrag 'thung bud d+ha he ru ka /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /g.yas ljang g.yon sngo dbus ser zhal/ /phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/ /'khor lo dgra sta zhags pa g.yas/ /ban

da rde'u chung kha T+wA~M g.yon/ /ser nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/ /lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na/ /khri dang nyi dkyil gshin rje'i gdan/ /de yi steng du

bsam bya ba/ /tshor ba'i phung po gnas gyur pa/ /khrag 'thung rad na he ru ka /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal/ /phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/ /rin chen gshol dang gtun

shing g.yas/ /ban da dgra sta rde'u chung g.yon/ /sngo nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/ /nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ /khri dang nyi dkyil klu yi gdan/ /

de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /'du shes phung po gnas gyur pa/ /khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ljang zhal/ /phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/ /

pad+ma rde'u chung spu gri g.yas/ /ban da kha T+wA~M so phreng g.yon/ /dmar nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/ /byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na/ /khri dang nyi dkyil gnod

sbyin gdan/ /de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /'du byed phung po gnas gyur pa/ /khrag 'thung karma he ru ka /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ljang zhal/ /phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/ /ral

gri zhags pa rde'u chung g.yas/ /ban da thod dbyug kha T+wA~M g.yon/ /ljang nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rim na/ /me dpung 'bar

ba'i gzhal yas na/ /mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las/ /mkha' las skyes pa'i 'phra men ma/ /shar phyogs su ni bsam bya ba/ /sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /kun gzhi gnas gyur 'phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor sngo nag

go'u ri ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/ /dbyugs par glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /sti ra dbyug pa g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /kyi shi ma la brkyang bskum

bzhugs/ /lho phyogs ngos su bsam bya ba/ /gsod skyen bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /rnam shes gnas gyur 'phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor ser nag tso'u ri ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs

g.yang gzhi gsol/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /thabs kyi mda' drangs g.yas pa na/ /shes rab bzhu brdungs g.yon pa na/ /ya ma ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /nyi ma bsgyel

ba'i gdan stengs su/ /nyon mongs gnas gyur 'phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor dmar nag pra mo ha/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /chu srin

rgyal mtshan g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /sUr+ya ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /zla ba bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /reg bya gnas gyur 'phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor mthing nag be ta li/ /ral

pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na/ /stir chung mgo gcod g.yon pa na/ /tsan tra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /shar

lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /me lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /lta byed 'phra men gnas gyur pa/ /rnal 'byor dmar nag puk+ka si/ /skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing / /dur khrod g.yang gzhi slog pa gyon/ /dpyugs

pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /sti ra chen po g.yas pa na/ /tshems par rgyu 'dren g.yon pa na/ /ag ni ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /bden bral bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /nyan byed

gnas gyur 'phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor mthing nag sma sha ni/ /skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing / /srog chags chen po g.yang gzhi gyon/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /sti ra chung ngu g.yon pa na/ /tsit+ta phyung ba

g.yas pa na/ /ni ri ti la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /rlung lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /mnom byed gnas gyur 'phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor ser nag tsaN Da li/ /skra 'bar mche gtsigs

rkan brdabs shig /'jigs su rung ba'i slog pa gsol/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /sti ra chung ngu g.yas pa na/ /ban da bcad pa g.yon pa na/ /ba ya be la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang shar mtshams su

bsam bya ba/ /dbang ldan bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /myong byed gnas gyur 'phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor ljang nag g+has ma ri/ /skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing / /sti ra chen po'i shun pa gsol/ /

dpyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /ban da rak+ta g.yas pa na/ /rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa na/ /i shwa ra la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim du/ /smug nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na/ /gsang

ba'i mkha' las skur bskyed pa/ /shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /dri za bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /kun gzhi yul las gnas gyur pa/ /'phra men thogs med seng ge'i gdong / /rnal 'byor ser nag seng ge ma/ /mche

gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /phyag gnyis bsnol nas shin tu 'gying / /sti ra chen po sprug cing gsol/ /in dra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /grul bum bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /

rnam shes yul la gnas gyur pa/ /'phra men dpa' bo stag gi gdong / /rnal 'byor dmar nag bya g+h+ri ma/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /phyag gnyis gyad kyi 'dor tshul gyis/ /stir chung bskyur nas 'bru tshugs

lta/ /ra tri'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /yi dgas bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /nyon mongs yul la gnas gyur pa/ /'phra men rtog 'dul wa yi gdong / /rnal 'byor dmar nag

sri ka ma/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /phyag gnyis stir chen nang grol 'dru/ /hri 'di gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /

reg bya yul la gnas gyur pa/ /'phra men btang snyoms spyang mo'i gdong / /rnal 'byor mthing nag shwa na ma/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /phyag gnyis rol pa chen po yis/ /sti ra phyed mar btsal nas
gsol/ /yak+Sha'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /lta byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /'phra men gzi brjid bya rgod gdong / /rnal 'byor

dmar nag kri d+ha ma/ /mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /zangs gri rnon po g.yas pa na/ /rgyu zhags drang ba g.yon pa na/ /rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /srin po bsgyel

ba'i gdan stengs su/ /nyan byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /'phra men gsal byed dur bya'i gdong / /rnal 'byor rnal ma kang+ka ma/ /mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/ /stir chung stod smad g.yas g.yon na/ /rngam

pa'i tshul gyis phrag la bkal/ /rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /snom byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /'phra men sa le bya rog gdong / /rnal

'byor dmar nag kha ga ma/ /mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /zangs gri dmar po g.yas pa na/ /ban da raka ta g.yon pa na/ /rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /srin po

bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ /myong byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /'phra men rdzogs byed 'ug pa'i gdong / /rnal 'byor ljang nag hu lu ma/ /mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/ /rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na/ /stir

chung spyi 'joms g.yon ba na/ /rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams tha ma la/ /thod skam 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na/ /zhing chen bsnol ma'i gdan stengs su/ /shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /

nyul byed yul las gnas gyur pa/ /sbor byed chen mo mi zad ma/ /sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog ma/ /zhing chen rol pa'i slog pa gsol/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum 'bar/ /
ha ha gad mos ye shes rol/ /nyi zer zhags pa g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /mi mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /sbor byed

chen mo mdung thung 'phen/ /rnal 'byor ser nag nyul chen ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mi yi g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs/ /ha ha gad mos mi rnams spror/ /rdo rje mdung thung

g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /chos kyi dbyings las gnas gyur pa/ /sbror byed rdo rje dril 'khrol ma/ /rnal 'byor mtshon du med pa'i sku/ /ral

pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /chos nyid dbyings kyi na bza' gsol/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs stong khams spor/ /ha ha'i gad mos dbyings su sbyor/ /gsung bsgrags dril bu g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du

brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /lha min thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /sbror byed thod phreng skar mda'i gdong / /rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma/ /srog chags chen po'i g.yang gzhi gyon/ /ral pa kham nag gyen

du 'bar/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs khams gsum sbyangs/ /ha ha gad mos lha min sbar/ /rdo rje skar mda' g.yas pa na/ /ban da raka ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /

lha 'dul thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /sbor byed khyung thogs gnod sbyin ma/ /rnal 'byor mthing nag nyul chen ma/ /'jigs byed g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags/ /

ha ha gad mos lha rnams sbor/ /rdo rje khyung chen g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /yi dgas thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /sbor byed me khyer glog phreng 'dzin/ /

rnal 'byor dmar nag nyul chen ma/ /yi dgas 'grin rings g.yang gzhi gyon/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /dbyugs pas glu blangs snang srid sbyangs/ /ha ha'i gad mos yi dgas spor/ /rdo rje glog phreng g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta

g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /byol song thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /sbor byed 'jigs chen slog sha rdebs/ /rnal 'byor smug nag nyul chen ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /

slog chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gyon/ /dpyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags/ /ha ha'i gad mos byol song sbor/ /rdo rje slag sha g.yas pa na/ /ban da raka ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang

shar mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /dmyal mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /sbor byed gshin rje ral gri skra/ /rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /gshin rje g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/ /dpyugs

pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs/ /ha ha'i gad mos dmyal ba sbor/ /rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi la/ /phyin ci log bzhi gnas gyur

pa/ /shar gyi sgor ni bsam bya ba/ /phag chen po yi gdan stengs su/ /rta gdong srin mo'i g.yang gzhi gsol/ /rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na/ /ban da rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /phag chen po yi gdan stengs su/ /stobs chen khro bo chen po

dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs/ /rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/ /lho yi sgor ni bsam bya ba/ /ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengs su/ /phag gdong chen mo'i g.yang gzhi gyon/ /lcags kyi dril zhags g.yas pa na/ /

ban da rlon pa g.yon pa na/ /ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengs su/ /khro chen gshin rje gshed po dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/ /rngam pa'i tshul gyis bltas pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor ni bsam bya ba/ /bum rna chen mo'i gdan

stengs su/ /dred gdong chen mo'i g.yang gzhi gyon/ /lcags sgrog me 'bar g.yas pa na/ /ban da rlon pa g.yon pa na/ /srin po bum rna'i gdan stengs su/ /khro chen rta mgrin chen po dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis

su/ /rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/ /byang gi sgor ni bsam bya ba/ /gsus po che yi gdan stengs su/ /spyang gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon/ /dril bu thal chen g.yas pa na/ /ban da rlon pa g.yon pa na/ /gsus po che yi gdan

stengs su/ /khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / /'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyis su/ /rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/ /ho badzra gu h+ya tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po'i de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las bdud btul ba dang

nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsal ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjes su

'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /bru~M bi shwa kro d+ha badzra dz+wa la maN DA la tsakra hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la du tri tsakra nAn/ sUr+ya tsan dra pad+ma de ba tiSh+Tha nAn/ hU~M hU~M ha ha hU~M hU~M badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA

tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn da ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hU~M badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+Tan da ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M~M phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga to bud d+ha ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/

oM tra~M rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN DA sarba duSh+TAn da ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ tra~M sUr+ya rad na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM hrI pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hrI shwa pad+ma ba mu ka ma hA kro d+hi

shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ ha karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn da ka ha na pa tsa hU~M phaT/ karma ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ badzra ke'u ri ha/ badzra tse'u ri ha/ badzra pra mo hA ha/ badzra be ta li ha/ badzra puk+ka si ha/ badzra

g+hasma ri ha/ badzra sma sha ni ha/ badzra tsaN Da li ha/ badzra sid ha mu kha he/ badzra byA g+h+r-i mu kha he/ badzra sri la mu kha he/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra gr-i d+ha mu kha he/ badzra kang+ka mu kha he/ badzra gA ka mu kha he/ badzra hu lu ka mu kha he/ badzra Ar+ya te tsa te nga tsa/ badzra a mo g+ha hU~M/

badzra A lo ka ba~M/ badzra b+hasmi pA la ya ba to ho/ e h+ye hi bri ta Ar+ya ni tsa tur ba ya phaT/ badzra be yo gi pra ti Ar+ya ni tsa tur tha ya hU~M phaT/ badzra mu a ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ba ni shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a

sum pa a ni ba shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni tra~M su pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu tri ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a du bri ti a ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ e h+ye hi A na ya ho/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ badzra

kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M phaT ces gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par dus gcig khyab par grags pa dang / dam nod pa bka' nyan gyi tshogs mi'i srin mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so'i srog gi snying po phul lo/ /badzra ma nu rAk+Sha si/

badzra pra ma ni badzra rau tri/ badzra baiSh+Na be/ badzra ping ga lam/ badzra ke ma ri/ badzra in dra na/ badzra su ra ya tra/ badzra so hu mya/ badzra a mr-i ta/ badzra da na ta/ badzra rAk+Sha si/ badzra bak+Sha si/ badzra ra ti ha~M/ badzra ru ti ha~M/ badzra e ka tsa ra~M/ badzra ma no ha ra~M/

badzra sa na d+hi ha~M/ badzra ba ya bya/ badzra ma hA ma ra ma na/ badzra ag ne ye/ badzra tsa mun tri/ badzra pu tra na/ badzra pa ru Ni/ badzra ma hA kA la/ badzra tIk+Sh+Na ba~M/ badzra la~M po d+ha ra/ ye shes rgyal po dgongs su gsol/ /khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ /

thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/ /'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/ /oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hoH/ /badzra sa ma ya phaT/ a li u li ta li ta pa li da~M sta~M kho na rau tri kha ra~M yo ga

ni kha ra~M hU~M ha he phaT ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun/ /tshig cing 'bar bas thams cad khyab/ /gsung gi khro tshogs chen po yis/ /kun tu khyab cing gang gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes

rgyal po de nyid kyi de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir nges par brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ /gru chad bzhis brgyan par 'khyams dang / /gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams

gsum gyis mdzes/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'khrug /khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /gtum ba dom gyi sbar bas ni/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs pa/ /dregs pa chen po gtum tshogs

mnan/ /gdan du byas te sku bzhugs pa/ /smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang / /dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dbu dgu phyag ni bcwa brgyad dang / /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /rngam pa'i sgra chen

'jigs par sgrogs/ /stag lug sbrul dang nyi mar chas/ /sti ra che chung nang zhags dang / /khyung dang yid bzhin nor bu dang / /stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /ral gri dgra sta bshol la

sogs/ /rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang / /btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /spor byed chen mo brgyad rnams dang / /dbyug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyar

mdzes pa dang / /lcags kyu la sogs thod pas mdzes/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/ /rang gi stan dang lag char chas/ /ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas zhes gsungs pa

dang / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du/ /sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen

po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di gsungs so/ /bla med mi spang bla ma bkur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /yang dag lam du zhugs la byams/ /gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya/ /

rtsa ba'i dam tshig chen po ni/ /rdeng chen bcu yi don rtogs kyang / /rtsa ba gsum po mi 'da'o/ /yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni/ /gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo / /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chu/ /dag

pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro/ /spyi dpal bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang / /yan lag bcu po mi dor ro/ /gzhan yang yan lag dam tshig rnams/ /'da' bar mi mdzad rdo rje dam/ /sa ma ya ni rdo rje che/ /mi 'da' rgyal ba nyid kyi dam/ /bsam

rdzogs lhun grub che mthar phyin/ /srid gsum dag pa dbang chen sgyur/ /mi 'jigs kun tu bzang por spyod/ /theg pa mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thabs/ /ji snyed sdom pa mtha' las pa/ /ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis rdzogs/ /

nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang / /tshe thung bsam pa log pa dang / /mya ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang / /dmyal ba nyid ni rdo rje byed/ /dgu rdzogs bcur ldan gsum gyis sbyangs/ /bkang ba la sogs mtha' yas mchog /

ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi 'dul bar 'gyur to/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las 'jigs byed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rdo rje'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i ngang du snyigs ma med par byungs btab pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i thig

le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / /byang chub sems kyi bde chen la/ /rgyu rkyen rten dang len bcas pa'i/ /skyon med thig le chen po las/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog /phyogs

rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang / /rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni/ /yi ge tshig la rab brten te/ /khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor
ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyings/ /

'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i tshogs/ /dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag par rdzogs/ /thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing / /snying
po thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i ye shes chen por rol/ /ye shes dgyes pa mchog tu 'bul/ /zad med zag pa med pa yi/ /bsod nams ye shes sgyu mar rol/ /rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /

gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i dbyings/ /sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun/ /ma lus bdag gi dbang sgyur ro/ /dbang sgyur ye shes

rol pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po yis/ /rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas/ /

thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung / /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon/ /sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus sgrol/ /bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thos bsam

bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor bas/ /rang 'byung kun nas lhun gyis grub/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /rgyu rkyen rten dang ldan pa yi/ /thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings/ /

byang chub sems kyi bde chen gyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings su thim/ /thig le chen po bla ma las/ /sgyu ma byang chub lam du bstan/ /skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang / /byang chub thig le nyid kyi ngang / /spyod pa

rnam pa nyid kyi yang / /thig le chen po'i lam du nges/ /sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang / /thig le chen po'i dbyings su sbyor/ /sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang / /spyi yi dam tshig mtha' yas pa/ /thig le chen po'i ngang du

gsal/ /snod bcud 'jig rten ma lus pa/ /thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings/ /tshogs chen rnam pa gnyis po yang / /byang chub sems kyi dbyings su nges/ /gzhal yas khang dang rgyan rnams dang / /cho 'phrul byang chub sems

su thim/ /khro tshogs bdud 'dul rol pa yang / /byang chub sems su nges pa yin/ /'gro drug sems can gsum po yang / /ye shes drug dang sku gsum du/ /nges pa'i thig le chen po yin/ /lnga yi rten dang rkyen bzhi yang / /

dbyings kyi ma dang dus kyi sring / /thig le chen po'i ngang du 'dus/ /snga phyi gsum dang yod med khams/ /sku gsung thugs su nges bstan pa'i/ /thig le byang chub sems su nges/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyang / /phyag rgya bzhi bcu

gnyis po yang / /thig le nyid las gzhan na med/ /bzhi yi las dang gcig po yang / /thig le sems kyi ngang du gsal/ /'gro ba'i don du 'byung ba yi/ /dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi/ /byang chub sems las gzhan na med/ /bde

skyid sdug bsngal mang po yang / /rtogs pa bde chen dbyings kyi don/ /ye shes ye shes rol pa yang / /rdo rje snying po'i dbyings su nges/ /kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams/ /nyag gcig yab tu

nges par rdzogs/ /thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum/ /kun tu bzang mo la sogs kyang / /thig le ma yi ngang du gsal/ /gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang / /bzhugs gnas khyad par mang po yang / /ye shes chen bo'i

gnas su bsdu/ /mchod pa'i rgyan dang longs spyod kun/ /rigs pa'i byang chub sems chen po/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i ngang du 'dus/ /rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi ngo bo dang / /chos so cog gi rang bzhin rnams/ /byang chub sems su nges

pas na/ /dkar nag las kyis ma gsungs so/ /byang chub sems kyi bde chen ni/ /ci yang med las cir yang snang / /cis kyang ma bcos g.yung drung sku/ /cir mi mdzad la thams cad sgrol/ /dmigs pa med par kun

la khyab/ /ma bskos rgyal po yang dag pa/ /ma sbyangs ye shes snying po che/ /ma bsgoms cig car don nyid rdzogs/ /ma bsgrubs rgyal ba ku gyi gtso/ /ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med/ /tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te/ /sangs rgyas

nyid kyis rnyed par dka'/ /kun bzangs rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod/ /spyod pas 'gro ba sgrol ba ste/ /de la nyes pa'i skyon mi mnga' zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas stug po brgyan pa'i rgyan nyid tu bzhugs so/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang ye shes

rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las chen po 'di ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor

mchog /'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/ /khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje'i phur pas gdab/ /rdul

du byas nas tshogs la 'bul/ /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /bcings gyur bskyod nas phyogs bcur g.yos/ /myos 'gyur gas te tshig par 'gyur/ /ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor

mchog /'bar ba'i gzi brjid lhun chen la/ /chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /rdo rje gsum yang dbang du 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab/ /

chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul/ /ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba'i 'du 'phro'i gzi chen la/ /dga'

ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag /nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtag /ma yi tshogs kyi

dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro/ /yid bzhin nam mkha'i mkha' dang mnyam/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dang ba'i yid

kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /gtum chen rngam po'ang lha ner 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /gtum chen 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag /lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab/ /'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la 'bul/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil

'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /'bar ba lha ne'i byin gyis khyab/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /a/ thams cad rdzogs pa chen po ste/ /las su ma gyur gcig kyang med/ /las kyi khyad par rdzogs pa yi/ /srid

pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams/ /byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med/ /rdzogs pa chen po'i phrin las kyis/ /sbyangs pas bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub/ /ho/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin/ /rang gi dam tshig

rab bsgrubs te/ /gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo/ /khrag 'thung chen po la sogs te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad kun/ /thams cad ma lus byed pa yin/ /mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs te/ /bro gar glu

tshig chen mos ni/ /'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed/ /'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed/ /lbos mo chen mo la sogs te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /rmongs par 'dod na rmongs par byed/ /myos par 'dod na myos par byed/ /seng gdong
chen mo la sogs te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la za bar byed/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la

'byin par byed/ /kun la rab tu nyams par byed/ /a/ spor byed chen mo la sogs te/ /nyul byed chen mo brgyad rnams la/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la nyul bar byed/ /ma lus gnas nas spor bar byed/ /

slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /sbad cing gtang bar bya ba ste/ /thams cad ma lus byed pa yin/ /ljon shing dang ni lcug phran tshal/ /sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu/ /dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang / /khros

pas ka li rab tu bya zhes gsungs pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de nyid dam tshig sti ra'i rnga bla ma

rdung zhing sti ra rngam pa'i mdangs 'di phyung ngo / /e yi tshogs chen 'byam pa ru/ /sti ra'i rnga chen sgra bsgrags bas/ /hU~M ha he phaT sgra 'byin cing / /yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /ru lu hU~M b+h+yo'i gsung sgrogs pa/ /khro bo rngam pa'i

sgra skad kyis/ /srid pa gsum char bshig nas kyang / /stong gsum bsgral ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /sti ra rnga chen 'di rdungs pas/ /gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te/ /mu stegs kun gyi snying yang 'byin/ /sti ra'i rnga chen 'di

bsgrags pas/ /stong gsum khro bo'i tshogs kyis bkang / /kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri/ /rnga sgra chen pos stong gsum bshig /rnga sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral/ /rnga sgra chen pos srid gsum sbyangs/ /rnga sgra chen pos dgra

bgegs 'dul/ /rnga sgra chen pos ngan song sbyangs/ /rnga sgra 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pas/ /na rag dmyal khams stongs par byed/ /rnga sgra stug chem ri rab rnyil/ /sti ra rnga chen sgra phyung bas/ /phyin ci log rnams snying yang 'byin/ /

rnga chen 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing / /rnga thabs glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bkang / /ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig bkang / /rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i dam tshig bskul/ /sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas/ /

nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas spar/ /rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su sgrol/ /sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas/ /lha dang mi yi theg pa yang / /bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud/ /sti ra rnga sgra 'di bsgrags pas/ /stong khams sti ra'i

rnga sgras bkang / /kun kyang rnga rdung di ri ri/ /rnga thabs glog stong lce 'byin cing / /rnga skad 'brug stong sgra sgrogs bas/ /byin brlabs lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs/ /stong gsum 'khrug cing srid gsum 'thor/ /rnga thabs g.yab

mor bor ba dang / /kha dang ka yi ru mtshon gyis/ /thams cad gnam lcags chen pos btab/ /ka la chen po la sogs te/ /rdo rje chags 'og ldegs pa'i rnams/ /dus gcig tu ni tsita ta 'byin/ /sti ra chen po yi rnga sgra

yis/ /srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil/ /dus gcig tu ni dbang chen rdzogs/ /rnga sgra rin chen khang pa brtsegs/ /bsam rdzogs che la dbang thang thob/ /rnga sgras g.yo ba med par byed/ /chos la 'dzud pa'i sgra yang 'byin/ /

rnga sgras ci 'dod dgongs pa rdzogs/ /byang chub sems ltar de ma thag ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes

rgyal po de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de la shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs kyis dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so/ /hU~M gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/ /

khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /mche ba zang yag za byed che/ /ho/ hU~M rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ /tug chem ri rab 'bum rnyil skad/ /a la la yi gad rgyangs che/ /dpyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che/ /ho/ hU~M khro bo'i

shes rab 'od po che/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal/ /'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms/ /sna tshogs ye shes thig le che/ /ho/ hU~M khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po/ /khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs/ /

dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che/ /ho/ hU~M bdud rnams kun gyi bdud chen po/ /bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs byed chen

po bdal pa che/ /hU~M rdo rje brag chen sra pa po/ /rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po/ /rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/ /rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che/ /ho/ hU~M stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /'jigs byed mtshon du med pa'i sku/ /sna tshogs

gsung dang sna tshogs thugs/ /'jigs byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter/ /ho zhes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen po rnams dbyer med pas mnyes par gyur to/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las

lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las dang yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i don/ /gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po yin/ /nges don chos kyi snying po las/ /

'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang / /dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang / /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'phros te/ /sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang / /'byung nas gtan la nges par 'bebs/ /'gro drug

sems can gsum po yang / /stan chen po'i dbyings su bstan/ /ling ga pad mar bcas pa yang / /'ga' na chen po'i dbyings su sbyor/ /snang srid kha dog mang po yang / /'ga' na chen po'i lam du bstan/ /rang bzhin gsang

ba'i snying po 'di/ /rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa/ /de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/ /rtag tu byang chub sems la gnas/ /tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas/ /nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar/ /bsam pa thams cad yid

bzhin 'grub ces gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid

nges pa'i sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las rdeng chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ /rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na
nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI karma tswad ta ri tsakra gu h+ya tan tra/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

dgyes pa chen por gyur te/ yum chen mo dang gnyis su med pa'i mkha' la bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ 'khor khro bo dang / khro mo dang / ma mo dang / mngag gzhug dang / 'bangs la sogs pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
pa chen po la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das btsun mo dang gnyis su med par gyur/ skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di ston to/ /ye nas ma skyes gshin rje chen po'i tshogs/ /

rnam dag dbyings kyi rang nyid rnam par dag pa la/ /gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog gshin rje gshed/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa yi/ /kun gyi ye shes thams cad 'dus pa ste/ /thugs rje chen pos
'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /sems can ma lus mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/ /ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs/ /'khor ba'i nyes skyon thams cad tshar gcad phyir/ /'dod chags 'dus pa'i dpal ldan gar gyi

bdag /bye ba phrag brgya dpag tu med par yang / /'dul ba'i dbang gis de lta bu yi gzugs su bstan/ /zhes gsungs pas 'khor gyi khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/ /sems can 'khor bas gdungs pa la/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog bstan/ /bstan pa dam pa 'di gsungs pas/ /thams cad sgrol ba ngo

mtshar che/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yum dang gcig tu 'dus te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /sprul pa'i sku dag tshad med dpag tu med/ /thun mong ma yin 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi phrin las rmad du byung / /mi dge bcu dang mtshams med tshar gcad pa/ /zug rngu mi mnga' chos nyid rmad po che/ /chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /sprul pa'i sku dang gsum ni don dam kun tu sbyor/ /phyogs bcu

bde bar gshegs pa thugs kyi dpal/ /yang dag ye shes dpal yin 'jam dpal yin zhes bstod de gnyis su med par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa de la 'khor gyis de bzhin du gsol ba la dgyes te/ 'di skad

ces gsungs so/ /zhi ba gnyis med chos kyi ngang nyid las/ /snying po gnyis med byang chub sems dpa'i don/ /thams cad 'dus pa'i bla med dam pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta e h+ye hi

ta thA ga ta pra ba ti/ bo d+hi sa twa d+harma d+hA tu/ e h+ye hi dzaHhU~M h+ye hi h+ye hi hU~M hU~M hU~M/ zhes brjod nas brdas mtshon par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi phyogs su sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /

snyoms par zhugs pas phyogs la phyogs su bltas ste/ rang bzhin gyis sgrol ba'i nus pa can du gyur te/ thams cad kyang sgrol bar gyur to/ /de nas yum gyi tshogs thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen po'i brda 'dis bcom ldan 'das

la bskul lo/ /e ma'o phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi/ /ye shes 'dus pa'i phrin las mchog /bla med theg pa nges pa la/ /sbyor ba mchog gis bshad du gsol zhes bskul bas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad dgyes par gyur to/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang phyug gi 'khor mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad dang bcas nas sku'i rgyan gyis brgyan te/ so so'i btsun mo'i dgyes pas sku'i nyams su btar

bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ba spu langs te 'di skad ces ched du brjod do/ /sku gsung thugs rnams 'gro ba so sor 'dul/ /ngang gis zhi ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / /phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro

ba so sor 'dul/ /de phyir mchog gi rgyal po 'di bshad do zhes gsungs bas 'khor rnams rab tu dga' mgur rangs par gyur te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba rang rang 'dul/ /dbyings las 'dren pa rdo rje gsor

byas te/ /'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad pa ngo mtshar che/ /zhes brjod do/ /sku la zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khro bos 'dul bar mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /khra dang spyang ki srin mo mu stegs

rnams/ /bdud dang log 'dren thams cad tshar gcad phyir/ /chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu sprul nas phrin las mdzad ces gsungs pas 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di skad du/ e ma'o che ba'i yon tan kun la khyab pa la/ /ngang gis khro

bor bstan pa 'di lta bu/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung sprul pa 'di lta bu/ /rab tu mi srun 'dul ba ngo mtshar che zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bskul bar 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /khyad par rim par bstan pa'i khro gnyer ni/ /

ye shes dbyings kyis kun la khyab par ston/ /khro bo bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu la sogs/ /ston pa mchod phyir khro bo mang po bstan/ /ngang khro kun khyab shugs khro rang rang 'dul ba yi/ /bye brag so sor rab tu shes bya la/ /mtshan ma drag po zhi ba

dbang dang rgyas/ /go rim bzlog ste rab tu bshad par bya/ /lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs can la/ /'khor ba gcod byed rtse mo can/ /gru gsum e yi pho brang a/ /zla gam rnam gsum dbang gi tshul/ /myu khyud dad can rgyas

pa phyi/ /rnam bzhir ldan pa'i 'khor lo la/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i thig gdab po/ /dbus su ma he'i zhing gdan la/ /rtse dbus zhing brkyang re re'o/ /rus pa tshogs kyi rba rlabs brag tu spungs/ /raka ta khrag gi rba glong mtsho lta bu/ /gnam

lcags dur mo rab tu ta la la/ /dur khrod rab tu brgyan pa de bsham mo/ /dbus su khro rgyal gshin rje gshed/ /sku ni nag po dug 'dra la/ /dbu gsum dkar dmar mthing ba ste/ /ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar/ /rtse la me 'bar rked

nas zhag kyang 'dzag /rtsa ba chu ste sdang mig rab tu bgrad/ /phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa'i thor tshugs ni/ /sdigs mdzub rgyu zhabs lcags kyu g.yas/ /dung chen mdung thung gsal shing g.yon/ /zhabs bzhi mthur du bstan pa ni/ /

brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'gro ba dbang du sdud/ /sku stod glang chen ko ba zhing phrag la/ /sku smad stag ste sham thabs tshams ngam can/ /e yi pho brang dbus su'o/ /yum yang yab dang sku 'thun te/ /pho brang dbus su g.yon du'o/ /zhal

gcig phyag gnyis mche ba can/ /khram bam ban d+ha bsnams pa'o/ /rtse la khro bo yab yum bcu/ /rab tu khros pa'i sdang mig can/ /go rim bzhin du dgod par bya/ /zla gam dur khrod ma mo ste/ /sgo la de bzhin bsrung ba'o/ /de la

rim pas mgu bar bya zhes brjod de/ 'di sku gsung thugs las phyung ngo / /oM a kro many+dzu shrI mu~M/ hU~M badzra kro d+ha b+hid nan hU~M/ oM badzra be ta li raka sha man/ hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/ hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/ oM ru ru du na/ oM dza dza ya ba/

oM ya shug b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu thams cad 'khrugs te/ g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /ldeg go/ chem mo/ /'ur te/ g.yo 'gul du gyur te/ 'khrugs par gyur to/ /de nas yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la

zhugs par gsol ba gdab ste/ gsol bar zhus pa/ e ma'o rab tu blo ldan khyod/ /'jig rten 'khrugs par mdzad pa'o/ /dbang med las kyi mnar ba la/ /bder gshegs gsung du gsungs pa ste/ /rab tu bde bar mdzad du gsol/ /

zhes glengs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ste 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzrA na la ka la hU~M badzra ga ta pra be sha ho/ zhes gsungs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu 'jam par

gyur to/ /gyur pas sems can thams cad slar sngon kho na bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen po la skyabs su dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgyas mnyes par bya ba 'di gsungs

so/ /rtse gcig mnyam par bzhag bya ste/ /sgeg mo g.yon du gnas par bya/ /bskul ba'i ting 'dzin brlan pa la/ /bskyod pa byang chub lam du drangs/ /gnas nyid bder gshegs skyed pa'i rkyen/ /rtse mo oM la phaT du bstan zhes gsungs

pas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rol mos mnyes par gyur to/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las zhi bar bya

ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /rab tu dkar ba'i yul dag la/ /mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te/ /dang bas mgu ba'i las byas zhes/ /bla med rgyal bas rab tu bshad/ /sa gzhi dkar ba rab mnyam la/ /gru bzhir ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor

la/ /lte bar bcas shing rtsibs brgyad pa/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te bri bar bya/ /dkar dang ldan pa'i zla ba la/ /gcig nas gsum nas mgo btsugs la/ /khams gsum rab tu mgu bya'i phyir/ /nyams su lon par byas la

bsgrubs/ /dbus su ye shes bdag po la/ /shar du nag 'joms chen po ste/ /lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya/ /nub tu khro bo dmigs pa la/ /byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya/ /shar lho lho nub nub byang dang / /byang shar mtshams su

dgod pa ni/ /glang mgo khro tshe gcod sbyong rje/ /las grub brgyad de go rim bzhin/ /steng 'og dmar po brag dgon bsgroms te dgod/ /zla gam lam mo gsum rnams so/ /sgo sgor sgo srungs ma rnams bri/ /de yi yum dang

bcas pa rnams/ /khro bo nyid dang sku 'thun pa'o/ /sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la/ /sgeg mo g.yon du bsten byas la/ /sngags g.yog mdzes par tshogs byas la/ /mgu ba'i phrin las brtsam par bya/ /ske tse thal ba rus

pa la/ /'dzam+b+ha la yi gzugs lta bur/ /byas la snying gar bri ba ni/ /a ma ba la si ti 'am/ /gang 'dod pa yi yi ge de/ /phaT da swA hAs dam ltar bya/ /ming byang gong ltar bri byas la/ /gang ltar mtsham pa bzhin du bzhag /de la 'di

yang rab tu brjod/ /oM a kro badzra shin+ta~M na ga badzra swA hA/ oM a kro te ka shin+ta~M ba la bu~M zhes brjod la snying gar brgyab na/ thams cad mgu nas dang ba'i sems kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas zhi ba'i las byas zin nas/ phyogs bcu'i

gdug pa zhi bar bya ste/ bdag la mi dga' ba med na las 'grub pa yin no/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad zhi ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rgyas par

bya ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /gser las grub pa'i yul dag la'ang / /dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas ste/ /rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la/ /ba yi chag chag btab

byas te/ /rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas/ /thig 'di gdab pa rab tu brtsam/ /gser las grub pa'i thig skud la/ /dpal ldan 'phel ba'i sems dang bcas/ /slob ma dam pa las grub par/ /bsams la thig 'di gdab par bya/ /

pho brang gser la rtse mo g.yu/ /rdo rje brtsig pa gser las grub/ /gru chad sgo rnams lcags las grub/ /rnal 'byor sngags pa blo ldan pas/ /thig bzhi re'u cha brgyad du 'gyur/ /mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can/ /de la sogs pa

bsam par bya/ /rin chen skyil dkrung 'dug byas la/ /dbus su gsang sngags bdag pos te/ /phyogs phyogs sgo ba dam pa rnams/ /snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang / /rang sngags skyes bu de bskyed do/ /oM a kro te ka puSh+Ti~M pa la na hU~M/

oM a kro puSh+Ti~M ti ba ta na s+t+wa~M/ zhes brjod pas bdag po yab yum la/ /'khor rnams 'bru re ba las sam/ /rang rang bskyed pa dam pa ste/ /sngags dang ldan par ting 'dzin gsal/ /bzhugs dang brten dang mchod pa dang / /phyag byed

pa la sogs pa yi/ /las kyi bya ba ma lus par/ /thams cad ma lus tshang bar bya/ /skyed dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /rgyal ba bsnyen ste thag mi ring / /rang grub 'bras bu de la sogs/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /dngos

grub dam pa rab ster zhes/ /'dren pa dpa' bos yang dag bshad/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas nas/ /sa zhag gser las grub pa la/ /gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya/ /phyi gan gan kyal mnan byas

la/ /nang hU~M puSh+Ti~M a pu tse swA hA/ snying gar bris nas brjod bya ba/ /snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste/ /bla med dam pas rab tu bshad/ /oM badzra puSh+Ti~M a yu pa shang shrI puSh+Ti~M swA hA zhes brjod na thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa las

bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad rgyas bar bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bdag nyid dbang gis 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /

zangs las 'brel pa'i yul dag la/ /rang dbang med de dbang bsdus nas/ /'du ba'i sems dang ldan byas te/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya/ /zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag la/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma dag dang 'dra/ /legs

par khod snyom zin pa dang / /thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/ /lte ba can la rtsibs brgyad pa/ /kun tu zlum pas rgyas pa mtha'/ /lte dbus gzhu rdungs bris byas la/ /de stengs bdag po dam pa gzhag /thams cad ma lus mchog tu 'gugs/ /

sa ba la yang thogs pa med/ /zhes ni yang dag bla med nges/ /bshad par bya ste rab tu bsten/ /gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam/ /sangs rgyas byang chub la

sogs rnams/ /gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams/ /ma nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /bsgrubs na 'grub par bshad pa'o/ /de dag 'gugs par gyur pa na/ /phal pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /bsdu dang 'dren pa byang chub lam/ /

'di dag go 'phang thob bya'i phyir/ /yungs kar rkang rjes sa 'am gzhan/ /khrag gsum thal chen sres byas la/ /ga 'u'i nang du blugs byas la/ /ga 'u gnyis ni kha sbyar te/ /skud pa dmar po zangs la sogs/ /bcing ba bsdams te dkris byas

la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog tu gzhag /yungs kar zangs gnyis bsreg byas te/ /dud pas ga 'u de la bdug /de la bdugs par gyur pa dang / /bzlas pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing / /lan grangs khri tshad du ma ru/ /brjod na sangs rgyas la

sogs rnams/ /'gugs par 'gyur na phal pa gzhan/ /smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs/ /oM badzra a kro many+dzu shrI pa shang ma hA sarba ti la bru~M/ lan grangs mang du brjod byas na/ /ci ltar bsams pa thams cad 'gugs/ /rgya shug bskus

pa'i khu ba dang / /ma yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis/ /snga ma bzhin du bkug byas na/ /'gugs par 'gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad/ /yang na rang gi lag pa'ang rung / /zhes gsungs pas thams cad ma lus par 'dus te/ dper na phyogs

thams cad nas mtsho la sbrang ma 'du ba bzhin du 'dus te bdag gi dbang du bya ba de dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rjes gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gshin rje'i tshogs 'du mdzad de/ rang bzhin gyi mthu can 'di gsungs so/ /'byung byed ye shes dkyil 'khor ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la/ /bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste/ /yum yang de

bzhin de yi'o/ /yab yum gnyis med byin brlabs las/ /thig skud rgyus pa lcags las byas/ /de ni las kyi thig ces bya/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /kun tu gru bzhi sgo

khyud can/ /gru chang ldan te dur khrod rgyan/ /mdzes par bris te gzhan na min/ /sten pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin/ /bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas/ /bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya/ /oM a kro te ka hU~M a/ hU~M badzra be ta li rag sha

man/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab

tu 'gul lo/ /ldeg ldeg / rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus

dma' ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs pas bdag cag spro lags so/ /

'jig rten du 'di lta bur mthu can la bdag zhu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis khro bar mdzad pa de la bdag mngon du sems can thams cad rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen por

'du mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /oM shrI pa ra yag sha gu ya sarba ta kri badzra kA la r+'u pa ma ra na phaT ces gsungs pas/ 'jig rten na dbang che ba dang / mthu che ba la sogs pa thams cad btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /

phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang / /gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la/ /rang sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las/ /phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin/ /de bas nan tan bskyed byas te/ /drag po'i tsham ngam bshad par bya/ /'jig

rten bcud kyi gdug pa kun/ /tsham ngam glog ltar 'gyur ba las/ /ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya/ /e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas/ /phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems/ /rigs kyi

yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni/ /rtag par bsgoms te de bzhin gshegs par bya/ /rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams ni/ /gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod grub par ro/ /mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa der byas

te/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang / /ga bu pad+ma dam pa dang / /kham pa rdza yi 'ji ba yi/ /khrag sna gsum dang 'gi wang ngo / /de dag phrin las mchog yin te/ /grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs/ /

phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun/ /'dul bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las drag po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/ ye shes lhun

gyis grub pa'i ngang la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /rang bzhin 'phags pa kun tu shes rab ste/ /de bzhin rnam par mi rtog yin pas na/ /'di gnyis chos kyi sku zhes rab tu bshad/ /chos kyi longs spyod 'dul ba'i

don la rgyas/ /'gro ba'i don rdzogs ma lus skur 'byung dang / /bdud dang mu stegs srin po gdul ba'i phyir/ /mtshan dang dpe byad gzugs su sprul nas ni/ /ma lus tshar gcod don du 'di gsungs so/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud zlum por

bcas/ /sbrul gyi rgya gram dag gi mtha' bskor la/ /lte bar rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya/ /de yi steng du ka pA la gnyis la/ /gcig la gshin rje dbu drug pa yi gzugs/ /gcig la yum chen khro gnyer gzugs bris la/ /nang du dgra bo rkang rjes

sa dang ni/ /dri dang de bzhin khrag sna gsum/ /thal chen rgya shug bskus pa'i khu ba dang / /brdzis la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/ /bcug la skud pa dkar pos bcing / /dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag par bya/ /oM ya man ta ka hriSh+TiM

badzra kro d+ha ya man ta ka badzra kro d+ha phaT phaT a/ zhes brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ yab yum sku mdog mthing nag la/ /dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes/ /dbu la thod pa rlon pas brgyan/ /sku la sbrul nag chun po dang / /zhabs bzhi brkyang

bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni/ /g.yas kyi dang po sdigs mdzub la/ /rgyu zhags lcags kyu bar tha ma/ /dung chen tri shul gsal shing g.yon/ /de ltar cha lugs gsal ba dang / /dbyangs 'di blang bar

nan tan bya/ /hU~M rngam pa'i rgyal po khrag 'thung gshin rje gshed/ /khams gsum dbang sdud rtagasu zhal gsum po/ /dbyings nas sprul pa'i yab yum lhun gyis grub/ /las ngan 'khrul pa'i sems can gdul dka' ba/ /gdug pa

de dag 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ zhes pa lan grangs mang du brjod/ /des ni brtan par bzhugs par 'gyur/ /khrag chen rgod khrag sha dang tshil/ /chen po la sogs gtor

ma bsham/ /de ni dkyil 'khor thog dag tu/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba las/ /sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas/ /oM badzra hasta ba ba he ha dA na hrISh+TiM che ge mo ma ra ya hu~M hu~M phaT phaT/ che ge mo hasta ba pri ti nir te sa hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/

nyin zhag gcig la lan 'bum bzlas/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas/ /de dag bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang / /gtor ma'i las dag brtsam bya ste/ /bskyed dang bskul dang rdzogs pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i khro bo spyan drangs te/ /bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo sogs/ /

ma lus rdzogs pa'i phrin las bya/ /de ltar phrin las rdzogs pa dang / /yang nas yang du bstab pa bya/ /de ltar bstab pa byas pas na/ /dgra bgegs dbang 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /de nas yang 'di ched du brjod de gsungs so/ /\u0f00 nga ni

phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /bder gshegs thugs kyi sras yin par/ /bdud dang srin po log 'dren rnams/ /ma lus tshar gcod byin brlabs te/ /mgon po gshin rje nyid kyi sras/ /don rnams thams cad ma lus pa/ /de nyid du ni

bsgrub par bya/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ /phrin las rdo rje can gyi mdzod/ /zhes brjod cing sngags kyis brdeg pa ni phrin las mchog gi rgyal po zhes gsungs so/ /dus dang dus dang zhag grangs ni/ /nyi ma gcig

la stong rtsa gcig /nam gyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig /tho rangs thun gcig brgya rtsa gcig /srod kyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig /de ltar nyin zhag gsum bar du/ /bzlas pa zhag grangs tshad bya zhing / /phyag rgya bca' zhing gzugs la brdeg /nya la

byas na gdon mi za/ /oM ma ra na kha da sarba hrI Sh+Ti~M ya man/ hu~M hu~M tre kha da pa ra na pa la hu~M hu~M phaT phaT swA hA/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dgra bo'i gzugs la brdeg go/ oM badzra hU~M kham s+pha ra na phaT/ hU~M A be sha a/ hu~M hu~M phaT phaT

a/ yang phyag rgya gong ma bcas la/ oM badzra kro d+ha ni la tan tra hu~M hu~M hrISh+Ti~M kri ta na na/ hu~M hrISh+Ti~M bi kri ta nan nan zhes brjod la/ bdag gi lag pas dbang bskur ro/ /yang phyag rgya bcas la/ sngags 'di la yang lan grangs mang du bya'o/ /a~M badzra

tsaN+Da hrISh+Ti~M badzra sti ra ba~M/ kha hi hu~M hu~M che ge mo dbang du bsdus shig /hril hril zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do/ /rdo rje rgya gram gyi phyag rgyas brdeg go/ yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go/ oM badzra kang ka ma ka la yan hU~M phaT phaT a/ zhes 'bum bzlas

la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas brdego / yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go/ oM badzra a gu sha tre tha sti ra ba~M hu~M hu~M phaT phaT che ge mo ma ra ya dza hU~M zhes dbang du sdus shing / hu~M hu~M phaT phaT zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do/ /rdo rje gdengs pa'i phyag rgya bcas la

dbang du bsdu'o/ /yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go/ oM hu~M hu~M phaT phaT 'dus 'dus rang rang ya~M ya~M ra~M ra~M hring hring du ba b+h+yo hU~M phaT che ge mo dun b+h+yo zhes bzlas la/ kha T+wA~M gi phyag rgyas brdeg go/ de ltar las de dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge

'dzin dang ldan par byas la/ bzlas pa byas na las ci byas pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar nges zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags dbang sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed/ bcom ldan 'das kun la khyab pa'i phrin las bsgrub pa 'di/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lnga phung yan lag gzhom pa dang / /dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa dang / /'bras bu

rgyal bar bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /nan tur phrin las bshad par bya/ /dang po'i las ni rgyas dang bsad/ /dgug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol/ /sbyor ba'i gdug pa ma lus kun/ /phrin las 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /dang por btsal ba'i btsal

thabs ni/ /rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal/ /stag mo gang mchong stabs dang / /seng ge gangs la 'gying tshul dang / /khwa spyad gzan la rgyug tshul dang / /bya rgod gzan la 'babs tshul dang / /dom chen rmi lam rmi tshul dang / /khwa skeg

thang shing snyag tshul gyis/ /ro yi phung po btsal bar bya/ /ri la 'dug na 'gying bas btsal/ /sribs la 'dug la mchong bas btsal/ /gdags la 'dug na 'dug pas btsal/ /'or na 'dug na 'babs pas btsal/ /brag la 'dug na rmi

bas btsal/ /nags la 'dug na snyeg pas btsal/ /rgyal rigs yin na seng ge gtang / /bram ze yin na stag mo gtang / /rje'u rigs yin na bya rgod gtang / /rmang rigs yin na dom gyis bya/ /ma ning yin na spre'u yis bya/ /dog la yin

na wa spyang gtang / /de ltar ro yi tshol stangs ni/ /rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal/ /brtags nas 'ongs ba gyur pa dang / /gshin rje rgyal po'i tsham ngam bya/ /khro bo bcu yi stangs stabs kyis/ /ro la kun tu bskor byas la/ /dkyil

'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag /de ltar gzhag pa'i las byas nas/ /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/ /lag pa g.yas pa lho yi phyogs/ /lag pa g.yon pa nub kyi phyogs/ /rkang pa

g.yas pa shar gyi phyogs/ /rkang pa g.yon pa byang gi phyogs/ /de ltar gan kyal bzhag byas la/ /da ni phur ba dgod bya ste/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /lag gnyis rkang gnyis pho mtshan dang / /lkog ma de bzhin snying ka dang / /lte ba

pus mo dpung pa gnyis/ /gru mo de bzhin long bu gnyis/ /mtshogs ma de bzhin spyi bo dang / /sku dang de bzhin mchan khung gnyis/ /dpral ba rnams su gdab byas la/ /phur pa de dag lha yi skur/ /rab tu brtags te

goms pa dang / /rang bzhin gnas nas gshegs pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin du bsgoms pa dang / /gzugs brnyan nang du bkod pa gsum/ /tshad pas gdungs pa'i bye ma la/ /mar zhu de bzhin thim pa bzhin/ /gnyis su med par shes

bya la/ /gong du bstan pa'i lha rnams ni/ /rnam shes bzhi dang dbang po bzhi/ /de las gyur pa'i yul rnams ni/ /brgyad po'i ngang du shes par bya/ /sgo ma lus la grags pa'o/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i phyir/ /steng 'og khro bo de las

gyur/ /de dag kun gyi sku gsungs thugs/ /ma mo gsum gyi ngang nyid de/ /yab ni kun la khyab pa la/ /yum ni kun la sdud pa ste/ /bya ba byed pa bdag nyid do/ /phung po kun la khyab pa la/ /mnyes pas phul phyin lha yi tshogs/ /'gro drug

kun la ma lus snang / /de ltar las rnams zin pa dang / /zhag grangs du bya dam yang bca'/ /dngos grub thob par 'dod pa yi/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i ting 'dzin gsal/ /de ltar byas na mi la sogs/ /thams cad dbang du 'du bar gsungs/ /

dgra bgegs la lta smos ci dgos/ /drag po'i phrin las grub 'dod pas/ /dgra bo'i ming byang bris byas la/ /ba~M gyi kha yi nang du gzhug /rdo rje rgya gram rgya yis gdab/ /he ru ka yi phyag rgyas gnon/ /yungs kar rgyal pos drag tu brdeg /

rgya shug bkus pas drag tu blug /nyi ma bzhi la drag tu brdeg /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad/ /dam rdzas mchod pa shin tu bgram/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drag tu bya/ /yengs na bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /g.yeng bar mi mdzad

khro bos gsungs/ /des ni las kyi 'bras bu yang / /shin tu zad pa med pa ste/ /mkha' la 'phur dang sa la 'dzul/ /chu la bying med mngon shes ldan zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud

las ro langs kyi bsgrub pa la ngan sngags kyi phur bus gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /ye shes 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor

bskyed steng na/ /ye shes nyi ma gsal ba'i thig phran gdab/ /mu khyud zlum po sbrul gyi zhags pa bri/ /stegs bu phyogs mtshams phur bus bskor bar bya/ /de ltar bris pa'i dkyil du dgod pa ni/ /oM ni dbus kyi lte ba la/ /shar du hri la

lho ru s+t+wa~M/ /nub phyogs hU~M la byang du ha/ /byang shar mtshams su dza zhes pa/ /shar lho tri la lho nub me/ /nub byang a la rab tu brten/ /rten pa'i yi ge de bkod nas/ /dbus su brtan par bsgom pa ni/ /gshin rje ste sku dmar nag la/ /

dbu gsum po la phyag kyang drug /dbu la thod pa tshal gyis brgyan/ /zhal g.yas smug nag g.yon ljang ba/ /dbus ni sku dang rab 'thun pa/ /sku la thod pa rgyan gyi tshal/ /zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ /yab kyi sku la rab 'jug pa/ /

g.yon phyogs gnas pa gong ma bzhin/ /oM a mr-i ta ta ka sarba a mr-i ta kro Ta hU~M phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kro Ti hU~M phaT/ de ltar yab yum gsal bar bskyed/ /pad+ma'i gdan la rab bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor la sogs pa'i rim pa ni/ /bskyed pa gong

ma'i rim pa'o/ /rtag tu bzlas pa bsnyen pa'i sngags/ /mi drag mi bul mi zhan par/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgoms byas te/ /zhi la 'tsher ba'i ting 'dzin la/ /ri rab dbus kyi lte dbus la/ /rab brten 'og gi go go nas/ /rdo rje tshe yi

dbang stsol te/ /phyogs bcu gdug pa'i tshe 'dren te/ /gdug pa ma lus 'gugs par 'gyur/ /tshe'i snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra a ko a yu pa la si ti ni bru~M a/ des ni tshe yi dbang thob nas/ /sangs rgyas sku

dang mnyam pa dang / /bskal pa ma zhig bar du ni/ /lo lnga lon pa bzhin du gnas/ /de nas bskul ba'i gnas 'di gsungs/ /e ma'o phyogs bcu kun nas 'dus pa yi/ /ye shes rgyal po'i thig le 'di/ /gsang chen rmad du byung ba ste/ /rgyud

drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /chos kyi sku 'am chos kyi dbyings/ /don dam tshig dang mngon sum pa/ /dngos po mtshan ma thams cad las/ /

khyab pa'i mya ngan thugs rje che/ /phra mo sems kyi rang bzhin ste/ /gti mug mun pa sel ba ste/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun dang bral/ /shin tu sad pa mya ngan 'das/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin gshin rje ste/ /rdo rje tshe'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'o zhes

gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rngam pa'i zhal nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /e ma'o phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ye nas dben/ /bder gshegs thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub/ /mtha' gnyis

spangs pa'i ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i stong khams 'jig rten rgyan du bcas/ /thabs dang shes rab kyis ni dbang bskur na/ /bdud dang srin po log 'dren tshe bsdus te/ /dbang bskur gnang ba des kyang byin bskyed de/ /shar

phyogs dri za'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig /oM badzra ku la e swa shwa ra na ha ha ho ho hU~M hU~M zhes ni dbyangs dang bcas pa yis/ /rdo rje rigs la grub pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /mgon po gshin rje tshe dbang bskur/ /de nas

rin po che'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o rin chen 'chang ba kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang byed pa/ /gtso mchog khyab par byin brlabs te/ /mi 'gyur rigs kyi tshe thob nas/ /lho phyogs gshin rje'i

gnas nas tshe drongs shig /oM rat+na ku la a yu he he ho ho ha~M/ rin chen dgyes pa'i dbang bskur bas/ /khyad par byin brlabs thob gyur cig /de nas pad+ma rigs kyi tshe'i dbang 'di yang gsungs so/ /e ma'o khro gtum rngam pa'i tshogs/ /

pad+ma rigs kyi dbang phyug ste/ /snang ba med las lhun gyis grub/ /rdo rje 'chang gis dbang bskur bas/ /klu 'dul tshe yi dbang thob shog /pad+ma ku la A yu he he ho ho ha~M/ lhun gyis grub pa tshe yi dbang / /thogs med dam pa thob par shog /

de nas las kyi rigs kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o rang bzhin mtshan ma med pa yi/ /ye shes lnga ldan phrin las gtso/ /gnyis su med pa las kyi rigs/ /las rnams thams cad dbang bskur bas/ /gnod sbyin

gdon la tshe drongs te/ /gnod sbyin bgegs 'dul dbang thob shog /oM karma ku la A yu he he ho ho ha~M/ zhes brjod pas thams cad tshe'i dbang nyid du gyur te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /tshad med bzhi yi thugs rjes kyang / /nyon mongs

dgra rnams zhi gyur cig ces phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ro/ /'phags pa las bzhin 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'jam dpal tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom

ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid de/ /mtha' byed 'byung ba de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ngo / /gshin rje las kyi phrin las 'di/ /myos dang mgo 'khor byed pa dang / /yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug par byed/ /log 'dren rnam pa drug tu

bstan/ /log 'dren mthar byed dkyil 'khor ni/ /bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de/ /yi dgas kyis ni gos la bri/ /sum brtseg ldan pa'i mu ran la/ /dbyangs kyis yi ges kun tu bskor/ /hriSh+Ti'i sngags kyis mnon byas la/ /tha la thod

pa gtang bar bya/ /de nas sngags kyis dgang bar bya/ /ya ma na te ra tsa'i tshogs/ /sa ste 'byung byed do yi rten/ /me ste thams cad sreg pa'o/ /bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed skur bskyed la/ /yum yang de ru bsgom byas la/ /phyogs bcu

gdug pa thams cad kun/ /ma lus tsham ngam drag par bya/ /bzlas pa'i snying po ma nor bar/ /sgra dang 'du byed rab spangs te/ /bde zhing yid 'ong gnas dag las/ /rab tu sdang mig sdang sems bcas/ /sgra dang bcas pa'i sems spangs te/ /

nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar/ /rgyun dang dus su bstan pa'o/ /bar bar bskul ba'i las bya zhing / /bcol ba'i las dag rab tu brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo gshin rje'i tshogs thams cad yum btsun mo dang gnyis su med par byas te/

bzlas pa'i sngags 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo / /oM hriSh+Ti bi kri ta nan/ hu~M hu~M ba na a nud b+ha ba/ sarba d+harma tsa tsAr+ya a ti ba ha~M/ oM la~M ya~M a~M/ badzra bo d+hi ta thA ga ta kro d+hi shwa ri/ a byi ta badzra kro d+hi shwa ri/ he he ha~M ha~M/

sngags 'di rab tu brjod byas pas/ /kha dog che zhing lus bo che ba dang / /rgya dag yongs su ma chad thams cad nam mkha' ste/ /gsal ba'i shes rab thams cad nam mkha' 'dra/ /mthar phyin sngags kyi lung la mkhas par bya/ /de yi sbyor ba

thams cad dgyes skongs shing / /dbang sdud sngags ste drag po'i las dang sbyar/ /mi dmigs gtso bo'i sngags dang phyag rgyar gnas/ /sgrol dang mthar phyin phrin las gnas su bstan/ /ting 'dzin rim pa 'di dag ldan par bya/ /khro bo de

bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin dang / sgyu ma la dbang sgyur ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / go 'phang chen po la sbyar ba'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thugs rjes zhe sdang sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / shes rab kyi 'dod chags sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyis gti mug sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan gyis nga rgyal 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis phrag dog 'joms pa'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /de dag 'joms pa'i sngags ni 'di dag go/ pradz+nyA ku la/ dz+nyA na ku la/ d+ha ka ku la/ gu na ku la/ bir+ya ku la/ b+hu ta ku la/ badzra ku la/ pad+ma ku la/ kar ma ku la/ rad na ku la/ sarba ta thA ga to ho/ zhes brjod nas 'di skad ces

gsungs so/ /dper na me dang 'od bzhin du/ /'od la sbrang ma 'du na yang / /me lce'i drod ni 'od la yod/ /'od kyis sbrang 'tshig ci bzhin du/ /skyon gyis dri ma thams cad dang / /bdud dang mu stegs log 'dren dang / /mi mthun pa yi

dgra dang bgegs/ /shes rab thabs kyis gzir gnon pa'i/ /me lce dang ni sbrang ma 'dra'o/ /tha dad pa yi mi mthun pa'ang / /'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid/ /'khrigs pa med cing sgrol bar byed/ /mi skye ye shes ral gri yin/ /

nyon mongs sdug bsngal dral byas nas/ /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa yi/ /rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa yi/ /nyon mongs sems can mtho ris gnas/ /bsgral ba'i zhing du smos pa de/ /de la de bzhin drag tu bya/ /rigs dang lo grangs 'thun pa la/ /

de bzhin byas na skyon pa ste/ /de dag yongs su shes par bya/ /las dang bya ba rtsol ba rnams/ /nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sad/ /de rtags dka' ba mi 'gyur te/ /mi la ya yi 'og gos la/ /'gi wang dag gis bris byas te/ /'og

nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dang / /gang bya spal la bri byas la/ /raka ta dag gi kha chus bran/ /thub pa drug gi snying po bri/ /gsang ba'i sngags 'di drag tu brjod/ /oM hriSh+Ti kro d+ha bi kri ta/ hriSh+Ti kro d+hi ma ra ta/ pra sad he te ba mu ka /he hang he

hang / ka la ru pa hu~M hu~M phaT phaT a/ de skad gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas/ /dgra dang bgegs dang mu stegs dang / /bdud dang srin po ma lus rnams/ /gzir cing mnon pa drag tu bya/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi 'byung po de/ /gdul bar bya ba'i

don ched du/ /khro bo'i sku ru bsgom byas te/ /thams cad bsgral bar bya ba yi/ /rang bzhin grub pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pra mArta na/ na mo badzra badzra ki ma na ta/ a hang bra khu ma khu ma mo mu sti swA hA/ de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis/ /rang bzhin

gyis ni dbang du 'gyur/ /bdud rnams dag ni khro zhing gtum/ /srin po dag ni 'jigs shing rngam/ /mu stegs log 'dren rgol bar byed/ /de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /phrin las dam pa 'di brtsams so/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin

bris la/ /dbus kyi pho brang lte ba la/ /bdud rnams 'dul ba'i snying po bri/ /shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ /dri za dbang bsdu'i snying po bri/ /lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la/ /mu stegs sgrol ba'i snying po bri/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi

'khor lo la/ /klu rnams tshar gcod snying po bri/ /byang gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la/ /gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dbang sdud bri/ /hu~M big+ha nan/ hu~M raka sha nan/ oM tir ti ka nan/ oM ma ra na nan/ mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lte dbus su/ /
