sngags btab gang zhig 'thas par bcag /bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor stod/ /rgyar ni khru drug pa yi tshad/ /tshogs bsag khru gang 'phang du bstod/ /mtha' skor khru gang pa yi tshad/ /dbang bskur sor bzhi'i tshad bstod de/ /ji ltar gru

bzhi rgyar bskyed cing / /dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas/ /tshad mnyam grog sbur la sogs pa/ /rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang / /snying po lnga dang 'bru lnga dag /dri chu sngags kyi btab byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor snying por gzhag par

bya/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te/ /stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyang / /dri zhim sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /chu rgyun phyogs bcur gtor byas shing / /sna tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te/ /lha tshogs 'gron rnams

tshim par bya/ /slob dpon rigs kyi gtsor gnas pa'i/ /rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas nas/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo gros ldan/ /tshul bzhin du ni gsol ba btab/ /dbus kyi sa yi char gnas pa/ /kun 'byung nam mkha' dag pa'i

sngags/ /brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon las/ /dkyil 'khor ri brtsegs bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje bsdams pa sar gzhag cing / /byams pa'i rdo rje rnam dag cing / /rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas/ /phyag mtshan dran pa thog mthar

rgyan/ /rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang / /gur sogs khro bo me 'od bcas/ /gtso bo gar gyi dbang phyug skus/ /pad bcas thal mo lan gsum brdab/ /'od 'phros gnas kun g.yos pa la/ /lha mo gser mdog rgyan gyis mdzes/ /me tog

phreng ba bum thogs pa'i/ /lus phyed sa la 'thon byas te/ /'thun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas/ /mchod bstod zhal gsil sogs 'bul zhing / /dri zhim las rnams ma rdzogs par/ /de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs nas/ /bdud sogs

bsgo ba'i ngag bcas mdzad/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa las/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du shog /ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms mdzad pa/ /de bzhin bdag

gis bdud las kyang / /rgyal bar byas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /de nas slob dpon rgyan rdzogs pa'i/ /rdo rje dril 'gying bcas pa la/ /dam tshig nye bar bskul ba yi/ /glu dag phyogs bzhi'i gnas nas gdon/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba'i mgon gyur pa'i/ /

chos kyi me longs gsal ba ston/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi gsang ba pa/ /rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig mchog /ye shes dri ma med pa'i tshul/ /sgrib sogs ma lus bral byed pa'i/ /rdo rje pad mo mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /dkyil 'khor chen po drug bcu'i bdag /theg chen

chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdzod/ /gsang gsum pad mo dag pa'i dbyings/ /so sor gsar ba'i don bstan pa/ /rdo rje lta bus gnas kun sbyor/ /zab cing rgya chen sgra sna tshogs/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bshad pa'i dus/ /rgyal po yon tan dpe dang bral/ /rin chen lhun po'i mdzod

mnga' ba/ /nyams dga' thugs rje'i zhing rnams dgongs/ /bdag med mnyam pa'i ye shes can/ /phrin las dag pas zad par mdzod/ /gsang gsum sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag /rigs mchog shes rab brtson byed cing / /spyan bzang dag pas 'gro la gzigs/ /slar

nyid khro bo chen po'i sku/ /zhal lnga phyag cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /'jigs byed 'bar ba'i skur gnas te/ /mgur nas hU~M bsgoms sgra sgrogs shing / /rdo rje pad+ma lta ba yis/ /lha rnams bdag la bsdu byed cing / /ma dang ta las byung ba yi/ /mig gnyis nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor

brjid/ /'bar zhing thams cad dag byas nas/ /slar nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /shangs kyi rlung sgrom 'bar ba nas/ /'jig rten thams cad 'bar byed pa/ /rdo rje'i 'gros las byung ba yi/ /sna tshogs sa gzhir brtan par byas/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na

hU~M/ gr-ih+nA pa ya gr-ih+nA pa ya hU~M hU~M/ a na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ phyag gi mtshan ma kun 'khrol zhing / /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spro bar byed/ /hU~M lha dbang rlung lha'i tshogs/ /gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang / /sha za gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs/ /

mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma lus rnams/ /gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa/ /srung byed sa yi bdag por bas/ /thos pa tsam gyi myur bar dengs/ /nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed/ /gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che/ /pad+ma rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga /thal ba'i tshogs bzhin

rlags par byed/ /rab 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'o/ /pad+ma'i 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis/ /gal te gang gi dam tshig bcag /'dod gsum skye gnas gsal byas te/ /'jigs par 'gyur zhing gzhan 'dis med/ /sa las yongs su bskor byas te/ /

bgegs byed bya phyir phur bar gdab/ /oM g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya sarba duSh+Tan phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha rod A dz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ lag pa bskyod cing rkang pa bskyod/ /ngo mtshar khro bo'i zur mig bzhin/ /smin ma khro gnyer g.yon

mdzad cing / /kha yi pad+ma 'dzum bcas pas/ /so so'i phyag rgya gnas su bsgyur/ /'gying bag bcas pas zhal la bstod/ /rta mchog khro bo'i gar thabs kyis/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i tshul/ /ba yi rnam lnga dri sres chus/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyer byugs

nas/ /lha rnams gnas su dri yi chus/ /thig le gru bzhir zlum por bya/ /rang gi sngags dang me tog rnams/ /so so'i gnas su dgram par bya/ /dbu rgyan rol mo mchod pa'i tshogs/ /lha mgon gnas kyi nye 'khor mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams nye ba'i

sa/ /mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par bya/ /cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs pa dang / /bzod gsol bskang ba'i don ched du/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba bya/ /oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dri D+ho

me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi~M me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+ta~M shri ya ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya/ sa twa AH/ gsang sngags rgyal po

bla med pa'i/ /lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa ma lus zad byed cing / /las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed/ /pus mo sa la btsugs byas te/ /lag pa g.yas pa spos 'dzin cing / /g.yon pas dril bu dkrol byas te/ /tshig

'dis gsol ba gdab par bya/ /oM bder gshegs stobs bcu brtson ldan 'gro ba'i mgon/ /mi 'jigs la sogs yon tan rtsal med ldan/ /rigs gnyis thabs kyis brgyud pa'i dkyil 'khor che/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' thugs rje shugs chen po/ /

dga' mdzad dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs chen la/ /tshul khrims la sogs phung po mnyes gyur cig /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtsor byas pa'i/ /dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni/ /mnyes pa'i tshogs rnams kun las rnam grol zhing / /bde gshegs

yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /'dod yon 'bras bu phun sum tshogs bsgrub dang / /'gro rnams ma lus thugs rjes bzung byed cing / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgya chen brtson lags na/ /mgon po'i bka'

drin rjesu brtse dgongs te/ /khyed kyis rab tu gnas par mdzad 'os lags/ /me tog dri bzang phreng sogs 'di bzhes la/ /ji srid 'gro ba'i don rnams ma grub par/ /de srid thugs rjes bzung zhing bzhugs nas ni/ /bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis

rlobs/ /de nas slob ma la bos te/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod theg pa'i snod/ /rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyon/ /dad gus dga' ba'i shugs phyung shog /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /cho ga bzang po 'di bstan bya/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas

rnams dang / /ma byon de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /de bzhin da lta'i sems can rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te/ /gsang ba zab mo bla na med/ /cho ga bzang po 'di spyod pas/ /skyes mchog rang gi gnas nyid du/ /kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen

brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med par/ /pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bdud tshogs shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad/ /de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi/ /blo gros mchog 'di khyod kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
'dun la/ /kun tu skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gsang sngags can/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so yi/ /'khor lo bzhugs pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /kun nas skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /

dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che/ /khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ /khyod kyi skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /de nas legs spyod slob ma yis/ /skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa bzung / /dkon

mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum po gzung bar bya/ /bdag gis sdig pa byas pa dang / /bgyid pa rjes su yi rang ba/ /mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /rgyal ba sras bcas

'khor rnams dang / /rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis/ /bsgom bzlas la sogs bsod nams la/ /dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo / /sems nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa'i/ /tshogs spyod byang chub sems

dpa' la/ /bdag ni rab tu skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ci lta bar/ /skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub sems mchog dri med pas/ /'gro ba rgya che tshogs la dmigs/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'gro rnams kyis/ /thugs

kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad pa/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings byang chub sems/ /dus gsum dag tu gtang mi bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon la gus shing / /dus kun du ni yon tan bzung / /rnal 'byor gsang ba smad mi bya/ /rdo rje spun la mig bzhin blta/ /gsang

sngags phyag rgya'i rnam pa dag /brtson pas dus gsum dran par bya/ /de nas shis par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang dang mtshan ma'i yi ge sngags/ /byin brlabs ye shes bskyed par bya/ /slar yang bdug pa me tog dang / /mar me dri chab la sogs pa'i/ /

rang gi gnas su 'dug cing dbul/ /bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can/ /lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas/ /rlon pa drang zhing 'bu rjes med/ /chag gas med pa'i tshems shing ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis dri bzang byug /rtse mo me tog phreng

btags pa/ /sngags zlos dri chus bsang bar bya/ /rigs kyi mtshon char byin brlabs pas/ /oM sarba pA pa da ha na badzra shi ta ni swA hA/ / yi ge sum bcas sngags brjod cing / /shar du kha bltas slob ma la/ /bden pa bdar zhing

sbyin bya zhing / /des kyang mi smra blang bar bya/ /gri rtse lta bus lce bzhar zhing / /phra mo'i phyogs kyi so brung ste/ /sa gzhi dri yis byugs pa ru/ /phan tshun mi lta dor bar bya/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun gyis/ /zhi sogs

dngos grub mtshan ma brtag /gyen thur rab dang 'bring gis lta/ /mtshams kyis 'jig rten las rnams 'grub/ /las dag pa yi sngags bzlas nas/ /sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas pa'i/ /chu gtsang dris sbyang khyor ba gsum/ /nye reg

'thor ba'i tshul du sbyin/ /oM hri bi shud d+ha sarba d+harma pA pa ni tsa sha bi sho d+harma sarba kal pa na a pa na ya hU~M/ /gtsang ma'i ras la legs bkal ba'i/ /srung kud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i/ /yi ge gsum gyis sngags bzlas nas/ /de yi dpung pa g.yon

par bcing / /ku sha rtse mo ma 'khrugs pa'i/ /bam po gnyis su sbams pa yis/ /yab yum gnyis su byin brlabs pa'i/ /sngas dang stan du sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba dusti ku ru swA hA/ /dga' ba'i gtam gyis gzeng bstod cing / /mchod

pa gtor ma'i tshogs bcas pas/ /lha tshogs rnams la bsngo byas nas/ /bden pa brjod cing ci bder nyal/ /mi smra dge ba'i sems bcas pas/ /rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /slar nyid slob dpon nang song ste/ /dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i ting 'dzin

gyis/ /lha rnams mchod cing bstod bya ste/ /dge ba'i sems kyis nyal bar bya/ /de nas skya rengs shar dus su/ /slob dpon slob ma sngas 'ongs te/ /kye kye bzhin bzangs rnams longs cig /rmi lam mtshan ma ci mthong ba/ /bden pa brjod pa'i dus

yin no/ /des kyang ci bzhin smra bar bya/ /rab 'bring mtshan ma'i ltas bstan cing / /ngan pa'i ltas rnams bzlog par bya/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs dang / /ba yi rnam lngas byug par bya/ /dngos rnams mtshan ma las grol ba'i/ /stong pa chen

po ye shes bsgom/ /rin chen rgyu las byung ba yi/ /bum pa mgul ring lto ba bzlum/ /kha khyer zhabs bteg phel ka che/ /dri zhim tshon dkar legs byugs te/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs gnas te/ /so so'i mtshan ma'i

yi ge rgyan/ /rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs rnams/ /mchod nas bstan la bkram par bya/ /rin chen sna lnga 'bru lnga dang / /snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang / /bkra shis rdzas lnga gzhug par bya/ /mgul chings gzungs thag kha rgyan sogs/ /dam tshig

lha rnams gsal byas nas/ /ye shes sku dang gnyis med par/ /mchod bstod sngags kyi bzlas pa bya/ /sngags bcas chu dang gnyis med gnas/ /dkyil 'khor grub pa'i dus dag tu/ /rang rang gnas kyi phyogs su dgram/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /

ye shes lha dang gnyis med pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor sa la thig gdab bya/ /shes rab spyan mdzes bcu drug lon ba 'am/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa gnas bya'o/ /gtsang ma'i rgyu las byung

ba'i ras/ /kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am/ /lnga las byung ba'i skud pa dag /byin gyis brlab cing bsgril bar bya/ /stong pa nyid kyis sbyang byas nas/ /rigs kyi lha ru gnas pa dag /mchod bstod sngags bcas bsgril bar bya/ /oM badzra sa

ma ya mu tra ma ti kra ma hU~M/ oM a: hU~M/ dza gdags pa yi sngags brjod cing / /rdo rje slob dpon thugs ka nas/ /slob mas smin mtshams drang por then/ /de la gnas kyi nub dang shar/ /'od 'phros byang sems thugs rje che/ /

namakha'i dkyil 'khor mngon bar lta/ /rdo rje lte bas phyogs dang mtshams/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs par bstan/ /stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje thig skud sgrar ldan pas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor legs

grub cing / /'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzod/ /\u0f00 a nun a nu ga to sarba d+harma pa ra pa ra a nu ga ta sarba a nan ta/ a ba ta ra sarba d+harma hU~M/ lha rnams mdun du bzhugs 'gyur nas/ /mchod bstod dbang po'i tshul du dgongs/ /

rdo rje khu tshur sar bzhag cing / /shar nas nub du brkyang ba yi/ /tshangs thig dang po gdab byas nas/ /de bzhin sgo nas tshad kyis ni/ /zur bzhi shin tu legs par gzhal/ /rdo rje lho byang gnyis pa dang / /mtshams kyi thig rnams gdab par bya/ /

legs thig gru bzhi mnyam 'gyur nas/ /brgyad dang bcu drug dag tu bgo/ /bar khyams phyi khyams ma gtogs pa'i/ /gzhan dag cha bran bzhi bzhir bgo/ /thig gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /ye shes skud pas mchod bstod cing / /rdo rje

khu tshur sngags bcas kyis/ /rang gi gnas su gshegs gsol bya/ /\u0f00 badzra ga dzaH/ dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis/ /mig gnyis ma dang ta las byung bar bsam/ /dkyil 'khor gnas rnams kun bltas te/ /sngags dang

phyag brgya bcas pa yis/ /sgo dag bzhi po dbye byas nas/ /cha bran dag kyang blo yis brtag /rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /ri mo'i mkhar ni bteg byas ste/ /'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag /rnal 'byor brtan pa yid kyis byas/ /\u0f00 be

ga kra ma hU~M/ pad ma rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ /dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas chen po/ /thugs rje ye shes rnam 'phrul tshogs/ /khyab mdzad byin brlabs ston pa'i gtso/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan

phrin las rmad du 'byung / /ma lus sems can don gyi phyir/ /pho brang dag par byin gyis brlobs/ /phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas/ /byang chub ye shes gnas gsal 'gyur/ /nyon mongs nyes tshogs kun bcom pa'i/ /thugs rje chen

po dri med shugs/ /ye shes byin brlabs las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod/ /rin chen rnam lnga'i phye ma dang / /sa tshon la sogs gang 'byor pa/ /rin po che yi snod blugs te/ /dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar gzhag /

sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas na/ /rigs lnga'i skud tshogs yum bcas la/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus sogs dang / /mchod bstod sngags kyis mnyes par bya/ /\u0f00 badzra tsita ma ti sa ma ya hU~M/ dkar mthing ser po ljang gu dang / /dmar po'i tshon

rnams rim bzhin du/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsam byas te/ /pan tsa rA ga drang bar bya/ /g.yas pas pad+ma rdo rje bzung / /g.yon pas 'dren pa'i las bya'o/ /de la mchod 'bul sngags brjod cing / /bden pa bdar te dgab

par bya/ /'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag /sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed/ /dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /yang dag bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzad/ /

dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsams te/ /dang po slob dpon gyis bris zhing / /phyis ni ci dgar shes par bri/ /mtho dman med snyoms drang por bya/ /de nas mtshan ma rtags bstan te/ /chad cing smra bas mi 'grub ste/ /yon pas gdung ba'i las rnams skyes/ /

chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag /shi tham ngan par 'gyur ba yin/ /lhag dang bcas pas g.yul 'khrugs shing / /phyogs 'khrul ba yis smyo bar 'gyur/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas dag tu/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga las/ /bde gshegs gtso bo'i

rigs su bcas/ /phyag rgya'i yi ge mtshan pa bri/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dab gnas la/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi tshogs rnams la/ /byang sems khro bo bcas pa dag /shar nas rim bzhin bri bar bya/ /phyi dang nang gi mtshams rnams su/ /mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad

rnams bzhag /bar 'khyams bskal bzangs sems dpa' rnams/ /sgo bzhir khro bo'i tshogs gzhag go/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus song ste/ /bde gshegs 'od zer snang ba yi/ /pad mo rdo rje dril bcas pas/ /rang gi kha dog tshon bcas bzhag /

de yi shar phyogs ri'u mig la/ /tshe mtha' yas dang chos dbang phyug /chags med 'od dang spyan dga' ba'i/ /pad brtsegs pad+ma'i phreng ma dang / /pad gnas rin chen glegs bam rin chen phreng / /rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan pa bzhag /

shar kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bde bar gshegs pa mi bskyod pa/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sngags bcas pas/ /rang gi 'od bcas gdan la gzhag /de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la/ /'brug sgra dri ma med pa'i rigs/ /mngon par snang mdzad

bstan dbang phyug /chags shing rin chen pad spungs pa/ /rin po che yi dra ba ste/ /rim bzhin rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bde gshegs rin po che sbyangs kyis/ /rin chen brtsegs dang dril bu la/ /

rang mdog sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'o/ /de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la/ /nam mkha'i mdzod dang dra ba can/ /dkon mchog rgyal mtshan rin chen tog /rin chen gling bu rin chen phreng / /rin chen rgyal mtshan rin chen bum/ /rang gi 'od bcas

sngags kyis brgyan/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bde gshegs kun tu snang ba'i 'od/ /'khor lo dril bu mtshan ma la/ /rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan pa bri/ /pad mo rigs kyis 'khor lo'i tshad/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bde

gshegs don yod grub pa yi/ /rdo rje sna tshogs dril bu bsnams/ /rang gi sngags dang kha dog gsal/ /de yi shar phyogs ri'u mig la/ /brtson 'grus dang ni shugs chen po/ /gnod sbyin 'dul ba sna tshogs dbang / /rgya gram phreng dang pad+ma phreng / /rdo rje gdengs po

zla khams can/ /'od 'phros sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i/ /mtshams kyi re'u mig bzhi rnams la/ /'od 'phros pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / /pad+ma gnon dang pad skyong dang / /me long rin chen phreng ba dang / /pi bang gar gyi phyag rgya la/ /rang 'od sngags kyis mdzes par bya/ /

phyi rol pad+ma'i shar brtsams te/ /rigs kyi byang sems bzhi bzhir gnas/ /bde ba'i blo gros rgya mtsho'i sgra/ /gzi mdangs dang ni 'khor lo yi/ /nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad lcug 'khor lo dbyug pa rnams/ /rang 'od sngags kyi mtshan mar gnas/ /

shes rab snang ba rdo rje rgyal/ /'od zer 'phro ba drag shul gyi/ /rin chen phung po rin chen gdugs/ /pad+ma'i sdong po 'od phung bri/ /dri ma'i tshogs dang rgyu ma 'phrul/ /rin chen rgyal po dra ba can/ /rin chen ri bo rgya gram bri/ /lag bzangs gser 'od

'phro ba dang / /rin chen snye ma chos mthong dang / /pad+ma'i rgya gram glems bam dang / /pad+ma'i sdong po'i go cha bri/ /dri med mun pa sel ba dang / /dga' ba dbyangs dang gzhon nu yi/ /chu shel nor bu'i phreng ba dang / /sprin phung rdo rje rgya gram bri/ /de ni rigs

lnga'i sems dpa' ste/ /rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i/ /de mthar khro bo bzhi rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri byas te/ /sbyin bdag smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / /rtse gsum rin chen rtse dgu dang / /dbyig pa rtse gcig

ral gri'o/ /gru chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /bdug spos me tog mar me dri/ /phyi rol bar khyams gnas dag la/ /phyogs re sems dpa' bzhi bzhi ste/ /rdo rje rnam snang gar mkhan dang / /blo yi rgya mtsho thogs med bkod/ /rdo rje mtshan ma gsang

sngags bcas/ /rang 'od gnas gdan dag la bri/ /pad+mo dga' ba'i sa la dbang / /rin chen spungs pa sprin gyi phreng / /rin chen mtshan ma sngags dang bcas/ /rang 'od gdan la gnas pa bri/ /yid 'ongs me tog sgron ma dang / /spos brtsegs

kha lo sgyur ba dang / /pad+ma'i mtshan ma sngags dang bcas/ /rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri/ /dran dbang pad+ma'i blo gros dang / /las byed snying po'i blo gros dang / /rgya gram mtshan ma sngags dang bcas/ /rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri/ /shar sogs

pa yi sgo rnams su/ /khro bo'i 'jigs pa'i rgyal po yis/ /rdo rje rgya gram rdo rje gdengs/ /rin chen dbyug pa pad+ma phreng / /rang gi yi ge gdan gnas pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /phyogs bzhi rgyan dang phreng ba dang / /'dod yon lha mo la sogs pa yi/ /

rgyan rnams pad+ma rdo rje dang / /rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram bri/ /'phro bas mtshan ma kha dog lnga/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od bcas pa'o/ /phyi rol rta babs dra ba sogs/ /ban d+ha dril bu nyi shu bzhi/ /gdugs dang bum pa bya yi phreng / /dpag bsam rdzing bu dang ba dang / /

nyi zla me long rgyal mtshan lnga/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas rnams/ /mdzes byas phyi mtha' pad+ma dang / /rdo rjes me 'od mtshan gyis bskor/ /dbus mig kha dog nyi shu lnga/ /pad phreng dmar po bar khyams dkar/ /sgo bzhi yi rin chen sna bzhi pa/ /gru chad gser gyi kha

dog can/ /mchod pa lnga dang bum dgram zhing / /bla rgyan na bza' phyogs rgyan bri/ /me tog tshom bu sngags bcas pa/ /so so'i gnas su dgram par bya/ /gtor ma'i tshogs mang sbyar byas nas/ /phyi rol phyogs dang mtshams su dgod/ /lha yi ting 'dzin

gsal byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor shis pa'i las 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas lha rnams bstod byas te/ /rdo rjes pad+mo dam tshig gzhug /thugs ka'i sngags kyis dgug byas pa'i/ /mgron rnams tshim par 'gyur ba dang / /dam tshig sngags kyis

bskul byas shing / /rang gi phrin las bcol bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las gzugs brnyan tsam pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //

de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'chang sogs mgu 'gyur nas/ /rgyal ba sar yang bskul ba mdzad/ /kun don thugs rje chen po'i shugs/ /ma 'ongs gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor chen por gang

'jug pa/ /dbang bskur tshul bzhin ji lta bur/ /de bzhin rab tu gnas pa gang / /bdag gzhan don gyi yan lag bsrung / /sbyin sreg rim pa ji ltar lags/ /gtso bo thugs rje cher ldan pas/ /ma lus gdul bya kun gyi phyir/ /

dus 'di snang bar mdzad nas kyang / /cho ga'i yan lag rgyas pa gsungs/ /de nas byang chub sems tshogs kyis/ /gus par gzung ste spyad par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang / /phyag rgya shes rab rab bskyod cing / /rab tu

dga' ba'i bzhin rgyas pa/ /rigs rnams kun la gzigs mdzad de/ /mchog gsum sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i/ /don 'di rab tu gnas par mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa'i/ /ma 'ongs gdul bya gang dag gis/ /gnyis med

gsang ba'i theg pa 'dir/ /smin pa'i lam la 'jug 'dod pas/ /gang gis nyes pa'i las rnams kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon mgu byas nas/ /yang dang yang du gsol btab ste/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i don du gnyer/ /ma

lus sdug bsngal las bsgral phyir/ /byang chub sems mchog rgya chen blos/ /phyi nang 'byor pa'i yo byad dag /thams cad byang chub don du bsngos/ /'dod chags rnam dag pad mo'i dbyings/ /chos kun gyis ni de bzhin nyid/ /ye shes

sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /de ring yid 'ong don chen gnyer/ /\u0f00 u ta ga ta sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ pad+ma dga' ba'i sku mchog mnyes/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas/ /mtshan dpe phun sum tshogs

pa yi/ /bder gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje chen pos gzhan rnams 'joms/ /mi shes dri ma kun sel ba'i/ /thugs mchog gsang ba'i chos mthar phyin/ /rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang sngags snying

po gsang ba'i chos/ /rab snang pad+ma'i dbyings nas 'phrul/ /byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rin chen char 'bebs shing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal 'gyur ba/ /dpal mchog

bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /theg pa che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu gnas 'gyur khyab pa po/ /las mdzad rdo rje dam tshigs mchog /mi mthun gnas rnams rab 'joms mdzad/ /rdo rje 'jom la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos grub kun gyi

dbang phyug rgyal/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas nyid du/ /dbang bskur gsang ba las byung ba/ /dam tshig ye shes rab grub mdzod/ /shes rab chos nyid las 'phrul pa'i/ /rjes su 'jug pas snying rje'i tshogs/ /yang dag bden pa las byung

ba'i/ /byin brlabs 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs/ /bde gshegs sprul pa'i tshig tshogs ni/ /dbang bskur rdzogs mdzad pa yi rigs/ /me tog phreng ba la sogs pas/ /slob ma brgyan par byas nas ni/ /phyir phyogs stegs bu la bzhag

ste/ /gtor ma phyogs kun las byin nas/ /kun la gsol 'debs bsgo bya zhing / /slob ma gzhug pa nyid du bya/ /ras gtsang dmar po'i rgyu las byung / /gnas gzhan ma sbyang ma nyams par/ /rang gi sngags kyis byin brlabs nas/ /legs par

gdong ni g.yog par bya/ /pad+mo'i thal sbyar rin chen phreng / /sngags brjod gzungs 'dzin rtse gcig tu/ /brtan por byang chub don gnyer bas/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed/ /de nas blo dpon blo ldan pas/ /theg chen lam

la zhugs pa'i phyir/ /slob ma dag la slar smras pa/ /gsang sngags lam mchog zab pa 'di/ /shin tu bzung bar dka' ba yin/ /khyod kyis bzung bar 'dod pa rnams/ /mi snyems pa yi blo bskyed nas/ /lta spyod mchog la gnas

dgongs so/ /kye ma rdo rje gsang ba'i don/ /theg chen snying po bla na med/ /tshe 'dis byang chub 'grub byed kyang / /rmongs rnams the tshom skye bar 'gyur/ /ngang tshul bzang po 'di rtogs pas/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs

rgyas rnams/ /byin brlabs ngo mtshar mchog brnyes te/ /sems can don phyir tshul dang ldan/ /khyod kyis sgro skur dang dral zhing / /dad brtson the tshom med par zung / /de nas slob mas slar gsol ba/ /yang dag thugs rje cher mnga' ba'i/ /

mgon mchog rnams kyis bdag la gnong / /'di dag bdag la rtol med pas/ /khyod kyis gsungs bzhin gsol bar 'tshal/ /slar yang rab gus dang ba'i yid/ /tshul chen mi nyan dam tshig mchog /slob dpon che la skyabs su mchi/ /

sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sras bcas tshogs/ /thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs/ /bdag gis byang chub don gnyer bas/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed/ /gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen mchog /mgon 'gyur rnams la

skyabs su mchi/ /mya ngan las 'das pho brang 'dir/ /bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje yis/ /gsang ba'i mthe bo nas bzung ste/ /yol ba'i nang du bzhugs par bya/ /\u0f00 pad+mo sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya yo ga

tsa ti uta pA ta yA mi hU~M swA hA/ /de nas gsang ba'i gnas zhugs pas/ /mchod brnyes rgyun gshags la sogs kyis/ /snod du rung bar gyur pa dang / /dam tshig gsum sgrogs chu blud cing / /rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrogs shing / /phyag rgyas

sngags kyi gnas gsum sbyang / /\u0f00 rgyal ba kun gyi khyod nyid ni/ /byin gyis brlab cing brtan mdzad pas/ /pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bdag med dam tshig spangs pa dang / /dad med brtson 'grus nyams pa dang / /blo dman shes rab chung ba dang / /

blo dman rtog 'dzin la gnas la/ /srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya/ /bde chen mgon po pad 'chang sku/ /khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa na/ /gsang ba'i ye shes gzhan brjod dus/ /snying khrag 'thung zhing gzhan du shes/ /bdag ni

gar gyi dbang phyug sku/ /khyod la thugs rjes bzung byed pas/ /nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dag /'da' bar rung ba ma yin no/ /bdag la brnyas shing 'khu byed na/ /rab gtum khro bo chen po'i sku/ /glad pa tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing / /

lus sems ngal sogs rdul du byed/ /gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas/ /dbab pa'i gsang sngags lan stong du/ /dri zhim bdug spos dril dkrol zhing / /ye shes sems dpa' gzhugs

par bya/ /des ni mtshan ma'i rtags mthong 'gyur/ /sku yi ye shes phyogs bcur g.yos/ /gsung gi ye shes gsang ba brjod/ /thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gsal/ /sngags gsum phyag rgyas brtan par gnas/ /bden

pa'i ye shes byin brlabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin/ /bdag gis bskal pa ci lta bar/ /dus 'dir dbab par mdzad pa rigs/ /nor bu phreng ba gar bab pa/ /rigs de rang gi dam tshig nyid/ /sngags dang phreng ba

ma lus pa/ /slar nyid de la sbyin par bya/ /gser gyi thur ma byin brlabs pas/ /ma rigs ldongs pa'i ling tog bsal/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson par mdzad/ /ma rig bsgribs

g.yogs gsal mdzad nas/ /pad+mo spyan bzangs dri ma med/ /\u0f00 pad+ma tsak+Shu dz+nyA na pra be sha phaT/ /rdo rjes gdong g.yogs gsal byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor gsal ba bstan par bya/ /legs par ltos cig blo gros che/ /sngon

gyi rgyal ba la sogs rnams/ /gsang sngags snying po dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /legs par zhugs te grub pa bzhin/ /me tog gang la bab pa yi/ /lha de rigs kyi dam tshigs yin/ /shar gyi sgo srungs nas brtsams te/ /gtso bo'i bar

du dkyil 'khor bstan/ /zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas/ /bla ma blo ldan mnyes par bya/ /yi dam lha sku phyag rgya sogs/ /gsang ba'i ming dang bcas par bstan/ /de ring dus nas bzung byas te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob

par/ /rab rib tha ma'i blo ldan pas/ /dus kun tu ni bzung bar bya/ /kye ma ho blo gros rgya mtsho'i gnas/ /'gro la bskyab pa'i don brtson la/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma la btud te/ /pho brang grong mchog nyams dga' 'dir/ /dbang

bskur ba yi rin chen mdzod/ /snang mdzad lus la bab pa lags/ /rigs bzhin thugs rje brtse dgongs pas/ /dri ma'i skyon sol byin brlabs mdzod/ /gnang bar mdzad pa'i dus lags pas/ /skyob pa'i sku mchog thob par

mdzod/ /shar gyi sgo phyogs khru do'i rgyab/ /dbang bsten dkyil 'khor dbus kyi tshad/ /pad+ma 'da' brgyad sgo dang bcas/ /dmar po'i 'tshon gyis legs byugs te/ /seng ge'i khri bshams pad+mor bcas/ /'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshul gyis gzhag /

spyi bor gdugs mdzes rgyal mtshan g.yas/ /dung dang zang dung sil snyan rnams/ /rol cha mtshon cha phyogs mtshams dgod/ /rgyan phreng gos kyis legs klubs pa/ /dri chu sngags bcas yungs kar dang / /ku sha'i chu yis dag par bya/ /\u0f00 ma hA

bin ta ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ /de nas rigs kyi lhar bskyed de/ /bkra shis dag pa'i glu blangs shing / /rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byas te/ /bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur bya/ /de yi phyir na sgrib tshogs dang / /bag chags nyon mongs gnas dag nas/ /

lha yi chu rgyun dag pa'i mthus/ /ye shes phung po dbang phyug mchog /\u0f00 lha yi chu ni dag pa'i chu/ /rdo rje gsang gsum gnas las byung / /byang sems chu yis tshogs rnams dag /dbang bskur ba yi don thob mdzod/ /yon tan rin chen rnam

dag mchog /rigs lnga'i sku rgyan byas pa yi/ /dbu rgyan bzang po'i cod pan bcas/ /kun 'byung rin chen phung po mchog /tra~M yon tan ma bcas pa yis rgyan/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed/ /khams gsum chos kyi rgyal

po che/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob kun/ /ye nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od phreng sngags kyis brgyan byas pa'i/ /rtogs bcas tshogs rnams kun las rgyal/ /bde gshegs thugs rje rtse gcig pas/ /khams gsum

gnas rnams dor mi mdzad/ /byang sems rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /rang rig ye shes gnas gsal byed/ /chos rnams skye ba med pa'i don/ /sgra brjod dngos po brag cha bzhin/ /stong pa'i dril bu gsung rang bzhin/ /de las sna tshogs rgya

chen tshogs/ /ha~M chos kun rgyun las rnam grol zhing / /de bzhin rkyen med 'bras bu'i tshogs/ /rang bzhin pad+ma dag pa'i dbyings/ /nges pa'i theg pa ston byed gsung / /kye ho rdo rje che ge mo/ /rigs kyi mtshan gyis dbang bskur te/ /

chos sku 'od gsal bde ba che/ /pad+ma'i sgra dbyangs ming dang bcas/ /\u0f00 phyag rgya chen po gsang ba'i gnas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /mi mthun la sogs bcom byas te/ /rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ /\u0f00 badzra pad+mo

a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ \u0f00 rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsA hU~M/ \u0f00 a ti pa ti tra~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa ha~M/ \u0f00 na ma che ge mo a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ slob dpon lha la rab gus pas/ /tshogs bcas yon tan bzung byed cing / /rdo rje dam tshig pa yi spun/ /mig gi 'bras bu

bzhin du bskyang / /'di dag la gus dmod byed pa/ /tshe srog rdo rje gtum pos 'phrog /sngags rnams dus su brjod bya zhing / /phyag rgya rgyun du bcing bar bya/ /gsang ba'i tshig dang mtshan ma'i tshogs/ /dus kun dag tu sba byas te/ /bdud rtsi

lnga po sha sogs rnams/ /mnyam par shes pas rgyun tu spyad/ /bro drug glu drug stabs pa yi/ /brtul bzhugs gnas skabs dag tu bya/ /nyon mongs chos lnga 'dod yon lnga/ /dam tshig nyams pas shes par spyad/ /rdo rje dril bu'i

phyag rgya che/ /gnas gsum brtul zhugs la gnas shing / /lung bstan rjes gnang dbugs 'don pa'i/ /cho ga bzang po spyad par bya/ /de ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog /yon tan bza' ba'i gnas thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya sku/ /

yang dag sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ /ma 'ongs bzung ba'i blo gnas pas/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig rjes su zung / /\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta swa ra pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ \u0f00 da du shrI pad+mo g+hAn d+ha a/ \u0f00 ma hA pad+mo swA hA sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka rtsi ta

hU~M phaT/ mchod pa bkra shis bzang la klags/ brtul zhugs mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa'i/ /dngos grub thun mong cho ga'i las/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang / /dbye rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga dang / /gsang

pa la sogs las rnams kun/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di yi tshul/ /khyod gyis gang 'dod grub par gyis/ /de nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor rab sbyor bas/ /'khor ba'i chos rnams zil gnon cing / /phyogs

bcur dam chos gsung sgrogs shing / /pha rol phyin drug gnas 'phags te/ /sgro 'dogs the tsom gcod par byed/ /lung bstan bde gshegs sras bcas kyis/ /rigs mchog mdzad pa bla na med/ /rgyal ba kun gyis lung bstan mdzad/ /

khams gsum 'dzin bcas kun las grol/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum kun na gzhan med de/ /des na 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig /\u0f00 ma hA sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags rgyun

rnams 'dzin bya dang / /lha dang slob dpon gzung bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsung gcig sgo nas gsungs pa yin/ /'gro rnams kun la phan pa'i blos/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs brtson par gyis/ /dad brtson shes rab blo ldan

pas/ /gang 'dod 'bras bu'i tshul la sbyor/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i grong khyer 'dir/ /gang gis 'dod don gang gnyer pa/ /des ni sgrib sogs kun spangs shing / /mchog gnas ye shes gsal bar sbyor/ /bde chen gsang ba'i theg pa

che/ /tshe 'di byang chub 'grub par byed/ /nyon mongs dgra sogs las grol ba'i/ /bde ba chen po'i gnas thob pa'o/ /de nas lha dang bzhugs gnas pa'i/ /rnams dag de nyid bstan bya ste/ /mchod sbyin gtor tshogs mgron gnyer cing / /

bkra shis 'gro ba'i tshogs bsags bya/ / slar yang slob ma blo ldan pas/ /yon mchog bla ma la phul te/ /maN+Dal mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /mnyes byas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /shes rab yan lag phun sum tshogs/ /

bcu drug yang na nyi shu bzhi/ /rdo rje bla ma la phul te/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga bya/ /khrus byas dri zhim rgyan gyis klubs/ /sna tshogs sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang / /rigs kyi lha dang ldan byas pas/ /dam tshig bskul ba'i brdas mtshon te/ /

gnyis med ye shes snyoms 'jug bya/ /byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod byas pas/ /slob dpon tshogs la dbang yang bskur/ /ji ltar rgyal ba sras mchog gis/ /'jug pa po rnams tshim mdzad pa'i/ /gnyis med ye

shes gsang ba'i don/ /dbab pa'i phyag rgya las byung ba'i/ /a la la ho/ \u0f00 A: hU~M/ a ho su ka rang gi gnas/ /a ho ra ti tshim par mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor kun la rang bzhin gnas/ /shes rab mchog ldan byin brlabs pa/ /slob

ma'i lag tu gtad par bya/ /rang bzhin bde ba'i ye shes nyid/ /zag pa med pa'i don gsal 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rang gi dngos nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /e ma ho 'gro ba'i gnas 'di dag /de bzhin nyid las gzhan du

'khrul/ /de dag bde chen ye shes pas/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba ci yang med/ /ye shes 'di ni shin du 'phra/ /rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra zhing / /rdul bral thar pa zhi ba'i chos/ /rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do/ /da ni sbyin sregs gsang ba'i don/ /khyed rnams

kun la phyir bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor chen po phyogs bzhi'am/ /gzhan yang gnas gzhan gang 'thad par/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang / /las kun pa yi thab khung brtsam/ /zlum po khru gang zla kham dang / /gru gsum sna tshogs dbyibs

can no/ /de dag dkar ser dmar dang nag /sna bzhi kun gyis mtshon pa'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma'i rgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mtshon cha can/ /khru gang bzhi dang gnyis med dang / /khru gsum de yi zhabs su phyed/ /bud shing yam shing so so yi/ /

mtshan nyid lo 'bras kha dog ro/ /rtse mo cha las sor bzhi dang / /sor brgyad bcu drug nyi shu'i tshad/ /sbams pa'i so so'i mar gyis byug /rim bzhin rtsa ba bud khang ni/ /zlum dang gru bzhi zla gam dang / /gru gsum tshul du brtsig par bya/ /

lha rnams kun gyi khang pa nyid/ /me yi gnas su gzhag byas te/ /so so'i las dang mthun pa ste/ /ag ne ra rtsa bod par bya/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgyas g.yab/ /g.yon pa bgrang phreng bzung bar bya/ /\u0f00 e h+ye hi ag na ye ma hA ba ba hi

swA hA/ / khro bo rgyal pos gsung bya ste/ /me lha'i gdan mchod pad+ma dbul/ /de rjes mchod pa rnam lnga dang / /sreg rdzas ma lus dbul byas nas/ /lha rnams mchod pa'i phyag brtsad du/ /bstod cing gsol ba gdab par bya/ /g.yas g.yon dgang

gzar blugs gzar gyis/ /khu bcud 'dzag pa'i rnam grangs dbul/ /\u0f00 ma hA a na la ma hA b+hu tA badzra la basmi ku ru hU~M sar+b+ba duSh+Ta Na hU~M phaT/ me lha mchod pa'o/ /\u0f00 ma hA ku ru pany+tsa hU~M/ dgang lugs dbul ba'i sngags so/ /\u0f00 sarba ba d+ha ha na badzra

swA hA/ / til gyi'o/ /\u0f00 badzra puSh+pe hU~M/ me tog gi'o/ /\u0f00 sarba ag+na ye hU~M swA hA/ yam shing ngo / /\u0f00 badzra pU dza me g+ha ga lo ke shwa ra hU~M/ 'jig rten dbang phyug bya ba'i mchod pa'o/ /\u0f00 d+hu pe rti pa pu sha g+han d+he sbyar ba'i mchod pa rnamaso/ /

\u0f00 a pra ti badzrA ya swA hA/ /ku sha'i'o/ /\u0f00 badzra A yu she swA hA/ /dur ba'i'o/ /gzhan yang rdzas rnams gang tshogs pa/ /rang ming yi ge gsum sngags dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor kun mchod cing / /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba

gdab/ /sdig bshags bag chags kun byas pas/ /lha yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /tha ma me lha mchod byas nas/ /phrin las so so'i sngags brjod cing / /\u0f00 badzra na ma sarba ta thA ga ta hri d+ha ya ma ku ru hUM/ /lha rnams gshegs su

gsol zhing / dam tshigs lha la bsdu bar bya/ /de nas rab gnas bzang po ni/ /'gro la phan phyir bshad par bya/ /sa phyogs nyams dga' mdzes pa ru/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor legs byas te/ /mchod rdzas rdzas kyis mnyes

byas nas/ /slob dpon chas su gzhugs par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrubs byas nas/ /rten tshogs sbyang ba'i cho ga bya/ /ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /dga' ldan gnas nas gshegs mdzad de/ /lha mo rgyu
ma'i lhums bzhugs nas/ /de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol/ /dkon mchog gnas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang / /me tog la sogs mchod bzhes la/ /'di don bzung bar bya ba dang / /byang chub sems mchog spel bar

mdzod/ /nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni grub pa la/ /bka' drin cho ga mdzad par 'os/ /de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas/ /'gro drug gnas

kun sgrol byed pa/ /thams cad dus 'dir dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gsang ba'i sngags ldan lha rnams kun/ /'jig rten mchod pa'i don phyir ro/ /rab gnas bzang por 'os pa lags/ /de nas gnas rnams kun

sbyangs nas/ /byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs byas te/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar/ /dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs byas nas/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs gtang zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba

dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las lam khyad par du 'phags pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o// // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu mya ngan skyes te/ kye ma'o ho sangs

rgyas 'dir ni bdag gi gnas la sogs pa bcom zhing rlag par byed na thabs ji lta bus gdul bar bya/ 'on kyang 'di nyid la ni bdag ci yang bya ba'i gnas med/ shin tu dman par gyur pa dag dang mtshungs par 'gran nam/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum

la 'di dag ni/ srid pa mi sreg brlag par bya ba'i phrin las yin pas/ thams cad la bka' bsgo zhing / las ngan pa 'de dag la bzlog par bya'o zhes bsam mo/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas na mthu che ba dang / dbang dang gzi brjid thams cad 'dus

nas kye khyed rnams bdag la nyon cig /'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni/ rgyal po gcig gi dbang du ma gnas na/ thams cad srid pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /des na phyogs thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus la/ bdag gi bka'

nyan par mdzod cig ces bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi drag bye chen po'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul bstan cing smras pa/ khyed ji lta bu'i nga rgyal can cig yin/ nged rnams re res kyang 'khor dpag tu med pa skyong ba'i rgyal po chen

po yin pas/ yul 'khor grangs med pa la dbang byed cing / gzhan gyi re gnas dam par gyur pa lags pas/ khyod rang zhi ba la gnas na legs so zhes 'thun par brjod par bdud gyi rgyal po yang shin tu nyon mongs pas rgyas te gzhan dag la smras pa/

lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /nga yi bka' las gnas pa yin/ /skye 'gro ma lus gang dag kun/ /rgyal po'i bka' gsang nyan par gyis/ /khams gsum bdag po lha'i lha/ /sa rnams kun gyi sa steng pa/ /bdag ni mthu dang rdzu 'phrul

tshad/ /kun gyis dran par nus pa yin/ /nga yi bka' las 'da' byed na/ /srog srid brlag cing gnas kyang 'thor zhes brjod do/ /de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal pos/ rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te/ de dag gi dbus nas srin po chen

po'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i khro bor gnas nas/ rang gi mthu las sprul pa'i khro bo dang / mtshon cha'i tshogs spro bar mdzad do/ /de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / 'bring gi ri ti

dang / gzhon nu gdong drug pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te/ de dag gi dbus na 'gying zhing sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab par spros te/ dbang dang rdzu 'phrul ston to/ /ri rab gyi kha khyer la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen

po bzhis kyang rang rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na 'gying zhing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston par mdzad do/ /gser gyi ri la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgya byin dang / dbang ldan dang / gshin rje dang / bden bral dang / chu lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / nyi ma dang /

sa'i lha rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi gnas dang bcas par 'jig pa'i mtshon cha dang bcas par 'khod do/ /zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / phur bu dang / spa ba sangs dang / spen pa dang / gza' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi

'khor dang bcas pas 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang / mtshon char bcas pas 'khod do/ /mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / rigs ldan dang / nor rgyas dang / dung skyong dang / pad ma dang / chu lha rnams kyis rang rang gi g.yog

'khor rnams dang / 'jig pa'i sprul pas 'khod do/ /de bzhin du khams gsum gyi dregs byed kyi tshogs gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / 'gro ba drug gtso bo dbang che zhing mthu yod pa rnams dang / ma mo rnams dang / gshin rje dang /

lha ma yin rnams dang / 'dab bzangs dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rgyu skar gyi tshogs su bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi mtshon cha dang nga ro dang bcas pas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'khod do/ /de nas

bdud kyi rgyal po yang nyon mongs pa skyes te/ rang gi 'khor rnams 'du bar mdzad cing rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa ci yod pa dus 'di dag cig tu ston nas/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang nas drag po 'bar bar 'jigs pa'i skur ston to/ /khro

mo'i tshogs dang rol pa mdzad pa lags/ 'khor ba'i tshogs mtshon cha me 'od bcas pa phyogs bcur spros te nam mkha' thams cad gang bar byas nas thog ser nad dang tshub ma thams cad skyes so/ /des 'jig rten gyi lha kun myos shing rmongs par gyur

pa dang / 'jig pa'i tshogs kyi sa phyogs thams cad nas/ 'khor ba'i me 'od 'bar ba'i mtshon chas bsad cing gtubs pa las/ so so'i tshogs bred par gyur te/ rang gi snying po phul zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /de nas lha thams cad 'du bar byed pa'i

bdud kyi sde de dag la mnas dor zhing dam tshig byin te so so'i snying po blangs te/ 'khor tshogs thams cad rje dpon dang bral te/ lha chen po brgyad ni rang gi rtse la 'khod do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi ni shar gyi gling la 'khod do/ /gnod sbyin dang /

phyogs skyong dag ni shar gyi gling phran gnyis su 'khod do/ /'gro ba rig drug gi sems can rnams ni lhor dkod do/ /dri za dang ma mo rnams ni lho'i gling phran la dgod do/ /lha ma yin rnams ni nub tu dgod do/ /gshin rje dang 'dab bzangs dang srin

po rnams ni nub kyi gling gi gling phran gnyis la dgod do/ /gza' dang rgyu skar rnams ni byang du dgod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba bla na med pa las bdud kyi sprul pa bstan pa'o// //de nas

bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid shin tu dga' zhing 'khor thams cad la bka' bsgo/ rgyal po gcig gi 'khor du gnas pas ni/ yid dang 'thun par spyod pas gnas pa yin pas/ khyed rnams kyis kyang ngas ci ltar bsgo ba'i bka' bzhin

nyon la/ thar pa'i lam 'di chod la/ ston pa gzhan la gus par ma byed cig /kho bo'i 'jig rten stongs par 'ong ngo / /bsam pa rgya chen po med pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni/ gti mug can gyi rang bzhin te/ byol song lta bu yin pas/

bde legs kyi gnas thob pa'i don med pa yin no/ /yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kye 'du shes med pa'i 'gro ba dag /rang gi bde ba spong byed cing / /thar pa'i lam gzhan sgrubs byed pa/ /de dag 'khrul pas rang rgyud brlag /nyes

'dod bde legs spong byed pa/ /rmongs pas 'gro rnams snying re rje/ /re shig thugs rje skal ldan pas/ /bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa yin/ /gnas gzhan gong ma thob 'dod pas/ /bdag la dad sems gus par gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de dag

gis kyang de ltar nyan te/ rang rang gi gnas shor zhing mya ngan gyi sems skyes kyang ci ltar bya ba'i thabs med de/ de ltar 'khod cing gnas so/ /de nas bdud kyi rgyal po rang gi gnas su song ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dga' ba'i longs

spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyod cing / dgyes pa'i glu gar dang rol mo la spyod do/ /ji ltar khams gsum kun gyi bdag po 'di dag yin pas/ 'di las lhag pa'i bsgrub bya ni/ gzhan dag yod par bdag gis ma mthong ngo / /da sangs rgyas

rgyas kyi tshogs dang byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang bdag gi dbang du bsdu na thabs ci ltar brtsam zhing / rang gi 'khor dag la yang 'dri bar byed do/ /de nas bdud kyi grong khyer kun la bsgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor rnams la mi dge ba'i

bltas dang mtshan ma ngan pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi bsgrub pa thams cad du rab tu 'chad cing / ci 'dod pa rnams la grub par bya na bdag cag la mos pa byed do/ /de'i rjes la de dag gi gtso bo rnams bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshe thabs sna

tshogs kyi sgo nas gdul bar bya'o/ /gal te 'ongs par ma nus pa bdag ni kho rang gi gnas de nyid dang bcas pa gzhom par bya'o zhes brjod do/ /de'i stong gsum g.yo bar byed pa'i tshogs kyi khro bo'i mtshon cha'i tshogs dang bcas pa sprul nas

dkar po'i rigs la dga' ba'i 'gro ba rnams ma lus bcom zhing / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang brlag par bshams pa las/ bden pa'i mthu gang la gnod par ma gyur to/ /de nas rab tu khros te/ bdag

gi khams gsum 'di dus gcig tu gdul bar bya spyod pa la/ ngan pa'i tshul can g.yo rgyu dang bcas pa 'di dag mi 'dul lam/ de rang gi sde tshan 'og ma la gnas pa kun bskul te/ thar pa'i lam la gnas pa 'di dag rigs kyi

gdul bar bya'o zhes brjod do/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa bsgo bar mdzad pa dang / de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sprul pa dang / mtshon cha rnams phyogs kun tu spro zhing / rang gi gsang sngags drag po'i tshogs dag kyang brjod par

byed do/ /des 'jig rten 'khrugs shing g.yos nas thams cad bred par gyur to/ /bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi sde dang bcas pa shugs 'byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas

bcom ldan bde chen mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis/ /stong gsum so sor 'dul mdzad phyir/ /rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs/ /de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang / /thugs rje che dang smon lam mthus/ /so so'i

las rtog 'thun bzhin du/ /sna tshogs rtog pa'i tshul ma ston/ /'dod chags la zhen smon pa dag /chags pa chen pos 'dul bar mdzad/ /de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal phrog dog 'dul don du/ /'thun byas snang

ba sna tshogs dang / /mi mthun sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad/ /pad mo bde gshegs rdo rje don/ /rin chen rin chen las sna tshogs/ /phyag rgya che sogs 'khor lo sgyur/ /ji lta ba bzhin dag par mdzod/ /thabs chen rnam

dag pad mo'i don/ /shes rab sprul pa'i mchog 'gyur pas/ /gar gyi dbang phyug bde ba che/ /rdo rje lta nyid sprul par mdzad/ /gzhan yang mdzad pa rgya chen po/ /sna tshogs mthu yis 'dul mdzad de/ /dag pa'i 'gro

ba 'thun byas sku/ /gser 'od mtshan dang dpe byad ldan/ /go byed theg pa bla na med/ /zab mo gsang sngags ji bzhin par/ /rgyal ba bde gshegs phyag rgya'i sku/ /rab sprul dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i/ /la las byang sems rgya

chen mchog /la lar lam lnga dag par sbyor/ /la lar pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs/ /la lar 'bras bu'i don la sbyor/ /la lar dga' ldan lha yul 'phags/ /lhums su zhugs dang bltam pa dang / /'jig rten spyod 'thun rol rtsed

sogs/ /gzhan gyi skur spangs bya ba rnams/ /bcas ka'i can gyi bsam 'phrul ba/ /'thun 'jug thabs kyi bya ba mchog /dka' thub mdzad dang dga' ba spyod/ /rdo rje gdan la yang sangs rgyas/ /bdud 'dul mngon rdzogs sangs

rgyas shing / /rtse gcig ting 'dzin bskul nas bzhugs/ /cho 'phrul mdzad pa kun 'dul zhing / /chos kyi 'khor lo rims bzhin bskor/ /mya ngan 'da' tshul ring srel ston/ /zhi tshogs khro bor 'khyil pa dang / /rang byung dud 'gro'i

gzugs sna tshogs/ /snod kyi 'jig rten kun mthu sku/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug 'jig rten skyong / /bdud dang srin po gzugs sogs kyis/ /'gro ba'i las rtog dag mdzad cing / /rang gi ye shes don bkod bya/ /de tshe 'gro ba'i gnas mtshon

tshogs/ /las kyi stobs tshogs mthus brdabs rnams/ /de bzhin nyid mthus tshogs chen pos/ /yang dag lam las rab grol zhing / /nga rgyal chen po'i dregs tshogs skyes/ /rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston/ /nyon mongs
las kyi lam la zhen/ /rang gi rigs tshogs bsdu bar byed/ /'jig rten gsum 'jig a la la/ /khams gsum gtso bo bdag cag rnams/ /su zhig sprul pa a la la/ /'jigs par mdzad pa'i 'os ma lags/ /rang gi

dka' thub bde gnas pas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog ste/ /gzhan gyi bstan pa ci zhig bya/ /bde tshogs 'jigs pa'i yan lag go/ su zhig rang gi bde spong zhing / /gzhan nas sdug bsngal don gnyer ba/ /gzugs mang

sprul pa bsam yas kyang / /rang gi sku mdzes bsgyur ba dka'/ /sgra mang sprul pa bsam yas pas/ /rang gi gsung nyan 'phro byed dam/ /sems rtog bya ba'i 'od bcas kyis/ /ting 'dzin rtse gcig 'gyur ba med/ /drag po'i stobs

mchog gzi ldan rnams/ /rang gis rang spyod bde bar sdod/ /de nas bdud dpung dang po dang / /dbang phyug tshangs pa khyab 'jug che/ /rgya byed glu dang dregs byed rnams/ /rab tu khros te rang gi mthus/ /ston zhing drag po'i gsang sngags

dang / /gtum tshig nga ro 'bod sgrogs byed/ /de tshe rgyal po'i byin brlabs mthus/ /'thun 'jug thabs kyis 'dul mdzad de/ /theg pa gsang ba bla med mchog /khyad par sgo gsum gsang byed cing / /yang dag don la bde bkod phyir/ /

thugs rje chen pos 'thun mdzad de/ /'jug pa'i lam ring bde bstan zhing / /dga' ba'i sgo nas bde mdzad kyang / /rang gi nyon mongs dregs pa'i mthus/ /don 'jug 'thun pa'i spyod sgo 'jig /gti mug chen po mun gtibs

nas/ /nga rgyal ri bo kun tu bkod/ /zhe sdang me lce 'bar sreg shing / /phrag dog rlung gis bskyod byas nas/ /'dod chags chu bos 'byin par 'gyur/ /dregs pa'i mthu yis rab khros te/ /tshogs rnams gcig la gcig sgo

zhing / /gsang sngags rdzu 'phrul stobs phyung nas/ /rab tu bsgrags pa'i mthu yis ni/ /'jig rten gsum dag 'khrug par byed/ /mi nad mu ge 'khrug pa dang / /mtshon cha lo tog 'bras bu 'phrog /'byung po'i 'jigs gzugs nyes tshogs rnams/ /

rgyun mi 'chad du 'khor bar 'byung / /sa gzhi me 'bar chu bdag byed/ /dug dang dbyig dug rlung bzhin g.yos/ /bde lam mtho ris thar lam gcod/ /mi dag sems kyis non 'gyur zhing / /'gro rnams sdug bsngal bskyed byas pas/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs khral bskyed/ /de nas byang chub sems bcas pa'i/ /'khor rnams dus gcig bstan par bzhengs/ /gtso bo'i phyogs su 'dud byed cing / /lan grangs bskor zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /mgon po bde ba mnyes byed

cing / /mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /thugs rje che lnga lha yi lha/ /byams sogs dga' ba'i bdud rtsi chus/ /gdos bcas thal bar brlag mdzad pas/ /thim 'gyur rdo rje ye shes tshogs/ /cho 'phrul dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol/ /mdzad pa'i

byin brlabs bstan du gsol/ /de dag nyon mongs rlabs 'khrugs pas/ /rang gzhan thar lam bde bar 'joms/ /byang chub sems nyid rlan bral lam/ /srid gsum yal bar dor byed na/ /thugs rje chen po gang la gdags/ /e ma ho 'bras bu mya ngan 'das/ /

e ma ho byang sems pad ma'i brdzings/ /e ma ho brjod bral ku mu da/ /e ma ho me tog 'bras bcas shing / /'di dag dkyil 'khor rnam dag pas/ /rigs mchog mtshan nyid yon tan gnas/ /dus 'dir dag par ga la mdzad/ /thugs rje chen po ga la

gdags/ /'di dag skal ldan gsung pa'i snod/ /rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin/ /da ltar rnam rtog ri bos non/ /thabs kyis 'dul bar mi gyur bas/ /shugs kyis bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bstan du gsol/ /zhes gsol to/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las mdzad pa chen po'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings nas phyung te sprul pa mdzad do/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa'i/ /rta babs rgyan tshogs kun gyis spras/ /rin chen nor bu'i phreng

sogs dang / /ban d+ha dril bu 'dod pa lnga yi tshogs/ /mchod pa bla re rgyal mtshan gdugs/ /kha dog nyi shu rtsa lngas spras/ /'khor lo re'u mig dgu pa las/ /seng ge la sogs gdan khri spras/ /ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Tha

Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha b+ha b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ ye shes ma 'dres bde chen gsal/ /rnam 'phrul rigs mchog gzungs kyi dam tshig dang / /khro zhing 'dren pa'i mdangs kyis gnas/ /rigs gnyis lung gis

rgyud pa'i sku/ /dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /ser dkar dmar ba'i zhal gnyis dag /bzhin mdangs tshangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /dbus ma khro 'dzum brjid bag dang / /pad+ma rdo rje 'kho lo dang / /dril bu rin chen rtse

gsum 'dzin/ /rin chen phreng ba'i chun 'phyang dang / /mu tig do shal dpung rgyan spras/ /stod g.yogs smad dkris na bza' klubs/ /dbu rgyan snyan cha sor gdub tshogs/ /mtshan bzang dpe byad mdzes par brgyan/ /rigs kyis mchod pas dbu skra sil/ /

rang 'od btsun mo'i sku bcas pa/ /phyung nas phyogs bcu'i sngags kyis spros/ /hU~M phaT pad+mo 'grig dza swA hA/ /\u0f00 du~M dru~M b+hin d+ha dza pra mo ha~M/ mdzad pa'i phrin las rdzogs byas nas/ /slar 'dus bdag po'i sku la thim/ /shar du rnam snang phyag rgya che/ /

gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rtse gsum be con pad+mo ral gri ban d+ha 'dzin/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan nyid/ /mthing ga zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rin chen pad+ma gri gug dang / /shu la bum pa rtse gsum 'dzin/ /nub tu snang ba

mtha' yas sku/ /dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /thod dbyug rtse gsum pad+mo dang / /dgra sta 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin/ /byang du don yod grub pa nyid/ /ljang khu zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /ral gri rdo rje dbyug pa mdung / /pad+mo rtse gsum

gshin rje'i rkang / /kun gyi g.yas dkar g.yon pa ni/ /dmar ljang ser dang le'u rgan mdog /rang gi btsun mo'i 'gul nas 'khyud/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag po lhar/ /sku mdog gsang ba'i mdangs dang ldan/ /phyag dang cha lugs kun gyis

brgyan/ /\u0f00 dzi na dzi ga la~M/ dwe Sha ra ti/ swa rat+na d+h+rig /maM mo ha ra ti/ \u0f00 a ro li ka /pya~M rA ga ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+rig /tA~M badzra ra ti/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs bcas pas/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad/ /'khor

lo rgyur rgyal cha lugs dang / /dgyes pa'i skyil dkrung tshul gyis bzhugs/ /khyams kyi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su/ /sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad/ /thugs kyi ye shes yi ge las/ /rang gi gsang sngags dag gis gdon/ /

sa snying dkar ser rin chen 'dzin/ /nam snying mthing ga ral gri 'dzin/ /spyan ras dmar skya pad+ma 'dzin/ /gsang bdag ljang skya rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yon pa pad+mo yu ba can/ /bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis phyogs su 'dud/ /sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar/ /

dkar ser dmar ljang 'od 'phro mdog /me long rin chen phreng ba dang / /dbyangs snyan gar thabs mdzes pa'i tshul/ /oM k+shi ra dza ya/ hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ tra~M mA le sa ma ya ho/ hri pad+ma ban d+ha hri/ girti ra ho ha~M/ a nI ti ra ga ma mi hU~M phaT/ byams pa

dkar ser klu shing 'dzin/ /sgrib sel 'khor lo mthing ka ste/ /'jam dpal dmar skya ut+pa la/ /kun bzang ljang ser rin chen snye/ /g.yon pa pad+mo lcug ma 'dzin/ /sems dpa'i stabs kyis gdan la bzhugs/ /bdug spos me tog 'thor ba dang / /mar

me dri chab lha mo rnams/ /ser dkar dmar ljang go rim bzhin/ /mtshan dang 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes/ /\u0f00 me ra ni/ dza d+hU pa pra be sha /thi ling swa ram pa ya/ hU~M pus pa A be sha hU~M swa ra tsa ya/ ba~M dI pa bu gi ni/ muM shi ra tsa ya/ ho gan d+he tsi ta ya hU~M phaT/ shar

sgor gshin rje gshed po che/ /mthing nag be con rtse gsum phreng / /lho sgor stobs chen ser skya'i mdangs/ /rdo rje zhags pa rin chen phreng / /nub sgor rta mchog 'jigs byed rgyal/ /thod sprul dril bu lu gu rgyud/ /byang sgor rdo rje 'khyil pa ste/ ljang skya rdo rje rtse

gsum mthu/ /khro bo cha lugs rngam brjid dang / /dur khrod rim pa'i chas kyis brgyan/ /lcags gyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /spyan dmar 'jigs byed 'od dpung dang / /rdo rje mche sogs khro gnyer can/ /yab yum 'khyil ba brkyang bskum sku/ /

hU~M phaT ru lu'i gsung 'don cing / /las kyi 'khor lo gnon pa'i tshul/ /\u0f00 ru lu pad+mA na ta krid hU~M phaT/ dza badzra kro d+hi shwa ri hUM pradz+ny+na ta krid phaT/ hU~M rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri/ hU~M pad mA na ta krid phaT/ paM pad ma kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M big+hA nan krid/ / ho karma kro d+hi shwa ri

hU~M phaT swAhA/ /phyi nang med par dkyil 'khor chen po ste/ /thugs rje ye shes che las sprul/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi rgyas btab cing / /dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/ /'od dpung sprul pa'i lha 'khor gyis/ /'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing / /

tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad rnams 'gugs/ /rdo rje brjid gnon sngags kyi 'thus/ /de dag dran pa med par 'gyur/ /mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis sgrol byas te/ /dug gsum phung po gsol bar mdzad/ /phrin las khro bo brjid glu yis/ /lha chen

'khor rnams dbang du bsdud/ /dkyil 'khor chen por gzhag byas nas/ /snga ma'i sha rus gnam nas ston/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /lha chen rnams kyis slar lus gsol/ /'khor bcas pa yi dbang bskur zhing / /rdo rje 'chang

gi gral la dgod/ /dam tshig gsang ba'i brdas bsgros shing / /phrin las bka' nyan gnyer gtad de/ /gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du bzhag /kun kyang tshig dbyangs 'thun pa'i sgos/ /dam tshig mna' srog thal myong 'gyur zhes brjod do/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas pad+mo chags pa'i skus/ /gsung gi gzi mdangs

rgyas mdzad do/ /phyag rgya rdzu 'phrul gnas sbyor bas/ /gser mig 'dab bzangs grong khyer dang / /lang ka'i gnas tshogs srin po'i sde/ /klu rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul kun stobs 'khor lo yis/ /lha chen la sogs gdul bar dgongs/ /

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /pad+ma rta mchog sprul pa mdzad/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings snyoms 'jug las/ /sems dpa' rgyal ba kun gyi yab/ /rdo rje 'dzin thug dbang nyid dang / /rigs nyid sprul pa'i lung las grub/ /sku mdog dmar po rA ga'i mdog /zhal

gsum rta mgo ljang gu can/ /phyag ni gri gug kha T+wa~M kha/ /thod pa khrag me dpung sprul lnga/ /gnas brgyad klu bdag thod phreng dang / /glang chen stag gi lpags pa gyon/ /sgra skad drag po phyogs bcur sgrog /bgegs la sogs pa'i cha lugs can/ /drang srong

khros pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /klu yi 'gro ba rmongs mdzad pa/ /pad+ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum gyis/ /yum chen dpal ldan ma dang sbyor/ /\u0f00 pad+mo gu ru he he ru lu hU~M phaT/ 'khor lo 'bar ba phyogs mtshams su/ /ye shes khro bo chen po brgyad/ /hri las grub

pa'i 'jigs gzugs can/ /rta mgo ljang gu brjid pa yi/ /shar du pad ma'i dbang phyug ni/ /dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o/ /rdo rje pad ma klu zhags dang / /rin chen dbyug pa ral gri mdung / /seng ge rgyal mo sku dang 'khril/ /sna tshogs mi mthun zhabs kyis

gnon/ /nyi ma zla ba'i snyan chas brgyan/ /sprul gyi phreng bas gnas kun brgyan/ /lho ru gzi chen drag po ni/ /mdog nag ral gri rtse gsum lnga/ /rdo rje rtse gsum mda' dang gzhu/ /drag po gnas kyi sku dang 'khril/ /me ri 'bar bas kun tu khyab/ /stag mo bcings pas

gzhan gnas 'jigs/ /sprul pa'i pho nya me 'brug gi/ khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /nub du rdo rje dra ba mchog /dmar ser rdo rje dbyug pa bri/ /'khor lo sprul zhags me long chu/ /lha mo 'jigs chen zhabs kyis gnon/ /'od 'bar glog gi phreng ba can/ /sprul

pa'i pho nya lce spyang gdong / /'bum phrag dri dang thod khrag 'dzin/ /byang du 'od byed 'jigs chen sku/ /ljang khu rtse gsum mda' bo che/ /nor bu dung khrag lcug ma dung khrag 'chang / /ra ro mig dmar zil gyis gnon/ /rgyal bdag khro bo'i sku dang 'khril/ /cod pan klu mgo gdengs

ka'i rgyan/ /dus mtshungs phud kyi sgra chen sgrogs/ /kun kyang thod phreng g.yang gzhi dang / /dur khrod gnas 'byung gcad sme byed/ /mtshams kyi khro bo chen po bzhi/ /rigs kyi phyed gzugs thig les mtshan/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'od mdangs can/ /rdo rje thod dbyug glu yi sgra/ /

lce sbyang bya khyung gnam lcags sprin/ /'od phreng thig le dbyugu'i rgyan/ /rnam 'phrul klu thabs u ta ra/ /'dod yon lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /kun du spyan mngar rdo rje'i mtshan/ /gnas su 'jigs pa'i hU~M sgra sgrogs/ /klu yi rgyal po'i gnas

na bzhugs/ /gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'joms par byed/ /\u0f00 ma hA ha ya gri ba pad ma d+ha ru na~M` bi d+ha ha ra hU~M phaT rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM na mo ad ta~M he ru lu ru ka~M ba mu kha/ a kar Sha ya rak+Sha na gaM gu ru hU~M phaT snying po'i sngags so/ /oM pad ma rag ma ku r+ya ra ka~M ru lu

ra lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru/ /lcags kyu lcags sgrog zhags pa dril bu snams/ /dkar dmar ser ljang 'od mdangs 'bar/ /seng ge lce spyang stag 'brug dang / /mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas/ /rang gi las

kyis 'khod pa dang / /'jigs pa'i cha lugs rngam gzugs gnas/ /las mdzad klu yi dkyil 'khor 'dul/ /klu chen brgyad sogs bsdus byas na/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya/ /rang gi dam tshig dran pa'i shugs/ /spyan rnams spyan ngar 'dod par

byed/ /\u0f00 na ga drings me ga nan ga ra tsa ya sa ma ya hU~M/ dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur nas/ /'od bzangs gzi mdangs me dpung 'bar/ /rigs kyi dbu rgyan gsal byed phye/ /ye shes 'od tshogs gnas bcas te/ /dkyil 'khor gsang bar goms

zhugs kyis/ /tshul 'dzin dkon mchog mngon du dbye/ /tshogs rnams ma lus mgrin gcig tu/ /gar dbang sku la skyabs gsol zhing / /'dod yon gsol 'debs dam bcas pa/ /bsod nams phung po'i gter la spyod/ /kye ma dkyil 'khor ya mtshan che/ /

bdag cag 'khor rnams rab sgrol mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dpe bral bas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas/ /bde chen lam 'di sngon ma rtogs/ /da ltar thugs rje drin gyis rnyed/ /rnal 'byor gsang bar 'dzin byed kyis/ /ji ltar bsgos

pa'i bka' bzhin bgyid/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dam 'di las/ /gal te nyams na 'das par shog /ces dam bcas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rta 'grin dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i

le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan pad ma'i skus/ /yul la chags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis/ /bka' yi bsgo bas dgyes mdzad de/ /mi shigs ting 'dzin la gnas mdzad/ /phyogs skyong dri za rgyal chen po/ /rang gi chung ma

tshogs bcas pas/ /gnas gzhan 'jigs par mdzad pa dang / /rang gi mthus bcus 'dul bar mdzad/ /sku ni bai dUr 'tsher ba'i mdangs/ /zhal gsum phyag rgya drug gis rol/ /rin chen mdzod bum sngags chen lcug /'khor lo phreng ba ma ga ta/ /rgyan dang cha

lugs rin chen tshogs/ /dbyings kyi dbang phyug yum chen mo/ /dmar skya zab mo'i tshul du sbyor/ /'od 'phro sems dpa'i gdug pa'i 'phro/ /rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan rin chen phreng / /phyag brgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /gru bzhi

sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan/ /bar 'khyams 'khor kyi dbus nas 'gying / /pad ma'i lte bar skyil dkrung bzhugs/ /shar tu 'joms byed rdo rje'i sku/ /dkar gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /lho ru rin chen blo gros sku/ /dpal be'u gdugs mdzes 'od mang ser/ /nub

kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po rtog /dkar dmar pad+ma glegs bam 'dzin/ /byang du 'jig rten kun sgrol ba/ /ljang skya rdo rje rgya gram bri/ /shar lho dra ba'i dbang phyug ni/ /ser skya rin chen 'bring ka ra/ /lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog /rtse gsum pad+ma'i lcug ma 'dzin/ /nub

byang rgyal ba'i ye shes tog /sngo skya seng ge'i bum pa 'dzin/ /byang shar sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtsegs/ /ljang ser g.yung drung rdo rje mtshan/ /'di dag 'khor lo brgyur rgyal byin/ /mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs rgyan/ /skyes bu chen po'i long spyod 'phel/ /cha 'thun yum

dang 'khril bar bzhugs/ /\u0f00 bi ta dz+nyA na ta na sa~M bo ga ta hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 d+harma mu ni na sa na sa hU~M/ \u0f00 bi ha ra phra mo tha na hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 dz+ny+na lo tra sa~M bo ga ya hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 rat+na ma rud te sa grum hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 ma hA shu ti mu sa mo ha hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 bud d+ha bud d+ha sar+ya ku ma ra hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 na ma ga ga na si

ta yo ga hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 na si ha ha he hu mu ga ra ba ri hU~M phaT/ 'khor lo'i gsang sngags rab brjod pas/ /lha rnams phyi yi gnas su spro/ /drag po'i rgyu 'phras sbyong byas te/ /gnas kun dag pa'i ye shes che/ /rigs mchog ye shes 'od gsal bas/ /shar gyi dbang po dri za sogs/ /

gnas mgon skyabs dang dbang du mdzad/ /nyon mongs las kyi dregs pa'i tshogs/ /rang rgyud zhi nas byang sems bcas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod/ /snying po mdongs sol phul bar 'gyur/ /\u0f00 trag sha ka sarba ra ma ma sa hU~M hU~M swA hA/ bcom ldan

'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bstan pa myur du spel cig /rgya chad pa'i sngags kyis thams cad bsrung bar gyur ba bde legs su bya ba'i gnas pa bdag cag dus thams cad dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas shing de 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung

bar bya ba dang bran bzhin du gnas par bgyi'o/ /slar yang bdag cag rnams mgon pos bzhengs la byin gyis brlabs ste dbang bskur ba dang grol bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i snying po 'di byin gyis

brlabs so/ /\u0f00 u a~M mr-i ta bi ga na shu ta hU~M phaT swAhA/ zhes gsungs pa dang / de dag dang po'i sangs rgyas bzhin du 'od zer dang bcas par gyur nas gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du 'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba

dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las thugs ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bde byed gar dbang phyug /pad ma tshogs pa'i sku chen pos/ /yon tan rin chen sgyu ma'i chos/ /ting nge

'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas gshin rje rnams/ /rgyal po rgyal chen rgyal mor gnas/ /'khor bcas 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo'i tshogs 'phrul mdzad/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las/ /

gzi ldan gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ /pad ma rA ga nam mkha'i mdog /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi ste/ /pad ma'i sdong po bdud rtsi'i snod/ /rdo rje kha T+wA~M zhags pa thogs/ /rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis klubs/ /khyod bzhed 'jigs mdangs tshul 'dzin cing / /

brkyang bskum zhing mchog nyi ma'i dkyil/ /g.yang gzhi nyi ma'i phreng bas brgyan/ /\u0f00 pad ma ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT/ dpal gyi lha mo mchog nyid dang / /\u0f00 dang sprul te phyogs dang mtshams/ /pad ma'i gdan la zhing gis mtshan/ /brkyang bskum sku mdog

sngon mo'i tshogs/ /phyag na gri gug thod pa khrag /'bar ba'i cha lugs skra 'bar ma/ /phyi rol sprul pa'i tshogs bcas pas/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas su rol/ /rdo rje rin chen pad mo dang / /las dang sgyu 'phrul mkha' la bzhad/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma bzhin rgyas

spyan/ /kha dog phyogs mtshams ji lta bu/ /gsal zhing mun pa'i rdul gyis gos/ /zhing gi dbyug pa rtse gsum dang / /gser gyi mda' dang rdo rje dang / /chu srin rgyal mtshan zhags pa dang / /zhing chen rdo rje rtse dgu gdengs/ /gri gug rgyu ma'i zhags pa sdom/ /

rdo rje gdengs pa rtse gsum khrag /zhing chen khog phyes snying 'dren cing / /de bzhin rlung yab thod pa 'chang / /oM badzra ta krid ma hA la ti ti hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ta tri me da ra hU~M phaT/ oM DA ki mad kum pa ya hU~M phaT/ oM DA ki ni ti bre sha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki bi lA sa

hU~M phaT/ oM badzra dA ki dri ku ta ma le hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M phaT/ phyi rol pad ma'i 'dab ma las/ /seng ge rta dang lce spyang wa/ /bya rgod kang ka bya rog 'ug /mgo brnyan mche gshogs chen mo brgyad/ /hU~M las sprul te mdog dmar po/ /phyag na gri gug

thod pa khrag /rdo rje rol gri rtse gsum mdung / /'khor lo dgra sta be con mda'/ /gtun shing zhing khog g.yang gzhi sprul/ /ne'u le gzhong pa rin chen khyung / /zhal gdangs so so'i phyogs mdangs bzhin/ /kun kyang khro bcas khyams par gnas/ /zhing lpags

g.yang gzhi thod phreng sbrul/ /khrag zhag thal ba'i tshom bus brgyan/ /mkha' 'gro rigs bdun ma sring sprul pa'i tshogs/ /mche gshogs 'bar ba phyogs bcur 'khrugs/ /oM se ra ba ra na hU~M phaT/ oM ni raM te sha pa mu kha hU~M phaT/ oM ka~M na ma du na hU~M phaT/ oM

mu ka ra na na~M hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 s+'ur+ya sa mo ka hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra snig sha bru~M hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 ni sha ku r+ya ra na hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 re la~M su bag sha hU~M phaT/ mkha' 'gro bcu drug 'di dag kyang / /'od 'bar glog gi phreng ba can/ /'od kyi ru lu'i sgra 'byin cing / /spyan mur khro gnyer mche ba

can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi rol pa'i stabs/ /dbyings dang shes rab rab rtogs la/ /so so'i phrin las mdzad pa'i phyag /zhal dang sku ni so so'i mdog /\u0f00 ru khu sa~M ta gu na DA+e ta sa mo ra ga hU~M phaT/ snying po'i sngags so/ /\u0f00 badzra DA ki dzA la sha~M ba ra ku ma

ra hU~M phaT/ nye ba'o/ /\u0f00 DA ki hU~M sam ba ra dza li mu kha ma me hU~M phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor spro ba'i mthus/ /de dag dran pa med par brgyal/ /slar nyid rang gi 'khor du bsdus/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen por bkod/ /

de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas/ /gdul bya rnams kyi gnas dor nas/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa bzung byed cing / /rdo rje theg pa sbyor bar mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las mkha'

'gro ma sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa'i gtso/ /gar gyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs/ /gzi ldan yum dang zhal sbyor zhing / /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

zhugs nas/ /phyogs kyi bgegs 'dul byed pa'o/ /khams gsum gnon pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gnas/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i khang bzangs na/ /rin chen pad ma seng ge'i gdan/ /dri med nyi zla spras pa la/ /dbus

kyi lha mchog chen po ni/ /zhabs brgyad phyag ni bcu drug dang / /dmar ser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /bgegs la sogs pa'i tshul dang ldan/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo dri/ /thod pa rin chen dgra sta ras/ /yum chen dbang phyug sgeg mo dang / /rgyan tshogs

rin chen phreng ba can/ /dri med pad mas klubs pa'o/ /\u0f00 ba ga ba te ru ka~M sa~M bo ga ta ya hU~M phaT/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /dkar ser rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /g.yas su rin chen sems dpa' ste/ /ser po rin chen 'khor lo thogs/ /rgyab du pad mo'i

sems dpa' nyid/ /dmar ser rtse gsum bum pa thogs/ /g.yon du las kyi sems dpa' ste/ /ljang ser dril bu tri shu la/ /\u0f00 badzra swat+ta hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 rat+na swat+ta hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 pad ma swat+ta hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 karma swat+ta hU~M phaT/ 'khor lo pad+ma'i rtse mo la/ /yum dang 'khril

ba'i tshul gyis 'khod/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i rigs bdun la/ /bde gshegs yab yum nyis stong tshogs/ /bde gshegs rdo rje rin chen dang / /pad ma rgya gram sna tshogs mkha'/ /sku mdog pad ma ra ga dang / /in+d+ra la sogs rim bdun la/ /ral pa rtse mdzod bum pa

la/ /lcug ma dril bu glegs bam dang / /chos kyi rgyal mtshan phreng ba 'dzin/ /kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rin chen rgyan phreng 'od mdangs can/ /phyag mtshan gri gug thod pa dang / /pad ma'i phreng ba rtse gsum bsnams/ /ltag pa'i phyag bzhi

'dzin par mdzad/ /dang po rang rtags phyag rgya bsnams/ /\u0f00 badzra du ki bi shi ka du ku~M di ka~M ma~M hri sa~M ga ta sbru~M sra mo ta phaT swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o/ /\u0f00 badzra sa mo yo ga ta sa ra la su hU~M phaT/ rin po che rnams kyi'o/ /\u0f00 pad ma bu~M si nyi ha~M

he he ma~M ba~M hU~M phaT/ pad ma'i rigs rnams kyi'o/ /\u0f00 karma b+h+yo tru~M hU~M rak+Sha mu r+ya sa hU~M phaT/ las kyi rigs kyi'o/ /\u0f00 badzra tsakra bru~M si ti yo gi shwa ri hU~M phaT/ 'khor lo'i rigs kyi'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i tshogs/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spros byas

pa/ /rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya yin/ /phyogs kyi rgyal po'i gdon rnams 'gugs/ /skrag shing byed nas dgra 'gugs shing / /so so'i rigs dbyer 'khrug pa dag /rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzer/ /rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran/ /srog gi snying po dbul bar

bya/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnasu 'khod/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas 'dor nas/ /rang gi lus su gnas byas te/ /gzhal yas khang gi brgyan du gzhug /de dag gi snying po ni/

\u0f00 sa mu da ra dzi na na ga su tra b+ha ba si tri sni sha hU~M bru~M phaT zhes pa'o/ /slar gso ba'i sngags ni/ \u0f00 su mu ge Da~M sa~M myag he he ru tu pa la si ta~M dza hU~M phaT/ lha rnams kyi snying po bsdus pa ni/ /\u0f00 sarba sa ka ra bru~M bag sha sa~M me bra~M mu rak+Sha hU~M zhes pa'o/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las khams gsum gnon pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang sku/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus mdzad nas/ /khro bo'i

dkyil 'khor sprul byas te/ /gnod sbyin grul bum 'dul bar mdzad/ /gzhal yas gru gsum mthing nag la/ /dbus su 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan/ /dpal chen pad ma he ru ka /dur khrod chen po'i rgyan gyis brjid/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste/ /sku mdog

pad ma rA ga'i mdangs/ /rtse gsum gtun shing ral gri dang / /pad ma zhags pa thod rnga 'dzin/ /glang chen lko ba thod rlon sbrul/ /yum dang zhal sbyor 'khril pa'i tshul/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/ /yi ge las sprul khro ba'i rgyan/ /

shar du rnam rgyal mdog dkar sngo/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje dung / /'khor lo rin chen pad ma dang / /ral gri me 'od kyis mtshan pa/ /lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni/ /sngo nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /thod dbyug rin chen ne'u le dang / /rtse

gsum me dpung thod rnga 'dzin/ /nub tu rta mchog khro bo'i sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dmar skya'i mdog /'khor lo bsdigs mdzub rtse gsum dang / /ral gri thod pa Da ma ru/ /byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ /ljang sngon zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rgya gram

gri gug pad ma dang / /be con rtse gsum seng ge 'dzin/ /shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po ni/ /sdo skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /dbyug pa tsakra pad ma dang / /rnga yab ban d+ha dril bu 'dzin/ /lho nub mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /zhal gsum ser skya phyag drug pa/ /rin chen ral gri

gtun shin 'dzin/ /pad ma thod khrag mdung rtse gsum/ /nub byang 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni/ /dmar skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rdo rje dbyug pa rin chen bum/ /thod pa bdud rtsi snying 'dzin pa'o/ /byang shar stobs chen dud ka'i mdog /zhal gsum phyag

drug 'jigs pa'i mdangs/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bam chen khog /sna tshogs rdo rje bam chen khrag /'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro phreng dang / /gyad gyi dor thabs rol pa'i stabs/ /\u0f00 badzra krota bi dza ya hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra krota ya man ta ka hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha ha

ya grI ba hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kun Da li hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha nI la Dan Da hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha Ta ki dA hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro ta ma hA ba la hU~M phaT/ phyogs skyong gi rgyal po chen gnod sbyin dang / /grul

bum tshogs rnams dbang bsdus te/ /gsang sngags drag pos bsgral byas na/ /slar gsol ye shes lhums su gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing / /dam tshig la gzhan dkyil 'khor tshul/ /kun gyi srog snying phul ba ni/ /dam tshig chen pos byin

brlabs mdzad/ /slar yang dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags/ /'khor rnams kun la sbyin par mdzad/ /\u0f00 badzra kra ka ra murda si na ba mu ka hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 AHhU~M badzra su ka ta b+ha mo tra~M a la la hU~M phaT/ lha rnams kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsum las

byung / /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po'i sku/ /khams gsum dus kyis dbang bskur nas/ /'khor ba'i chos las rgyal byed cing / /byang chub sems kyis de nyid gsal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta

mchog rol pa'i rgyud las khro bo phrin las rol pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang skus/ /gzi brjid dgod pa'i rgyan bkod cing / /lha min grong khyer 'dul ba'i phyir/ /yum gyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul

bar mdzad/ /chos dbyings sprul pa'i gnas bzang mchog /rgyal ba'i rang bzhin rin chen spros/ /gru bzhi khang pa sgo dang bcas/ /rta babs ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes/ /dbus kyi pad ma'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /gnyis med rol pa'i yum gyi sku/ /mdog dmar

rgyan du zangs chen gzugs/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdzes pa'i mdangs/ /'khor lo dung khrag pad mo dang / /rin chen 'bar ba rtse dgu 'dzin/ /rin chen pad ma'i phreng ba can/ /stong bzangs na bza' dkyil bzangs bzhugs/ /\u0f00 pad ma mu sha ra sa ma

ka ta hU~M phaT/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ /pad ma dbyings phyug gsal ba mo/ /rin chen phreng ba glu ma che/ /dkar dmar ser dang ljang khu'i mdog /rdo rje gsum pa pad mo dra ba dang / /na ra si la'i snod rin tshogs/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor ma spros

shing / /sna tshogs pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /\u0f00 tsun d+de shwa ri hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 Sh+Ni sha badzra sa~M bru~M ga hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 byi tsu swa te hU~M phaT/ mtshams kyi pad ma'i 'dab ma la/ /de bzhin bde ba bskyed byed yum chen bzhi/ /dra ba mo dang glog 'gyur

rgyan/ /gshog pa can dang 'dod pa'o/ /dkar ser dmar skya sngo bsangs dang / /ljang khu mdog legs la bzhugs nas/ /rdo rje rin chen pad mo dang / /ud dpal lja khu legs mdzad pa'o/ /\u0f00 nu te no tsa kru hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 sa~M bo ga ta su he bya hU~M phaT/

\u0f00 ma ma kri bru~M he he hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 ta re ga ga na a ma la hU~M phaT/ phyogs rnams kun tu mkha' khyab pa/ /til gang bzhin du gnas gyur pa/ /ma mo gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kun/ /'khrug rngam rod rod por gyur nas/ /thugs rje

can la skyabs su mchi/ /srog gi snying po dbul bar byed/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus byas te/ /rang gi gnas su dbang bskur zhing / /dam tshigs dga' ba'i sdom pa rnyed/ /bde gshegs ye shes gsal bar 'gyur/ /kun gyis 'thun

par khas blangs te/ /dam tshig bsrung zhing rnal 'byor skyong / /\u0f00 ma ma rag ta sa pra ti id da~M sa bu ta phaT/ oM trag sha ra la si bad Ta ta phaT/ ma mo dang 'byung po rnams kyi snying po'o/ /\u0f00 yu me si d+ha ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ gnod sbyin rnams

kyi'o/ /\u0f00 AHhU~M yo ga bri gu me/ ha sa ha sa/ ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ slar gso zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las rin chen dbyings kyi
dkyil 'khor phrul pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /dus sum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsum thugs kyi 'khor lo yis/ /sa 'og sa bla sa stengs rnams/ /'joms byed

gza' dang rgyu skar dang / /bdud dang de yi rigs 'khor kun/ /'du bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la/ /snyoms zhugs 'khor lo sprul pa mdzad/ /thabs dang shes rab bsgrub byas pa'i/ /'od zer gsal bas stong gsum gang / /rin chen 'bar ba'i

gzhal yas khang / /sgo bzhi rta babs phreng bas brgyan/ /'khor lo rim gsum gdan dang bcas/ /rdo rje pad ma rin chen gyis/ /khor yug seng ge glang chen mchog /nyi mas mdzes pa'i pad mo yi/ /dbus kyi dpa' bo yum dang bcas/ /zhal

gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje rin/ /pad ma ral gri 'dzin par mdzad/ /dmar ser kun tu rgyu ba ni/ /ljang ser pad ma dril bus 'khyud/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan phreng klubs/ /sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis mdzes byas pa'o/ /

rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs rnams la/ /rigs kyi sems dpa' nyi shu bzhi/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba'i mdangs/ /rdo rje dril bu pad ma bsgoM/ /'khor lo rin chen snye ma bsnams/ /dang po'i phyag gnyis mtshan byas shing / /lhag ma gri gug thod pa

thogs/ /khro zhing sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis/ /rgyan phreng rigs kyi dbang po gsum/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis klubs/ /\u0f00 badzra swa ta kro d+ha he he ru lu hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rigs rnams kyi'o/ /pad ma ti sh+tha swA da na ma ku ru ku ru hU~M phaT/ pad ma

rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /\u0f00 i ku ri tsag ban d+ha si d+hi phaT phaT/ kro d+hi sha ri hU~M phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi'o/ /sgo bzhi mdzes gzugs khro mo ni/ /mi mthun pa'i blo gros dpa' chen mo/ /ye shes mkha' dbyings bzhi rnams te/ /

dkar ser dmar dang rim pa bzhin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu mtshan ma'i phyag /\u0f00 badzra a~M gu shA dza: pA sha hU~M/ s+pho Ta ba~M/ g+han+Da hoH/ phaT/ dgug gzhug bcing pa'i las dag dang / /dbab pa'i cho ga mnyes par byed/ /

dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus/ /rigs gsum sems dpa' khro bor bstan/ /'jigs byed cha lugs rngam pa'i stabs/ /rdo rje gcod byed 'jigs pa che/ /rdo rje 'joms pa'i yid 'phrog byed/ /rdo rje
