'dren pa yang dag ldan pa ste/ /steng du zla gam thig ler dga'/ /mgo mjug du yang gzhan yang bri/ /'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste/ /rnal 'byor rin chen dbang bskur sbyin/ /bstan pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te/ /sdig pa rnams kyang

'jig par byed/ /A li gnyis dang ldan bya ste/ /tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad/ /'di ni rab 'gal kun du chags/ /chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin/ /dang po bskal pa chen po yi/ /tsheg drag po dang bcas par bzhag /sangs rgyas

byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /bdag nyid la ma bzhag yang rung / /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor bsgrub byed na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams kyi mchog /ye shes phyag rgya mngon

gnas pa'i/ /'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba'i/ /bris pa yis kyang khyab par 'gyur/ /e ma'o bde ba ye shes che/ /'di ni ye shes sku 'di la/ /gnod byed pa ni bsten byed cing / /'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur/ /khams gsum

mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'di las rgya chen gzhan med do/ /sgrub pa po dang sems can kun/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /che mchog he ru ka gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba

las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid ches pa dang / mgu ba dang yid dga' ba skyes nas shin du gyes pa chen po rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad cing / yang he ru ka'i sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das che mchog

he ru ka zhabs brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o/ /de las spros nas phyag stong spyan stong gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa na/ shin du mi srun pas gdug pa nga rgyal che zhing dregs pa can

thams cad la badzra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs 'od zer du gyur te/ de las spros pas rigs bzhi he ru ka dregs pa can thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir/ rak+Sha he ru ka nyon mongs pa'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i phyir rak+Sha he ru ka /ye

shes kyi don dang ldan pa'i phyir byi sha he ru ka /dam tshig las mi 'da' ba'i phyir sa ma ya he ru ka /de las 'phrog pas he ru ka stong rtsa brgyad/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /kro d+hi shwa ri sku mdog sna tshogs

pa'o/ /dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad/ zhabs bzhi phyag cha sna tshogs pa'o/ /zhabs brgyad rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gi nang na/ he ru ka bzhi zhabs bzhis mnan pa/ badzra he ru ka /pad ma'i sbubs su dpral ba'i spyan phyed tsam nub par bzhugs pa/

shin du rngam pa'i khro mo dbu'i steng na he ru ka zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo dbu brgyad mnan pa yang dbus kyi gyen du bltas pa'i zhal ni nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med par sbyor zhing byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims/ byang chub

kyi sems kyi rigs kyi he ru ka zhabs 'og tu mnan pa yang gnyis su med par sbyar zhing byang chub kyi sems 'bebs/ badzra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs pas rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnam par rab tu skrag nas skyabs su gsol lo/ /mgrin

gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol te/ rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gis/ /bskal pa bas kyang bsreg mdzad cing / /'jigs chen rngam pa'i khyad par can/ /dbu mangs bsgrub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing / /phyag mangs 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams/ /zhi ba'i phyag

stong spyan stong yang / /'jig rten rab tu dpa' kong na/ /khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong yang / /rgod dang gshi zhing za byed pa/ /'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ /'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa/ /khro chen khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /

ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma slas 'di rnams phul nas skyabs su gsol lo/ /chags pa med pa'i dbang gi thabs kyi sbyor bas dbang bsdus te/ dam tshig dang ming btags lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje 'chang gi gral du dgod do/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa chen po'i don gyi gsang ba rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal po sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rol pa 'di phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /thig gis

yongs su 'khor bar btab/ /dbus su pad ma 'dab brgyad bri/ /dbus kyi pad ma'i snying po la/ /bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka /shar du badzra he ru ka /lho ru rata na he ru ka /nub tu pad ma he ru ka /byang du kar ma he ru ka /shar lhor rak+Sha he ru ka /lho nub

yak+Sha he ru ka /nub byang byi sha he ru ka /byang shar sa ma ya he ru ka /bder gshegs yum dang bcas pa dgod/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la ye shes las grub pa'i 'phra men ma bcu drug dkod/ /de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi thod pas bskor/ /gshin rje 'joms dang

stobs po che/ /rta mgrin dang ni bdud rtsir 'khyil/ /sgo bzhi dag tu rim bzhin no/ /sku dang phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur te gcig tu ma nges pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de kho na nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

bcom ldan 'das dpal pad ma he ru ka dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa/ gshog pa rdo rjes bstams pa/ zhabs brgyad chas dang brgyan cing / 'phra men ma bcu drug gi 'khor dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor nas bzhugs te sprul pa las

bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen po rag ta dang / rus gong gsar snying gi nang na thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du zhing bsnol ma'i gdan khri la bzhugs so/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis klu chen po rnams brdzis pa/ rdo rje brag ris bltams

pa rdo rje me phung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/ dbu gtsug nas rta mgo ljang khu lnga byung ba/ sbrul nag gi chun po stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rta mchog

chags pa chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /hU~M nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing khams nas/ /de nyid rang snang mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor na/ /bde ba chen po dpal 'bar mchog gi lha/ /'du 'bral med pa'i thugs rje dbang gi lha/ /dbang

mchog ngo mtshar rngom brjid dbang gi lha/ /dpal chen pad ma'i thugs ni rin po che/ /khro bor ston kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ /snying rje yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa sna tshogs cir 'gyur yang / /'gro ba'i don du dpal chen bzhengs su gsol/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das rta mgrin de nyid/ /yul la ma chags brag phug dgon pa/ /zas la ma chags rtswa'i rtsa ba/ /gos la ma chags shing gi shun pa/ /skom la ma chags brag gi thigs pa/ /brag ri mi rten shing la rten/ /shing la mi brten chu la

brten/ /chu'i snying po 'tsher ba gcig tu sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /ha ya gri ba rta mchog dpal/ /sku mdog dmar po stag gi sham thabs can/ /sprul nag stong gis brgyan pas brjid chags pas/ /dbu skra kham nag ral pa mun tsa cod pan can/ /dbu'i

gtsug nas bdud rtsi rnam sprul pa/ /smin mtshams sna brag kun nas glog stong 'phro/ /dbu'i gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni/ /snyan nas sgra byung 'brug skad ldir/ /spyan nas me byung khams gsum sreg /shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig

rten 'thor/ /zhal nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil/ /ma mo dam can rnams kyang dam la 'du/ /rta skad theng gsum 'tsher bas srid pa dbang du sdud/ /rta bro theng gsum brdungs pas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnan/ /pad ma rgyal po rta mchog dpal/ /dkar po'i

mdog la dmar po'i zhal/ /sku mdog mthing ka'i khro gnyer can/ /snyan ni dung gi khong seng can/ /mu med khams ni ci mchis gsan/ /spyan gnyis nyi zla'i phrugs su bcas/ /khams gsum dag ni ci mchis gzigs/ /rtog pa mtshon gyi lcang lo can/ /rnga

ma lcags kyi g.yab mos 'debs/ /shangs nas me phung 'bar ba'i tshub ma 'thor/ /zhal nas mi zad lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs/ /g.yas pa gsum po ba dan 'phyar/ /g.yon pa sdigs pa'i 'dzub mo bsgreng / /go'u ri gshog pa gsang

ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /na ba rnams ni sos par byed/ /rta skad bzhad pa rta bro brdung / /rta skad chen po thang gcig gis/ /klu rgyal ris drug dbang du sdud/ /rta skad chen po thang gcig gis/ /ma tshogs dbang phyug dbang du sdud/ /rta skad chen po thang

gcig gis/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du sdud/ /rta bro lan gsum brdungs pa yis/ /bdud bzhi kun kyang zil gyis gnon/ /dpag tshad 'og na bdud gnas pa/ /klad du rgyob la thal bar lhogs/ /yab cig re byams rta mchog dbang / /rta

rkun tshul du gar byed kyis/ /gar gyi rda la da tshur spyon/ /rta rkun tshul du dbyugs 'dor gyis/ /dbyugs pa'i rta la da tshur spyon/ /rta rkun tshul du g.yab 'dor gyis/ /g.yab mo brda la da tshur spyon/ /hU~M gis rgyu drug rtsa nas gcod/ /phrin las zhi bar mdzod

cig rta mchog dbang / /srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba'i mthu/ /che tshan kun las 'phags pas pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug che/ /gar mkhan sgyu 'phrul kun las thabs kyi rgyal por grags/ /byams ldan gar gyi dbang gis phrin las mdzod/ /rtag tu grub

mchog re zhing 'bod 'grogs na/ /byams ldan mgon po bdag la ci phyir thugs mi brtse/ /lha mchog bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na/ /ye shes lha mchog khyod kyis thugs rjer rung lags sam/ /dngos grub rtsol bar mi dmigs kyang / /

sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub rtsol/ /yum chen e ka dza Ti ma/ /ral pa gcig mas de skad bskul lo/ /yang yab kyis bskul ba 'khyud par bsten pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /bdud kyi yum la gshin rje lcam/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug

ma/ /dpal ldan chen mo re ma ti/ /ma chen e ka dza Ti ma/ /gu h+ya gsang chen ral gcig ma/ /re ta chen mo tsa mun Ta/ /srin mo dkar mo chen mo'i tshogs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dam shin ti/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam rgyal dpal/ /yi dam rgyal mo g.yu

'phro ma/ /las la 'khyil cing chos la bstan/ /dbu rnams 'byin cing 'dud pa'i tshul/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /de nas snying po dran tsam gyis/ /pad ma ta krid ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu/ e a ra li hring hring hring / e ka dza Ti sa ma ya hU~M/

ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ sngags kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/ /dbyings gsum rnam par dag pas bsgrubs/ /de nas skyo nas bsdu ba ni/ /hU~M hU~M zhes ni rab brjod de/ /phyag rgya chen po sku gnyis ni/ /sang ha ra na hU~M zhes rab tu brjod/ /yab kyang yum la bsdu/ /yum

yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / de kho na nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /cha ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbang gi rang bzhin dmar po ni/ /

dbusu pad ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /pad mo'i snying po la bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbu gsum phyag drug la shar gyi pad ma la badzra he ru ka /lhor rat+na he ru ka /nub du pad ma he ru ka /byang du kar ma he ru ka /mtshams bzhir yum bzhi/ /de'i

phyi rim du go'u rim brgyad dang / sing ha ma brgya dang bcu drug /sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'o/ /sgo bzhi rim bzhin dang 'thun/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de kho na nyid rab gsang ba'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /

za byed chen mo tshogs kyi bdag /yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rdo rje shugs can dang / rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje gad rgyangs can dang / rdo rje

grags can dang / rdo rje ha ha gad mo can dang / rdo rje he he grags chen dang / rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje gshin rje bshad pa can dang / rdo rje las kyi bdag po dang / rdo rje mi g.yo mgon po dang / rdo rje bsgyings pa dang / rdo rje glang po che dang / rdo rje ko

ba rlon pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' chen po dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje mig mi zad dang / /rdo rje bde ba dang / rdo rje so'i phreng ba can dang / rdo rje dang chen dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje g.yab mo dang / rdo rje dga' ba dang / rdo rje 'degs pa dang /

rdo rje hU~M chen dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje gzhu gdungs dang / rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje rdo rje dang / rdo rje g.yul zlog dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rjes dang / rdo rje chu dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje rlung dang / rdo rje nam mkha' dang / rdo rje yang dag dang /

rdo rje sgra 'bar dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje mig brgya ma dang / rdo rje ba spu ma dang / rdo rje sen mo skyes pa dang / rdo rje zangs kyi lpags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi mche ba can dang / rdo rje spu gri so can dang / rdo rje lpags pa mkhregs pa dang / rdo rje phreng ba

thogs pa dang / rdo rje rgyan pa dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje ki la ya dang / rdo rje dpal ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje za byed dang / rdo rje 'jams pa'i dbyangs dang / rdo rje chen po dang / rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / rdo rje smra ba dang / rdo rje

skyes mchog dang / rdo rje seng ge dang / rdo rje kun tu lta ba dang / rdo rje mchog du dga' ba dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje 'od bzangs dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snang ba po dang / rdo rje sku dang / rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rje thugs dang / rdo rje 'od gsal ba dang / rdo rje

sprin rnam par 'thor ba dang / rdo rje char ba stan dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po dang / rdo rje rin chen kun bdag dang / rdo rje 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje snang ba dang / rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje dri ma med pa dang / rdo rje chags pa bral ba dang / rdo rje skyil dkrung

dang / rdo rje 'od po che dang / rdo rje pad ma skyes pa dang / rdo rje thams cad kun mkhyen dang / rdo rje mdzod 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje pha rol phyin pa dang / rdo rje rab tu ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / rdo rje gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang / rdo

rje nu ma can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sder mo can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mche ba can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sprul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje rgyud 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje phyogs bcur sprul pa

'gyed pa po dang / rdo rje don byed pa po dang / rdo rje lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje lha min bdag po dang / rdo rje 'chi med lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje 'joms par byed pa dang / rdo rje chos kyi sbyin bdag dang / rdo rje byams pa dang / rdo rje shes rab rnon po dang / rdo rje thog

thog lcags kyi gsor chen 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje teg teg stong gsum 'gyed pa dang / rdo rje thib thib myos par byed pa dang / rdo rje 'ur 'ur 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / rdo rje chem chem gnam lcags 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje yud tsam glog

'byin pa dang / rdo rje shig shig khams gsum bsgul ba dang / rdo rje ye shes 'bog byed dang / rdo rje mi srung smyong bar byed pa dang / rdo rje kha T+wA~M rgyal bar byed pa dang / rdo rje dbang phyug sdigs shing sdang bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi zhags pa dang /

rdo rje gnod sbyin srog gcod pa dang / rdo rje khrag 'thung snying khrag 'thung ba dang / rdo rje dpal snying sreg pa dang / rdo rje mdung thung 'bugs par byed pa dang / rdo rje khrag za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje tshil za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkang za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sha

za bar byed pa dang / ye shes las sprul pa'i khro bo 'di rnams kyang 'thung bar byed/ zhal du 'dren par byed/ mkha' la rlom par byed/ zhal du rdub cing za bar byed/ dbang du sdud cing tshar gcod par byed/ tho bas rdeg par byed/ phur bus 'debs

par byed/ ral gris gcod par byed/ be con gyis rdung bar byed/ 'khor los lus gtub par byed/ dgra stas gshegs par byed/ rdo rjes mgo mjug med par rdeg par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis phyed tshal du byed/ rdo rje mdas gting 'bugs par byed/

mtshon spu gri ma las gsheg cing dral bar byed cing lcags kyus 'gug par byed/ zhags pas 'ching bar byed/ lcags sgrog gis sdom par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram phyed kyis dbang du bsdus nas las thams cad grub par byed do/ /rdo rje mtshon cha'i sngags

so/ /\u0f00 bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dza la maN+Da la phaT phaT/ ha la ha la hU~M/ badzra dza man tra su~M b+ha ni/ \u0f00 brU~M hU~M bru~M tru~M bru~M hi bru~M ha bru~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ grangs nges pa 'dir bstan to/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de skad ces rdo rje

mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las tshe bsgrub pa 'di phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/ /chag ni dgu yi tshad du bya/ /thigs gis yongs su 'khor bar gdab/ /

dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri/ /'khor lo dag gi lte ba la/ /bcom ldan kun du bzang po bri/ /shar du rdo rje sems dpa' bri/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan bri/ /nub tu snang ba mtha' yas bri/ /byang du don yod grub pa bri/ /phyi rim rdo rje ra

bas bskor/ /grwa bzhir dgod par bya ba ni/ /shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug bri/ /lho ru rin chen dbyings phyug bri/ /nub tu pad ma dbyings phyug bri/ /byang du las kyi dbyings phyug bri/ /de yi phyi rim snam bu la/ /sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par dgod/ /sgo bzhi

ni dkyil 'khor gzhan dang 'thun/ /de rnams kyang phyag mtshan tshe'i bum pa re re 'dzin cing bsnams pa/ gdan pad ma la bzhugs pa sha dag go/ de nas tshe dbub par bya ba dang / tshe gshin rje nag po'i lag nas 'brog pa dang / che gang g.yab pa dang / che

bcing zhing bsdams pa dang / tshe dbang du bsdu ba dang / tshe yongs su spel ba dang / tshe rgyas par bya ba dang / tshe ring zhing bdud kyis bar mi chod par bya ba dang / tshe sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba dang / tshe skye shi med pa'i 'bras bu chos lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos lha mo lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa spros nas/ \u0f00 bru~M badzra A yu she hU~M zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bdud gshin rje nag po'i snying dral te/ shog gog skya bo rlung gis btab pa zhin/ dun dun khyar khyar 'ong ba de la gshin rje'i co to nas

bzung nas 'drad kyis bsgyel te/ rdo rje snying kar bzhags nas lag pa nas hur gyis phrogs nas/ tshe'i g.yab dar dang / phyag rgyas g.yab pa dang / ri rab rtse la sbas pa/ rgya mtsho'i gting du sbas pa/ bar snang gi khams la sbas pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu

nas bkug cing tshe blangs te zhags pa'i tshogs kyis bcings/ lcags sgrog gi tshogs kyis bsdams nas dbang du bsdus te/ rgya cher yongs su spel bar bya'o/ /\u0f00 bru~M badzra A yu she badzra hU~M a zhes brjod pas/ bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgyas bstan nas rgyas par bya'o/ /

\u0f00 badzra d+ha ra/ rad na d+ha ra/ pad ma d+ha ra/ kar ma d+ha ra/ ta thA ga tA/ sa ma ya ti ya ma ya ti kra sa ma ya d+ha ra ko\u0f85ha~M zhes brjod pas bdud gshin rje nag po'i lag nas tshe 'phrogs te/ gshin rje yang brgyal zhing ngas nas bsgral zhing rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos snying khrag

'thungs te/ tshe'i bar chod byas te/ \u0f00 puN+ye puN+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ra mi ta A yuHpuN+ya/ dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ zhes bzlas pas/ sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub thob pa dang / tshe srog gi snying po/ \u0f00 bru~M badzra A yu she badzra hU~M

a zhes bzlas pas/ tshe skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gi sku tshe thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas tshe'i las 'di gsungs so/ /dbang phyug gtso dang rigs kyi yum/ /yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bde ba chen pos yongs

brgyan te/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par phun sum ldan/ /rdo rje sems gtso mnyes mdzad pa/ /gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol/ /a~M e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni kA tri sha ho/ sa ma ya sta~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ brtan par bzhugs pa/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung

thugs/ /yon tan phrin las rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /\u0f00 badzra sa ma ya \u0f00/ oM badzra sa ma ya a~M/ hU~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ swa badzra sa ma ya swa/ ha~M badzra sa ma ya ha~M/ las la bzhugs pa/ \u0f00 shar gyi

phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /rdo rje lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu dza/ /tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig /dkar mo zhi byed mgyogs ma 'od 'phro can/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /bru~M badzra A yu badzra

a~M gu sha dzaHdzaHdzaH/ lho phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /ser mo yid bzhin glog phreng 'dzin/ /phyags na rin chen sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams/ /che la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs

ma/ /dmar mo bkra gsal dbang bsdud ma/ /phyag na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /nag mo mig gcig ral pa can/ /dung gi tshems la lcags kyi

spu/ /phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings phyug ma rnams bskul ba/ dbyings phyug mkha' ldan pad ma'i dbyings/ /phyag rgya bde mchog dbyings kyi yum/ /

ye shes sprul pa'i phyag rgya ma/ /dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /badzra a~M gu sha hU~M dzaHstong gsum dbyings la tshe yi mnga' brnyes pa/ /khams gsum ma lus dbang bsdud ma/ /zhing la rngam zhing brkam stobs can/ /stong gsum

dbyings nas tshe dang gzi brjid drol/ /dbyings ma dkar dang rkun mo gnyis med tshogs/ /bde chen rmongs byed thal byed ma/ /gtum mo dbyings su sgrol mdzad snying 'byin ma/ /dpal chen rgyal mo dgyes pa'i 'khor/ /dung phreng chen mo 'khor dang bcas/ /tshe la

gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /log pa lta byed bdud dpung 'dul mdzad ma/ /'dod khams ma dang gnyis med rol pa'i sras/ /dbang phyug 'phra men 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /tshe la gnod cing

'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /gshin rje lag nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo lcags kyu ma/ /phyag na shel gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sgrol bar byed/ /lho yi phyogs nas

'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo zhags pa ma/ /phyag na mthing shing bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed 'ching bar byed/ /nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo lcags sgrogs ma/ /phyag na zangs kyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod

cing 'gal byed sdom par byed/ /byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo dril bu ma/ /phyag na g.yu yi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud/ /steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo dbyings phyug ma/ /

phyag na dngul gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud/ /'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo bstan ldan ma/ /phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod 'gal byed ma lus dbang du sdud/ /\u0f00 bru~M badzra A y+'u

yud te rad na yu ti/ d+harma yu ti/ karmA yu ti/ bru~M badzra A yu she hU~M a/ de nas dngos grub blang ba ni/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ /ding bdag sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa'i/ /byin kyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig /

\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ dpal ldan rdo rje gsung 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ /ding bdag sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga tA bAg badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs

'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ /ding bdag sangs rgyas thugs 'dzin pa'i/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skongs bar gyur cig /lta ba yon po thams cad

srongs par gyur cig /cho ga nyams pa thams cad rdzogs par gyur cig /tshe sku gsung thugs kyi skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku gsung thugs sprul pa'i cho

'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs so/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ ma hA rag ta'i mgo la yan gyis byugs la/ dbus su badzra he ru ka /yum ka ti shwa ri/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du badzra he ru ka /lhor rata na he ru ka /nub

tu pad ma he ru ka /byang du karma he ru ka /sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyud gzhan dang 'thun/ de'i phyi rim snam bu cig la 'phra men ma bcu drug /de'i phyi rim sgo bzhi la dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dri chen gyis maN Dal byugs la dbus su yak+Sha he ru ka

dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad/ zhabs brgyad gshogs pa rdo rjes gtams pa/ de'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ shar du badzra he ru ka /lhor yag k+Sha he ru ka /nub tu byi sha he ru ka /byang du sa ma ya he ru ka /mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma yum

bzhi bzhugs/ gdan zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la 'phra men dang khro bo pha bcu ma bcu dgod cing bzhugs so/ /sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi dgod do/ /khro bo chen po ni la tan tra dbus su bri/ de'i phyi rim

pad ma 'dab ma brgyad la sprul ba'i khro bo shugs can dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / gad rgyangs can dang / 'di rnams go rims bzhin bri/ sgo bzhi bzhan dang 'thun/

dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ rnam par rgyal ba dbus su bri/ pad ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje grags chen/ lhor khro bo gad mo can/ nub du khro bo he he/ grags chen dang / byang du rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po bri/ de yi phyi rim sgo rnams

bri/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su gshin rje gshed po bri/ phyi rim pad ma 'dab brgyad la/ 'phra men ma sing ha la sogs pa brgyad bri/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dbus su bri/

de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la khro bo 'gyings pa dang / khro bo glang po che dang / khro bo ko ba rlon pa dang / khro bo mig mi bzang ba bzhi rim pa bzhin du bri'o/ /phyi'i sgo snam dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su ha ya gri ba bri/

pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ ke'u rim brgyad bri/ phyi rim sgo snam dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la Ta ki ra dza dbus su dgod/ phyi rim maN+Da la brgyad ba la khro bo bde ba dang / so'i phreng ba dang / dung chen dang / khu tshur dang / g.yab mo dang /

dga' ba dang / 'degs pa dang / hU~M chen dang ni 'di rnams bri/ sgo rnams dgod/ dkyil 'khror 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje spu can dang / zangs kyi gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi mche ba

can dang / spu gri so can dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dbus su dgod/ de'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab ma bzhi la stag gi mgo can dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo

can rnams so/ /sgo bzhi rims bzhin du dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la khro bo hU~M ka ra dbus su dgod do/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la spyang khu'i mgo can dang / wa'i mgo can dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / dred mgo can rnams dgod do/ /sgo

bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khom 'dom gang gru bzhi la stobs po che dbus su dgod/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje gdengs mo/ lhor ni rdo rje sder mo/ nub tu dur khrod bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje gtun khung rnams rim bzhin du dgod do/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo de rnams kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni/ /dbu dgu phyag ni bcwa brgyad ste/ /gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa gdengs/ /zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad

du bstan/ /de yi 'khor gyi khro mo ni/ /phyag kyang srin mo ltar 'thun te/ /zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar bstan/ /shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba ste/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /

zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /dri za bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo dbyug pa sngon po can/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /

zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /me lha bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /ya man ta ka gshin rje gshed/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa

can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /ma he bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug

gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /bden bral bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /nub kyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /ha ya gri ba rta mchog dbang / /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum

phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /klu bdag bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /nub byang mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo Ta ki ra dza ste/ /sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum

phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /rlung lha bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /byang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'phro/ /

dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /byang shar mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /sku mdog

ljang skya 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /bi na ya ka'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /steng gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo hU~M mdzad hU~M ka ra/ /sku mdog

dkar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /nyi zla gza' skar khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /'og gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /ma hA ba la stobs po che/ /sku mdog

gnag la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /sa bdag bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ya mAn ta ka'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs

nas 'di skad ces bskul lo/ /bdud ru tra nag po 'dul bar mdzad do/ /hU~M gtum chen rab 'byam 'jig rten 'joms mdzad la/ /nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod/ /phyag cha mang po bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar/ /rab 'bar gshin rje gshed la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing / /gcan zan gdug pa'i lpags rlon sku la brgyan/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis rab 'jigs gshin rje gnon/ /zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan/ /mi zad rgyal po gdong drug hU~M sgra can/ /phaT kyis

khams gsum sngags mdzad zhabs drug po/ /sha za'i mgo gcod dbu yi rgyan du thogs/ /spyan bzlog tsam gyis thog 'bebs me ltar 'phro/ /ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing / /ma mo rnams kyang sgren mor 'dar zhing 'bros/ /

stong gsum mid par mdzad pa'i zhal gdangs la/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor bcas khrag gi thigs 'dzag cing / /nad stong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'bros/ /rkan sgra gtogs pa lha chen khyab 'jug kyang / /'bub 'gyel bcas par khrag skyug nyid la 'dud/ /

phyag na mi thod rlon pa bsnams pa ni/ /dngos grub phyag gis glad khrag zhal du stob/ /tshangs pa'i mgo gcad dbu yi rgyan du byas/ /zhing chen mgo nas chem chem za bar byed/ /rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas par thogs nas ni/ /khyod mthong tsam gyis rab 'jigs

nyid la 'dud/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sprul pa'i khye'u bzangs dbu gsum phyag drug pa brgya rtsa brgyad byung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis me tog gtor bka' nod pa'i tshul du gong de bzhugs

pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dgung la thog thog mi bzad pa/ /khyi'u chung sngon mo mkha' la lding / /ya mAn ta ka khro bo ste/ /sku yang tshe la bam lda ri bzang / /sku mdog stangs zil bcag

pa 'dra/ /phyag gnyis dang po kha T+wA~M ga /bar na rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /tha ma mda' dang gzhu bsnams te/ /'khor ni 'phra men brgyad kyis bskor/ /nga nyid yin te skal pa bzang / /skal bzang nga yi dam tshig gis/ /dog la chem chem mi bzad pa/ /

bsgrags pa ral pa gcig ma yin/ /dam tshig dus las ma 'da' zhig ces sgo'o/ /ci bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ /las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos ma dang 'phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du

zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /las bcol bar mdzad do/ /kro d+hi shwa ri dpal 'bar ma/ /khams gsum srid la mnga' mdzad ma/ /las su gsod la dga' ba mo/ /shan pa spu gri rnon po so/ /ro la rngam pa'i kha T+wA~M ga /'byung po tsit+ta mchog la

rol/ /mthing ga mchog ston dpal gyi yum/ /rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug ma/ /ki'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol/ /gser gyis 'od 'phro mda' gzhu 'gengs/ /rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma/ /tse'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol/ /phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan

'dzin/ /pad ma'i gsung gi dbang phyug ma/ /pra mo ha yi mchod pas rol/ /nag mo ral pa thod pas 'gengs/ /karma las kyi dbang phyug ma/ /po ta li yi mchod pas rol/ /gtum mo zhe sdang spu gri so/ /zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /g+hasma

ri yi mchod pas rol/ /pad ma 'joms pa'i char chen 'bebs/ /'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /puk+ka si yi mchod pas rol/ /rin chen me lce glog phreng 'dzin/ /gti mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /sma sha na yi mchod pas rol/ /

las su dgra sta 'bar ba 'dzin/ /nga rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /tsan d+ha li yi mchod pas rol/ /sid da gsod byed seng ge mgo/ ro mchog za ba'i 'phra men ma/ /byA g+h+ri mgo gcod stag gi mgo/ thod rlon za ba'i 'phra men ma/ /sri ka dur

rkun wa yi mgo/ dur sri ma yi 'phra men ma/ /shwa na sha 'drad spyang mo mgo/ sha chen za ba'i 'phra men ma/ /gr-iT+ha khrag 'thung bya rgod mgo/ khrag tshil za ba'i 'phra men ma/ /kang ka mu ka dur bya'i mgo/ dug gsum 'joms pa'i phra men ma/ /khwa kha rgyu 'dren pho rog mgo/ dgra

bgegs 'dul ba'i 'phra men ma/ /hu lu tshe 'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo/ glo snying za ba'i 'phra men ma/ /stag g.yag sha ba seng ge'i mgo/ byi la sbyang khu wa yi mgo/ dom dred phag gi mgo can rnams/ /thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig /de skad ces

bka' stsal pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sbyor bas sku la 'khril cing / /las mthar phyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dzaHdzaHlcags kyu glo snying 'dren/ /a mo sngon mo thod sprul zhags/ /a li

dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom/ /bas ni ljang gu dril 'khrol dgyes/ /bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las ye shes kyi khro bo dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung ngo / /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs rnam pa bzhis ni brgyan/ /dar

dang dril bu chun po dang / /nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras/ /do shal rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam bres pa/ /sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan/ /sras bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /ka ba

mchog brgyad yang dag ldan/ /dbus su dga' byed stan la ni/ /dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i dar gyis g.yogs/ /thams cad stan la de dag ces/ /dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /stan de la ni bzhag

par bya/ /tshad med pad mo dmar 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan ldan/ /rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdzes/ /tshad med dang ni sbyang ba yi/ /dbu la chun pos mdzes par byas/ /sna tshogs ye

shes rab tu gnas/ /chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas/ dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud/ /g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje che/ /snying kar gsor la rab tu brtson/ /bde la sogs pa yon tan ldan/ /thog ma nyid du rnam par bzhag /slob ma 'am yang

na gzhan yang rung / /mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la/ /tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs bya ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil du bzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /de la sogs pa yon tan gtso/ /dbus gyi stan la 'dug pa ni/ /bdag ni rab dgyes

rjes su smra/ /der ni slob ma byin brlabs te/ /thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs/ /rdo rje pad ma las byung ba'i/ /gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro/ /rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan/ /yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya ste/ /snying ga mtshogs

ma mgrin spyi bor/ /lha rnams la sogs 'bru bsgoms te/ /mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba'i/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /tshul bzhin thams cad bzhag par bya/ /mdun du lha mo myos byed ma/ /

ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes/ /dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis/ /thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchog /shes rab can gyis mdun du bzhags/ /g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma/ /mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren

par brtson/ /do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan/ /lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/ /gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra/ /chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo/ /sems dpa' che la mnyes mdzad cing / /de yi tshul bzhin bzhag par bya/ /rgyab tu lha mo rmongs

byed ma/ /pad ma dmar po mdog gi 'od/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'o/ /sku yi tshad ni nyi shu gcig /dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes/ /sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par glubs/ /sna tshogs

pad mo sbyor la sogs/ /gar gyi bya ba rab rlag bzhag /g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs dgos pa rjes brlabs pa/ /sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan/ /rnal 'byor la ni shin du brtson/ /lha dang lha min mi yi rnams/ /'gro ba

thams cad myos mdzad ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs dar ni na bza' gsol/ /grwa rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams dang / /bdug pa me tog bsung ldang ba/ /gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan/ /

ci rigs par ni bzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan/ /skal ldan 'ga' la rnams mos pa/ /sgo srungs bzhi ni bzhag par bya/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang / /

rdza rnga rnga chen ku mu te/ /mu ra tsa dang dar rnga dang / /gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che/ /rol mo yo byad sna tshogs rnams/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi

rol du/ /rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro ma bzhag /yi dgas phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te/ /skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan/ /gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing / /sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang / /rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa/ /

dkyil 'khor byas te bdug pa ni/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya/ /dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed/ /gsod par byed dang 'phrog par byed/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams/ /shar gyi phyogs su bzhag par bya/ /gzi brjid che dang 'bar

byed ma/ /'joms byed bong bu lho ru ste/ /gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin bzhag par bya/ /chags chen po dang chags bral dang / /'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs ma/ /rab du 'byor pas 'byor byas te/ /ci rigs nub tu

gzhag par bya/ /sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang / /gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag 'phrog /sngags dang phyag rgya byin brlabs nas/ /sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du bzhag /shar gyi grwa ru bzhag pa ni/ /bya rog gdong ni mig 'bru ste/ /'jigs

pa'i mig dang 'jig pa'i gdong / /ci ltar rjes su 'thun byas te/ /yid dgas stan la yang dag 'dug /sna tshogs mchog gi gdong 'dzin te/ /lag par gri dang khar gzhong thogs/ /mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o/ /nub dang lho yi mtshams

bzhag pa/ /bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma/ /khros pa'i khra dang phag gi gdong / /gsus pa che la lto 'phyangs rnams/ /nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /rnga mo bong bu gdong 'dzin ma/ /khros pa ra dang khyi yi gdong / /rgyu ma'i mgo nas sha bar

byed/ /shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs/ /lto 'phyangs po la bum pa 'dzin/ /phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi/ /lce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams/ /'jigs byed gdong

ni mche ba 'dzin/ /rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin ma/ /sgo rnams kyi ni phyogs rnams kun/ /sgo bzhi rnams ni bzhag par bya/ /byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te/ /bum pa rnams ni shar nyid du/ /nub tu rnam par 'jigs

pa 'o/ /lho ru gshin rje rgyal po bzhag /de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog /nam mkhar 'gro bas kun du bskor/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dgyes shing

spyan ni rgyas pa yis/ /bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi/ /brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /thal mo sbyor nas gtsug nyid du/ /bzhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed/ /bskul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis/ /de dag gtso la mnyes

par byed/ /kye ma chos ni ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma spyod pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma sbas pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma bde byed yang dag 'byung / /kye ma kun tu bzang po don/ /kye ma rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs/ /kye ma bde ba dga' ba che/ /

kye ma bde ba bde mchog ste/ /kye ma sngags kyi yang dag sbyor/ /kye ma snying po yang dag sbyor/ /kye ma phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs/ /kye ma bsgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o/ /kye ma pha rol phyin pa yis/ /kye ma ci ltar mthur rigs pa/ /kye

ma dgos pa sna tshogs che/ /kye ma dag pa gsum sbyar ba/ /kye ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma pad ma rnam phye ba/ /kye ma dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma mchog dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma gar ni dga' ba che/ /kye ma glu rab dri ma med/ /kye ma

sil snyan rnam par 'khrol/ /kye ma gda' dang mun sel ba/ /kye ma dga' byed me tog phreng / /kye ma mar me mun pa sel/ /kye ma dri ni shin du bsil/ /kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma rgyu ma nam mkha' 'dra/ /kye ma sangs rgyas

nam mkha' 'dra/ /kye ma rin chen bde mchog skyed/ /kye ma sna tshogs rgyu ma mdzad/ /kye ma ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang / /kye ma ngo mtshar dbang po rnams/ /kye ma ngo mtshar sems dpa' che/ /kye ma ngo mtshar lha yi rnams/ /shin du dgyes che rdo rje la/ /

rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying pa yis/ /dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur/ /chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa/ /yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/ /spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /rab tu dgyes ldan smin

ma bsgyur/ /yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/ /spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /yid tsam mdzes pa'i spyan zur gzigs/ /sha rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dud/ /rked pa'i dbyes ni rnam par yangs/ /rnams kyi gos kyang tshe la mdzes/ /chags

pa cung zad tshems kyi gnon/ /tshems kyi phreng ba kun da zla/ /mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing / /rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod/ /bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba/ /lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis

gnas gsum gyis/ /dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog /spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis/ /

pad mo rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du skar/ /yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya/ /bzhin bzangs phan par 'dod pa yis/ /bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin/ /bde bar mchod par brtsam par bya/ /ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbus su

gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhin du/ /bud med rtag tu bzhag par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /

mtshan nyid dag ni yongs su dag /rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /pang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog /'dra ba dag ni

rtag tu bsgrub/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni/ /byas na las rnams brtsam par bya/ /bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la/ /rigs kyi sbyor ba rab bsgoms te/ /bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /'dis ni de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /na chung gzhon nu mig bzangs btsal/ /gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa yi/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa'i/ /bzung nas byol song skyes gnas brtag /bzhin bzangs shin tu mdzes pa yi/ /na chung mtshan

ldan skal ba mchog /mig bzangs brtan pa'i blo ldan pas/ /khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya/ /dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar/ /sbyor ba mchod pa kun brtsams na/ /rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /zla ba phyed kyis nges par grub/ /

smin dkyus ring zhing skra lo 'jam/ /lus ldem dbyibs sgu blo dag cing / /brtan pa chags shing bcos su btub/ /lus nyan ci la thogs pa med/ /rked pa phra la ro smad zlum/ /stod ni drang la shin du rgyas/ /tshems dkar mgul

ring phyag sor ring / /dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog /gzungs ma mtshan ldan spyad par bya/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem rab tu mdzes/ /yid 'ong 'dzum phran spyan zur gzigs/ /khur tshos dkar pos gdab par bya/ /dkar

'dzin phyir ni mnye bya ste/ /pad ma'i ze ba chen pos gdab/ /pad ma lan gsum mnyes bya ste/ /mchan khung mngon sum rna ba gnyis/ /zangs kyi mdog gis bzung bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi btsun mo dang bcas

par gyur to/ /de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do/ /zhi ba kha dog dkar la 'tsher/ /btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yis/ /gsum pa rdzogs bar ldan pa dang / /phyag rgya tshogs mchog de dag la/ /rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/ /phyag rgya

rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /bcu gsum pa yi cha lus 'dzin/ /che chung med par gsal bar bsgom/ /dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan/ /gsal ba nyid kyis dus dag tu/ /cod pan lnga yi rin chen las/ /rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba

yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyi/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya 'o/ /mthing ga 'bar ba'i yi ge che/ /rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las/ /phyag rgya gsal ba'i skur gsal ba'i/ /rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/ /sgrib pa kun

spang sdig byed stobs/ /gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las/ /thams cad blo dbyangs yi ge gter/ /mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa/ /rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /las 'di thams cad kun gyi mchog /rgyal po rnam par

rol ba'o/ /pad ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog /chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa/ /gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa na/ /thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad/ /sbyor dang skye dang bsdu ba yis/ /phyag rgya gsal bar dbang gis bskur/ /btsun mo dag dang

mnyam du skyes/ /gnyis su med par 'khril ba yin/ /dbu ru yi ge gnyis par ldan/ /rin chen rigs kyi spro bsdu las/ /cod pan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/ /ci bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad mo'i tshul/ /mnyam

par gsal bas dkyil 'khor yin/ /mi phyed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog /pad ma rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /rigs kun gyis ni phyag rgyar gsal/ /mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin/ /gsal dag yid

gnyis med par bsgom/ /chu skyes 'jam pa 'og tu ldan/ /steng dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis/ /dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bsham/ /'di ltar gsal ba dbang yang rdzogs/ /thams cad bsdu ba zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin dbang ste las thams

cad/ /dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che/ /rigs kun 'dus par bde bar gshegs/ /mnyam pa ci bzhin ting 'dzin te/ /yi ge 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog /bshad par khyad par las kun rdzogs/ /chu skyes gsal bar 'dab ma'i

steng / /gnyis su med par gsal bas na/ /rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis/ /'dus par gsal bar skur gyur pa/ /'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing / /blo la yid gnyis med pas na/ /phyag rgya gsal bar rgyal ba'i sku/ /rgyal mo

dang ni mnyam du skyes/ /dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan/ /sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu/ /bong tshod lo grangs khyad par med/ gnyis su med par 'khril bar gsal/ /dus kun du ni mnyam ldan pa/ /

gsang ba mchod pa rab tu rdzogs/ /zla rgyas lta bu gtso bo sgom/ /chags pa med par 'dod bsdu yi/ /yum dang lhan cig sgoM pa ni/ /A li kA lir byed pa'i don/ /phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis/ /bde ba chen po tshul gnas pa/ /rgyal ba kun kyang de dang

'thun/ /phyag rgya bsnol bar gnas pa yi/ /kun kyang sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /phyag rgya rdo rje thal mo ni/ /kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu bsnol/ /zhal gnyis mdzes par rab sbyar ba/ /zla gam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes/ /dung gi phur bus

mkhur btsos la/ /'debs shing rdeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog /bzhan dang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzugs bsgom/ /rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don/ /gsang ba spyod pa

shin du dgyes/ /gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren/ /thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel/ /yum gyi las kyis khyad par ni/ /sa yi rim pa kun sbyor zhing / /zas dang mgo dbang med pa yi/ /nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa/ /byang chub

sems kyi char chen gyis/ / pad mor bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad/ /dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste/ /rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin/ /phyag rgya chen mo tshogs mchog ste/ /dga' ba don du rigs mchog yin/ /myur bar rtag

tu ma yengs na/ /gdon mi za bar grub pa ni/ /'dod khams lha yi nyin phyed kyis/ /gsang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i don dang mnyam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /kun du bzang po rnal 'byor mchog /gsang ba nyid

kyis mkha' dbyings so/ /yi ge \u0f00 ldan tsheg drag bcas/ /rnal 'byor bde chen nyid kyis sras/ /gzugs khams lha tshogs byin brlabs te/ /phyag mtshan 'khor lo gsal ba dang / /bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs/ /gtso bo gser

gyi kha dog gsal/ /nyi ma gser gyi 'od bzhin du/ /gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das/ /dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa la/ /rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis/ /legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs/ /

rdzogs pa chen po bzhugs tshul dang / /ting 'dzin 'thun par 'gro la gzigs/ /pad ma ge sar dbus gnas pa'i/ /thig ler gsang ba bzhin dang ldan/ /mdun du lha mo chags pa mo/ /lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan/ /ma hA su khe gnas la dgyes/ /

mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang bcas/ /gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni/ /gtso la rten pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /rgyab du lha mo dgyes chen mo/ /sangs rgyas bsnyen par mdzes tshul gyis/ /thal sbyar 'dzin pa sku brten pa/ /sku tshe bcu drug brtsan

dmar sku/ /sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin tshangs par sbyor/ /'dod chags can la 'thun par mdzad/ /g.yas su zhes sdang 'dul ba mo/ /rdo rje pad mo sbyor la dgyes/ /ma dad pa rnams dbang med par/ /drag po sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel/ /

chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis/ /gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul/ /sngo bsangs mdog ldan khyad par che/ /sku tshad bcwa lnga chags pa can/ /dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes/ /steg dang

sgeg pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khru/ /rab tu sbras pa'i 'gog pa rnams/ /bslangs nas rgyal ba'i sras su mdzad/ /a rta ma li phrin las kyis/ /thams cad byang chub chen po mdzad/ /mig gnyis

'dzum dang sbom po yis/ /dbang mor ldan par byas pa na/ /gnyis su med par sbyor 'dod yin/ /sna yi rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin/ /ma ta bzhugs par brtson byas pa'o/ /so so rnams bsdams kha phye ba/ /dus la bab ces

bya ba ste/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na/ /dus la bab ces bya ba yin/ /'di ltar brdal ldan ting 'dzin la/ /dam can bud med rnams mi 'dud/ /dngos grub mi thob dam tshig nyams/ /tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyur/ /'di

ltar brtson par byed pa na/ /g.yon pa skyed pa rnam bzhi yis/ /skyes pa na chung tshul bzhin du/ /rdo rje pad ma'i mtshams nyid du/ /dbyings phyung lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /dal bus dal bus gzhug pa dang / /dal bus dal bus rab bskul te/ /drag po tshig gis

spro ba dang / /byang chub sems kyis pad ma dgang / /sbom po dbang ngam lnga rnams kyis/ /yum gyis blangs la gtso la mchod/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs te/ /bsnyen pa che chung rdzogs par bsgom/ /byang chub sems kyi

dkyil 'khor las/ /mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par ston/ /de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / /gnyis su med par lugs bzhin du/ /mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan/ /dus gsum kun gyi gdung 'dzin la/ /

g.yon phyogs bsten pa'i skal dang ldan/ /na tshod lo ni bcu drug pa/ /sdong po rul pa dag la dgyes/ /g.yas pa zur gyi spyan gyis gzigs/ /dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol la brtson/ /rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan

can/ /mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa/ /brda dang bcas par gar gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma/ /byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis/ /mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes/ /sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa/ /

dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /so sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni/ /mnyen dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod/ /de nas gsang ba chen po dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba chen por gyur te/ g.yon pa skyed pa mang

po mnyes pa dang / pad ma spang pa la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so/ /chos kun dngos po med par rab gsal ba/ /'byung gnas chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar

che'o zhes blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsung pa/ mdangs bzang mig gi dkyus kyang ring / /sku ni ldem la tsan dan dri/ /yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen/ /tshems dkar sum bcu rnga rngo med/ /mgul

pa zlum rings rab tu legs/ /gser la g.yu spras g.yas su 'khyil/ /gzungs ma 'di dag bsten par bya/ /skad gdangs mi snyan ra ra bo/ /yang na rmongs bag sub sub po/ /sbrang bus gtses pa'i sna sgra bzhin/ /sems can dag

la khro zhing 'tshog /dam can dag la g.yel bar mdzod/ /phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can/ /de bsnyen na ni dngos grub nyams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma la/ /rab tu 'phrul te 'char ba yin/ /

bden gnyis so sor snang ba yis/ /yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /ma nor lam chen kun bsgoms nas/ /kun tu bzang mo bsgoms pas grub/ /bud med la ni mchod bsten na/ /ye shes chen po grub par gsungs/ /

dpal kun du bzang po thams cad shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so/ /sngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa 'di/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa gnas pa yin/ /de la mchod pa dam pa ni/ /sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste/ /

kun du khyab par kun tu sbyor/ /rjesu chags pa dam tshig mchog /de byi dkar sham mdog dang ldan/ /bcu drug bong tshod ring ba dang / /lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste/ /lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang / /dpral ba dbyes che kos ko phra/ /

nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring / /yid tsam mig dkyus ring ba dang / /so dkar thags bzang mtshams thung zhing / /skad bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste/ /'di la brtson par byed pa ni/ /rigs kyi rdo rje

gdon mi za/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnas rab bden par rab brtags te/ /sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang ldan/ /lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can/ /so dkar thags bzang mig dkyus ring / /skad phra mdog dgod

spro ring ba/ /dpral dbyes la sogs bzang gnas pa/ /rma nag la sogs gnas pa ni/ /rtag tu chos la 'dud pa yin/ /tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen las/ /'di las brtson byas bsgrubs pa yi/ /de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin las/ /

phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na/ /tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni/ /sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs/ /bud med cha lugs legs pa ni/ /bong tshod mi ring lus phra

zhing / /rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba/ /mig legs ngo zlum btsan dmar che/ /blun du chags pa mi shes med/ /lus la mtshan gyis rmad 'dras brgyan/ /tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang / /so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan/ /chog shes

pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od/ /rdo rje pad mor ldan byas te/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na/ /'dod pa'i khams lha'i skad cig gis/ /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /lus zlum gtum pa nga rgyal can/ /khong na sems

rnog sems la 'dzin/ /bya ba 'dra la mi gtong ldan/ /bslab pa'i blo rtul sha rus che/ /mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir gsal/ /sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dad/ /rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /bag chags yi ge tshar gcod cing / /ting

'dzin blo la gsal ba na/ /bsgrub pa'i dus la bab pa ste/ /de tshe rab tu rtsen pa yis/ /yum gyi pad ma kha phye zhing / /bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na/ /rigs kyi rin chen grub pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob

par 'gyur/ /thugs rjes mdzad spyod byed brag gis/ /'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs/ /rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na/ /snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa'i/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po gsungs/ /shan pa'i rigs ngan

smad 'tshong ma'i/ /na ba'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams/ /'joms pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs/ /yi dgas gnod sbyin byol song dang / /khyi dang rus sbal spre'u la sogs/ /mi dang lha yi gnas

mchog kun/ /so so mtsham pa dga' spyad na/ /las mchog dam pa 'grub par gsungs/ /rab tu chags la chags pa'i mchog /rab tu rmugs pa rmugs pa sel/ /zhe sdang can la 'tsham par ston/ /grags pa can la zhi ba che/ /

rtsen pa dag la rtsen par mdzad/ /thabs kyi mdzad pa kun gyi mchog /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams/ /gdul bar mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med/ /shin tu gtum pa'i

cha lugs kyis/ /gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad/ /shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis/ /grags pa can rnams dbang du mdzad/ /shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis/ /chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad/ /e ma'o shin du ngo

mtshar che/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen pos rab tu brtson par mdzad pa/ yid kyi 'phro ba dang / zla gam med pa dang / gyad 'gyed pa dang / 'khur ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do/ /sha mdog dkar la

nu ma 'bur/ /stod smad phyed la smin dkyus ring / /pad ma'i dri yang dung ltar 'phro/ /pad ma legs pa gro bos 'dra/ /zlum la che chung snyoms pa 'o/ /sha mdog dkar la sme ba can/ /stod smad phyed la sor mo ring / /nu ma chung zhing 'khrang

ba ste/ /dri yang pad ma'i dri ru bro/ /mgul pa legs la ring thung ran/ /pad ma dmar la khur tshos legs/ /spyan yang zlum la 'og nas lta/ /sha mdog ser la nu ma zlum/ /rked pa 'phra la ro smad zlum/ /rkang pa'i sor mo nang du skyor/ /

lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms/ /tshems kyang dmar la thags kyang dam/ /sor mo rnams kyang phra la ring / /dri yang tsan dan dri ru bro/ /yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen/ /pad ma ser la phra la ring / /spyan yang phra la zur du

gzigs/ /sha mdog gnag la sme ba gnag /sha yang gnag la rtsub pa ste/ /skad mdangs mi snyan gnyid ra ro/ /rmongs la mi shes sub sub mo/ /nu rdog che la nu bshal ring / /rkang pa sbom la sor mo thung / /gdong yang leb

la sme ba 'thug /smin ma thung la mig mi sdug /lus po sbom thung 'jing pa thung / /pad ma gnag la yangs pa ste/ /ba lang can gyi rigs ces bya'o/ /gzugs ma mtshan dang ldan pa btsal ba'i don ni/ rang dbang thob pa nga lo yang / /

bcos su btub la lung nyan pa/ /skad gsal lta bas thags chod pa/ /spyod pa la dor rtog pa choms/ /yid gzhungs blo rno dbang po gsal/ /sems dag gzhung bzang zhal ngo rtag /dam tshig phog las mi 'da' ba/ /tshigs la

brdzun gyi gron theb med/ /dad pa skyo dang dub pa med/ /spyod pa blang zhing dor ba med/ /brtson 'grus thang dang lhod pa med/ /ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa/ /gom pa dal la spyod pa gzob/ /mig 'bru tshugs su mi lta zhing / /'og dang zur

gyis rtogs par lta/ /dbu lo 'jam la lcang lor 'khyil/ /spyan bkra phra la kyus ring ba/ /sna gzur zor la rgyud ma chad/ /ya yo nyag dang chad pa med/ /so dkar sum bcu thags bzang la/ /kos ko sogs bu yul zungs 'dra/ /

mdog sdug dkar dmar mdangs phyed pa/ /rkeng phan chag gang zlum pa dang / /mgul ba zlum la phra la ring / /ngang mo bya yi tshul dang 'dra/ /sna zlum blta mdzes chung ba dang / /phyag gi sor mo phra la ring / /rna ba gro ba gcus pa 'dra/ /lce

ni dar bltab khug pa bzhin/ dbugs rgyu phyi nang med pa 'dra/ /gnyid chung sha yang sdud ba med/ /kha snams med la dri zhim pa/ /sna tshogs spos dri lus la bro/ /bskyod par mkhas shing las la dpa'/ /sbyor drod rig dang ting 'dzin rig /

pad ma dam la spyad na dog /nu ma dag ni chung la sra/ /kha mchu srab la bzang ba'o/ /lha yi sbyor ba cog bu/ mi'i gan rkyal yi dgas zur gyis sbyor/ byol song kha sbub tu sbyor ro/ /gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhag zla'i tshad

bzung ste/ /dam du bcas nas mchod dus mi chag par phyi nang mi bsre/ dam bcas pa la ma gtogs pa gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan du sbyor ba byas na dam las 'das te/ mngal gyi sri bu kha dmar du skye'o/ /dam las ma 'das bka' bzhin

du bsrungs na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o/ /gzungs ma 'di dag dang bka' 'thun par bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med do/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /he ru ka rol pa las

gsang ba'i lha mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas ru lu'i bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /zhugs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs

rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni \u0f00 la dpal chen po yab lnga la yum khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga yang sku la rdzogs so/ /de nyid lta bas srin por song gis dogs nas ye shes lngar bstan to/ /a ltar snang

ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ /zla tshes me long lta bu'i ye shes/ /rna ru so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ /ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ /a las btags par bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/ yab yum rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar/ chos thams cad ma

byung ma skyes pa'i ngang la skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan no/ /bo/ /ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni phung po lnga rigs lnga 'byung ba lnga yum lnga khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang sprul pa lcam dral/ phung po lnga he ru ka lnga/

'byung ba lnga khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga/ khams dang skye mched 'phra men ma bcu drug /sgal tshigs dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ ba spu nyag ma re re sprul pa'i 'phra men ma dang pho nya/ yan lag sgo ba bzhi/ sprul pa thugs kyi rgyan te/ sngags

ma hA yo ga'o/ /dkyil 'khor la yang phyogs dang gral ma nor bar dgod do/ /sgo skyong yan chad rim bzhin du dgod/ ru lu lhar shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na sangs rgyas yin par

shes par bya'o/ /ru lu mchod par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na/ bdag byang chub kyi sems mchod pas 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes pa ste/ 'drangs shing tshim par 'gyur ro/ /tshim pas dngos

grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /ru lu bsnyen par shes pa ni bsnyen pa ni dpal chen po'i sku'o/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni yum kro d+hi shwa ri'o/ /bsgrub pa ni 'phra men ma bcu drug /bsgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar bsgrub pas 'bras bu drod rnam pa

gsum dang sbyar ro/ /'od kyi drod ni bdag bsgrub par byed pa'i dusu bdag gi lus la 'od 'byung ba ni drod dang po dang sbyar ro/ /'don pa'i drod ni bdag bsgrub pa byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus bal 'dab g.yengs pa ltar byed na drod 'bring po dang sbyar

ro/ /drod kyi drod ni bdag gi sems tag tag rang rang nam mkhar 'phur snyam byed na tha ma dag sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ don dam par bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang po'i nye ba'i

bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang mo'o/ /de la gnyis su med pa ni bsgrub pa/ rgyu byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos la 'bras bu kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems phyag rgya sna tshogs cir snang yang sgyu ma ye shes kyi

phyag rgya tsam du snang / snang tsam nyid na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka ste/ rgyu 'bras ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes par bya ste/ thig le chen po'i ngang du ye nas ma bcos par lhun gyis grub par gnas pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub

kyi sems zhes bya ste/ bsgrub pa chen po'o/ /ru lu sgrar shes pa ni byi khung na bung ba chen po'i skad tsam rang gi rna bas thos pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis tshor bar mi bya'o/ /ru lu dbyangs su shes pa ni/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren

stangs kyis/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho thugs dam bskul/ /rdo rje srin po ngur sgra yis/ /khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud/ /'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /ma dang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bskul/ /khong kun 'dren pa'i

gdung dbyangs kyis/ /ke'u ri brgyad kyi thugs dam bskul/ /mkhur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis/ /seng gdong la sogs thugs dam bskul/ /sngags kyi yig 'bru bzlas pa yis/ /rdo rje tshig la skad mdangs med/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyi las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs so/ /dam tshig ye shes dpal 'bar ma/ /\u0f00 ni sku gsung thugs kyi ngang / /ru ni gzi brjid 'phrul po che/ /lu ni yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ /b+h+yo ni ma sring rgya mtsho tshogs/ /ru lu gser phreng

rgya mtsho ste/ /phar spros pas ni sku la thim/ /slar bsdud pas ni thugs la thim/ /\u0f00 ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /pa~M las pad mar gyur pa'i dbus/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /sha da pa la sogs pa yi/ /

bskul ba dag ni tshul bzhin du/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'o/ /bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po/ /yum ni pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la/ /dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas

bstim/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /sku yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /de yang dpal chen nyid gyi sku/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /gsung gi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /de yang dpal chen nyid gyi gsung / /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /thugs

kyi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi thugs/ stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang badzra he ru kar byin gyis brlabs nas/ /badzra he ru ka'i dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi

'jig rten na/ /lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang rata na he rur byin brlabs nas/ /rata na he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang pad ma he rur byin brlabs nas/ /

pad ma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang kar ma he rur byin brlabs nas/ /kar ma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /gnas

rab gnas ni bsam mi khyab/ /dur khrod chen po gnas kyi mchog /bde ba chen po gnas kyi mchog /yum gyi mkha' dbyings gnas kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gnas/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /zas rab zas ni bsam mi khyab/ /rdo

rje dri chen zas kyi mchog /rdo rje ga phur zas kyi mchog /bdud rtsi rnam lnga zas kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi zas/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /skom rab skom ni bsam mi khyab/ /rag ta dri chu skom gyi mchog /de yang dpal

chen nyid kyi skom/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /skyog rab sgyogs ni bsam mi khyab/ /ban d+ha gsar snying skyogs kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skyogs/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /yab rab yab ni bsam mi khyab/ /

kun du bzang po yab kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yab/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /yum rab yum ni bsam mi khyab/ /kun du bzang mo yum gyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yum/ /\u0f00 ru lu 'di ni sku yi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni

sku yi gsung / /ru lu 'di ni sku yi thugs/ /ru lu 'di ni gsung gi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni gsung gi gsung / /ru lu 'di ni gsung gi thugs/ /ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi gsung / /ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi thugs/ /skur gsal

gsung gsal thugs kyang gsal/ /sku don gsung don thugs kyi don/ /ru lur ma gyur gang yang med/ /stong khams thams cad ru lus bkang / /ru lu dngos grub dus 'dir gsol/ /ru lu dngos su snang ba ni sku/ /de nyid ma skyes pa ni gsung / /snang

ba dang ma byung ba gnyis su med pa ni thugs so/ /ru lu sku gsum gsung gsum/ thugs gsum/ dgu phrugs kyi don to/ /\u0f00 ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ /\u0f00 ni dpal chen he ru ka yab yum mo/ /ru lu gong ma brgyad ni ke'u ri ma brgyad/ ru lu 'og ma

brgyad ni sing ha ma brgyad/ hU~M ni sgo ba yab yum brgyad/ b+h+yo ni dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ /hU~M ni sdud pa byang chub sems/ lha re re la snying po grangs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /khro bo rnams ni kro d+ha ni ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro gnyer snying po chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 badzra bi sku ti ma hA kro d+ha ma/ ha na ha na/ grih+na grih+na/ mA ra

mA ra/ ban dza ban dza da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hU~M dru~M bri bri/ bra ma ya bra ma ya/ bi dwan sarbA ba ra na sarba duSh+Ta~M/ ma ta ma ta/ mo ta mo ta/ hU~M bri tra~M tra~M/ bri hU~M tra~M tra~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po pad ma 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs so/ so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /pad ma dza la ma hA kro d+ha pad+ma ba mu ka kha kha/ sarba duSh+Ta~M/ kha hi kha hi/ sarba dusta ba/ dusta na ma/ da ma da ma/ badzra sho da ka /ta ma tha ma tha/ kro d+ha ko d+ha/ badzra

kha ra tsa/ pa la du ru/ ga be ga tra sa ya tra sa ya ma hA badzra pa da ba mu ka /pra ma pra ma hU~M phaT/ ti ha ha ti ha ti/ tsa tur mu kha/ /bi phran sha na hU~M hri/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hri/ rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs ye shes kyi snying ka nas phyung ngo / /\u0f00 badzra be ga ma hA kro d+ha sarba duSh+Ta~M/ sa ma ya bak+Sha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra sa k+Sha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen po mngon par sprul nas mche ba chen po 'khyil cing zhal mi

sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can rab du za bar byed pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag cha mi'i keng rus khrag dang sha dang lud pa dang rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i lpags pa

rnams g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi mgo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang po dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / lce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ugs pa dang / bya rog dang / gzhad dang / byi la dang / gzig dang /

stag la sogs pa khro bo'i byol song gi gdong la sogs pa brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs 'jigs byed 'dul ba/ zhal rnam par bsnyen pa/ 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang /

zhal rdo rje mche ba cher gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad stong gi g.yog dang / shar phyogs dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ /lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du khro gnyer can mang po brgya stong g.yog dang bcas

par gnas so/ /nub phyogs su yang rta gdong khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so/ /byang du yang 'ur 'ur chan po khro bo brgyad stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shin du khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya

stong mang pos bskor nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs te/ he ru ka'i khro bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa bskyed byung nas nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byams thams cad snang bar byas te/

stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rad+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsan Da badzra pA NA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pA ta ye/ tad+ya thA/

\u0f00 b+ho b+ho/ ma hA ba re ba da ra ba/ ma hA d+hi/ ha ra ha ra/ gri h+na gri h+na/ ma ra ma ra/ ban dza ban dza/ k+Shi kra na ma hA badzra tsan+Da d+ha/ sarba duSh+TA~M du ku/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ 'jigs byed chen po dbul

bar byed pa/ rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul du byed do/ /khro bo brgya stong po zhal rnam par bsnyer ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'khyil cing bsgyur ba phyag brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal brgya stong mang po me lce bzhin

du 'bar ba'i sku/ \u0f00 ma hA badzra ang / ha sa ha sa/ ha ha ha hU~M ha/ \u0f00 ti/ \u0f00 ma hA/ be ra ba be/ shing shing / tra tra tra~M tra~M/ ha ha i ti/ de nas 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bo nas mnan to/ /rdo rje he ru ka'i

rol ba'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing sgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang

sgren mor byas te sma phab nas he ru ka'i tshogs chen po'i mthu dang gzi byin bskyed nas/ 'khor thams cad thul skyabs 'og tu yang btsud nas dam tshig la gnas te yang dag par bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo drug po'i bzhad

pas bzhad cing / \u0f00 badzra b+h+ri ku ti ha na ha na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ma ta ma ta/ kri na tsa ri ya/ si su ra ma hA sa/ sra ti re ke ba su ra dza la na la ra tshi pra ti dza li ta/ ma su ra taM/ A kad ta Ta/ A kad Ta/ a phya wa/ a phya wa/ krisna tsakra be ra brti da yan hU~M bri/ de nas

khrag 'thung gi sngags/ \u0f00 badzra s+'u r+ya bri ku ti/ khro da ma hA kri he/ da ra pa da ra ba/ su ra du ra ti/ \u0f00 sa me dad ma ni tsa na/ \u0f00 bra bra bi bra~M ba/ de nas rta gdong gi khro bo chen po'i sngags/ ba hri/ \u0f00 ma hA badzra ba da/ ba mu ga /kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tsa du ra mu

khang / ba ba bi ba/ a ru ti ram/ ma kAr+ya hri da yan/ dra na/ da ma de'u/ badzra ba da~M ba mu ka /hi hi/ sha hi sha ma hA she sha hi hi/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i rta gad chen po mdzad cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs

te/ oM gu lu gu lu badzra ma hA kro d+ha A kar Sha ya/ A kar Sha ya/ sha kra hr-i da yA na ma hA badzra da~MSh+TA~M ya/ hU~M b+hak+Sha ya shriM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnal 'byor pa rnams dang rol cing / rang gi shin du dgyes pa'i kun du longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil

'khor du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du bar mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do/ /\u0f00 ma hA su ra ta/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ba saM har sa~M ha ra/ sarba kro d+ha ma sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sarba kro d+ha

uts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha b+ha ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma dra le sta ma ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta praSh+Ta kro d+ha ma ba ba ba ya/ dz+wa la ya sha kra pA da~M/ bai sha ra ma ye/ sha ra ma hA/ b+ha ga ban+d+ha/ su ra ti/ sarba ta thA ga tA sA dA na/ sa ma ye na tsa hoH/ su ra ta/ sa ma i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

khro bo chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 dza hU~M ba~M hoH/ TAk+ki hU~M dza hU~M TAk+ki hU~M TAk+ki hU~M/ \u0f00 ga ta she hU~M dzaH/ A kar Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ ba shi ku ru/ sarba kro d+ha sa ma ya/ dza hU~M ba~M hoH/ TAk+ki hU~M dzaHdzaHhU~M/ TAk+ki hU~M/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyi khro bo chen po 'di phyung ngo / /\u0f00 sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi'i khro bo'i dbang mo phyung ngo / /\u0f00 badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri/ uts+tsha badzra a mr-i ta hU~M AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo 'di kun du khros

te/ ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba 'byin cing rang gi pad mo la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rigs pa phyung ngo / /\u0f00 a mr-i ta sa man tsi ba ni a mr-i ta su mu te/ pra be sha ya sarbAn badzra/ pad ma mas/ yo gi ni ra/ ma hA bo d+hi

tsi/ bi ta bi ti mur+t+ti ya/ rdo rje khro bo'i dbang mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga tA ma he shwa ri sarba duSh+TA~M/ su ta ni ma hA prA la yAn/ sma shA na bi sha rtse/ ma hA badzra kro d+ha da~MSh+Ta kA ra le bi kr-i ta/ ba de na/ sarba sha du bra ma N-i

hU~M hU~M ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT/ khro bo 'di rnams phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / tho ba gcig khang pa dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum dang / be con

dang / mu su dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma dang / mda' dang / gzhu dang / shak+ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba mgul rgyan du byas nas nyi ma brgya'i me'i 'od 'dra ba'o/ /de'i dbus mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i

gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis bzhags par bya'o/ /\u0f00 badzra ma hA d+ha ra/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA sma shA ni/ pi sha ni la dz+wa la ya/ ma hA sa pra pra dz+wa la te/ mu ti da ra/ ka pA la mA la/ bu shi da/ ma ku te/ ma ra ru d+hi/ ra dra ra ba/ tsi pu ri ta/ ka pA la haste/

kha T+wAng+ga badzra/ tri sh+'u la gan+d+ha/ ma hA kro d+he hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he ru ta mu ta pra ye hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gzi brjid mchog dang ldan ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rdo rje nyi ma nyid kyi khro bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo

rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 hU~M tra~M AHsur+ya badzra kro d+hi shwa rI/ da ma da ma/ gra sa gra sa asta ma hU~M phaT/ a~M hU~M bra~M dra dra dra/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs su bzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen mo rab gtong zhing / /shin du 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar/ /dpung pa bcu

drug rno ba che/ /dpung rgyan thod pa brtsegs pa byas/ /spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog /mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par brtson/ /gdug pa thams cad cha byed cing / /yi dgas chen po stag la zhon/ /rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad mo'i khro mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 hrIHbadzra pad+ma ba mu ke/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho di ra/

bi go be hU~M/ he hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hrI ha/ sha ti sha ma tha ba/ badzra pa da pa na la ma hoH/ te to hU~M hU~M hU~M hi hi hU~M/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /'di ni rgyab du bzhag par bya/ /rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa/ /rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste/ /khro bo chen po dpung bcu drug /rnam par

bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong / /mi lto stan la yang dag zhon/ /khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pa brtsams/ /'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing / /g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhugs/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje khro bo gnyis su med pa'i 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 sarba a mo g+ha ma hA bi shwe shwa ri/

hU~M hU~M ha~M ha~M ha~M ma gro ti gra ma khe/ ma hA bi shwa r+'u pa d+ha ri N-i sarba duSh+Ta pra sha ma ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par/ /rdo rje gdon mi za dkyil du/ /g.yog dang bcas pa rnam ba bzhi/ /sna tshogs dam tshig bzhag bya ste/ /sna chogs pa dang khyad par kun du yongs

su bskor nas gnas/ /bskyed pa dang ni bcum pa'i gdong / /rab tu drag pa'i ro byad zhing / /gdong gnyer thod pas pas rtse mo byas/ /dpung pa bcu drug gis rgyan pa'i/ /khro mo chen mo gdong gsum la/ /za byed me bzhin lta ba yi/ /de yi re bo thams cad kyi/ /g.yog

ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyang / /rang gi phyag dang mtshan mar ldan/ /dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /de ni cho ga ci bzhin du/ /'byung mo phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams/ /de dag kun du yongs su

bskor/ /bzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung / /de ni de yi stan la gnas/ /bzhin mi sdug la dpung bzhi mo/ /gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas/ /de la sogs pa rim par ldan/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsang ba'i sngags rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra a nu rA gi NI ma hA ti sha tri hU~M phaT/ /\u0f00 sarba badzra A kaR+Sha Ni/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M dzaHdzaHdzaHhUM hU~M hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra d+ha ra ku la ma nu rA gi Ni ma hA badzra kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M ha he phaT hoH/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ro gra

ma hA kro d+ha hU~M sa sa hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hi ha tsa a be sha ka hU~M tru~M hU~M/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA su ta pri ti ka ro ke dra tha ta tha/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra he ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri/ ma hA bi tsa yo tsa ra ba ye/ hU~M hU~M hU~M dru~M dru~M dra~M dra~M tha/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha a ta

ha si ni/ hU~M hU~M dri~M dri~M tro Ta ya/ tro Ta ya/ hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra kro d+ha b+hak+Sha Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hU~M hrIH/ \u0f00 sarba badzra ma hA/ /badzra d+ha ra badzra tik+Sh+Na kro d+hi shwa ri tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M badzra tik+Sh+Na haste/ tshe da ya tshe da ya/ hU~M ma tha ma tha/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma ma

hA badzra kro d+ha ri ni hU~M ma hA gra du bI ni/ hU~M hU~M pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma hA badzra tsa kre na tsa kre na tsur+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA ke ra bA tsa ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ma ta ma ta/ \u0f00 sarba badzra ma hA d+ha ra mi ta pi sha mu kha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ \u0f00 sarba badzra ma hA d+ha ra ma ya ba de/ hu du haM haM haM phaT phaT

phaT/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra yak+Shi Ni hU~M hU~M/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ a bi ba bI hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra pa na di ni ma hA kro d+he ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ bi d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra da da ha ni/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra kro d+hi mA la ni/ hU~M

hU~M/ gru~M gru~M gru~M/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra kro d+ha gan+d+ha ga sa ni/ hU~M hU~M gru~M gru~M/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ri ma hA/ kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA ma hoH/ kA la d+ha ri Ni ti pa ya/ ho da ho da/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA la se hU~M/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri mA le d+ha ra Ni hU~M/ \u0f00

sarba badzra d+ha ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi ga ti ni hU~M hU~M he he/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ni ri te ke hU~M/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA ka ra shi na/ dzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M dzaH/ \u0f00 sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha d+ha ra ma hA badzra pA sha hU~M hU~M hU~M/ \u0f00 sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA badzra kro d+he/

ban+d+he ban+d+he/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya hU~M ba~M/ \u0f00 sarba ta thA ga tA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he pa she/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ho ho ho/ \u0f00 hU~M tra~M hri hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 sarba
