ta thA ga tA ma hA badzra d+ha ra/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha g+h+r-i Ni hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha TAk+ki ni/ ma hA he ma pa ti ba hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ku mA ri ye hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni dra sha mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra muSh+Ti ni/ bid+ya bid+ya/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 sarba TA

ki ni ma hA badzra kro d+ha ra li hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra kro d+ha tsakra Ni/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA mi thod pa ti ke hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni se mya kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TIk+ki ni ma hA badzra d+ha na te hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA ma ri Ni hU~M

phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA a mr-i ta ka pA li haste hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA se n+ya kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni mr-i tu dan da ri hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ni badzra sr-i ga li hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni pi pa pi pa ru d+hi ra ma ma hA badzra pa li hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni

ma hA badzra pA sha pa pa shak+Sha hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra sha ni pi phe hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA badzra bi she hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni A na ya A na ya hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA badzra be ka ni gu gu ma ya hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni badzra dz+r+wa la ya/ b+hasmi ku ru

hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra mi ka te hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra haste hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra ke li pra be sha pra be sha hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA su ma~M sA sha ni hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA ka ra hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA ka ra

sha ni mi ta ka la mu ki hU~M dzaHdzaHhU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ya bi sha ni hU~M phaT/ khro bo spyi'i bsnyen pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /\u0f00 ba hU~M bi bi ta ro/ dra san ti ta/ yi ni she she/ sarba bi dA na ya/ sarba ta thA ga tA dza le dza le/ pra dza le pra dza le/ gur bi

gur bi/ k+Sha ma sarba ma ba pra Ni/ b+h+yo hU~M hU~M \u0f00 ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ bsnyen pa'i grangs brgya dang stong dang 'bum mo/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i khro bo'i bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rol pa rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /khro bo rdo rje mgyogs pa'i dbu lnga bcu rtsa gcig /phyag brgya rtsa gnyis pa phyung ste/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma

hA ban te/ ba~M ba~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA do sha na sa ye hU~M phaT/ a a/ \u0f00 badzra ma hA rak+Sha sa ma sa ru ti/ ra ma ti da pri ya/ ma hA kum ba kA ru Na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ k+Sha \u0f00 badzra ma hA rak+Sha/ a gat+ta ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba badzra ga la/ ba shi na ba na da ba na da/

hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT/ \u0f00 badzra rak+Sha ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ bi sha ya/ bi sha ya/ bi bi sha na sarbA na/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra ma hA ra sha sa/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ sarba ma hA bi kr-i ta na na/ da sha grI ba hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po he ru ka'i

sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /smug nag sngo nag /hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hUM

hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT/ zhal

re re nas hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra mang po phyung bas/ khro bo 'bum du gcig du phyung ste/ hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra mang po 'byin cing 'jig rten gyi khams dus gcig tu gang bar gyur te/ dregs pa thams cad brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa

ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ ma dang mkha' 'gro ma 'bum chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ma mo 'bum gyi rgyal mo dbyings nas bzhengs/ /khyod ni ye shes lha mo 'bum

gyi gtso/ /zhing lpags rlon pas sa gzhi 'gengs mdzad ma/ /zhing chen rlon pas g.yang gzhi ral pa can/ /gzigs lpags rlon pa stong gis sku smad klubs/ /sbrul nag 'bum gyis yan lag rgyan du sgril/ /thod rlon thod skam thod tshal mgur chu

dpung rgyan ser ral kha/ /khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gshog g.yas pa las/ /ye shes lha mo tshogs ni brgya yang 'tsher/ /khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gshog g.yon pa la/ /las byed lha mo brgyad bcu gnas/ /nyin zhing rgya mtsho gting nas bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /klu rgyal

'bum gyis bkris shing mchod pa 'bul/ /mtshan zhing ri rab rtse la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /gnod sbyin bu mo khyod kyi pho nyar gtong / /bdud kyi bu mo 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag tu gnon/ /gshed ma don du gnyer zhing dgra snying tshal par 'gas/ /gsur

chen dud pas 'jig rten ma lus 'gengs/ /sha chen ro la rngam zhing dpal chen zhal du stob/ /rang yang za zhing grogs la 'dar bar byed/ /ma dang mkha' 'gro dbyings nas bskul bskyod la/ /las la 'khril zhing chos kyi dbyings su bsten/ /

mkha' 'gro za byed mgyogs ma gshog pa can/ /mkha' 'gro 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can/ /mkha' 'gro rngam pa'i zhal gdangs mche ba can/ /mkha' 'gro 'byung ba 'dzin pa'i sder mo can/ /mkha' 'gro khams gsum rngub pa'i mchu

rings ma/ /mkha' 'gro dug gsum za byed 'bar ba'i sku/ /las kyi mkha' la 'gro ba'i shugs can ma/ /don gyis mkha' la 'gro ba'i ye shes yum/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis las byed par gyur to/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma de rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba rtse gcig ma'i ting nge 'dzin du mdzad do/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum la skyes pa'i bdud bag chags kyis mtshams sbyar te/ bdud ru tra

nag po sems can dang rnal 'byor pa la 'tshe zhing gnod par byed pa za bar byed pa de la bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pas pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /til mar sna tshogs kyis lus bskus pa'i

rdo rje mche ba can dang / nag mo mi thod thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ba can dang / rnal 'byor ye shes rdo rje dam tshig ma dang / mgo bo cod pan legs spras rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / lag na mtshon thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ma dang / dgra bgegs dbang du sdud pa'i rdo rje g.yul

zlog ma dang / sbrul gyi ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung thung ral gri thogs ma dang / zhing lpags rked pas bkris shing khrag gis myos ma dang / mig rtsa dmar por gyur pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang / mtshan mo dur khrod du rgyu ba'i 'byung mo sgrol ma dang / ko rlon

smad bkris thod pa se ral khar thogs ma dang / mi ro rgyu ma tshems kyis 'dren pa'i rdo rje zab mo dang / khrag gi thig les brgyan pa'i rdo rje dri tshor ma dang / zhing chung 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang / rdo rje zhag gi tshom bu can chen mo dang / rdo rje mi ro sha la

chem chem za ba'i rdo rje mche ba 'dzin ma dang / drag po 'dul ba'i rdo rje drag mo chen mo dang / ma mo skrag par byed pa'i khams gsum dbang du sdud ma dang / zhing la skam par byed pa'i rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga dang / nag mo lus mdog gnag pa'i rdo rje me stag 'phro ba mo dang /

zas su khrag tshil za ba'i rdo rje srin mo dang / kun la dbang mdzad rdo rje pad ma 'dzin pa dang / zas su sha rlon za ba'i rdo rje rnga mo dang / e ma ma tshogs rdo rje za byed ma dang / dpal ldan chen po rdo rje lcang lo can ma dang / kha nas rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho skems ma dang /

lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / nag mo mig gcig rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi bya khra khyung gi g.yu mig can dang / thal ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje 'byug ma dang / rdo rje ral gcig

chen mo za byed ma dang / rdo rje tri shU la thogs pa'i zhag gi tshom bu can dang / tsham ngam drag shul spyod pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul mo dang / rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje gzugs can ma dang / cir yang 'gyur

ba'i rdo rje rdzu 'phrul can dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrad rnal 'byor sngo nag chen mo dang / mche ba gtsigs pa'i ral pa 'khyil ma dang / thod pa rlon pa'i rdo rje mun tsa la dang / dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba dang / sti ra chung

ngu mang po brgyus nas brgyan te rdo rje brjid ma dang / tsham ngam brkyang bskum rdo rje 'jig rten skrag ma dang / bdud bzhi gnon pa'i rdo rje ban dar ldan pa dang / stir chen glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang 'jigs su rung ba'i rngubs pa'i

pa'i rnge'u chung thogs pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra can dang / log par lta ba'i rdo rje bdud rnams 'dul ba dang / ro la rngam pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang / gsod cing sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor sngo nag ma dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrad rdo rje mche gtsig ma dang / tsham ngam chen mo mdzad pa'i

tri sh+'ul mda' 'phen rdo rje 'gengs ma dang / dgyes par byed pa'i rdo rje se gol rdebs ma dang / 'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag 'jigs pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yum chen mo dang / rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag mo dang /

tsham rngam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rje stags tshul can dang / rnal 'byor mthing nag rdo rje stir chen za ba mo dang / bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug pa glad 'gems ma dang / gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje ljang ma dang / khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i dbu

gcig phyag drug ma dang / rdo rje tri sh+'u rde'u 'dzin pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs ma dang / 'ching zhing sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ser nag dang / gtum mo zhe sdang stir chen za ba mo dang / zhing chen nang grol 'byin cing rdo rje tsham rngam can dang / sgrol bar byed pa'i rdo rje mthing nag dang /

spyan bgrad mche gtsigs rdo rje chen mo dang / sti ra 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung zhal du stobs ma dang / spu gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje ban dar ldan ma dang / zangs gris 'debs shing kha T+wA~M 'phen pa'i rdo rje sha za ba mo dang / ro la brkam pa'i rdo rje za stangs chen mo dang /

rdo rje ser nag seng ge mgo can dang / mche gtsigs spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rje sdang mig can dang / mchi tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i rdo rje zhe sdang 'joms ma dang / mthing nag rdo rje seng ge ral pa can dang / rdo rje ye shes sku'i cha lugs 'chang ma dang /

mi 'jigs sti ra'i g.yang gzhi gsol ma dang / srog chags mang po'i snying 'byin rdo rje klad 'gems ma dang / dmar mo chen mo sti ra mgo can dang / ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs bzhi'i g.yang gzhi se ral khar thogs ma dang / bka'

las mi 'da' thugs dam skong zhing las mdzad ma dang / ban da rag tas bkang nas gtso la stobs shing dgra sdang klad 'gems ma dang / gsod byed sngo nag dur bya'i mgo can dang / mchi tshogs 'khor du bskor zhing 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang /

thal chen rag tas rdo rje sku la brgyan ma dang / spu gri mgo gcod ban da 'thung zhing gsod la dga' ba mo dang / rdo rje zhags pa 'ching zhing khrag 'thung zhal du stob pa dang / mthing nag 'gying stabs rdo rje shwa na khyi mgo can dang / glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu

'dzin ma dang / phrag dog 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje za ba dang / dmar nag 'gying ba'i bya rgod mgo can dang / zhing chen rgyu 'dren gti mug 'joms par byed ma dang / gshog tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i thod rlon 'dzin ma dang / ser nag 'gying ba'i pho rog

mgo can dang / klu rnams 'dum par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang ma dang / mthing nag 'gying ba bya rog mgo can dang / ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo can dang / sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro dbu gsum ma dang / lcags kyus 'dren pa mi 'jigs sbyor

ba dang / rdo rje bka'i pho nya spyan gsum mche ba can dang / rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / snying rje phag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje gzig gi mgo can dang / rdo rje byi ba'i mgo can dang /

rdo rje pha bang mgo can dang / rdo rje dred kyi mgo can dang / rdo rje dom gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje sdig pa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje wa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje stag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rta'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spyang ku'i mgo can dang / rdo rje bub shud kyi mgo can dang /

rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje skyin gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje phag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rnga mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rje bya rog mgo can dang / rdo rje spang ti'i mgo can dang / rdo rje ske ka'i mgo can dang / rdo rje khra'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spre'u+i mgo can dang / rdo rje khu

byug mgo can dang / rdo rje seng ge mgo can dang / rdo rje pha bang mgo can dang / rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje srin bya'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sre mo mgo can dang / rdo rje zer mo mgo can dang / rdo rje dmag pa thang gog gi mgo can dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i zhags pa

can dang / rdo rje me lce glog phreng 'dzin dang / rdo rje srin mo mdung thung 'phen pa dang / rdo rje ral gri sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rje klu mo thogs 'bebs mo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed ba lang gi sna dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin khyung gdong ma dang / rdo rje lag na

khrag thogs ma dang / rdo rje zla ba skar mda' ltar gtong ba dang / rdo rje dam tshig bsrung ma dpal phreng ma dang / rdo rje lag na phur bu 'dril ma dang / rdo rje ri rab bsnyil ba'i rngam stangs can dang / rdo rje dmar mo spyan gsum shin du mi srun ma dang / rdo rje cir

yang 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul can chen mo dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje smug nag gtibs pa'i med dpal can dang / rdo rje ke rus 'cha' ba'i tshems rnon ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma'i shin du gad rgyangs chen mo dang / rdo rje nang grol 'dren

ma kang ka'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin 'brug sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi rin chen char 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje shugs 'chang rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje dbang mo rdo rje sder mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shan pa spu gri'i rnon po'i so can dang / rdo rje go

cha sra bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sprin tshogs mang po sdud par byed pa dang / rdo rje 'ur 'ur shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs pa'i drag shul can chen mo dang / rdo rje za bar byed pa'i phaT phaT sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje brkyang bskum gshin

rje gnon ma dang / rdo rje zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan pa dang / rdo rje drag po'i nga ro 'byin pa'i gdong gsum ma dang / rdo rje yud tsam 'dul phyogs bcur 'phro ma dang / rdo rje seng ge stabs su mchod pa'i nga rgyal can dang / rdo rje sprul pa

mang po 'gyed pa'i bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje stir gnas myul bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi tshogs myul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje phyi nang mtshams myul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje de bya'i sbyor myul ma bya khra khyi

sgyigs can dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dur khrod ro za 'dul ba'i bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma dang / rdo rje ser mo sbrul gyi ska rags can dang / rdo rje gnam lcags 'ur mo thog 'bebs

ma dang / rdo rje brgyal byed dngas par byed ma dang / rdo rje bsdams pas srin mo brgyal bar byed ma dang / rdo rje kha nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag ma dang / rdo rje dbu stong phyag stong bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar byed ma dang / rdo rje 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha'

'gro chen mo dang / rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsug 'khyil ma dang / rdo rje sku yis rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dang / rdo rje gsung gi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed ma dang / rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul mnga' ma chen mo dang / rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul dbang

phyug mo dang / rdo rje rin chen sku'i dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje pad mo dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje dbyings la sbyor zhing stan byed ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rje tsher ma dang / rdo rje myong ma dang / rdo rje reg byed kun la 'khyams

dang / rdo rje dmar nag dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje sngo nag ral pa can chen mo dang / rdo rje ljang nag dbu brgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang sngo dbu drug ma dang / rdo rje ba lang gi mgo can ma dang / rdo rje ser nag dbu bcwa lnga ma dang / rdo rje smug nag dbu brgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang ser

khro gtum dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje ser mo dbu gcig ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dbu lnga ma dang / rdo rje nag mo dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje bsnyems ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje ser mo bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo bya khra khyi sgyig

can dang / rdo rje gtun khung ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje mda' bsnyag ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje skul byed ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje rlung 'byin ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje rjod byed ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed

ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje 'phrog ma brlag byed ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje rmongs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje khrag 'joms ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang /

rdo rje tshe 'joms ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje rmungs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje srin mo snying zan ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje skul ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje 'bebs ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje dpal bdag ma bya khra khyi sgyig can

dang / rdo rje rkan 'jib ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyig can dang / rdo rje sgrub pa tshe 'dzin ma bya khra khyi sgrig can dang / rdo rje thod rlon dang sbrul nag 'khyil ba can dang / rdo rje zhing chen stod g.yogs chu srin smad

g.yogs can dang / rdo rje za byed kha 'bar ma dang / rdo rje nam mkha' lding dang / rdo rje khra dang 'ug pa dang / rdo rje bya rgod chen mo dang / rdo rje byin lag dang / rdo rje kang ka'i lus la chu srin gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje gshog pa gtams pa dang / rdo rje sder mo

lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje mchu rtse gcig ma'i gdong can ma dang / rdo rje so gri can dang / rdo rje kha gdangs ma dang / rdo rje karma mud ka ra dang / rdo rje 'jigs par par byed pa'i gzugs can dang / rdo rje smigs bu'i mgo can dang / rdo rje khwa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdun pa mo dang / rdo

rje myos pa mo dang / rdo rje dra ba mo dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje byed pa dang / rdo rje dang ba mo dang / rdo rje kha spu can dang / rdo rje ral gri spu can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi lpags pa can dang / rdo rje zangs kyi kha spu can dang / rdo rje ka li pi ka'i dbyings can dang / rdo rje dbang sbyin

ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ched du 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu

gtogs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gzugs gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sgra'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dri'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro'i tshogs dang / rdo rje regs gi tshogs dang / rdo rje khro mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gos gyon pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje

bza' btung gi tshogs dang / rdo rje bro gar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje klu mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dbye bar byed ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje pad mo phreng ba ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bde ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sprin sdud ma'i

tshogs dang / rdo rje dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nyi zla'i 'od kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yid bzhin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mchog phran 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje zhing 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nga

rgyal can kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje thim par byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar chen po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'khor lo ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje pad mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bka' nyan sprul pa'i

tshogs dang / rdo rje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje spyod pas ci la'ang thogs pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rigs su thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i tshogs dang /

rdo rje sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rigs su skyes pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje me stag phra mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sems ma ye shes su snang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje snyom las med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyid lug

med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje the tshom med par bsgrub pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gsang ba ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rnam par spros ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rgyan bkod pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bstan

pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la rgyu ba mo'i tshogs dang / snying rje skyon dag pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje phyogs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdul ba mo'i dgongs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rten pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshigs mtshon pa mo'i

tshogs dang / rdo rje gab pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sbas pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shes rab 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bde ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang /

rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje drang snang mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rang 'byung mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje kun du mang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shes rab kyi mig dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje kun bzang longs spyod gnas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje

rmongs par byed pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje srog za bar byed pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje za mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje khrag za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshil za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rkang za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bsod nams gter 'chang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ye shes

dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgra mtha' yas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yon tan phrin las kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lhun gyis grub pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sprul pa 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rgyu las 'byung ba mo'i tshogs

dang / rdo rje gtum bag can dang / rdo rje gdug pa gtong ba sbrul gyis chun po can dang / rdo rje 'jigs pa'i mgo brgyad pa dang / rdo rje mgo sna tshogs par sprul pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje lus stong la mgo bcu pa dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo gcig pa'i

tshogs dang / rdo rje lus sna tshogs dang / rdo rje yan lag 'bum yod pa dang / rdo rje gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo stong yod pa dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo brgya pa dang / rdo rje lus bcu la mgo gcig pa dang /

mgo brgyad pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang / mgo dgu pa la rkang pa gcig pa dang / de'i 'khor gyi yang sprul gyi pho nya ni lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po dang / long ba rgyab sprel ba dang / nag po mgo dgu pa'o/ /shar gyi dkar mo spyang dung gi khyi mo chen mo dang / lho'i

sbrul gyi zhags pa can dang / nub kyi dmar mo zangs kyi mche ba can dang / byang gi ser mo dril bu can dang / 'di rnams kyi pho nya mo ni shar gyi rdo rje sder mo dang / lho'i nag mo dung gdung ma dang / nub kyi dmar mo seng ge'i mgo can dang / byang gi ser mo las

kyi bdag mo dang / rdo rje rus chen phreng ba can dang / rdo rje zangs kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje ral gri so can dang / rdo rje nam mkha'i gung gcod ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i zer zhon ma dang / rdo rje chu bo'i gzhung 'dral ma dang / rdo rje rgya mtsho'i

gting dkrug ma dang / 'di rnams kyi sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o/ /drag byed de bdag pos sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las pho nya'i las 'di gsungs so/ /

\u0f00 hU~M pho nya sum brgya drug bcu rnams/ /yud tsam gyis ni kun 'dul zhing / /yud tsam gyis ni phyogs bcur 'phro/ /hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing / /bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po ldir/ /mgo gsum po la lcags sder can/ /mi sha za zhing bdud dpung 'joms/ /

bltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing / /klu yi khyim rnams rab tu 'joms/ /rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni/ /'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste/ /las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/ /mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis las 'phros/ /mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i

pho nyar ldan/ /glog rgyu ma dang 'dra bar grags/ /chos nyid khyab pas mtshan ma dbyings su sdud/ /ye shes thugs rjes 'brel bas kun la khyab/ /phrin las dra bas 'gro ba rlabs kyis grol/ /de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma/ /\u0f00 dz+wa la badzra hU~M/

ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyings su gcod/ /skad cig thugs rjes 'khor ba dbye bsal byed/ /phrin las glog 'gyus 'gro ba yid kyis sgrol/ /dra bas sdud la glog 'gyu ma yis 'dren/ /badzra a ma ka hU~M/ /'od zer dud ka 'phro ba ni/ /

hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing / /bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin/ /kun kyang mgyogs ma rlung dang mtshungs/ /mig gsum yo la lcags sder can/ /mgo sum po la rkang gsum pa/ /mang du za zhing bdud khyim 'joms/ /bltas

pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing / /klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms/ /'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya ste/ /ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing / /gang gis rlung phyogs song ba yi/ /khro bo thams cad nges par 'jig /na mo byi tsi ri b+h+yo/ /ha ha ru lu ru lu

b+h+yo/ /mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po/ /lag pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad/ /lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /rta mgrin gnas kyang nges par 'joms/ /mgo drug po la rkang drug po/ /lag pa drug ni rgyud drug gcod/ /rkang pa gsum ni phur bu

'dril/ /g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin/ /gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag /'od zer dud kas reg pa ni/ tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig /lag pa g.yon pas skyod pa ni/ /'phra men 'khor bcas ral

par 'bar/ /lcags kyus dgra sta rab thogs shing / /zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro/ /byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni/ /lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po/ /lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig /spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra/ /pang ni glog pas nges

par mgyogs/ /skad ni 'brug pas shin du che/ /rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni/ /phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog /mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po/ /lus kyang gnag la 'od phung gnag /yan lag gnag la sbrul gyis brgyan/ /ral

pa gnag cing mche ba gnag /mig kyang gnag la lag gnag po/ /mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med/ /'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas/ /las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/ /long ba rgyab sbrel phyi ma nang / /mang sa za zhing ri lu sgrol/ /

mig kyang med la cang mi smra/ /yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro/ /'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste/ /las rnams thams cad grub par byed/ /shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /dung gi khyi mo chen mo la/ /dung gi ba lang sna khrid can/ /dung gi mi

mo chen mo zhon/ /lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs/ /lho'i phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa/ /lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la/ /lcags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon/ /lag na zhags pa sgril ma thogs/ /nub kyi

phyogs na 'gugs pa ni/ /zangs gyi khyi mo chen mo la/ /zangs kyi khyi mo chen mo zhon/ /lag na lcags sgrog sgril ma thogs/ /byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la/ /gser gyi mi mo chen mo zhon/ /lag na rdo rje phur bu

'dril/ /'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste/ /las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka pho nya bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs

bzhi la/ /dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa/ /sku mdog mthing nag dbu gsum brgya phyag drug brgya pa zhig dgod/ /shar du rdo rje til mar dgod/ /lhor stag gi mgo can dgod/ /nub du g.yag gi mgo can dgod/ /byang du sbrul gyi mgo

can dgod/ /de'i phyi rim pad ma la brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa gsum la pho nya sum brgya bcu dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la pho nya lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la yang sbrul gyi pho nya dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi/ pho nya las byed

bzhi dgod do/ /ci bgyi dang / bka' nyan dang / bka'i pho nya dang / sprul pa dang / yang sprul pa dang / 'di rnams yang dag pa'i bden du nges par rigs par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin du gsang ba he ru ka'i rol pa las

rdo rje pho nya'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs shing phyung ngo / /bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa/ /thugs rje sprul

pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol/ /yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las/ /'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhen chags khro/ /gnyis med dag las phrin las snying rje snyoms/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtog 'joms spyod pa 'thun

pas 'gro 'dul zhing / /brda can yan lag len pa'i don go la/ /lha brgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel/ /bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par 'os/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /lung gsum man ngag gsum dang

spyi don gsum/ /lung gi spyi gcod man ngag gdeng du bya/ /spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog phub la/ /bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis mgos sa gcad de/ /khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad/ /'di ni khrag 'thung rngom brjid rgyal po'i lung / /

zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo'i sde zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ lung gsum gyis sna grangs te rde'u bya'o/ /man ngag gsum gyis 'jug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don

to/ /spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi gcad do/ /spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog dbub bo/ /bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba bcom mo/ /rtsis mgo drug gis sa gcad do/ /khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis

bshad pas ni gol sa dang ni sgrib pa spang ngo / /yon tan kun rngom pas brjid gzhan la snang phyir rngom brjid chen po sum bcu rtsa drug bstan te/ /rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rin po che sna bdun gyis rgyal por gsol lo/ /lung gis spyi dril de bshad

do/ /de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas/ /de ni phye byang ngo bstan te gses nas bshad pa/ de la lung gsum ni zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra/ /lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram/ /gdod bcas

don dang bstun de 'tsham par bshad/ /ting 'dzin shes rab bka' lung gsum du nges/ /de la man ngag gsum ni bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thong / /yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzad du gshegs/ /yul sems gnyis

med ma skyes dbyings su gcig /nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong man ngag /de la spyi don gsum ni/ med rgyu btag chags sgrub 'grub bltas par snang / /spyod 'thun khro drag gdug pa'i dbal gsos 'dul/ /rtog 'joms

sman rdzas dngos len dngos grub rgyu/ /'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad/ /de la spyi khog bcu bzhi ni/ /gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khro/ /gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste/ /rang khro shugs khro bar bcas dang bcos/ /rtogs pa thugs

rje rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang / /gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas/ /las dang 'bras bu sems can sgrub pa'o/ /las bzhi sgrol mdzad 'bras bu sku gsung thugs/ /ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni/ /dus gsum mi

yong sha rus khrag la rol/ /gang gi ro ni hU~M dang ha he phaT/ /gnas na lta 'og mkha' stong ye shes thugs/ /bskyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum po khro bo'i sku/ /'bras bu dpal chen 'phra men tshogs kyi bskor/ /'phra men las drag 'gro ba

cis 'dul mdzad/ /de la bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni/ /tsham ngam drag pos lha chen 'dar 'gyel brdzis/ /brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig /dug gsum brlag phyir sha rus khrag la za/ /rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i

gnas su stobs/ /rtsis mgo drug ni dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang / /dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang / /ye shes dang ni nan tan dang / /drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro/ /de la dbang ni chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ni/ /

mnyes stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul/ /dran med thod pa kham por g.yang gzhi ni/ /kha dang rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen gnon/ /de la dpal drug ni/ byams las khyab pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral/ /thugs rjes

'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs/ /smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs/ /gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub/ /yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal/ /khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal te rnam drug yin/ /

de la dpal yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ sku gsum sa gsum sems dpa' rtogs dka' ba/ /bka' khyab sprin 'dal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun/ /ting 'dzin bsam yas

bo d+his thogs pa de/ /bsam yas bsam khyab mkhas la gza' skar gsal/ /klu mthu gdul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan pa/ /mang chen gsung sgra dbyangs dang pho nya'i dbang / /dug lngas gdos bcas 'du byed brgyan byas pa/ /khrag sprul g.yang

gzhi khwa ta dregs pa 'joms/ /de la gzugs rnams pa gnyis ni/ mi thud bus pa'i gzugs 'dra la/ /a gon la ni rkang lag gtams/ /drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la/ /shin du mkhrang zhing skems pags bri/ /gnod sbyin snying bags mi

mthun gzugs dang ni/ /'dul dbang yid dgas srin po drang srong 'dra/ /de la grags pa ni bud d+ha bo d+hes bstod dam sras spun dgongs/ /gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags/ /de la ye shes ni/ rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor

ba'i skyon dang bral/ /'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen 'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das/ /gnyis su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang / /mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes yin/ /de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas 'du/ /nan tan phrin

las 'gro ba gnas nas 'don/ /bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gson/ /nan tan mchog gis mchog du shes par bya/ /da ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad do/ /de yang mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung dang / che mchog yon tan gyi lung dang /

yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad do/ /de la mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung ni/ glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa/ /bdud 'joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhungs/ /stag ni dpa' rtun za byed rgyan zhes pa/ /ye shes thugs

rje'i phrin las ngang du bstan/ /sbrul ni gnyen lcug phrin las rgyan zhes pa/ /'jigs tshul dug gnon 'khrul pa yum gyi rgyan/ /thod phreng dbang sgrol 'chad pa'i rgyan zhes pa/ /sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang chad sgrol/ /g.yang

gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa/ /byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya/ /raka ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa/ /mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje'i spyan/ /gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa/ /bcud kyi thig le

don dam kun du 'ong / /thal ba 'dul byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa/ /yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog /me ni 'bar 'phro 'du sreg glong dkyil zhes/ /ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'dul phrin las te/ /zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil

zhes bya/ /me sgra sgra chen tha dad sgra zhes pa/ /chos sku khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs pa/ /ral pa kham nag snyil zhing phye ma ni/ /de nas chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro/ /sku mdog mthing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes bya/ /'dul dbang mtha'

med yon tan dgongs pa gting mi dpogs shes bya'o/ /de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gong du bshad par zad do/ /de la dpal he ru'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang ma nges bar 'byung ste gang ltar bsgyur yang 'grub po zhes bshad

do/ /de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang / /de la dngos byung phyag rgya rnams/ /nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad/ /mkhas pas bsgoms la ci dgar 'grub ces 'byung ngo / /'o na yang 'di'i gnas skabs su/ he ru ka dbu gsum

phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad de/ de yang yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad na/ grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so/ /de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsung thugs

lhun grub/ /lta spyod rnam gsum grub pa'i rtags/ /spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum ste dgu/ /bgrod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa/ /rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' yangs dbu ma'i spyan/ /shangs gsum srog la

mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum/ /de bzhin nyid du kun du snang zhes bya/ /sgra chen tha dad sgra chen chos sku ting 'dzin snyan/ /zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub/ /ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes bya'i rtags/ /mche

bzhi phrin las mthar phyin zhi ba'i tshul/ /ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste/ /pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug /zhabs bzhi lam bzhir bgrod pa med pa thob/ /de la mdzad pa rtags shes bya ba ni/ /spyan

dgu sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs/ /spyan gsum srid gsum mgo rgyud so sor mkhyen/ /shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs/ /snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan/ /dbu gsum srid gsum mgon

mdzad sku gsung thugs/ /zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad bar rngub/ /ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs ngar sgrogs/ /khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin mo lce/ /mche bzhi skye shi rtsa nas gcod par mdzad/ /phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor

ba gting nas 'don/ /phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro non mdzad/ /zhabs bzhir phrin las rnam bzhi bgrod med sgrol/ /yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang dag bshad/ /rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni/ /rang bzhin mi 'gyur las

ni 'bigs shing 'joms/ /chos sku rdo rje tog dang bag chags bsreg /ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya/ /ban da bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni/ /chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan/ /ye shes dbyings rtog zhen khrag thugs

rje skye/ /mtha' gnyis skyon la mi bsngags bzod pa'i mchog /kha T+wA~M stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dug gsum dga' byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms/ /stong gsum srid pa yo 'dul rgyal po'i rtags/ /kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor

rnams dbang du sdud/ /zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni/ /'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud/ /sbyin pa'i za bas mkha' 'gro tshim par byed/ /rdeg pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po bshig /rtog

pa chos nyid dran med shes lnga bzung / /ji ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya/ /thong gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni/ /nyon mongs tha ba thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing / /ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags/ /thabs kyis sku

gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro/ /brda ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa/ /yul med ma skyes chos sku rnga sgo la/ /'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs/ /gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed/ /'khor lo bsam btan lhag pa gsum

gyi mtshan/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan/ /pad ma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan/ /mi zad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha' gnyis

gcod/ /rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad/ /dgra sta zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams/ /rang gnyer las kyi brda tsam chos sku rtogs par bstan/ /de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gis spyir dril te bshad pa

ni/ yon tan gyi brjid la phrin las kyi rngom sum bcu rtsa drug bstan pa ni de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la nam mkha' ri mo phyag rgyar rngom/ /cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngom/ zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ tsham ngam chen po'i stobs rngom pa dang bzhi

'o/ /de yang kun rdzob rang bzhin med pa la nam mkha' la sprin dra ba'i tshul dang / lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang / smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa dri med pad ma nyi zla 'od

yon tan rtags de gdan khri'i tshul dang / stobs chen bcu'i tshul dang / rnam pa ni 'og nas 'chad do/ /gsung gi rngom bzhi la hom lnga 'brel bar 'byung ba'i zhal rngom/ zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags rngom/ skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i

tshems rngom/ gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rngom pa'o/ /de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel pa rnam lnga'i tshul dang / gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus byas dang /

rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang / mche ba bzhi ye shes bzhi'i 'phro 'dus dug bzhi ye shes bzhis gcod pa'i tshul dang / 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan lag drug bcu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs

shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad do/ /thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom/ phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan gyi dba' rlabs ltar rngom/ yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar rngom/ mdzad pa

rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs ltar rngom pa'o/ /de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o/ /lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin la zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung

ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol ba las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' ba skyed pa'i tshul lo/ /mthu'i rngom

pa bzhi la ru tra gcos pa'i gnas rngom/ lha chen gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom/ rtogs 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom/ de yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang /

gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / zhing khyad par can khams gsum yo sgrol ba'i tshul dang / spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog pa dus gcig tu bcom pa'i tshul lo/ /rngom tshul sum bcu rtsa gnyis bshad do/ /

de la brjid chen po la/ sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid che/ bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pas brjid che ba ste bzhi'o/ /de yang chos sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i

sgo nas sku che/ thugs rje dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul rags/ sems 'du byed dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul pa grangs mang / smon lam gyis sgo nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar

'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong / rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/ phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/ gsung gi brjid bzhi la gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid che/ tshig myur the tsom gcod pas brjid che/ bdag la cher

ston snyam pas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid che de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgra che/ sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum gang / sgra dbyangs sgo nas kun gyis go bas myur/ nye bar bsgyur ba'i sgo nas the tsom gcod/ byams pa'i sgo

nas bdag la gzigs/ /thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher ston/ /shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs/ /tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas 'dul/ thugs kyi brjid bzhi la/ yangs pa re dogs med pas brjid che/ gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che/

thugs rje thugs dam mthar 'byin pas brjid che/ ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o/ /de yang gnyis med pa'i sgo nas yangs/ spang blang med pa'i sgo nas re dogs med/ lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mang gsal/ zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi

'gyur bas gnyis mtha' spangs/ mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/ 'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i sgo nas thugs dam mthar 'byin/ shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs pa sel/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams thabs kyis 'dul/ yon tan gyi

brjid pa bzhi la/ med pa zad mi shes pas brjid che/ gcig la 'dod dgur ston pas brjid che/ gnod sbyor phan par 'dod pas brjid che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos pas brjid che'o/ /de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas med/ med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/

ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig /sems kyi sgo nas 'dod dgur ston/ sems kyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor/ grub pa rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad/ shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas/ spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis ma gos/ phrin las kyi brjid bzhi la/ mi mnyel

nyam phag rol pas brjid che/ 'khor ba yun rings mi mnyel bar brjid che/ mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas brjid che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che'o/ /de yang sgyu mar gyur ba'i sgo nas mi mnyel/ rang bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol/ /

spyod pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun ring por bzhugs/ bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel/ mthu yi sgo nas mgon skyabs che/ dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun du mdzad/ rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dgongs/ /nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub/

brjid nyi shu dang sgo bzhi bcu ste spyir drug bcude la rin po che sna bdun ni 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur ro/ /btsun mo rin po ches ni yul gyi rgyal po la mnyes par dbul lo/ /dmag mi rin po che'i tshul

dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so/ /khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhis rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin to/ /glang po rin po che'i stobs bcus pha rol bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do/ /rta rin po che'i myur mgyogs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis bgrod pa'i

gnas sleb par byed do/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi re 'dod skong ngo / /lung rnam pa gsum ni mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis mgo spyir sbyar bar zad/ de nas 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang

bcu ni/ skye bzhi skur ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzad pa/ /lha mi sdig sbrul mche ba bzhi ru ston/ /yo byad brid pa'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni/ /rtog pa gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol/ /ci ltar mos bzhin 'dod dgu gzugs ston pa/ /gar dbang 'thad

dga'i tshul du rol pa mdzad/ /rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyings nas 'phra men 'phro/ /lus ni ci rdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston/ /gad rgyangs gdangs ngar sgrogs pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mche ba zil gnon tha dad chos rnams ston/ /shes rab thabs ldan spyan gnyis

dbu ma'i ngang / /dbyings las ma g.yos cir yang sa le mkhyen/ /sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin tha dad 'phro/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol pa mdzad/ /rdo rje sder mo lpags pa spu phreng brgyan/ /'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i tshe la dbang / /lta ba rnam

bzhi spyan zur gyis bskul bas/ /'phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad/ /smon lam dbang gis drag po'i skur ston pa/ /dus mtha'i bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med/ /de la brtsun mo rin po che'i dbang ni/ ma chags rdo rje

gzugs kyi yum gyi 'khyud/ /zhi gnas ting 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor/ /thogs med shugs 'chang don grub yum gyis bskyod/ /lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis mnyes byed 'bebs/ /'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje lha mo ste/ /bde ba chen po'i sku la mnyes par

dbul/ /dmag mi rin po che yi tshul dgu ni/ bsgregs pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed pa'i tshul/ /nyam nga med pa'i mdza' spyod dpa' bo'i tshul/ /gdug rtsubs gdos bcad brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /log par ltar ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul/ /

rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs gzhad pa'i tshul/ /shin tu gdul dka' la khro snying rje'i tshul/ /smon lam dbang gis mi shom rngam pa'i tshul/ /nyon mongs grub pa'i gyur mdzad ngo mtshar tshul/ /khro drag dbyings nas mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul/ /de la khyim bdag

rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni/ khro gtum tshad med byams par snang / /bsod chen snying rje bdag nyid che/ /bsgral zhing bstabs pa dga' ba'i mchog /yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so/ /de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni/ thugs rje chen

po'i stobs ni dregs chen bsnyengs phyir gnon/ /chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam mkha'i mdog /mi 'byed stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /ma spangs stobs ni gdod bcas sku la brgyan/ /ma g.yos stobs na don 'thun grol ba'i brgyan/ /

smon lam stobs ni bskal par yongs grol mdzad/ /sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan 'phra men 'phro/ /phrag dog log lta 'khor bar gcig mi gtong / /'dod chags yud tsam 'phral 'dod spyan bzlog dmar/ /de la rta rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ /

chos dbyings med bzhin cir snang ba/ /mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin du rnam par bkram/ /ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa/ /mkha' la nyi shar bzhin du gsal la stong / /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni/ /mkha' dang

mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du 'dal/ /sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni/ /ro la cig char 'babs snod bye brag phye/ /de la nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni/ /'gro rnams ci ltar 'dod pa'i re 'dod skong / /mi zad bdag nyid gter chen nam mkha'i

mdog /srid gsum mun nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron/ /dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rin chen phreng / /lung gsum ni rtsis mgo spyir sbyar ba yin no/ /da ni lha rgyud kyi rtogs pa so sor bshad pa bya ste/ 'gro rnams ci ltar 'dul zhing gshegs

mdzad pa/ /shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pa dga' rgyud ston/ gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa/ /gti mug rdo rje bud+d+ha he ru ka /ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs rdo rje 'joms/ /thabs 'dzin mchod pa'i dngos po bshig /zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe

sdang 'joms mdzad pa/ /zhe sdang rdo rje badzra he ru ka /rin chen dbyig ltar kun skong zhing / /bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru/ /nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa/ /nga rgyal rdo rje rata na he ru ka /'khor ba'i 'dam du pad ltar sku 'khrung

shing / /lhag mthong me chen 'bar bas thams cad sreg /'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa/ /'dod chags rdo rje pad ma he ru ka / phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod/ /

phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa/ /phrag dog rdo rje karma he ru ka /sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag /phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /chos dbyings nam

mkha'i dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag /rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /sra brtan rdo rje dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /gsung gi longs spyod

sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnams par dag /gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /lhag mthong ye shes dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /

sbyin pas mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag / ngar 'dzin bro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /bdag med zhi gnas dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /bzod pas mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag /

tshul khrims dri med mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /thogs med las la dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs/ /'gugs mdzad ye shes lnga yi dbyug to can/ /dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs/ /srid

gsum 'joms byed dbyug thogs gau ri ma/ /sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs/ /mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel/ /bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs/ /dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tso'u ri ma/ /gsung

gis thams cad zil gnon rmongs pa'i tshogs/ /dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi yong chu srin ni/ /mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par lta/ /stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo ha/ /thal ba byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs/ /kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje

rtse dgu 'dzin/ /sa dgu rtog 'joms shi ba slong bar gzigs/ /'jig rten thal byed rde'u thegs be ta li/ /'byed med shes rab mi rtog lbos mo'i tshogs/ /'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las/ /khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyis

thugs rjes sgrol/ /bde mchog dbyings su 'dren mdzad puk+ka si/ /zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtum ma'i tshogs/ /myos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i/ /thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs/ /snod bcud dkrugs nas skongs

mdzad g+hasma ri/ /chags pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad sme sha can/ /ma ni rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags/ /mtha' gnyis spangs pas rnam par g.yengs tshul bzhugs/ /'bar ba stong gsum stobs byed tsaN Da li/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i lhun

'gyur ma tshogs ma/ /kun gyi las mdzad chos kun snying po 'dzin/ /kun la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang ldan/ /thugs rje 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha ni/ /'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yum/ /gnyen po stobs kyis thams

cad zil gyis gnon/ /shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don/ /sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod byed sing ha ma/ /dpa' brtun za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las/ /brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don du/ /thugs rje ye shes

rtse gcig so sor gzigs/ /nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad bya khra ma/ /mdzes byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi yum/ /thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad/ /don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la gtang / /'dod

chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri ka ma/ /mi ma byed spyod pas mchog rigs kyi yum/ /g.yer ba'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes srung / /chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs/ /phrag don las grub za byed shwa na ma/ /yid kyi ye shes

so so kun la rtog /rnam shes kyis bsad god 'brang tshul khrims srung / /'khor ba'i rgyun gcod rgyud 'dzin rgyu gri 'dzin/ /mgyogs mas snyigs byed khrag 'thung kyi gya ma/ /rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'grogs mtshan ma 'joms/ /

gsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pas pha rol phyin/ /mtha' 'das chos sku gzugs 'dzin spangs tshul bzung / /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrog ka ka ma/ /bslad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag cing / /mi mthun gnyen pos mi

shigs bzod pa'i mchog /chos sku thugs su chud phyir zhal na thogs/ /yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kang ka ma/ /dbyings la mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs/ /gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin/ /dbyings kyi thugs rjes

phrin las 'dus ma byas/ /mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i rngam tshul ka /bcu drug zhags gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /dpal chen bcu drug sa la lhun gyis grub/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku/ /

thog ma med cing yon tan zla ba med/ /sbyin pas rigs pa'i klung du mtsho drang ltar/ /'khor bas 'jigs nas thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dren/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin don mdzad pa/ /thugs rjes shar mdzad rta gdongs

lcags kyu ma/ /don dang 'thun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad/ /byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyun 'dzin cing / /rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong / /yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma/ /

gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don/ /shes rab sgrol mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal sel/ /don gnyis mi 'da' dga' ba'i mchog /kun gnyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan/ /snyan par smra bas kun kyang bka' bzhin byed/ /btang

snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don du/ /phab nas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho/ /chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril 'khrol ma/ /da ni srin mo'i lha rgyud bshad de/ bcwa brgyad spyan gyis bcwa brgyad

khams la gzigs/ /bcwa brgyad shangs nas bcwa brgyad sprul pa 'byung / /bcwa brgyad khams la bcwa brgyad skur ston cing / /bcwa brgyad thugs kyis bcwa brgyad 'dul thabs mnga'/ /bcwa brgyad snyan gyis bcwa brgyad khams

gsan cing / /bcwa brgyad ljags kyis gsung rabs bcwa brgyad 'chad/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dgongs pa bsams mi khyab/ /sa dgur thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgur ldan/ /brjod gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad

gnon/ /ci ltar rol yang spyan dgur dbyings mi g.yo/ /'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing / /rdo rje srin pos ci 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs/ /rnam thar gsum las sku gsum phrin las 'byung / /spyod pa rnam dag smon

lam stobs kyis gshegs/ /ral bsigs sprul pas 'gro don rtse gcig rol/ /bcwa brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad rtsa ting ma/ /brjid pa'i stobs kyis klu rnams zil gnon cing / /phra ma'i skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che/ /'bad pa med

pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan/ /chos la dbang mdzad ha ya gri ba dpal/ /'dzin tshul stabs kyis drang srong tshar gcod cing / /log lta'i nyes spangs yang dag lha dang ldan/ /tshul khrims mthar phyin drang srong spyod pas tshe/ /skye la dbang mdzad bran

tshul mi g.yo mgon/ /shugs 'chang stabs kyis rlung lha tshar gcod cing / /'khyal pa'i spyod spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che/ /'dod pa kun la sbyin mdzad rgyal po'i tshul/ /sems la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i khro bo rgyal/ /'tshir ba'i stabs

kyis gnod sbyin zhabs kyis mnan/ /ngag tsub skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che/ /smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtse/ /las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kuN Da li/ /gnon pa'i stabs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing / /gnod

sems nyes spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che/ /mnyen pa'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnon mdzad cing / /rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che/ /rdegs pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar gcod cing / /bden dang bral ba'i brdzun spangs

skyon sel ba/ /mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma 'dul mdzad pa/ /ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can/ /'debs pa'i stabs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing / /brnab sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang phyag che/ /bzod pa sa gzhi

lta bu gzhir 'gyur ba/ /smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN Da li/ /zlog pa'i stobs kyis bdud rnams tshar gcod cing / /'dod chags skyon spangs sku yi dbang phyug che/ /ye shes mthar phyin nyi zla'i 'od gzhin gsal/ /skye bzhi mos

pas dbang mdzad hU~M ka ra/ /rol pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshar gcod cing / /ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che/ /rab tu shes pa'i shes rab mthar 'byin pa/ /yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal/ /'jigs byed stabs

kyis 'chi bdag zil gnon cing / /srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che/ /gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan ngang la gnas/ /tshe la dbang mdzad 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed/ /ye shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar

mi 'ching / /thugs rjes zin pa'i srid las grol/ /gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsnyems/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad la se ke/ rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin/ /thugs rje lcags kyus 'khor

ba mi gtong zhing / /shes rab thabs kyis lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin/ /gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad dra ti ru/ /ye shes mtshan sdud thugs rje khrod 'byung zhing / /sprul pas 'gro bsgral sku dang ye shes 'phro/ /shes snying

ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa skye/ /sta na ba tis khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes/ /dbyings su mtshan ma shes rab tho bas brdungs/ /thugs rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms/ /dbu mar ye shes snying rje mi rtog dang / /mi g.yo mgon po mnyes

mdzad mu ha la/ /rdo rje gtum mo mtshan ma'i dngos po bcom/ /thugs rje rngam tshul srid pa thal bar brlag /gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs/ /ha ya gri ba mnyes mdzad tsaN Da li/ phra mor 'bigs pa'i ye shes dbyings

su 'phen/ /'bigs pa'i ye shes gnad du thugs rjes rdeg /ma khyogs dbu ma chen po'i don ston pa/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes byed sha ya ti/ /mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings thos rig pa'i sgra/ /dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyan pa'i

sgra/ /de la bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa/ /bdud rtsir 'khyil pa sha ya ya tis mnyes/ /bdag rtog log lta'i mtshan ma kun bcom zhing / /za byed mche bas skye bzhi rtsad gcad de/ /sku dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa/ /pad mo 'khyil

ba mnyes byed ma ra na/ /thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul/ /thugs rjes shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren/ /gnyis med mchod bskul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stob/ /ma ha ha la mnyes mdzad tsun da ma/ /bskyod pa'i ye shes

sa rnams dus gcig gcod/ /thugs rje shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spor/ /thabs dang shes rab bskyod pas mtha' gnyis spor/ /ba ya ba tis khams gsum hU~M mdzad mnyes/ /sdug bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod phrin las dpa'/ /yal

bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brtan/ /gdong nas don mdzad 'khor ba mthar thug sgrol/ /de phyir dpa' brtul za byed bya khra ma/ /sdang mig mi 'gyur thugs rjes zhe la gnon/ /mthu rtsal rngom brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung bzlog /tsham ngam

ral bsigs gdangs ngar 'jig rten 'gengs/ /de phyir 'gyur med 'phra men tsa sa ra/ /rtog pa'i dgra spangs dran pa'i dgon par gnas/ /'khrul skyon dri med shes bzhin rdzi mchor spong / /'gro don dus la bab na thugs rjes 'jug /de phyir 'jug

par byed pa'i ha ri na/ /chos dbyings gnas mal rtog pa'i skyon sel zhing / /thugs rje spu ris sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus khrag la rol/ /sel byed sprul pas don mdzad d+h+ya ma/ /yang dag zon chags 'gro don thabs

mkhas ldan/ /mi 'dul zing thub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs/ /dus la bab nas brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan/ /de'i phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i rtsa la ma/ /ye shes dbyings la 'jug pa shes bya za/ /dbyings nyid shes la 'jug pa nyon

mongs za/ /gnyis med ye shes phrin las 'khor ba za/ /de phyir za byed pu ka mu ka ba/ /rigs brtsun gnyen por 'gyur bas thams cad 'dul/ /phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms/ /stong nyid sgra bsgrags mu stegs wa tshogs 'jigs/ /

de phyir 'joms byed rtsa mchog sing ha ma/ /dbyings la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rje rmi/ /lhing nag nag po drag po sku ston pa/ /thugs mchog rnam dag chos nyid dbyings su mkhyen/ /de phyir rmi byed 'phra men rik+Sha ma/ /ye shes thugs rje stobs kyis mtha'

gnyis gnon/ /tsham ngam ral bsigs sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms/ /las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs kyis rol/ /de phyir stobs ldan 'phra men hak+Sha ma/ /lhag mthong chos dbyings zhi gnas rlan gyis brgyal/ /thugs rje 'khor

bar smon lam stobs kyis myos/ /rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang sme med par rol/ /de phyir 'phra men myos byed u ka ra/ /yid g.yo las can sems par gyur pa ni/ /ye shes dbang gis thugs rjes 'gro la g.yo/ /don mdzad god 'brang ye shes

dbyings su mkhyen/ /de phyir tshul khrims chen po kyi kya ma/ /bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni/ /dbyings nyid mnyam nyid ye shes mkhyen pa za/ /thugs rje 'dun pas 'khor ba bag chags sbyong / /de phyir 'phra men za byed don ka ma/ /dbyings

la sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur/ /ye shes dbyings rtogs drangs pa nyin mo nyal/ /'gro mdongs rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldan/ /ye shes thugs rjes drangs pa'i u lu ka /brtags pa'i dngos la rtse gcig ting 'dzin

'gyur/ /mnyam nyid mtha' bral dbyings las mi g.yo ba/ /rtog ge spyod yul byis pas mi mthong ba/ /de phyir sbeb byed 'phra men ba ya ta/ /las 'bras bden la yid ches dang gyur te/ /mnyam nyid dbyings su ye shes thugs kyis mgyogs/ /zhi gnas

spyan rdzi lhag mthong bgrod tshags chung / /de phyir 'phra men mgyogs byed b+hag shi ta/ /nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin pa'i mos par gyur/ /lhag mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam 'gyur 'dzin/ /zhi gnas gces par 'dzin pa mi 'phrogs pa/ /de phyir 'phra

men 'dzin ma tsa ta ma/ /'dris pa'i dngos po ma brjed dran par gyur/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med ma brjed dran/ /ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mthong so sor gsal/ /gnyis la ma rmongs zin ma ti ti la/ /chos rnams 'byed pa'i byed par gyur

pa ni/ /mnyam nyid ngang du log lta sel byed cing / /rig pa skyed pas som nyi the tshom gcod/ /de phyir 'phra men gsod byed na ku la/ /'jug pa rang dbang med pa'i gnyid gyur pa/ /bstan pa'i chos sgrogs log lta myos byed cing / /mnyam dang mi mthun

log lta myos byed phyir/ /thams cad myos byed 'phra men 'u shi ka /gsum 'dus gcod pa'i reg par gyur pa ni/ /phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad cing / /phyag rgya bzhi po ma skyes dbyings su bros/ /de phyir 'phra men 'bros byed ka si ka /'khor ba'i rdo rje

brjod pas mya ngan 'das/ /chos sku rdo rje brjod pas mtha' gnyis spangs/ /rjod byed brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral/ /de phyir rjod byed badzra pa sha ma/ /chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig /ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs/ /

phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha bdud bcom/ /de phyir 'joms byed badzra be ra be/ /'chi med bdud rtsi yul sems skye 'gag med/ /grub pa'i bdud rtsi bsam pa'i 'bras bu thob/ /thugs rjes 'gro bdud rtsi gtong bla med bsgrub/ /rtsi mchog ye shes badzra

a mr-i ta/ /ye shes 'phrog byed yon tan rgya mtsho bsgrub/ /thugs rjes 'phrog byed 'jig rten dbang du sdud/ /ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbang du 'ub/ /de phyir brlab byed badzra ma ra na/ /de ni pad ma dbang chen dang / dbang

phyug ma lha rgyud brjod par bya'o/ /bcwa lnga spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge bcu/ /ye shes lnga dang so so cis 'dul mkhyen/ /snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal gsan/ /shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul 'phros pas/ /rgyud lnga'i mgon

mdzad brtson ldan rta dbu lnga/ /dug lnga zhal du shar te rngub mdzad cing / /ljags lnga the tshom gcod phyir theg lnga 'chang / /skye bzhi las bzhis sgrol mdzad shog bzhis skyod/ /bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dren/ /phyogs brgyad

'dul phyir zhabs brgyad khro brgyad bcom/ /rigs bzhi snod bcud nyi zla 'od dang brdzis/ /phyogs bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang ches mnan/ /che ba che ba yang che bla na med/ /bcu drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa lta/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs

pas bcu drug sa la zhugs/ /phyogs bzhi dbu lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i dbu/ /mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes gzigs/ /tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /dbang chen yongs su 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /tshogs chen

gnyis rdzogs ye shes lhun grub pa/ /dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro bo rgyal/ /thugs rje 'dam skyes spyod pa skyon mi gos/ /mtha' gnyis dbang mdzad pad ma he ru ka /rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin mo gzugs 'dzin cing / /thod rus gdug pa 'bum mar zas

su za/ /srid pa'i sems can chags pa'i snying khrag gsol/ /dbang drag las mdzad ma bu rak+Sha si/ /sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtog tshangs pa'i gzugs/ /tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtags kyi dbu bzhir ldan/ /zhabs bzhis smra 'don gling bzhir bkra shis brjod/ /

gti mug yid bzhin rin chen pra ma ti/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma/ /ma rig dug gsum 'joms mdzad dpal rtse bsnams/ /bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad bka' zlog ma/ /chags pa'i skyon bral te chen re'u tri ma/ /thams cad rgyu

ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma/ /'brel ba'i thugs rjes sems can kun la gtogs/ /phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzhed chen can/ /'khor ba'i rgyud gcod drag mo bo sna be/ /'du byed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen/ /rtag par gzhon

tshul 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs/ /nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i mdung thung 'phel/ /gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad go'u ri/ /rdo rje las mdzad kun gyi bla na med/ /lha yi rgyal srid chos la dbang bsgyur zhing / /mtshon sbyin brgya mdzad mi dmigs

sku dkar mdog /gsod byed rdo rje 'bebs byed in dra ma/ /byams dang thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar/ /ban da snod yangs bcud kyi khrag mtsho la/ /rngam pa'i zhal du dug gsum za byed ma/ /sdug bsngal dbyings su skyongs mdzad pa ki lam/ /

sems can gdul thabs khro bo mchog tu mkhyen/ /mun sel sgron 'bar bdud kyi nad gsos mdzad/ /'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs kyang / /chags pa'i skyon bral dbang mdzad a mri ta/ /zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen/ /zla ltar

yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku/ /gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing / /gtan mchog thams cad stobs byed se'u mya la/ /dbyug pa 'tshog pa 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen/ /thabs kyis ma rmongs phrin las ljang gu'i mdog /nan dbang drag

shul 'tshog pa'i dbyug to bsnams/ /dregs byed spyi nas 'joms mdzad da na ha ma/ /log par lta ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog /skye ba 'phrog byed skye rgyun khrag mtsho gsol/ /las mdzad chags pa gser gyi rked chings can/ /drag mo rngam tshul glog

'gyur k+Sha si/ /phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzes/ /snying rje rgyun skad ba su zhags pa yis/ /chags med zhing du khams gsum kun 'dren ma/ /rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol mdzad bag k+Sha si/ /'tshog pa dbyug pas 'chang ba'i mchog tu mkhyen/ /

gtun bus gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad ma/ /yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter 'dzin ma/ /stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ral gri ma/ /ra ro 'dra bar dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen/ /chos rnams gnyis med don rtogs rtag tu myos/ /nyon mongs tha

ba bzlog pa'i gshol bsnams shing / /dge ba'i lo tog skyed mdzad ru ti ram/ /brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham dpa' bo mchog /ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad cing / /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig pu spyod/ /gsod byed 'dra mdzad

e ka ra tsa ma/ /bud med chags pas 'gro ba dbang du byed/ /thams cad ma lus mgu byed dge ba'i las/ /'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum yid 'phrog ma/ /thugs rjes zhen pa'i ma no ha ra ma/ /khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing / /

gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad sgo gtong can/ /mi zad nor gyi gter ldan bum pa 'dzin/ /sdug bsngal re skong thag thug si ti ka /reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog /srid gsum dbugs kyi srog sbyin tshe 'phel ma/ /bder gshegs

ras rgyus sems can sgrol mdzad cing / /khams gsum gnas nas skyon mdzad pa ya be/ /snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma la/ /srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba/ /gsang ba nyid la las kyis 'dul bar mdzad/ /sdug bsngal

dbyings su gsol mdzad ma ra na/ /gzi brjid can de me yi khams te mchog /'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsregs/ /za byed bskal pa dus mtha'i tshul ston pa/ /lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro ag na ye/ /mche ba dag pas skye bzhi

rtsad gcod bzhugs/ /nyan thos tha ba zlog mdzad phag gi dbu/ /'og gi phyogs nas srid gsum stobs kyis spor/ /skye bzhi rtsad gcod za byed pa ra ti/ /'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'phos mkhyen/ /thams cad gsod byed dam nyams

'chi bdag mdzad/ /dam tshig gasrung ba'i 'chi bdag zlog mdzad cing / /lung gi dur khrod dbang mdzad dza mun ti/ /'jigs las lhags pa'i grags ni gzhan med mkhyen/ /stong phrag brgyad bcu grags la mnga' mdzad cing / /sna chen glang sna bdud

rtsi 'ga'u wang mthong / /sdug bsngal nad gsos mdzad pa'i pu ta ma/ /chu las lhag pa'i nor ni gzhan med mkhyen/ /nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing / /gdug pa 'dul phyir dug gtong sbrul zhags bsnams/ /zhi gnas ting

'dzin dbang sdud ba ru na/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag /srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shul gdengs po bsnams/ /thugs rje shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams/ /'khor bar thugs rjes shar ba'i ka

ma la/ /chags pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad ra mgo can/ /byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing / /gang la ci 'dul de la des ston pa/ /yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skong tsa ka lam/ /ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam bca'

gnyis/ /mi 'da' ma grub rab tu brtan par bzhugs/ /dam tshig sgrog gis sems can 'dul mdzad cing / /ma rig nub mdzad kum pa ka rnam 'phrul/ /sku gsum yon tan phrin las mtha' klas pa/ /stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i

rgyud la 'bebs/ /so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ /ma chags byang mdzad lam po d+ha ra ma/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las bzlas pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems

dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang 'di bka' stsal to/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pad ma 'dab ma brgyad/ pad ma'i lte ba la rag ta'i maN Dal byas te/ dbus su badzra he

ru ka / shar du bud d+ha he ru ka /lhor rad na he ru ka /nub tu pad+ma he ru ka /byang du karma he ru ka /mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma bzhi/ de'i phyi rim snam bu la go'u rim brgyad/ de'i phyi rim la sing ha ma brgyad/ sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa/ /zhing

gi rgyal mtshan/ ras chen gyi 'phan gdugs/ tsid ta'i thog mang sa'i bla res/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims te/ yum kun du bzang mos rang gi mtha' la byang chub kyi

sems blangs te/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /byang chub sems nyid sgom pa'i dbang / /dbyings dang dbyings kyis dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /sems

nyid rtogs pa'i thig btab te/ /de ru slob ma bskur bar bya/ /chos rnams thams cad brtag par dka'/ /brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das/ /da ltar sa gsum gnon pa ni/ /sems can nang na mi yin te/ /sangs rgyas mis ni bsgrub thag nye/ /byang

chub sems de'i don rtogs nas/ 'bras bu yangs dag mngon du 'char/ /de las kyang ni ma gtogs pa/ /de las sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ /sems nyid dngos po de las med/ /bstan cing yang ni rtogs par dka'/ /bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi gzhi

'ang de las med/ /sems kyis brtag par dka' na yang / /tshig gis 'di yin bstan dka' zhes/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'di/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /bo d+hi tsita ta hU~M/ phyi yi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na/ /sems la srid pa

thams cad chub bar 'gyur/ /nang gi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na/ /sems la sku gsung thugs kyang 'phrugs par gnas/ /gsang ba'i tshul du snang ba thams cad ni/ /yum chen kun du bzang mo zhes kyang bya/ /sems ni snang ba shar ba'i ye shes

yin/ /gnyis su med par rtogs na chos kyi sku/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ mngon pa'i sangs rgyas che ba yum chen kun du bzang / /bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po ni/ /yab yum gnyis su med par

gyur pa las/ /byang chub sems nyid bde ba chen po yin/ /chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas bde ba chen po ni/ /yum dang sems nyid gnyis su med pa yin/ /rdo rje sems ni ye nas mi 'gyur te/ /skye 'gag med pa'i sems nyid don yin te/ /sems

dpa' yi ni bdud bzhi med pa'i don/ /kun du khyab cing bdal ba dpag tu med/ /thams cad man ngag la ni thams cad rten/ gdod nas 'tshang ni rgya ba'i che bar gsungs/ phyi ni snod kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na/ /'byung ba lnga las sangs rgyas gzhan

na med/ /nang ni bcud kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na/ /sems las ma rtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med ces bya/ /rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' las 'das/ /

sems la dngos po med cing gzung du med/ /gnas ni yum gyi b+ha ga ya ti ste/ /rnam par mi rtog chos nyid stong par gsal/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rig pa rnyed pa dag la shin du gsal/ /byang chub sems kyi dngos

gzhi ma gtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas gzhan na med ces 'byung ba yang / /mi rtog pa'i lta ba mi bslad pa'i ye shes te/ /mi gtong ba'i spyod pa mi 'gyur ba'i sems nyid yin/ /mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig mi 'bral ba'i gzungs/ /mi g.yo ba yi

chos nyid dbyings dag pas/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /mnyam par shes pa sangs rgyas kun gyis rje/ /mtho ris srin mo na rag dmyal ba kun/ /mnyam pa'i don dang rig pa gnyis med pas/ /'di dang phyi ma'i don du

bsgom par bya/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /mdzod gsum ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje/ /phyi ma'i don du srid pa'i gnas 'gro bas/ /nang gi tshul du gnas ni rtogs 'gyur na/ /sku gsung lus ngag yid gsum

gnas gyur na/ /de yang gsang ba'i gnas su rtogs par bya/ /kun gzhi yid dang rnam shes yid dang gsum/ /gsang ba'i mdzod gsum yin pas bskur bar bya/ /de la sems kyi gzugs ni ci 'dra ba/ /tsit+ta'i dbyings nas 'od ni tshon gang 'phro/ /

dkar ser snum la 'dril ba gcig tu gnas/ /las 'phro len las gzhan ni len pa'i tshe/ /sems ni rta dgugs nyid rgyu ba yi 'dus/ /mi chags mi 'khor ba yi don de ni/ /'od dang bcas pa tshon gang gsal bar bsgom/ /byang chub

sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rtag pa chen po rnam snang mdzad/ /mi bskyod pa ni sems kyi mchog /bdag gi lus ni rtag pa ste/ /bdag gis gsung ni 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag gi sems ni mi bskyod pa/ /sems nyid dus gsum 'gyur ba med

par gsungs/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /thig le chen po dgu yi lung bstan pa/ /man ngag gnyir chen rnam shes tshogs dgu ste/ /yid kyis rnam shes las 'phro len pa'i don/ /rnam par shes pa'i byang chub sems

nyid 'di/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /med pa'i phyal ba dang ni gcig pu lhun gyis rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan bskal par mi nyams rdul tsam med/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rang dbang las/ /gzhan nas sangs

rgyas btsal gyur kyang / /btsal kyang rgyal ba mi rnyed do/ /thams cad 'gyur med byang chub sems dpa' las/ /ma gtogs gzhan na med ces bya bar gsungs/ /byang chub sems nyid mnyam par khyab 'dal te/ /bdag dang gzhan du

med par rtogs pa la/ /de ltar sus rtogs skyes bu gcig pu yin/ /lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes kyang de la bya/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /dran pa'i sems can sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ /dkar 'tsher snum la

'dril bas byang chub sems/ /'dzangs pa zin po sems shes de la bya/ /blun po byol song sems ni na bun dud pas 'dres/ /sems gnas phung po tsi ta'i dbyings dkyil na/ /'od kyi thig le dkar 'tsher gnas pa ni/ /nga dang bdag tu

'dzin pa'i sems de ni/ /ti dang ra dang nas btags zhabs 'khyud rnams/ /gu gu zla tshes dag tu gnas gyur te/ /mi las sangs rgyas dag tu gnas bsgyur nas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi sa bon 'di/ /bdag gi ma yengs

brjod bral med par 'di bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu yang dag byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la/ /mgon chun de las gzhan med do/ /rnal 'byor dam nyams

gzhan gyis mi skongs kyis/ /bdag gi sems nyid kun du bzang po'i ngang gyur na/ /bya tsa dang ni bral zhing 'das pa yin/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa yang / /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dbyer med mnyam pa chen po dang / /de la sangs rgyas

gang nas btsal kyang rgyal bas rnyed par ma gsungs so/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /glang po dpal gyi thugs kha nas/ /lcags kyi zer chen bzhi 'phros te/ /glang po dpal chen he ru ka'i/ /lus ngag yid gsum

sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /'od zer dgu 'phros gdug pa ma lus bcom/ /'gro ba mtha' dag rnams kyi don byas te/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang / /kun gzhi snying la 'dus pa'i he ru ka /de ltar lags

pas rtogs na byang chub sems/ /gang nas btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /bdag med khams kyi snod gang du/ /rgya che gsal ba'i khams bkang ste/ /re dogs med par phung 'gro yang / /nyam

nga med pa lam gyi mchog /gza' gtad med pas don du bde/ /de bas rang sems bgrod pa'i sa/ /byang chub sems ni yangs zhing rgya che ste/ /de bas bdag gis lus rtogs na/ /snod bcud la sogs rtogs pa'i skyes mchog rnams/ /shes

gsal blo ldan rnams la ye nas rnyed pa gsal/ /bla ma'i rgyud mchog de la yod ces gsungs te rdzogs/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /bsgoms pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ma bsgoms stong bral med/ /thugs nas zhal

du byung ba 'gro ba'i don du gsungs/ /rna rgyud ston pas thugs brtol te/ /lus dang sems las ma gtogs bsgom du med/ /bsgoms nas sems nyid gzhan nas btsal yang rnyed par ma gsungs so/ /dus gsum rgyal bas ye nas ma

bcos te/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi sku/ /chos nyid bsgom par bya ba gang yang med/ /man ngag shes rab sbyin chen des gsungs pas/ /lus dang sems las ma gtogs na/ /bdag gi sku gsung thugs la tshang bar gnas/ /

gal te brjod pa'i mtha' bzhi yod na ni/ /don rdzogs sgom pa po yang yod par 'gyur/ /lus sems skye ba med bden pas/ /bsgom du med par 'jog pa gang / /don kun rdzogs shing chub par der gnas so/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir

dbang bskur ro/ /zla gsang dkar dmar rlung ka lci/ /zla ba shes rab gsal ba thabs chen te/ /thig le byang chub sems nyid dkar la 'tsher ba yi/ /dmar ba yug gi rag ta byang chub sems/ /rlung la shor du mi rtsal thig le sgrom du sba/ /

de las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ /man ngag tshul du zla ba'i gzugs yin te/ /gsang ba'i tshul du yid kyi rnam shes nyid kyang zla ba yin/ /thig le sems kyi rang bzhin snum la 'dril/ /man ngag len par byed pas sems kyi

thig le yin/ /sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rang 'byung che ba'i ye shes mi 'gyur la/ /chos nyid rang gis gnas pa'i rang bzhin la/ /dmigs bral ting 'dzin

rgya mtshor rab sprul te/ /yid ni 'phags pa'i lam ni gnas pa ni/ /phra zhing zab pa bstan dka' rgyal ba'i sku/ /dran pa byed pa'i rtsol dang srog chags gsum/ /kun gzhi pad ma'i yig 'bru gsal bar byed/ /byang chub sems kyis deng

'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rgyu ni skye ba med pas rnam par dag /'bras bu 'gags pa med pas byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems de skye med ye shes dbyings/ /skye med mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don/ /sems la rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/ /

byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /nam mkha' rdo rje snang ba ston pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /sa rdo rje chos nyid ye nas gnas pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /me rdo rje chos nyid rin po che'i sangs rgyas so/ /

chu rdo rje snying rje chen pos brlan pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /rlung rdo rje 'dod pa sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas so/ /'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ro/ /dngos grub stsol ba rnam gnyis te/ /nges pa'i lung dang rang bzhin no/ /chos kyi dbyings las mnga'

brnyes nas/ /gang ltar bsgrub kyang dbyings kyi don/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'char ba dang / /dbang chen dbang sgyur 'chi ba med/ /sprul pa kun du bzang po nyid/ /sgrib dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro/ /lhun gyis

grub pa'i dbang chen ni/ /de yang sa gser zla ba med/ /gser dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems ni sa zhes bya/ /zla ba me dang 'dra ba yin/ /byang chub sems nyid kun du bzang / /gsal zhing dro la nyon mongs sreg /

byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro/ /don ni dbyings dang ye shes yin/ /yab yum gnyis med rol pa yi/ /rag ta byang chub sems dkyil na/ /ma skyes rdzogs pa'i he ru ka /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /yon tan phrin

las rdzogs mdzad pa/ /gsang ba'i don gyis dbang bskur ro/ /gsang ba yum chen kun du bzang / /rag ta byang chub sems dkyil na/ /ma hA su kha'i dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /sems kyi thig les thig btab ste/ /dkyil 'khor

zlum po 'khyil pa la/ /chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i sku/ /don gyi dbyings nas lha dang lha mo dgod/ /nges pa'i don gyi dbang bskur ro/ /nga dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po ste/ /lhun gyis rdzogs dang spros ba med pa yi/ /thugs

kyi dkyil nas 'byung ba rigs kyi sras/ /kun du bzang po yum dang don gyi thabs chen las/ /man ngag dang bcas pa yi ye shes snying po'i don/ /bcom ldan gsang ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor na/ /dpal chen kun du bzang po ye shes

te/ /gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /dkyil 'khor ma hA su kha'i gnas/ /ma hA su kha'i dbyings nyid na/ /byang chub sems nyid de kho na/ /ye shes chen po lhun gyis rdzogs nas gnas/ /ma hA su kha gsang ba chen

po 'di/ /don dang ldan te kun du bzang po yin/ /ngang las ma g.yos kun du bzang po ni/ /gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /yum gyi nags tshal chen po 'dul med
