du/ /rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du bzhugs/ /ngang ni dus gsum bzhugs shing rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa yin/ /bdag nyid 'dus ma byas pas skye ba med par lhun gyis grub/ /gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /

srid pa byang chub sems su ma bcos thig ler zlum/ /sngar 'das dang ldan bzhugs dang phyis 'byung ba'i/ /sems nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /nyon mongs dri ma ye nas med pa'o/ /ye nas sangs rgyas ma skyes

lhun gyis grub/ /byang chub sems nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro/ /dpal chen kun du bzang po dbye ba med pa'i don/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las sprul pa mang po 'phro/ /lhag pa'i ye shes bye brag gcig 'du'o/ /phyag rgya 'gyur

ba med pa rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /sku ni thams cad chos kyi sku ru 'dus/ /lam ni thams cad rol pas chub pa'o/ /yum gyi dbyings chen rang bzhin rnam par dag /zas ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga yi don/ /spyod pa bya ba med pa chen

po'o/ /thugs ni rtog pa mi mnga' sa le ba'o/ /ldem dgongs don dam byang chub sems kyi don/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rnar brgyud ston pas thugs brtol te/ /nges pa'i lung dang don yang sangs rgyas yin/ /

sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro ba zhes/ /byang chub sems ni kun tu rtag pa'i don/ /rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po nyid/ /dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro/ /sku rgyan 'khor lo lung chen zab mo nang nas gsal/ /lnga

bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang / /ye shes sangs rgyas de las med/ /lta ba 'di la gnas shing rnal 'byor skal pa bzang / /bder gshegs kun gyi thugs dam byang chub sems kyi don/ /don dam dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro/ /

dbyings nas gsal shar bdal ba la/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byam re yas/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yid la thim/ /'greng ldog spyi'u tshugs gar 'gyur yang / /gang ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don/ /thig le

chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /mun nag langs kyang khams gsum gsal/ /ye shes khrus kyi rdzing bu ru/ /dri la dag pas rdul mi 'go/ /dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid las gzhan

pa'i 'khor rigs bzhis 'khor ba'i 'phra men ma dang / khro bo rdo rje bka'i pho nya rnams la bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang / /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams su grub bya'i phyag /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis

long / /shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya 'dzin/ /rnam grol dag pas gsung skad sgrogs/ /dril bu 'di ni sgra snyan gyis/ /phyogs bcu kun tu sgrogs par byed/ /dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor khrung

gang tshad du bya/ /rag ta'i mgo ma yin gyis byugs pa la/ /de ru dpal chen dgod par bya/ /'phra men 'khor dang pho nyas bskor/ /de ru slob ma gzhugs par bya/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /

bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul/ /dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum gyis bka'

stsal to/ /phyi yi dbang rin po che sna bdun la sogs te dbang rdzas lnga bcu rtsa lngas dbang bskur ro/ /nang dbang dpal chen po yab yum dang / khro bo dang 'phra men rnams kyi phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskur ro/ /gsang dbang thabs

dang shes rab byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo las dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sku gsung thugs mnga' ba'i rtags su dang po phyag rgya chen po drug dang ldan par bsgom mo/ /de nas kun mkhyen ye shes kyis thabs mkhas

pa'i thugs rjes go shag gis phye la kun du snang gi ting nge 'dzin du bsgom mo/ /de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du yi ge hU~M mthing nag las sku smug nag 'jigs pa'i sku/ /gsung gi drag shul spyod pa'i sngags/ thugs ting nge 'dzin hU~M mthing nag

las 'phags pa'i skur bsgom mo/ /de nas he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khyil pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

mnyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / /grub pa rdzas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / /rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje bza' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi btung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lha'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya chen po'i ting

nge 'dzin dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dgyes pa chen po'i ting

nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa 'joms pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul khrims chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbu ma

chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bden pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / /sgra sgrogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bar ba chen po'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / gtum po rngam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / khrag 'thung chen po'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / rdo rje lbos pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzhad gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dur khrod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dregs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje

ngo mtshar gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rngam par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glo snying nang grol 'dren cing za ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byin gyi brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol ba'i rgyud gsang ba

zab mo las ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i mnyes pa chen po'i mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /de la mchod pa dam pa ni/ /

thog mar rtog bsgoms bdag nyid bsgral/ /de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ /blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje/ /gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya/ /'khril ba'i 'jig rten mnyam sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid mnyes pas mchod par bya/ /mnyam pa'i grub

rdzas chen po dag /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul/ /bza' dang btung dang bca' dang bgo/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya/ /mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos rab tu mchod/ /sha chen dang ni dri

chen dang / /ga pur rag ta'i dri chu dang / /ma he rta dang khyi sha dang / /na ge ge rgya gshog pa can/ /'di dag 'phags pa'i tshogs la dbul/ /pad ma can dang dung can dang / /ba lang can dang ro mo can/ /'di dag mnyes pa'i mchod par dbul/ /

zhing gi rgyal mtshan sha chen tog /ras chen dag gi bla res dang / /zhing gi dbyug pa tsita ta'i tog /til mar dag tu bcas pa rnams/ /'di dag mchod par dbul bar bya/ /mnyes pa'i mchod pas rab mchod na/ /thams cad ma lus mngon

sangs rgyas/ /phyi yi mchod pa dang nang gi mchod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las mchod pa gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje

lus phyung ngo / /bla med mi spang ba dang / bla ma bskur ba dang / sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang / gsang ba'i don du mi smra ba dang / rtsa ba lnga dang sgrub pa dang / bsrung ba dang / gti mug dang / 'dod

chags dang / zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dag mi spang ngo / /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri chen sha /dag pa'i snod bcud mi 'dor ro/ /yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste/ /ye nas ma nyams rtogs pas spyad/ /bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig

ni/ /rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur/ /mi spong mi 'dor gnyis po ni/ /yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po thob gyur nas/ /'das

na sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /rtsa nyams pa yi phyal ba dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson dang / /skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed/ /nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang / /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /bsgrub pa thams cad nyams

par 'gyur/ /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i/ /'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung / /dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag nyid yin/ /

rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni/ /gcig la gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum/ /yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/ /gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su med/ /bsrung bar bya ba dang mi spang ba brgya nyi shu/ dang du blang ba brgya nyi shu/ spyad par bya ba brgya nyi
shu/ spyir sum brgya drug bcu'o/ /dam tshig 'di rnams ma nyams na 'tshang rgya'o/ /nyams na dmyal ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /blang bar bya ba'i snod ni gang / /spang bar bya ba ci lta bu/ /mtshan nyid rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /spyad par bya ba du zhig mchis/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka rol pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis/ /gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang / /drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang / /dum bu brgyad pa rab tu grags/ /bram ze rgyal rig rje'u rigs dang / /

dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma nges/ /dkar dang dmar dang dkar sngo dang / /sngo dang de bzhin ser skya ste/ /thal ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug /kha dog bdun du rab tu grags/ /nyi rim dang ni glang po'i rgyab/ /'khor ba de bzhin bya rog rjes/ /

dung sngo gcig dang dung gnyis dang / /chag pa dang ni mtshams gyes pa/ /'di dag thams cad rab brtags te/ /rab tu brtags de spyad par bya/ /shin du mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam/ /snyi ba 'am yang na dul ba'i sar/ /

sngags kyis btab ste gnam du bsgyur/ /ltung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di rig bya/ /lho phyogs kha bltas bram ze med/ /srin po'i phyogs bltas glang po snyol/ /nub kyi phyogs bltas rigs ngan te/ /rlung gi phyogs bltas gsang mi thub/ /

byang gi phyogs bltas phyug por 'gyur/ /dbang ldan phyogs bltas sngags grub ster/ /shar du bltas na bdag nyid gsod/ /me yi phyogs bltas she'u shing med/ /'og du bltas na rkun por spyod/ /steng du bltas na bud med

gsod/ /glor bltas de ni rigs ngan te/ /snod kyi mtshan nyid 'di rnams so/ /de nas gzhan yang gshad bya ste/ /dge ba sprul pa'i snod dag ni/ /dum bu gcig pa sa la dbang / /gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur/ /gsum pa de

yang nor la dbang / /bzhi pa de yang sngags sgrub 'gyur/ /lnga pa de yang chos kyang sgrub/ /drug pa de ni slong ba yin/ /bdun pa de ni brtul shugs so/ /brgyad pa yongs su spang bar bya/ /dum bu gcig pa bram ze'i rigs/ /

gnyis pa de ni rgyal po'i rigs/ /gsum pa rje'u rigs yin pa ste/ /bzhi pa de ni dmangs rigs so/ /bu gu med dang mang ba ni/ /mkhas pas shin du spang bar bya/ /bong chung ba dang srab pa dang / /gang dag ser por gyur pa ni/ /bud med yin

par shes par bya/ /bud med rab tu dmad pas na/ /de dag rab tu spang bar bya/ /ser skya dang ni dkar ba dang / /kha dog sna tshogs spang bar bya/ /dung med pa dang dung gnyis dag /lha mo sprul pas mi blang ngo / /dung sngo ba dag sdug bsngal te/ /bya rog

rjes ni 'thab rtsod 'gyur/ /nyi rim gyis ni gsod par 'gyur/ /glang po rgyab ni nad du 'gyur/ /'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /gsang ba sgrub thod mtshan nyid ni/ /yan lag che phra mang ba'i bdag /dpag bsam shing ni yod gyur na/ /'dod

pa'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te/ /sngags pa de la the tsom med/ /dbus na gshong bu bzhi yod na/ /'di ni 'dod 'jo ba zhes bya/ /mdun na gshong bu gnyis yod na/ /yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o/ /de yi mtshan nyid ldan pa'i snod/ /su dag

rtag tu 'chang ba ni/ /longs spyod thar pa thob 'gyur te/ /de la lha mo the tshom med/ /de nas rigs ni rnam bshad de/ /snod rnams kyi ni bye brag dang / /dung dang kun zla 'dra ba'i mdog /snum la mnyam du sdug pa ni/ /sngags rnams

thams cad 'grub ster yin/ /dbang phyug chen por shes par bya/ /thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che/ /pad ma'i dbyibs su 'dab mar brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa gsol ba yod/ /'di dang tshangs par rig par bya/ /sbrang rtsi

ser skya'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /zhi ba'i thig les rnam par brgyan/ /khyab 'jug pa yi snod yin te/ /zug rngu dgra rnams 'joms par byed/ /kha dog dmar zhing lnga pa la/ /pad mo dmar bas brgyan pa dang / /zlum pa shin du

rnam pa ste/ /snod 'di gzhon nu ma zhes bya/ /cung zad ser zhing zlum la zab/ /gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa/ /de yi mtshan ldan gang yin pa/ /dbang phyug chen mo rigs chen yin/ /phag mo'i gdong dbyibs 'dra ba la/ /

rab tu mkhregs shing mu tig 'phro/ /sha yi dri dag mnam pa yi/ /snod ni phag gdong ma zhes bya/ /thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che/ /thig le chen pos rnam par brgyan/ /khrag 'dzag pa yi dri mnam pa/ /'jigs byed ma

yi snod ces bya/ /snod kyi khyad par shes byas nas/ /sngags pas 'di dag rtag 'chang na/ /bdag bka' byed ni bzhin bzangs ma/ /de la bgegs kyis tshugs mi 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /snod kyi dngos po khyad par

ni/ /tshangs pa bram ze bcang bar bya/ /rtag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu/ /khyab 'jug dang ni 'byor kun la/ /rtag tu las rnams 'grub par byed/ /rgyal rigs kyis ni gzhon nu ma/ /pha rol yul

ni rnam par 'joms/ /rje'u rigs kyi ni dam chen mo/ /blo dang ldan pas bzlog phyir bshad/ /gsad dang bsgral dang bstabs pa'i phyir/ /dmangs rigs kyis ni phag gdong bcang / /las dang rigs rnams thams cad

dang / /'jigs byed mas ni dngos grub ster/ /re ba med pas bdag nyid mas/ /grub pa'i khyad par 'di shes pas/ /'du ba med pas bdag bsams te/ /rtag tu 'di dag spyad cing bcang / /bdag gi dngos grub skye ba yi/ /sngags

pas de nas bshad par bya/ /\u0f00 na ba ba to/ ba du ba ya sma sha na/ ba si ni i tang ka pA la/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ thal ba dang / me tog dang / chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad snod la btab te blang bar bya/ ri mo rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /

mchod rten dang ni rin po che/ /pad ma dang ni ljon shing dang / /dbus na bu ga gnyis yod pa/ /mdun na gshong bu gsum dang gnyis/ /gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i snod gnas so/ /srubs gcig pa dang

srubs gnyis dang / /srubs gsum pa dang srubs bzhi pa/ /lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad/ /dgu dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /bcu drug pa dang nyi shu drug /'di dag rab tu spang bar bya/ /
bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las kun du bzang po he ru ka rol pa snod brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas dbang phyug chen po bsgral ba'i thabs 'di bcom ldan 'das

dpal kun du bzang po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /ma hA ru dra'i rgyud dur khrod ma hA ru dra brgyud pa'i dbang du bsdu ba'i mchog /phyi rol phyogs gar bde ba'i sar zhing chen stan gar 'os pa gcig tu maN Dal byugs

te/ gnas chen po dur khrod gyi bdag po chen po'i cha lugs ci ltar nyam tshigs bcad las byung ba bzhin tshon gyis bris/ yang na thal ris dang / yid kyis bkod kyang rung / sta na'i dkyil 'khor bsham/ de'i dbus su hom khung gru

gsum pa zhig bkod/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bca' ste/ mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sngags la/ a sa ma hA tsa la d+harma d+ha tu swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha~M zhes cung zad bsgoms pa'i rjes la/ mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po dang / /
chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa yi/ /gnyis med phyag rgya rol pa yis/ /dus la bab po sa ma ya zhes brjod nas/ /rnal 'byor gzhan gyis 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mkhas pa gcig gis las 'di bgyi/ dbang
gi gtam rgyud bshad/ rgyud kyi gtsug lag chen po dang bden pa'i tshig gis bsgrags nas/ 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson/ /'byung po mang po kun nyon cig /thugs rje dang ngad shes rab dang / /thabs la

mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /'gro ba thams cad spyod par mdzad/ /'gro ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog /gson po bde ba'i bar gcod pa/ /bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun/ /bcom zhing gsad pa'i gnyen po ni/ /'jam dpal

'phrul gyi khro bo des/ /srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa dang / /thod dbyug drag po mi mdzad pas/ /gshin rje bcom ste bsad nas kyang / /ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du/ /bor nas sa gzhi dur khrod kyi/ /bdag po gdol pa drag po

yis/ /ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te/ /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/ /de yang cung zad bsnol ba'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon 'khrig ma la/ /khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod do/ /thal ba'i

mdog la sku sgreng ba/ /de yi lus snying yan lag ni/ /ma mo chen mo rnams kyis gnas/ /dur khrod chen po 'di dag go/ /de yi snying ni ma hA'i lto/ /dur khrod chen po bsil tshal na/ /ma mo chen mo go'u ri ma/ /mkhas ma

snying stobs che ba'i gnas/ /de yi mgo ni lho phyogs kyi/ /sing ga la yi gling phran na/ /ma mo chen mo tso'u ri ma/ /mthong thos rngam pa'i rdzu 'phrul mnga'/ /lag pa g.yas ni shar lho mtshams/ /bal yul na ni pu ka si/ /

'khor dang longs spyod sna tshogs ldan/ /lhag par zas kyi 'byor pa che/ /lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams/ /sa yi tshal na be ta li/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas/ /de nas mthu dang dbang yang che/ /

rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams/ /li yul na ni tsaN Da li/ /shang ka na zhes grags pa de/ /de yang 'khor dang longs spyod ldan/ /rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams/ /skad ni skad sna 'thun pas na/ /ma mo chen mo pra mo ha/ /
bde skyid ldan pa'i sa la gnas/ /pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na/ /u rgyan yul na g+hasma ri/ /sbyor bas longs spyod 'jug pas na/ /dngos grub can yang de na mang / /de nas sta na'i dkyil 'khor

'dir/ /bris te bsams nas dgongs pa ni/ /dur khrod bdag pos 'dus pa dang / /dbang du sdud pa'i las brtsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs zhes brjod do/ /de nas 'geng la rdo rje khu tshur dku g.yas su
gzhag cing / mig gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ /'dzam bu gling gi 'jig rten 'di/ /skye shi gnas ni dur khrod kyi/ /rang bzhin yin no rnam gzigs nas/ /sa bzhi dur khrod gnas su bstan/ /bdag gis yid ches

par bya zhing / /sta na'i dkyil 'khor bsams la gar bris pa'i sar bltas te/ de'i bdag po la sdigs pa'i phyir ldan pa g.yas byo zhing sdang mig drag tu bgrad/ mig gi 'bras bu dril la/ sarba pa pa ka ra he ru ka /byi sta na ma ha~M ka ru dra

hU~M phaT/ /rigs lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa khro bo'i ngang du gyur te/ bdag dang 'dra bar bsams la/ de nas 'gying rngam pa las ral pa bsigs la/ lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng sor mo gyen du bgrad la ba ya ke rtsi ta dza la hU~M phaT/ ces

brjod nas lag pa sta zur du bzhag cing lag pa g.yon pa rngam pa bzhin du skra gyen du bteg la/ pradz+nyA ke shi rtsi ta dz+wa la hU~M phaT ces brjod la rngom pa'i nga ro bgyi/ mche ba 'dar rkan sgra drag tu gtogs la rngom brjid chen po'i tshul dang

ldan par bsam/ \u0f00 pradz+nyA su pa ya na hU~M phaT/ rkang pa g.yas pa bskum/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha e sha ya hU~M/ de nas slar go cha'i phyag rgya snying kar bcings la btang ste/ \u0f00 badzra ka ba tsa zhes brjod nas go bgo bar bsams

te/ gnas lngar bsrung zhing / \u0f00 na ma d+hu ba bi/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/ sarba bud+ha mu drwa sa~M ha ra na/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M phaT ces brjod pas sku cir yang 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bcas te/ rkang lag bzhi'i tshogs bskum mgo mgrin 'khril

cing bsgril la hU~M zhes tshig 'bru drag pos g.yas g.yon du lta ba'i tshul drag po re re bgyi/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M zhes drag tu brjod do/ /rdo rje dril bu bsil te/ brkyang bskums bsgreng la 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su mchongs la/

khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams/ /rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis/ /'od zer tshul du bsdus nas kyang / /de dag bdag gi lus la gzung / /sbro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya/ /thar pa'i bla med dkyil

'khor 'dir/ /brod pa can rnams dar ba ltar/ /skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu/ /bde bar 'ongs pa legs pa 'ongs/ /rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir/ /bod+hi tsi ti'i gnas nyid du/ /khams gsum 'khor ba kun

bsdu'o/ /chos nyid skye 'gag med pa las/ /dbyings su thim pas gnyis su med/ /kun gyi ngo bo mnyam nyid de/ /thams cad snying po byang chub las/ /ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig /bdag nyid med pas mnyam pa'i

sku/ /thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad/ /sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos/ /bdag dang bdag gis so sor phye/ /log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings/ /'khor ba rgyud lnga yi kha brims/ /mya ngan mi 'da' yun rings
te/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye/ /gsung gis mtha' yas sems can sgrol/ /thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan/ /sku gsum 'gro ba'i tshul ston pas/ /dus la bab
pa'i sems can dag /las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag grol/ /yang dag bsgrol nas bde

chen thob/ /mi ldog sa la nges par phyin/ /phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong / /rgyud drug gnas su mi skye phyir/ /dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag /phung po khams
dang skye mched rnams/ /'khrug pa'i bag chags bag la nyal/ /bde 'gro lam la sgrib pa'i rnams/ /ye shes 'bar pa'i mes bsregs te/ /mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis

phaT/ /gsang ba'i dbyings su hU~M gis bsdu/ /skur bskyed ye shes skur bsdus pas/ /'og min gnas mchog dam pa ru/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing gshegs/ /stong gsum ma lus gdon pa ni/ /'bum gyi char yang mi phod

do/ /skyes bu chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bskal ba 'bar zhing snying rje'i mchog /nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang / /sa bcu byang chub sems dpa' dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod/ /de nas 'gying zhing dkyil

'khor phyogs su mchongs la/ ma tang gi gnas dang lung gi tshul du smos pa bzhin gsal bar bsgoms te/ de'i 'khor 'byung po mang po yang mngon du bkug par bsams te/ rkang pa gnyis bsnol ba'i drung du phyin nas byang

shar mtshams su kha bltas te/ bdag nyid brkyang bskum gyi tshul du 'greng la/ 'dzub mo gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gnas kyi sgo 'di sus bcad/ /sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci/ /gzung

'dzin rka lag bsnol ba'i sgo/ /yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis phye/ /de nas hU~M phaT pra be sha hU~M phaT/ rkang pas shag gis phye bar bsam/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gsum pa'i phyag rgya bya/ g.yon pa'i 'dzub

mo snying gar bsgreng ste/ \u0f00 shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+Tan sa ma ya mu dra pra bany+tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/ zung mthar byed kyis gzung / las mthar byed gang gis mnan nas kha lho phyogs su bltas te/ brkyang bskum du bsgreng la

a a zhes brjod la/ lcags kyus snying kar sgo phye bar bsam/ g.yas nas rgyab tu bskor te/ lus kyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu rkang pa bshibs te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te/ hU~M zhes sgo phye bar bsam/

g.yas rgyab kyis bskor bas 'bod par bya/ e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru sha /dra~M karma badzra hU~M phaT/ ma hA de ba ma ta ru dra dza/ zhes rdo rje gar gyi gom pa 'dor zhing lte ba'i phyogs su song la/ shin du dmar po bzhi lte ba'i phyogs bzhir dgod do/ /

yi ge hU~M mchog tu brjod cing / g.yas g.yon du lam cig tu gar gyis bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /d+ho tse phya d+ho tse phya/ ma nu d+ha ra~M/ a ma d+ha ra~M/ shrI ma hA kA pA la/ d+ho tsa phya~M/ pad ma rag ta d+ha

ra~M/ badzra d+ha ra~M/ badzra ma hA ma~M ba d+ha ra~M/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas gar gyi tshul du snying ka phyogs su song la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas ci ltar bde ba gtor ma sbyin par mkhyen pa ni shes rab mkha' dbyings dang / ma tang gi lus

su dbyer med par gzhal yas khang 'bar ba'i nang du khro bo he ru ka phyi'i 'phra men la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bkod do/ /spyan drang ba'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyings nas yi ge dza las lcags kyus gsal bar phyogs bcur 'phros

te/ phyi'i rnal 'byor dgug cing spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya gsal ba las 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ngo / /mi gsang ba'i bsad pa chen po chos nyid kyis bsgral ba dang / sku gsung thugs che ba'i yon tan gyis bsgral ba dang / bdag
nyid chen po lhun gyis grub pas bsgral lo/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo'i don bdud 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa

'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ste/ /de tshe sems can thams cad kun/ /

shin du khro zhing gdug par gyur/ /shin tu khro drag gtum pa yang / /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yis/ /khro bas de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis/ /

thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /hU~M bzhis he ru ka bsgom/ has he ru ka la sogs pa bsgom/

hes sing ha la sogs pa sgom/ phaT kyis sgo ba la sogs pa bsgom/ hU~M ha he phaT kyis ting nge 'dzin bzlas/ sngags 'dis spyan drang ngo / /sarba duSh+Ta~M na sa ma ya mud tra pra ban tsa kra hU~M phaT/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban/ dzaHhU~M ba~M ho:/ ru

lu ru lu/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ e h+ye hi tri sha ho sa ma ya ho/ e h+ye hi a ra li d+hing d+hing / dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka /chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /gzugs sku
'jigs tshul bstan du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol/ /tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol/ /ye shes rtogs

pa'i khyad par las/ /sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs/ /\u0f00 shrI he ru ma hA badzra/ sarba duSh+Ta~M sa ma ya mu dra pra be sha ya shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+Ta~M sa ma ya mu tra pra ban tsa kra hU~M phaT/ bde

gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ /don kyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang / /'khor bcas rab 'bar gshegs su gsol/ /\u0f00 shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta~M kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra hU~M phaT/

sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing / /ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang / /mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog gi rnams/ /bdag cag stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /\u0f00 shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba

duSh+Ta~M sa ma ya mu tra a ma ba stam b+ha ka hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya/ gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya ho/ \u0f00 badzra gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya hU~M/ dam tshig sa la bzhengs pa yi/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas/ /dam tshig tshul

bzhin ma gshegs sam/ /grub pa mchog dag ma stsal na/ /sku gsung thugs dang 'gal ba'o/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+Ta~M sa ma ya mu dra pra ban tsakra bAk+Sha ya bAk+Sha ya bi tog sa ya bi tog sa ya/ he b+ha ga ban/ bud+d+ha

k+She tra~M pra ti stam b+ha ka hU~M phaT/ sku gsungs thugs su bdag sbyor bas/ /pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul/ /nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste/ /mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas bsdus pa'o/ /\u0f00 shrI badzra ka ra mu ka sha ra yA ya na maH/

\u0f00 badzra ra ga sa ma yA ya na maH/ \u0f00 shrI badzra kha T+wa~M ga pra ma yA ya na maH/ \u0f00 shrI gan d+he dza yA ya na maH/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ ta thA ban d+ha na~M ka ro ya mi ma hA yo gi ni/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ bdag med phyogs bral don

dam thugs chud cing / /byams dang snying rje sgra zun mi mnga' yang / /gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i/ /'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing / /'dod dgur sgyur ba'i

gzugs can 'phrul mo che/ /ma sring byams pa'i tshul gyis 'grogs mdzad ma/ /phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ya hA i dan pu ya ti ba lin ta/ pra ti dza ho/ shrI ban kha kha khA hi khA hi/

dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra A be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ hU~M khA hi/ he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang / /dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad nas/ /dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drang te/ /dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru/ /
zhing chen gsar snying tir ra bcas/ /dmar gyi ar+g+ha~M rgya mtshor bskyil/ /mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis/ /ma lus gshegs shing bsnams su gsol/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra

sarba duSh+Ta~M sa ma ya mu dra pra ban tsakra/ kha kha khA hi khA hi da yan bi ba hU~M phaT/ nga ni za byed chen po ste/ /khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya/ /gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ /sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M

hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+Ta~M na sa ma ya/ ma hA ma~M sa ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA tsita ta/ ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA panya tsa a mr-i ta kha kha le le hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa'o/ /rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman/ /

rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas/ /rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba'i/ /dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste/ /phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis/ /

thugs dam dbyings nyid bskul ba'i mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di/ /bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags na/ /bzhes te kun du dgyes mdzod la/ /'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA ar+g+ha~M

pra ti dza ho/ dpal ldan shrI he ru ka dang / /yum chen krod+hi shwa ri la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /bzhes te kun du dges mdzad la/ /'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA ar+g+ham pra

ti dza ho/ dpal chen badzra he ru dang / /badzra kro d+hi shwa ri la/ /dam tshig gi ni mchod pa 'bul/ /dpal chen rata na he ru dang / /rad na kro d+hi shwa ri la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /dpal chen pad ma he ru dang / /

pad ma kro d+hi shwa ri la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /dpal chen karma he ru dang / /karma kro d+hi shwa ri la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA ar+g+ham pra ti dza ho/ /dpal chen mi

pham rdo rje dang / /ma tshogs dbang phyug 'khor gyi rkyen/ /go'u ri la sogs brgyad rnams dang / /sing ha la sogs brgyad rnams la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /ma mo chen mo bdun rnams dang / /sring mo chen mo

bzhi rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas thams cad la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /bzhes te kun du dgyes mdzod la/ /'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA ar+g+ham pra ti dza

ho/ shrI ban kha hi/ dpal chen sems dpa' 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / dpal chen po shrI he ru ka /badzra DA ki nI 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo mched lcam dral 'khor

rgya mtsho dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol lo/ /ding gnas mchog dam pa 'dir 'phags pa thams cad mchod pa dang / rdo rje mched lcam dral phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i thugs dam bkang ba dang /

sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir rgyu mchog rkang bzhi pa zhig yon du 'bul zhing mchis na/ thugs rjes bzung zhing bsgral du gsol lo/ /rgyu mchog 'di thugs rjes bzung nas ma bsgral na/ 'di la spyod

pa zhig mchis te/ rnal 'byor theg pa'i gzhung las kyang tshul bzhin du ma bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad ma khyad du bsad pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon dang / mched dang lcam dral la ngan sems dang dpyad sems bskyed pa dang /

mched la 'khus pa dang / dam las 'das pa dang / spa lo dang sgyu gsog /brdzun dang kha gsag /phyi tshul dang rgyab nyan bgyis nas rdo rje slob dpon snying nas dmod cing bla ma la dbang zos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul sun phyung

ste/ sbyor sgrol sgo bkag pa dang / dad pa can gyi tshogs bcag ste/ gdung sems kyi rgyun bcad pas phrag dog dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi gdung 'tshob ba'i bar chad kyis da ltar ngan song gi gnas na 'khyams
zhing rtog pa'i dra bas ni bcings/ 'khor ba'i snyis ni zin nas dmyal khams gyi gting brgyud par nges te/ zhing bcu dang ldan pa 'di dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsgral bas/ 'di'i rnam par

shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba yang gnas stobs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ lnga phung gi yan lag ni kun du bzang po mchod pa'i sprin phung du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dgyes

pa'i ngang du thim par smon to/ /smon lam brjod de bsgral bar bya'o/ /spyi gtsug tu \u0f00/ lag pa g.yas par swA/ g.yon pa la hA/ snying gar hU~M/ lus la \u0f00/ \u0f00 ma hA su ra ta s+t+wa~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M ho:/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/

\u0f00 badzra kro d+ha shrI he ru ka a a hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha ga dza hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Na da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha ya man ta ka pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la ba~M d+ha ba~M d+ha

hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha a pa ra tsita stiSh+Tha stiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN Da li tsi tshan+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha tri lo kya bi dza ya b+hin da b+hin da hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha ma

hA ba la spo Ta spo Ta hU~M phaT/ ma ma ma ma/ bo bo bo bo/ dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH/ mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/ /gzugs snang rtog pa rnam par bsgribs/ /bag chags ma lus sbyong ba'i phyir/ /khams gsum ma lus bsgral

bar bya/ /nga ni za byed chen po ste/ /sems can thams cad gsad par bya/ /ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya/ /rnam shes hU~M gi bsdus nas kyang / /sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya/ /nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste/ /

'khor ba'i dra bas chags pa yi/ /dmar chen dag gi rgya mtsho la/ /'khor gyi mkha' 'gro tshogs dang rol/ /ma rungs gdug pas ma chags shing / /dam tshig la sdang dgra chen rnams/ /thugs rje byams sems ldan pa yis/ /

ngo mthon stobs kyis bsgral bar bya/ /pra be sha ya phaT/ tsi ta zu~M/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ gri ha na pa ya gri ha na pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga ban bi d+ya rA dza ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/ /badzra DA ki ni/ a yang / s+pha ra na phaT/

badzra yu ti dza/ drag po las kyis bsgral ba'i rnams/ /'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo yang gcad/ /rnam shes hU~M gis bsdus brngubs nas/ 'og min gnas mchog bla med 'dir/ /gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ /sems pa dang

ni sems ma dang / /khro bo dang ni khro mo yi/ /sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang / /zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /skad cig yud la brlag mdzad de/ /brlag par ma gyur

gang yang med/ /'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /yud tsam gyis ni dbang mdzad de/ /dbang du ma gyur gang yang med/ /nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams/ /'jig rten
khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /dpal ldan gzi brjid chen po rnams/ /yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod/ /gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /yud tsam gyis ni zhi mdzad de/ /

zhi bar gyur pas dbyings la rol/ /bdag cag mched lcam dral rnams kyis rdo rje slob dpon dbang zos pa dang / phrag dog gi dbang gis mched lcam dral mngan sems dang dbye sems bgyis pa dang / gnyid dbang gis le lor gyur

pa dang / sems g.yengs pas sngags dang phyag rgya zur chag pa dang / dam tshig dang du len rngo ma thog pas smad pa'i dam tshig nyams so 'tshal thams cad mthol zhing bshags so/ /rgyu mchog rkang bzhi pa 'di phrin las rnam bzhis

bsgral ba yang gnas stobs par smon to/ /bdag cag mched lcam dral 'di tshogs pa rnams kyis yid la rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig /shrI he ru ka bya shan/ badzra be ra ba na shan/ badzra ka ra dza li ta/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha ru lu

ru lu hU~M phaT/ ur ta ke sha pra la ban/ sha ta sha pra dra/ sha ma ba ra na shra ma la ha ha ha hU~M/ ka ra ba~M/ badzra ka ra ba~M/ badzra ka ra na ta/ tri sh+'u la a gu dza/ pa ra sha ra na su sho ma ma/ pra yo ma hA tsan Da/ su re pa ru

na/ ku be ra na/ ni ra ba bri tsi ti ma hA ku ru nan/ shrI he ru ka ta na ti/ la la gan du sa ta ma hang ya ku ra ka te/ ku sha la dzi mo ta/ ba ra mo/ gan ta gan ta/ kar ta ka /ga bo dza la ni/ ba pu ra ti ba ta/ ko sha bi sha la/ i san

pad ma tsan dri na ka /mang gu na da re/ tsi ri ka ta/ tsi ta sti/ dza bi s+t+ra/ b+han d+ha he ru ka /badzra ma rang sa na sa rang / ba mun ka na/ tig sh+na/ tra~M stang ga ya/ dza ya ba ke dong / bi ka ra be ra/ ma ra ma hA/ ri tsa yang sang sa ra/ ma hA ru na/

dzA la pa ni/ ho ho ha/ ro na ro hU~M hU~M/ re na ro de na/ he he ra na ro/ bzhi la bstod/ tha med tang bting / ba ba ti ka ba ra mnya dzu/ gri na dza la pa ra ho/ he he ro na ro/ \u0f00 phur bu sra sti sra ho/ \u0f00 phur bu sha ta sha~M ka /phur bu ba ta ba ti ho/ phur

bu ba sA sa ra hU~M/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ \u0f00 e sha hU~M be she hU~M sa ma ya bak+Sha hU~M/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ kha ra~M pra ti dza ho/ mchod pa 'bul/ bshags pa bya/ smon lam gdab/ phyogs bcu mthas klas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / dpal chen po shrI he ru ka badzra DA ki nI tshogs kyis dam tshig gis sa la gzhes pa'i nang gi rnal 'byor dang / phyi'i grub pa la sogs te/ 'phra men gyi 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa la

sogs pa rdo rje theg pa bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa'i 'phags pa thams cad dang / rig 'dzin stsal 'chang du gyur pa'i mi la sogs te/ sprul pa sna tshogs su sku bzhengs nas slob dpon gyi sa la bzhengs shing sems can gyi don mdzad

pa la/ bdag cag mched lcam dral 'dir tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i zhal zas 'di dag tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas 'bul bas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ye shes bla ma'i sa non/ dam tshig nyams pa

thams cad skongs par gyur nas so so'i thugs dam skongs par smon to/ /rnal 'byor snga rabs sku tshe 'das pa rnams kyang sgrib pa rnam gnyis ni byang / tshogs gnyis ni rdzogs/ bdag cag gi stong grogs su gyur cig /bdag

gis snga slad dam rdzas bsgral ba dang / sems can gyi srog bkum mo 'tshal thams cad kyang ye shes ngang gis bsgrol zhing rnal 'byor gyi skal pa can du gyur cig /bdag cag rnams kyi tshe snga ma nas da ltar gyi slob dpon du

gyur pa dang / rgyud gcig cing yi dam gcig pa'i thugs dam la ma gnyes par phog pa dang / bdag gi snying rje chungs ba'i rkyen gyis 'phags pa thugs dam bskul ba'i stsal 'phang dmas pa dang / gnang ba'i dbang las pham par

gyur pa dang / gti mug ma tshor ba'i rkyen gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen mi bzod de/ lus ngag yid gsum gyis sems dkrugs nas ma yin pa'i chos smra ba dang / spyod lam mi mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis dam tshig gi lha dang /

slob dpon dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / rdo rje mched lcam dral thugs dam gyi lha yal bar bzhag nas dngos grub thams cad 'phang bar gyur pa dang / mkhyen gsal gong ma rnams dang bral ba'i rkyen gyis mchod pa'i yo byad rgyun mi gcig

pa dang / mchod pa ma yin pa'i grogs po la brten nas rgyun mi gcig pa dang / bsod nams 'dres pas rtsal tshad mar gyur te/ le lo dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang du gyur nas thugs rje'i gnas su ma gyur te/ ye shes lha dang srung

ma rnams 'phang bar gyur pa dang / rgyang phan gyi chos kyis gdungs nas bde ba'i yo byad dang bral te/ nyes pa bsags pa'i cha shas dang / mchod sbyin mi chung ba'i sgrib pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las the tshom

gcod pa'i bsam pa ma yin pa byung ba dang / shin du sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams rjesu dran zhing gnong ba'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags so/ /bshags bya 'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis tshor ba dang ma tshor ba dang bag chags byang bar smon to/ /

gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang bas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig /lha dang slob dpon gyi dbang dang sngon ci ltar dkyil 'khor gnang ba dang / mi skyol zhing dngos grub rnam bzhi yang thob par gyur cig /skyon brjod pa

thams cad dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams yon tan tshad ma bzhin thob par gyur cig /de nas tshogs kyi gtor ma gtang / \u0f00 shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra DA ki nI nA~M/ badzra go'u ri ha/ badzra tso'u ri ha/ badzra pra mo ha/ badzra

pe ta li/ badzra puk+ka si/ badzra g+hasma ri/ badzra tsan Da li/ badzra sma sha ni/ badzra he ru ka sa ma ya yo gi shwa ri/ sarba DA ki nan/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dbyug pa'i brda yis mtshon nas kyang / /ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren

gyis/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol/ /thal mo brda yis mtshon nas kyang / /ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol/ /glu yi brda yis mtshon nas kyang / /ma tshogs

dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol/ /bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yis/ /'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyil na/ /sku ni dud kha chen po la/ /zhal gsum po la phyag drug ste/ /gnag

dang mthing ga dmar ba'i dbu/ /g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni/ /rdo rjes bkug cing zhal du gsol/ /khyung gi khra chen 'bar ba'o/ /g.yon pa gsum na thogs pa ni/ /sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang / /thod rlon dmar gyis

bkang ba dang / /sti ra phra mo gsus pa nas/ /glo snying nang grol 'byin cing za/ /glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon/ /zhing lpags g.yang gzhi sham thabs can/ /thod rlon phreng bas rgyan du byas/ /ma lus pa dag gsan du gsol/ /

rgyu las byung bas de bzhin gshegs/ /ston ni ma nor don mdzad pa/ /mngag pa'i gnas su yud tsam gyis/ /thams cad kho nar dbang mdzad mdzod/ /srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal/ /thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhogs/ /

rol cig dgongs cig de bzhin gshegs/ /mA ra na ta tha/ 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim/ /'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim/ /'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste/ /thams cad gsol te dgyes par mdzod/ /dpal chen
he ru ka /mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen po/ /shin du mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par sprul/ /lhing nag gcer bu ral pa can/ /mi lpags rlon pa gos su gyon/ /thal ba'i

mtshan mas byugs pa ste/ /khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan/ /phreng ba mang pos rgyan du byas/ /lag na tri sh+'ul thod pa thogs/ /dug gsum bshigs par dam bcas pa'i/ /rdo rje me phung 'khrug pa'i tshul/ /re ba

thams cad skongs mdzad pa'i/ /khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab/ /theg chen rnal 'byor spyod pa la/ /gnod pa'i dgra bgegs gtan nas phyung / /thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas kyang / /rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang / /

sems nyid theg pa chen po yi/ /rnam thar la ni dgod par mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul/ /dam tshig dag la 'jug du gsol/ /nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod/ /ma lus pa dag bsnams su gsol/ /

rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyi mkha' 'gro bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /de na te the hU~M/ rnam pa sna

tshogs dag pa'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rnam pa sna tshogs khro bo

rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyud kyis

sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hU~M e sha hU~M be sha hU~M/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da

d+ha badzra bA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pA ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ e h+ye hi sa ma ya/ A na ya badzra shan ting / badzra kro d+ha na/ badzra tsakri badzra gan/ badzra mu sting / badzra ti ba ti/ badzra gan ti/ badzra gan da/ badzra

a kring / badzra rak+Sha/ badzra dang Sh+TA~M/ badzra shan ting / badzra e ka ra tsa ma/ badzra ma no ha ra ma/ badzra dun ting / badzra nI lam/ badzra na lam/ badzra gri ta/ badzra mu kring / badzra ki lam/ badzra u sasma/ badzra ma

ka rad wa/ badzra bi d+ya tsa ra tsa ni ka /kha na kha/ tu ta kha/ sarba a/ sha sa kha/ sarba ma A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ sarba DA ki ni nan/ e a ra li ma nu sma ra ya phaT/ mi yi srin mo tshangs ma dang / /khro bo

dang ni 'jug sred mo/ /gzhon nu mo dang dbang po dang / /rdo rje dmar mo bdud rtsi mo/ /zhi ba ma dang be con mo/ /zin mo dang ni za ba mo/ /rdo rje dga' ba mo dang ni/ /shin du khrag 'thung mo/ /gcig pu sbyong dang yid 'phrog mo/ /grub mo

dang ni rlung mo dang / /rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo/ /me mo phag mo rgan byad mo/ /sna chen mo dang chu lha mo/ /rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang / /rdo rje ra ste dmar ser mo/ /rdo rje sngo nag bum rna mo/ /rdo rje dmar ser dril 'khrol ma/ /ma mo chen mo khyed

rnams kyis/ /ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /ye shes thob par bya ba dang / /bsgrub pa rnams kyi las bya zhes/ /rdo rje byin nas ming btags te/ /dam bcas bzhin du he ru ka /

da ltar khyod kyis gzugs mchog rnams/ /mngon par ston la grub pa 'phrul/ /ci snyed grub mchog ma phul zhing / /khyed rnams mngon du ma gyur na/ /rab tu sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /gdug la las rnams kun gyis shig /

\u0f00 pad ma ba da mu mu ka /A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ badzra DA ki nI hri da yan/ \u0f00 \u0f00 hU~M/ gtor ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bsgyur

la kha ban d+ha dang ras chen gyis bcad la rta mgrin dbang gi phyag rgya bcas la mchod do/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las khro bo bskyed rdzogs las kyis bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom

ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /zhi ba'i mchog gtan phreng ba'i phrin las rab bsdus pa/ tshad med snying rje skyed pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dag la ni/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i lam mchog ste/ /

sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya/ /khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni/ /ye shes gtso mo mchog nyid de/ /gsum pa las ni 'das pa'i phyir/ /rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan/ /de ni gzugs dang byin brlabs dang / /bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las dang / /

dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dag /phun sum tshogs pa bdun po ste/ /btab na ci 'dod sbyin no zhes/ /dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs/ /'das na lha yang brlags pa'i phyir/ /rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'/ /gzugs

ni thugs kyi phyag rgya dbyings la ste/ /lcags dang lcags lnga seng ldeng la sogs pa tsher ma can gyi shing las sor brgyad dam bcu gnyis par byas pa mgo 'jug ma nor bar shing rtsa ba phyogs su mgo byas la/ sor brgyad la sor gcig la

rgya mdud/ /rked par sor gcig la rgya mdud stod zur brgyad/ /smad zur gsum du byas la/ ri rab ltar brjid pa 'dug pa ni gzugs so/ /byin brlabs ni thog ma nyid sku gsum du byin gyi brlab par bya ste/ /de'i 'og tu rgya mdud

gzhal med khang du dmigs te/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar/ hU~M bsgril ma lnga bzhag ste/ dbus su he ru ka /shar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba/ lhor gshin rje gshed/ nub du rta mgrin/ byang du stobs po che/ 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul

te phyi nang gi mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul te/ dam tshig rjes su bkug nas gnyis su med pa'i rgyan rdzogs par mdzad pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas sras phur bu'i khro bo bskyed pa ni/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya man phaT/ ces brjod

pa'i lte ba yan chad mthing nag la dbu kham pa zur gsum pa'i thabs su bsgreng la/ brang gis 'gro chen po dang / thod rlon gyis bcings shing bshams la/ spyan gsum sdang mig tu bgrad de/ phyag g.yon pa'i phur bu la gzigs/ mche ba btsigs pa/ rab tu rngam pa/ dur khrod

kyi me phung gi nang du lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa/ e'i nang du sum cha tsam nub pa la phyag bzhi la g.yas kyi gong ma sta ri kha yar bstan te brdeg par bya ste/ g.yon pa ri rab kyis gnon pa'i stobs su 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang pos rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga 'khrol zhing

bdud kyi khams 'jigs pa/ 'og ma phur bu zur gsum 'debs pa'i stabs su gzas shing / ngan song gsum du 'jigs pa/ stobs dang mthu la sogs pa khro bo thams cad 'dus pas kyang che ba gcig phyung ste/ rtag pa chen po bzhugs par bstan pa ni sprul pa'i skur byin

gyis brlab po/ /de la rigs lngar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ 'bru lngas gnas lnga byin gyis brlab po/ /sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi gtsug tu oM/ rked par hri/ rtse mor phaT bsam mo/ /de'i 'og tu thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig par byin

gyis brlab par bya ste/ zur gsum du phaT gsum/ ngos gsum du hU~M gzhag go/ da nas sku bltas pa dang / rigs so so'i khro bo thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste/ khro bo dkyil 'khor de dag nyid phyogs bcur 'phros pa slar 'dus nas/ hU~M hU~M phaT

phaT kyis sgra 'byin cing de'i sku la bstims te/ dbang dang byin brlabs thams cad brlan par bya'o/ /de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs thams cad dang / sngon thugs dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa lags pas des gros

mdzad cing bskul ba la bzhugs pa dang / bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid chen po yin pas phur pa yang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ lag par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du hU~M/ g.yon pa'i

steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa'i steng du ta bsam mo/ /gung mo la oM/ mthe bo la hU~M/ mdzub mo la tra~M/ srin lag la hri/ mthe'u chung la ha/ 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du gzhag ste/ su ra da s+t+wa~M zhes brjod pas thal mo mnyam par sbyar

la/ \u0f00 badzra a dza li hU~M/ zhes brjod pas sor mo cung zad bsnol lo/ /\u0f00 badzra ban d+ha hU~M zhes brjod pas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la bsdam mo/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod pas phur pa blangs te 'chang ba'i nang du bcug la/ lag pa chang pa phye la mthe bo dang srin lag dang mthe'u

chung dang gnyis kyi bar du yang gzhug /mthe bos chung zad bsgul zhing drud do/ /oM badzra A be sha ya/ a a zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thams cad zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku yungs 'bru tsam bar mtshams

med par phur pa la bsdu zhing bstim mo/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bar bya ste/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la gung mo bshibs te/ bsgreng ba'i bar du phur bu bcug la/ oM badzra sa twa ra dza hU~M phaT zhes brjod pas bzlas

so/ /de nas sor mo pug pug byas te/ lag pas phur pa bzung la/ oM hU~M hri: phur bu ba phaT zhes brjod pas de nas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la the bong gnyis bshibs pa'i chang bar bcug nas/ oM ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ ha na ha na/ ti ba ta tsakra hU~M phaT ces brjod nas dril te/ bdag

nyid chen po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad phur pa'i sku la bstims pas stong gsum gang bar me stag 'phro zhing dmigs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i byin dang / dbang dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la e'i gdan la bzhugs

par gsol nas yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brab cing gu gul sbyar bas bdugs la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad mchod par bya'o/ /de nas yid la brnag pa'i phrin las bcol te de'i byin brlabs so/ /bzlas brjod ni bdag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du

bzhugs la snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hU~M mthing nag pa gcig bsams la/ oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya mA ra ya phaT ces brjod pas phur bu'i khro bo ci 'dra ba zhig de las byung ste phyogs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don byas nas phur bu la bstim mo/ /

'di 'bum 'am/ bdun 'bum 'am/ sa ya bye ba snyed bya ste bsnyen pa gtong par 'dod na phur bu nyid snying ga la bsdu ste/ 'di ni bzlas brjod do/ /phrin las ni thog ma nyid brtag pa'i sa rnyed nas bskrad pa dang mtshams gcad pa la sogs pa byas nas skad cig

ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i sdang mig dang / mtshon cha'i char dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskrad nas phur pa bcu khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te phyogs bcur btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa thams cad mtshams gcad do/ /rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par bya te/ de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas nas

de nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas byung ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang nas gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum la rtse mo lho phyogasu bstan te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang zhing chen gyi rag ta dang / srub ma'i lo ma'i lo ma dang / khre dang tsi tse dang / sum ma dang / grog

mkhar gyi sa dang / bong bu'i bdud rtsi las sbrus te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba ma rnyed na til nag po las gzhi blangs te gzugs byas kyang rung / ri mo bris la mdog smug nag tu bgyis te shul ba la sogs pa la zhing chen gyi rag tas hU~M che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ces bris te/ snying

gar glan te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rgyal du bzhag ste/ mgo bo lho phyogs su bstan te/ gdon de nyid dgug pa ni mngag gzhug gam/ khro bo sum b+ha ni sbyor ba yang rung ste/ gsang ba'i thugs kha 'am snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po zhig bzhag la

dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHbadzra aM ku sha che ge mo zhig hU~M zhes brjod nas khro bo lcags kyu can grangs med pa rgyud ma sha stag byung bas bgegs kyi snying ga nas bzung ste/ der 'ongs pa dang / dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHche ge mo mA ra ya pra pe sha phaT ran tsam du brjod la/ gzugs sam ri mo la phab la lcags

kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrogs gi phyag rgya bcings pa dang / bsdams pa dang / de'i sems ma 'khrugs par dag par byas nas e'i nang du rtse mo 'og tu song bar bsam/ de nas phur pa blangs te/ las kyi lha'i snying po dang bcas pas drag tu chung zad bskul lo/ /thal mo

sbyar phur bu thabs kyis gsor la rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas nas ting nge 'dzin gsal bar ma khugs kyi bar du dril na ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang / gdan gyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam ma reg par gzas la khro bo'i skye'am ma rked pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ rdo rje tho ba'i sta re

lag pas rdog cing rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum dang nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab cing bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig snying gar btab dpral bar gcig gdab/ dpung mgo gnyis dang brla'i nang rol gnyis su yang gdab/ lte ba khung du yang gdab/ sder mo'i sngags/ na maHsa man

ta kA ya bA ka tsi ta badzra nan/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya/ sarba dush+Ta na/ mA ra ya phaT/ ki li ki lA ya sarba pA pam phaT/ hU~M hU~M badzra ki li ki lA ya badzra d+ha rod/ A dz+nya pa ya ti kA ya bA ka tsi ta badzra ki la ya hU~M phaT drag tu brjod/ phur pa de btab zin nas de'i steng du las kyi lha phyag rgya dang sngags kyis mnan te lag pa

gnyis sor mo bsnol ba mthe bo dang mthe'u chung rtse sbyar brkyang nas gzhan ni drag por rgyab tu bskyed de de'i sngags/ oM badzra karma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te g.yas phyogs su bskor te kI la ya'i mgo la lan gsum bdug go/ de nas phur pa slar mi 'byung ba dang / sus kyang

mi phyin pa dang / lhag par yang zad cing thal phyin par bsam mo/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te/ sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol la bcangs nas gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar rtse mo rnon por bsgreng la phur pa'i klad du gnon/ phur pa'i lha dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam tshig 'di las ma 'da'

zhig par bsgo zhing sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA sa ma ya hU~M phaT ces bya'o/ /'di ni sems ma dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam sor mo gnyis nang du bsnol te/ mthe'u bo dang mthe'u chung ngo sbyar la bsgreng / khu tshur mi

bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bskyed de phur pa'i steng du mnan cing sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pA tsa pA tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ rba na rba na phaT/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /stobs po che'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ gong du bka' nyan pas bdag gi

dbang du gyur nas ci bsgo ba thams cad bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brdeg /gur gum sbyar mas bdugs la gzhag go/ de nas lag pa gnyis sbyar la/ mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig khyud mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud/ mdzub mo gnyis kha

gram la g.yas g.yon du sgreng / yid tsam dgu bar bya lhag ma rnams nang du bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi snying gar mnan te lan bdun bzlas/ oM badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT ces brjod de/ /de nas rdo rje be con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/

lag pa gnyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud du sbrel la mthe bong g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag /mdzub mo gnyis ngo sbyar te bsgreng nas sdang mig tu bgrad la rdeg cing sngags 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na da ha ba tsa bi

d+h+wa~M sa ya dza Ti lam po d+hA ra uts+tshus ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT ces brjod do/ /de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal po brdeg cing las 'di shin tu brtan zhing grub par bcol lo/ /rdo rje brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis mnan par bya'o/ /khro bo rnams kyi spyi bo nas 'dus pa'i steng du hU~M mthing nag la rdo rje

lcags kyu'i rgya gram me lce'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rgya gram gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge gsum gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba zhig tu gnas pa las/ oM badzra badzra merta hU~M sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod pa las gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad bye ba gru bzhi pa gcig tu gyur la de'i steng na bcom ldan

'das don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang khu dbu gsum phyag drug la/ phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'bar ba phyar te bsnams/ g.yon dang po rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar bstan/ 'khor dpag tu med pas pho brang gtams pa khro bo rnams kyis shin du gzir zhing mi g.yo ba dang / las ma

grub na bskal pa mthar thug na yang gnas par bsam/ phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol te gzhag go/ yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsam/ gtor ma nag po cha gcig bshams te dam tshig can gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la bsngo zhing

dbul lo/ /drag po'i gtor ma cha gcig gnod byed de nyid bkug ste zar gzhug go/ phrin las 'di'i dus su 'phra men ma dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo rnams kyang spyan drangs/ gtor ma dbul lo/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M ho:/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ bya da yak+Sha dza/ b+h+yo ru lu ru lu

hU~M zhes lan gsum brjod de spyan drang / pra tits+tsha ho zhes brjod la gtong / oM sa ma ya ar+g+ha~M pra tI ts+tsha hU~M swA hA zhes lan gsum brjod la a mr-i ta phul la las bcol lo/ /'di'i phrin las so/ /dus ni tshes bcu bdun nam mar gyi ngo la nyin mtshan gyi gung du gza' dang

sbyar ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang ba dang / rtags byung ba la sogs te 'di ni dus so/ /gnas ni shing rkang gcig pa dang gnod par nges pa te/ 'di ni gnas so/ /bdag nyid byang chub sems la gzhol zhing mang du thos pa dang / las la mkhas pa dang / lha nye bar gyur pa dang /

mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang / drag cing ltos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan la re ba med pa dang / dam tshig ma nyams pa'o/ /'di ni bdag nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /

zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang / mnan bzlog drug tu bka' stsal to/ /zhi ba'i zhi ba chen po ni dkyil 'khor 'dom gang thab khung zlum po chag gang thab kyi dkyil du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mtho gang zlum po phar sor gcig /'jim pa 'am bong ba la 'bur du brkos

te gzhag /thab kyi kha khyer rdo rje ra bas bskor/ de'i phyi rim zlum po la pad ma 'dab brgyad bri/ bkra shis kyi lha mo dang / mchod pa'i lha mo dgod/ bsreg pa'i rdzas shu gu shug shags/ mar dkar/ kha ra/ sbrang rtsi/ 'bras can/ 'bras thug /'bras yos/ til zho/ nas thug

so ba/ gro so ba/ til so ba/ sran ma sha /yungs kar/ 'bras kyi lag pa na/ gtor ma dkar po/ 'bras la bgyi/ yo byad thams cad dkar po/ mtshon dkar pos bri/ chas gos gsum dkar po/ lha'i sku mdog kyang dkar po/ grangs dang sbyar nas mchod par bya'o/ /rgyas

pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi/ lha ni snga ma'i steng du gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis bsnan/ pho nya yang 'byung ngo / /yo byad thams cad kyang ser po/ dgang gzar ser po/ phrugs su bcas pa grangs bzhin du dbul lo/ /dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru

bzhi la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla gam phyed par bcad pa'i tshul du bya/ las kyi lha pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dgod/ bsreg rdzas dmar po/ gtor ma dmar po/ chos gos dmar po/ lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul/ drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi dbus su gru

gsum/ zabs su khru phyed/ gru gsum du mda' gzhu/ mtha' thod pa gsar snying gis bskor/ dpal chen mo dang khro bcu dgod yo byad thams cad nag po/ bsreg rdzas nag po/ dkyil 'khor yang nag po/ gtor ma yang nag po/ las kyi khro bo bcu dang / 'phra men ma

chas gos nag po/ sbyin sreg lha'i grangs bzhin tu dbul lo/ /oM shan ting gan ting ti kar pra sha ma ni rA tsa ta/ a ba ba swa ba ba/ a mu ka si/ swa sti shi ba~M/ ku ru swA hA/ zhi ba'o/ /ba shang ku ru pra sha ma na ye ho/ puSh+t-iM ku ru swA hA/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hU~M/ bcom

ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po he ru ka rol pa las khro bo mnan bzlog gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la

thig bzhi gdab pas re'u cha dgu/ dbus su zla ba phyed par bcas pa'i tshul du bya/ de'i phyi rim 'phra men ma bcu drug /sgo ba bzhi/ kham phor ri mor bris pa dgu/ snang ba'i 'od bcas pa 'gram/ tshil chen dang ni tsid ta'i tog / ras chen 'phan gdugs la sogs pa/ /

dkyil 'khor rgyun tu bri bar bya/ /ban d+ha'i gnam yol/ zhing gi rgyal mtshan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dgod/ rag ta dri chen gyi maN Dal bya/ yo byad thams cad tshang bar bsogs la/ 'phags pa mchod cing bdag kyang bza'o/ /dam ma 'dres shing mi gcig pa/

spyod lam yan chad ci'i sgo nas kyang sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang / tshogs rnams phyi rol tu byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa po nyid ting nge 'dzin gnyid dbang du mi gtang / spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs dngos grub kyi dbyig bsgrub pa dang / srid pa gsum

gyi sems can rgyu'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir tshul mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /de la dang por sgrub pa la bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mtshams gcad do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang lta

ba dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang / rgyal mtshan dang rdzas 'di dag gis rab tu gcad par bya'o/ /bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs/ /rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bar bya/ /lha'i grangs bzhin bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o/ /snying po ni/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M zhes drang ngo / /

de nas bsnyen bsgrub lags pa dang / yo byad rnams phyi rol du mi 'byung / gnas su mi bgyer/ lha dang bdag mchod la sogs pa'i rjes la lhag ma dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og tu rin po ches kha bcad la sba bar bya'o/ /don de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o/ /de ltar ma byas na dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phra men ma'i bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su go'u ri/

de'i phyi rim pad+ma mdab ma brgyad la shar du stag gi mgo can lho ru g.yag gi mgo can/ nub tu seng ge'i mgo can/ byang du gzig gi mgo can/ shar lhor pha bang gi mgo can/ lho nub tu phug shud kyi mgo can/ nub byang du srin bya'i mgo can/ byang shar du

ske ga'i mgo can/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tso'u ri/ de'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar du smigs bu'i mgo can/ lhor bya rgod kyi mgo can/ nub tu sha ba'i mgo can/ byang du khu byug gi mgo can/

mtshams bzhir pha wang gi mgo can/ khra mgo can dang / byan lag gi mgo can dang / pho rog gi mgo can dang rnams so/ /bsgo ba bzhi dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pra mo ha/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la shar du

'ug pa'i mgo can dang / lhor spyang ki'i mgo can dang / nub tu sbrul gyi mgo can dang byang du gzig gi mgo can mtshams bzhir sre mo'i mgo can/ dred mgo can dang / sdig pa'i mgo can dang / wa'i mgo can rnams so/ /sgo ba bzhi dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi

la dbus su be ta li/ pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug la ye shes kyi khro mo bcu drug dgod do/ /mtshams bzhir ye shes kyi khro mo bzhin dgod do/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su bu ka si/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rta'i mgo can/ lhor nam mkha'

lding gi mgo can/ nub tu khyi'i mgo can/ byang du spang ti'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir yang sprul bzhi dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su g+hasma ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug ma/ lhor rin

chen dbyings phyug ma/ nub tu pad+ma dbyings phyug ma/ byang du las kyi dbyings phyug ma/ nub tu khyi'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir phag gi mgo can ma/ byi la'i mgo can/ chu srin gyi mgo can/ ra'i mgo can rnams so/ /sgo bzhi dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi

la dbus su sma sha ni/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad la shar du sti ra'i gnas nyul ma/ lhor rdo rje phung nyul ma/ nub tu mchod pa'i tshogs nyul ma/ byang du de ba'i sbyor nyul ma/ shar lhor dam tshig rjes gcod ma/ lho nub tu phyi nang gi mtshams myul ma/ dur khrod gnas

phyug ma'i lhag myul ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje sgrol myul ma/ bsnyen pa'i mtshams myul ma/ dgongs pa'i don myul ma/ dur khrod gnas myul ma dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsaN Da li/ pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar

du rdo rje sder mo/ lhor rdo rje gtum mo/ nub tu dur khrod bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje sgrol ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje tib tib dang / rdo rje teg teg dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje yid g.yo ma dang / sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su sing ha mu kha/

pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ chu srin gyi lus la seng ge'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su byA g+h+ri mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ kang ka'i lus la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil

'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su sri la mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la seng ge'i lus la wa'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su shwa na mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la khyi'i mgo can brgyad

kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su gr-i d+ha mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang ka'i lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma

brgyad la/ spyang ku'i lus la kang ka'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la 'ug pa'i lus la pho rog gi mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor

'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su u lu mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la pho rog gi lus la 'ug pa'i mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal

kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las 'phra men ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /sku dang

gsung dang thugs las sprul pa'i he ru ka /chos dbyings don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs/ /phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs nas kyang / /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /ye shes khro rgyal sprul pa mang po 'phro/ /phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'gro don

mang por mdzad/ /las byed mkha' 'gro chos dbyings sku la 'khril/ /ye shes khro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /'phra men za byed mche gshog 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /dbang phyug 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can/ /rdo rje mchu can sder chen gshog pa can/ /'phra men za

byed chen mo dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /rdo rje yang sprul chen po chos dbyings mkha' la shar/ /mtshon thogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad/ /rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje shugs las byung / /'phra men yang sprul chen po dngos grub stsol/ /smon lam grub pa 'gag

pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa/ /sems can rnams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ /ye shes chos dbyings skad tshogs zla nyi'i zhal/ /las mdzad ye shes nan tan don la bzhugs/ /rgyu 'bras gnyis

kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /sgo ba yab yum dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbyings kyi ye shes yum/ /las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma/ /phyag brnyan sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /

rdo rje gshog pa thogs pa'i yid 'phrog ma/ /rdo rje sder mo phyogs bcur sprul pa 'phro/ /rdo rje las byed ma mo brgya yang 'gyed/ /dbang phyug pho nya'i dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /mi mnyam pa yi lha khyod rtag tu ni/ /thugs rje can gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal/ /

bla med byang chub bsgrub par dam bcas pa/ /bdag cag las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa/ sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha/ /de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /rtse gcig bsnyen

kyang ye shes lha dang 'phra men khyod bsnyen bsnyen/ /bsnyen pa'i dus na rgyang ma ring / /bsgrub pa'i dus na mthu ma chung / /yang bsnyen ni yang yang bsnyen na/ /dpal chen 'phra men khyed ltar ma lags kyi/ /lang ka'i tshogs kyi srin mo yang / /pha bas byams shing khu bas gdung / /

yang bsgrub pa ni yang bsgrubs na/ /lang ka'i tshogs kyi srin mo yang / /ma bas byams shing srid pas gdung / /gdungs pas mchi ma'i tshul du dku/ /ye shes lha'i thugs kyis bzod lags sam/ /dngos grub skal dang ldan par mi dmigs kyang / /sngon gyi

thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i dngos grub 'khor rnams la stsal to/ /'khor rnams kyis kyang rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po dngos grub stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa

las sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dbyig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i dam pa'i don gyi gsang ba zab mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung nas sprul pa lcam dral 'di mgo 'jug gi don rgyu dang 'bras bu

gnyis/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis/ kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis/ mdor bsdus na don dam la lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems su bsdu'o/ /rgyud 'di'i mgo 'jug gi don dpal kun du bzang por 'dus so/ /kun du bzang

po sku mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / gsung mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / sku gsung thugs bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyang 'dus so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i

kun tu bzang por 'dus pa'i don ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do/ /sku gsung thugs kyi don gsang ba zab mo 'di rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa pos lus ngag yid gsum rjes su yi rang skyes

te/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ kun gzhi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ /zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rgyal ba'i sku bzhugs so/ /sprul pa mang pos 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad/ /dpal chen kun bzang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes

khro bo chos nyid dbyings na bzhugs/ /sprul pa'i khro bos las rnams rdzogs par mdzad/ /'phra men yang sprul ye shes dbyings su 'khyil/ /khro bo 'khor mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung dngos grub ya mtshan cho 'phrul can/ /

sku gsung thugs la sprul pa mang po 'phro/ /mkha' 'gro za byed 'phra men pho nya ma/ /mgyogs pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las rnams drag shul mdzad pa'i khro rgyal sku/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag gsang chen

rnams/ /klung nas grol bar mdzad pa ye shes yum/ /sgo ba sgo ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ste/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bka' dam pa gsang ba zab mo'i tan tra 'di sdud pa po rdo rje

chos la gtad do/ /de nas sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi bshags pa phul lo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang du gyur pas na/ /lus ngag sems kyis sdig

bgyis mthol zhing bshags/ /theg pa dman pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/ /thabs chen spyad dang ma spyad mthol zhing bshags/ /ma rig log pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/ /yang dag don ma rtogs pa mthol zhing bshags/ /snying rje chungs shing zhe sdang dbang du gyur pas

na/ /'gro ba'i don ma bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags/ /le lo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ /bsgom dang bsgrub la g.yel ba mthol zhing bshags/ /ser sna 'jur 'gegs dbang du gyur pas na/ /mchod pa lo zla 'das pa mthol zhing bshags/ /nga rgyal

khengs sems dbang du bsdus pa na/ /slob dpon sku ma mnyes pa mthol zhing bshags/ /brtse gdung chung ba'i dbang du gyur pas na/ /grogs mched thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags/ /za rog ngan pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/ /phud dang lhag mar gyur

pa mthol zhing bshags/ /phud dang lhag ma nyams pa'i skyon dbang gis/ /phud la thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags/ /phud la thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis/ /mkha' 'gro bka' chad gnas su gyur pa mthol zhing bshags/ /sgrol ba'i

dus su snying rje chungs ba yis/ /sems can gnas ma stobs pa mthol zhing bshags/ /nyon mongs gnas ma stobs pa'i skyon dbang gis/ /yun gyi sgrib par gyur pa mthol zhing bshags/ /sbyor ba'i dus su ting 'dzin ma gsal bas/ /gzungs

ma thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis/ /chags shing 'khor ba'i gnas su mthol zhing bshags/ /bshags nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/ /de skad ces bzod pa phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshangs pa gnang ste/ bka'

dam pa 'di yang nas yang du rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do/ /de nas rdo rje chos kyis bka' dam pa 'di ma chags pa'i dbang gis bka' bzhin byas so/ /de nas 'khor de dag thal mo sbyar nas rjes su yid rang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la

mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po zab mo mchog dpal snying rje rol pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi lo ts+tsha ba mkhas par lobs pa bal po shri kir tis gtan la phab ste/ skad gsar pas bsgyur nas sog po mchog gi snying po dang /

an bkra shis dang / bal po bzang bkra shis rgya mtshos yon bdag bgyis nas mang yul byams sprin gtsug lag khang gi ya thog gi dbu rtser shin du gsang ste/ skad gsal bar bsgyur ro/ / bam po chen po brgyad pa/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ sa ra sid+d+hi ma hA

du ka /hri da yA na pa ra bid twan aSh+Ta/ bod skad du/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po mchog /bam po chen po brgyad pa/ dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi dkyil

'khor na/ /shin du rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas/ /skal ldan rnams dang thabs gcig bzhugs/ /gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na/ /gnyis myed lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe/ /de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang / /rang rgyal

theg chen mdo sde dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / /nyan thos dge 'dun chen po dang / /dgra bcom ming yang med nang du/ /kun bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dgongs ste 'di skad bstan pa'i lung / /bshad cing 'grol ba'i dus gcig dang / /

'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ /srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga/ /ma bcos ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas/ /dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs/ /ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir/ /nges pa'i klong nas bka' stsal pa/ /

zab mo'i klong nas phyung ste bstan/ /de nas bder gshegs thams cad dang / /thabs gcig bzhugs te dgongs pa ni/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu/ /ye shes mnyam nyid nyams rnyed nas/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod de/ /kun gyi dam par 'di gsungs so/ /

bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung / /nges par phyung ste gsungs pa 'di'o/ /sgrub dang sgrub par bya ba dang / /'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag 'di/ /bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung / /snying por bsdus pa'i nges par 'di/ /byang

chub 'byung ba snying po mchog /lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang / /dam tshig bsgrub pa phrin las dang / /nges par sgrub dang bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /zab mo bsdus pa'i lung 'di gsungs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang / /brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang / /

theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs/ /gsang nyid theg par bsdus dang bzhi/ /ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang / /bkri ba'i don de sangs rgyas yin/ /rna brgyud bstan pas thugs brtol te/ /thig le chos skus khyab pa'i phyir/ /nges pa'i lung yang

sangs rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro/ /nges pa'i lung yang rnam gcig tu/ /gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te/ /byang chub sems 'di kun du dag / rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid/ /ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya/ /ye nas bya med bya mi

dgos/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i sgra/ /mi rtog sbyong ba'i yul min no/ /de lta'i yul du rtog 'dzin gyis/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa yin/ /nges 'byung chos sku chen po la/ /b+ha gar ji bzhin bzhag pas na/ /byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med/ /bu gcig ma

rtsol bde bar gnos/ /rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang / /rmangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul/ /khyad par rtsal 'phang thag ring yang / /gcig la gcig rten gcig gi ngang / /dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin bas/ /cig ste ma grangs yongs kyi med/ /dbyer med

ngang du rtogs pa la/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/ /de las sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang / /lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal/ /lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang / /ye shes sangs rgyas de las med/ /dbyings su gyur pas mnyam gnas pas/ /

ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod/ /skye shi med pa'i dbyings su gyur/ /dbyings 'gyur dag mnyam lhun grub pas/ /lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang / /ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrub kyang / /bdud rtsi nyid te sman gyi mchog /bder

gshegs nyid kyi thugs dam nyid/ /byin brlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung / /rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos/ /sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung / /thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di/ /spros med thig ler gnas pa las/ /mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir/ /rang la

mchod cing rang gis bza'/ /bsgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ ye shes chen po'i thugs nas dgongs te bka' stsal pa'o/ /bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las byang chub sems de kho na nyid lta bar bstan pa'i man ngag chen po

gsang ba'i don dang po ste/ thugs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang nas gsang ba'i mdzod chen po las bam po chen po brgyad pa'i dang po// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta ra sa ya na/ ta na dz+ha ya/ pra shasta pra ma na shri kan pra sha sta ya na mo/ bod skad du/ tshangs pa la sogs

pa drang srong dang / lha dang klu dang mi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshangs pa'i gtso bo mchog /dung gi thor tshugs khong seng can/ /tshangs pa kun grol chen po dang / /drang srong chen po ljang sngon dang / /tsa ra ka dang nam so skyes/ /tha skar bu dang lha skabs dang / /

rgyun shes pa dang g.yon phyogs lha/ /thang la gnas dang me bzhin 'jug /dka' gnyis spyod dang ka la yan/ /shing khyer dang ni ljang sngon bu/ /nyi ma zla ba klu ru bcas/ /shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma/ /sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun/ /'di kun 'khor dang bcas pa yis/ /kun bzang lha

la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sman gyi dbang dang dam tshig mnos/ /drang srong rnams la rjes su gnang / /de nas kun bzang bder gshegs kyis/ /sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi mchog /nges pa'i lung 'di bka' stsal to/ /de nas thugs rje'i cho 'phrul gyis/ /sa rnams rab tu g.yos

nas ni/ /stong gsum 'jig rten sa stengs su/ /thams cad sman chen ra sa yan/ /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /de ltar smin par byed pa yang / /thugs rje rgya mtsho chen po las/ /thugs rje sprin ni khyab pa yis/ /sprin chen glog gi phreng ba can/ /yud tsam sgra dang

bcas pa yis/ /sa stengs khengs par char phab nas/ /de nyid thugs rje snyoms pa'i mgon/ /chu yi phung po bdud rtsi yis/ /ma lus par ni ngoms par byas/ /bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho thigs chen gyis/ /sa dang sman rnams kun gyi gsos/ /ri rab rtse dang ri sul dang / /sman

ljongs dang ni nag tshal dang / /lcang lo can gyi 'khor kun du/ /sprin chen bdud rtsi char gyis rlan/ /chu de thams cad ro gcig ste/ /chu yi bcud las skyes pa ni/ /dpag bsam shing dang gel ba'i shing / /ljon shing dang ni tsu ta'i shing / /sa stengs khebs par skyes pa ste/ /

bdud rtsir gyur te thams cad rgyas/ /sdong po dang ni sdong chen dang / /rtsa ba sdong po shun lpags dang / /snying po yal ga lo ma dang / /'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas/ /de bzhin 'bru yi rnam grangs kun/ /thams cad bangs shing smin par mdzad/ /'thungs na ngoms te

rgyas par gyur/ /so so'i yul dang gnas dag dang / /mdog dang ro dang dri dang mthu/ /gang gi sa bon de nyid las/ /de dag rang rang 'byin par byed/ /de bzhin srog chags thams cad kun/ /ra sa ya na'i rdzas la spyod/ /'gro ba drug gi gsos su 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi sgo

ni rnam par phye/ /'jig rten mgon pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rnon pos bsdus te bka' stsal pa/ lha dang klu dang drang srong dang / mi'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge bsnyen chen po dri ma med par grags pa li tsa bi

la sogs pa la bdud rtsi ra sa ya na ta nan dz+ha ya 'di dag bstan no/ /dang por bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas ni/ u hu si ti pa tsa zhes bya ste/ ba tri sa zhes kyang bya ba/ ri'i rgyal po gser mdog can gyi rtse mo rta rna ri zhes bya ba der/ ra sa ya na zhes bya ba drang srong rnams kyis

bsgrubs so/ /de yang thang cig yud kyis 'grub/ /la la nyin zhag gcig gis 'grub/ /la la nyin zhag bdun gyis 'grub/ /'tha' ma nyi shu gcig gis 'grub/ /de la the tshom med pas 'grub/ /de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rtsa ba sdong bu yal ga dang / /
