lo ma 'dab ma me tog dang / /shun lpags 'bras bu snying por bcas/ /ro dang mthu dang mdog dang las/ /rtsa ba gcig la yan lag brgyad/ /yan lag brgyad las yon tan stong / /'di dag kun gyi yon tan yang / /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing / /bdud

bzhi nges par 'joms par byed/ /sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi'i mchog /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po 'di kun kyang / /mngon shes lnga dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /rig pa'i gnas mchog bcwa brgyad shes/ /de nas sman ni bsgrub par bya/ /stegs

bu khru gang pa gcig la/ /maN Dal gtsang ma'i dris byugs la/ /de yi dbus su sman gyi mchog /bdud rtsi cong zi rnam gsum dang / /ser skya ba las byung ba yi/ /'o ma bre gang btsags nang du/ /a sho kan 'da'i phye ma dang / /bsres nas bskol ba'i nang du gdab/ /

lcags las byas pa'i snod du blugs/ /stegs bu'i dbus su bzhag nas ni/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di dag /stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /oM badzra a mr-i ta/ pa la li ka /be la lig tsan da lig swA hA/ dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o/ /a mr-i ta sid+d+hi byi

tsurna ya swA hA/ pu tsa lha ha kan/ byin gyis brlab cing bza' ba yang / /nyi ma'i gung la bza' bar bya/ /don dam thig le bden pa las/ /snying po med las snying po blang / /rnam smin 'bras bu rig 'dzin 'grub/ /nad med lo brgya 'tsho bar byed/ /de nas drang srong nyi shu

gcig /grub pa'i rig 'dzin mchog tu gyur/ /de yi 'og tu drang srong mchog /bcwa lnga yis ni bdud rtsi sman/ /ra sa ya na dam pa 'di/ /tshe yi rig 'dzin 'dod pa'i phyir/ /gzhon nu sred ces bya ba dang / /'dron skyob ces ni bya ba dang / /rtsibs kyi mu khyud la sogs

pas/ /chu bo gang gA'i 'gram du bsgrubs/ /lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra/ /rigs bdun sa la lhung ba ni/ /brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i tshe/ /thigs pa bdun ni kha nas ltung / /rlung gi khyer te sa las skyes/ /bdud rtsi'i gtso bor rab tu grags/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad

kan dang / /'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad/ /dus min 'chi las thar bar byed/ /rlung mkhris bad kan 'di kun yang / /gcig la 'ang lnga lnga yod par bshad/ /de kun rab tu bsal ba'i phyir/ /phung po'i bdud dang nyon mongs bdud/ /lha bu bdud dang 'chi bdag

bcom/ /bdud rtsi 'di yis sel bar byed/ /shar lho nub byang gang yang rung / /brag phug stong pa yod pa las/ /bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i khu ba ni/ /rin chen sna lnga 'byung ba'o/ /ming ni shi la mdza' du zhes/ /ra sa ya na bdud rtsi'i mchog /a ru ra brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ /yang na nyi

shu rtsa gcig gam/ /sul bu zlum por gyur btsos te/ /de dag rab tu btsos pa dang / /lcags zangs 'khar ba'i snod nang du/ /bkang ste stegs bu gong ma yi/ /dbus su bdud rtsi sman de gzhag /byin gyis brlab pa snga ma bzhin/ /'od dang dri dang bro ba 'ang med/ /rtags 'di

rnam gsum gang byung yang / /lag pa g.yon pa dkan te phyar/ /mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug /blangs te btung ba'i sngags 'di'o/ /oM a mr-i ta si ti bi tsu rna ya/ /lha ha ka na zhes brjod do/ /de'i yon tan brjod mi lang / /rdo rje brag dang 'drar 'gyur te/ /nad med

rtag tu dar la bab/ /grub pa'i rig 'dzin dam par 'gyur/ /srid pa chags nas srubs shing gis/ /bsrubs pa'i 'bras bu rin po che/ /me shel chu shel gnyis byung ba/ /de yang thabs dang shes rab ste/ /nyin mtshan gnyis la dbang byed pa'o/ /de nyid zung yang

'khor du bcas/ /de nas bdud rtsi zags pa ni/ /sa dman dag tu mi skye ste/ /a la pe tas sar kal ba/ /lha dang dri za gnod sbyin dang / /rin chen sna tshogs 'byung khungs gnas/ /legs ldan gangs ri gnyan gyi shod/ /ri brag chu klung bgegs gnas su/ /lhung nas

babs te skyes pa ni/ /a~M li ka dang bris rtsi ka /nyi ma gzi brjid ldan pa'i chu/ /a la be ta sar sra kal ba br-ik+Sha 'bru/ /de bzhin zla ba gzi ldan chu/ /de yi sa bon lhung ba ni/ /gser mdog bdud rtsi 'dra bar gsal/ /dmar ba mer blugs bus bus zer/ /gzugs

bzang mdzes pa phun sum tshogs/ /tsher ma rno ba dpal dang ldan/ /bdud rtsi shing dang 'bras bur ldan/ /dug rnams 'joms shing slar yang zlog /sna tshogs nad rnams sel bar byed/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i mdog /ro yang rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /rag ta'i gtso bor

'di sbyor cig /tshangs pa tshe dang ldan par 'gyur/ /nyi ma zla ba'i dngos grub thob/ /ra sa ya na'i gtso bo yin/ /de nas drang srong gzhon nu srid/ /khyab 'jug spang gnyis bya ba yi/ /rwa yi gzhu thogs mi srun pa/ /lag na mtshon cha sna lnga thogs/ /de'i srid pa chags pa'i

bcud/ /bdud rtsi rnam lnga bskus pa las/ /kha nas thigs gnyis sa la lhung / /de nas bdud rtsi dam pa'i mchog /ra sa ya na phyi ma'i rgyu/ /bu mo bzang mo gcig tu gyur/ /chu klung gang gA'i bye ma la/ /yod de skye ba bstan pa ni/ /nye'u shing ram nye'u zhes bya'o/ /

'gan ta ku le par pa ta/ /gan da pri ya ku ma ha go na sig ha ma kha/ tsher ma yar lta mar lta ba'o/ /de la lha bran tshogs kun gyis/ /bskor zhing mchod pa byed pa yin/ /ston zla tha chung dpyid zla 'bring / /nya yi tshe na btsal bar bya'o/ /btsal ba'i thabs ni 'di ltar

ro/ /byis pa lo drug lo bdun pa/ /khrus byas dar ldan gos bskon nas/ /shar phyogs ngos su kha bltas te/ /lha phyag lan gsum byas nas ni/ /de dag rtsa nas dbyung ba'i sngags/ /tad+ya thA sho hod ga te da re swA hA/ phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi mchog khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal

bdud rtsi las 'byung ba/ /stobs dang gzi brjid 'phel mdzad ma/ /rang 'byung ston pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang gyur cig /khu ba ra sa ya ni'i mchog /dngos grub mchog tu nye ba khyod/ /tshe dang stobs ni bdag stsol cig /ye shes thams cad

gsal bar mdzod/ /shun lpags dang ni rgyud pa bsal/ /tho to bsnyil te slar la sba'o/ /snying po brdungs la khu ba yang / /ras ni sar pa'i nang du btsir/ /bdag nyid lus kyang khrus byas te/ /dar ldan gos bzangs gyon nas ni/ /sman du bsgrub pa'i 'dzab

la 'jug /bsnyen dang 'dzab bsgom byas nas ni/ /stong ngam 'bum 'am ci nus bzlas/ /bza' ba 'am yang na 'thung ba'i tshe/ /nyug chu ba'i 'o ma btung / /yang na phye ma mchog tu bgam/ /bza' zhing btung ba'i sngags 'di'o/ /na ma dza ra a ga dza tu swA hA/ zhag

gam za ma re re yang / /srang re'i cha nas bskyed de bza'/ /zos pa'i yon tan 'di rnams so/ /lus ngag yid gsum dbang po gsal/ /bdud rtsi 'di dag su 'thung ba/ /ji ltar lha rnams 'chi med ltar/ /klu rnams la ni sman bzhin no/ /shing rnams la ni chu bzhin no/ /

me tog la ni zla ba bzhin/ /lo ni lnga brgya lon bar du/ /bcu drug mdog ni gzhon nu 'dra/ /nad med rtag tu dar la bab/ /stobs kyang glang po che dang 'dra/ /mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'o ma dag dang btung ba'am/ /mar khu 'am sbrang rtsi dag dang btung / /

zhag gcig zos na yon tan bcu/ /zhag bdun zos na yon tan brgya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig zos na ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad 'dis thob par 'gyur/ /bud med stong la khyab par sbyor/ /sa bon mi zad 'bras bu yang / /bu phor 'phel zhing dpa' dang ldan/ /mi rnams kyis ni mi sod do/ /zla

gcig zos na yon tan ni/ /ngo yang zla ba nya ba bzhin/ /gnod sbyin srin pos mi sod do/ /lha rnams kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'phur/ /rdo rje 'gros kyis nam mkhar 'gro/ /rigs 'dzin go 'phang 'dir thob bo/ /'dres pa gang zag mi

yi zas/ /zos na dngos grub mi thob nges zhes lung du bka' stsal to/ /de nas drang srong trag sha na/ /rgyal po shes nyen can zhes bya/ /lha dang drang srong thams cad la/ /mchod sbyin rgya chen byas pa las/ /ma hA de ba lha chen po/ /kun gyi 'jug tu spyan drangs pas/ /lha

chen drag po de khros te/ /lha chen de yi dpral ba las/ /mig gcig lhag par byung ba ste/ /lha dang drang srong thams cad la/ /rlung 'khris bad kan sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin mi la rims nad dag /rlung lha'i lag par bskur nas gtor/ /lha dang drang srong mang pos kyang / /ma shes

ma tshor myos par 'gyur/ /phye ma'i rgyal po 'dab ma 'di/ /sa stengs khyab par skyes pa la/ /drang srong rnams kyang mchod pa byed/ /lug mig me tog chen po 'di/ /ra sa ya na'i rgyal mo ste/ /ba yi 'o ma dag dang bskol/ /rngubs cig 'thungs pas ba spu langs/ /rngubs gnyis

'thungs ba'i yon tan ni/ /rims nad thams cad byang bar byed/ /rngubs gsum 'thungs pa'i yon tan ni/ /mig rtsa dmar zhing mdog kyang gzhon/ /phye ma grib mar bskams pa dang / /ma to la yi khu bar sbyar/ /blud na dgra rnams myos par 'gyur/ /lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /

byin gyi brlab pa'i sngags 'di'o/ /stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /oM so'u gri bA ha na ha na hU~M/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ tse ta ya tse ta ya su gri ba phaT/ bdud rtsi ra sa ya na'i gtso/ /shu dag dang ni ru rta dang / /phye mar byas te su blud pa/ /rgyal po bud med dbang du 'gyur/ /'gri ha 'gro lo ki

dang sbyar/ /dgra la blud na rna ba 'on/ /lug mig grib mar bskams pa dang / /su ti'i 'o mar sbyar ba ni/ /dgra la blud na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lha chen drag pos bskyed pa ni/ /'jam dpal gzhon nus mkhyen pa las/ /lha dang drang srong gzhan mi shes/ /de skad ces bcom ldan 'das

'jam dpal gzhon nus/ mi mjed kyi bdag po lha tshangs pa dang / drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / skal pa bzang po'i mi'i byang chub sems dpa' li tsa bi la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal to/ /de yang tshe phyi ma 'am dus phyi mar mi sdod par/ skal pa bzang po'i 'bras bu

mngon du thob pa dang / 'bras bu tshe 'di nyid la smin to/ /de nas rtsi yi lha mo mchog /ming ni grub pa'i blo gros ma/ /bu mo mu la zhes bya ba/ /de yi sa bon lhung ba ni/ /'dzam gling shing gi nags la skyes/ /rag ta zhes ni 'dir grags pa/ /ra sa ya na'i gtso mo ste/ /rtsa ba rag ta mu

la kha/ /rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu rnams/ /'thun par zad par dmar ba ste/ /'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam/ /gyen du zug pa de brko ba/ /ston zla ra ba'i nya la brko'o/ /srid pa'i na dang nags las skyes/ /khrag gi nyungs ma zhes ni grags/ /rlon pa'i khu ba btsir ba dang / /pad+ma'i rag ta

cha mnyams bsres/ /de dag bsgrub pa'i sngags 'di'o/ /oM na mo ra ga rag ta mu la bu ne swA hA/ 'gro ba dbang byed dam pa yin/ /rtsi yi lha mos bka' stsal to/ /ming gi med du mi rung ngo / /rgyal bu don grub bya ba de/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung ni/ /sha ri ram zhes grags pa

yin/ /de yi sa bon 'phel ba ni/ /'dzam gling sa stengs khyab par skyes/ /ma hA ni le zhes bya ba/ /ming ni tha skar rdo rje yin/ /me tog tha skar gzhon nu ste/ /snye ma zur gsum til gang 'dra/ /rdo rje brag kyang 'joms par nus/ /sha ri ram dang rus pa yi/ /sbyar ba'i 'phrad

kyi dam par rung / /ming gi med du mi rung ngo / /de'i yon tan thams cad kyang / /rus pa sra 'khregs rdo rjer 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang mnyam/ /ra sa ya na'i mchog tu gsungs/ /de nas lha yi dbang po mchog /brgya byin bu yi lag pa ru/ /gnod sbyin rgyal pos

mda' brgyab pa/ /de yi dum bu lag sor yang / /sa stengs khyab par skyes pa ni/ /li rtsi tsi lag dbang po lag /sdong bu yal ga mdzer ba med/ /me tog zur gsum mda' sgro 'dra/ /rtsa ba lag sor lnga pa ste/ /dbyar zla tha chungs nya la brgo/ /bsgrub pos lag

mthil g.yon du gzhag /ra sa ya na thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub blang ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /de tshe med du mi rung ngo / /mang du 'phel 'gyur bsgrub rdzas yin/ /lus la 'byung ba'i dri chen dang / /bsgral ba'i dri chen yungs kar gsum/ /cha mnyams 'thungs na dug rnams thub/ /

'tsho byed dug ni sel ba'i phyir/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /'chi bdag bdud kyang des bcom mo/ /purna zhes bya'i rna ba yang / /srin po purna yi rna ba ste/ /bsgral ba'i rna ba dag dang sbyar/ /rna ba'i mngon shes thob par byed/ /ming gis med du mi rung

ngo / /b+ha hu lug mig me tog dang / /mkha' lding bya yi mig dang sbyar/ /A la bi ga shang shang de'u/ /rma bya ngang pa ko k-i la/ /'di rnams bsgral ba'i mig dang sbyar/ /mig gis mngon shes des thob ste/ /stobs ldan gyi ni mig yin no/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /tsi ta

ka dang snying zho sha /thams cad gnod sbyin snying gi brla/ /bsgral ba'i tsid ta dag dang sbyar/ /mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub thob/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /bud med gong bshad 'dra ba yi/ /klad pa go ro tsa na 'byung / /de ni ban glang rigs can yin/ /bsgral ba'i

klad pa thams cad dang / /thang phal hwa yi rtsa bar sbyar/ /mdangs kyi dngos grub des thob 'gyur/ /ha lce ki ya kha 'bar ma'i/ /lce yin pas na lce dang sbyar/ /dbang ngo lcags kyi dngos grub dang / /spyan ras gzigs kyi dngos grub thob/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /srid pa'i

bdag po tshangs pa'i gtso/ /ming ni mgo btsun phywa zhes bya'o/ /nal gyi bu ni dzi hwi zhes/ /skad ma phyung gi lce zhes bya'o/ /skad phyung ba ni tshangs pa ste/ /skad ma phyung gi grubs par gcad/ /de dang sbyar ba'i 'phrad nu ni/ /me tog rma lo kril kril ste/ /ming ni ba ya sa

ya'o/ /rtsa ba ma hA go na sig /me tog gser gyi mdun zhu can/ /shar phyogs su ni kha lta ba/ /'di'i kun ha lce ki ya ste/ /cha mnyams btags te phye mar bya/ /zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe/ /yi dam lha la mchod bya zhing / /phye ma rgya chang nang du gdab/ /thang cig yud

kyis 'grub pa ste/ /rta mgrin dbang gis dngos grub thob/ /bsgral ba'i lce ni thams cad dang / /sbyar ba 'phrad kyi dam par rung / /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /sna dang gna' ma'i 'bras bur sbyar/ /tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrogs nus 'gyur/ /bsgral ba'i

sna ni thams cad sbyar/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /dung dang 'brug rus gdung dang ni/ /bsgral ba'i rus pa thams cad sbyar/ /lus kyi rdo rje mngon shes thob/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /rgya mtsho dbu' ba 'dus pa'i chu/ /sna tshogs chu dang gangs kyi chu/ /lan tshwa sna

tshogs dri chu rnams/ /bsgral ba'i chu ni thams cad sbyar/ /rdo rje chu yi bdud rtsi ste/ /rtag tu 'gro ba'i don byed nus/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /dgongs pa'i don du sems can mtha' dag la snang ba dang / /nus mthu'i yon tan gyis sems can kun la phan

'dogs par nus so/ /'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad par dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ye shes kyi thugs nas dgongs nas mgur gyi bum par dril te/ ljags kyi dbang po la bkram ste/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ mkhyen rab kyi dang

po 'jam dpal rnon po dang / rdo rje chos la bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sras mchog nye ba dang / tshangs pa dang drang srong dang / lha dang klu dang / mi'i byang chub sems dpa' ba ma la g+hir ti rnams la bka' stsal to/ /bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi

sde las/ sman ra sa yan bsgrub pa'i lung 'bum sde las btus pa/ bam po chen po gnyis pa// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA b+ha ga ba na ma hA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis med kyi rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas

spyod pa bstan te/ lung a nu yo ga pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du bstan te/ lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin dam tshig chen po 'ang bstan/ /las 'di lung gis bsgrub bya na/ /mi spong ba ni dang du blang / /spyod pa dam tshig

bcwa lnga bsrung / /shes pa lnga dang bsrung ba gsum/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bsrungs pas ni/ /rtsa brgyad stong zhes de la bya'o/ /de yang ma hA sa ma ya/ /bzhi po rdzogs na kun tu bzang / /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang / /gnan bzlog drug ni gcig tu'o/ /dang la ga

ni lung bshad de/ /khru tshad bzhi dang ldan pa ni/ /yon tan bcu gcig dang yang ldan/ /bzhin bzangs mig gis dkyus ring ba/ /stod smad phyed la rked pa phra/ /tshigs pa zlum la sor mo ring / /yon tan 'od can bcu gcig lo/ /ye shes rigs can yin par bshad/ /

bcu gsum rdo rje rigs su 'grub/ /bcu drug sngags pas 'grub nges pa'o/ /rin chen rigs mchog yin par bstan/ /nyi shu gcig pa pad+ma'i rigs/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang rta mchog 'grub/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pas ni/ /thogs med byang chub sems kyang 'dren/ /

thams cad las kyi rigs mchog 'grub/ /sum bcu rtsa gcig phan chad kyis/ /sems phebs tshun chad kun du dge'o/ /yid du 'ong ba dam pa yin/ /bder gshegs rigs su 'grub par bshad/ /bde chen 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/ /de dag ma lus gang rnyed pa/ /

lus kyang khrus byas gtsang mar bya'o/ /dri zhim tsan dan go ban dang / /dz+ha ti pa la ku ru tshe/ /ka ko la dang ga bur dang / /a ka ru dang du ruska/ /g+hi hwang glang po'i spos rnams kyis/ /byugs nas rgyan dang phreng ba gdags/ /dar dang ras bal 'jam po dang / /gos rgyan

chas klubs bskon nas ni/ /gser gyi rna cha gdub kor dang / /do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/ /rin chen sna tshogs brgyan du gdags/ /ji bzhin bde ba'i stan dag la/ /g.yon phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang / /bsgrub dang bsgrub chen bya

ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa/ /'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya/ /rdo rje dri chus man Dal byug /sha chen gu gul pog gis bdug /dkyil 'khor de la bskor te bdug /g.yon du de byi bzhag nas ni/ /b+ha ga de nyid byin gyis brlab/ /spyi bor oM dkar

'od ldan pa/ /lce la a~M dmar dam pa bsam/ /snying kar zla dkyil hU~M mthing ka /lte bar swa sngon 'od ldan pa/ /rkang par ha ljang 'od ldan pa/ /pa las pad+ma'i dbyings su yang / /gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bsam/ /nyon mongs lnga rnams sbyang ba dang / /sdug

bsngal lnga ni tshar gcad phyir/ /lag g.yas gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /g.yon pa ro langs chen mo ste/ /de yi kha la khro gnyer ma/ /ral pa gcig ma pad+ma la'o/ /gsang yum lnga dang khro mo bzhi/ /byin gyis brlabs te sngags bzlas pa/ /\u0f00 A~M: hU~M swA hA/

b+ha ga ban ni nyid kyi bka'/ /phyag rgya bzhi ru bdag gyur pas/ /gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas/ /lha yi bdud dam phung po'i bdud/ /nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom/ /phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan/ /mkha' la sems phebs 'phros pa'i tshe/ /byang

chub 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis su med pa'i sar phyin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang / /mtshan mar btags pa thams cad kun/ /bde chen nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /bde chen nyid las gzhan

pa'i chos/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen to/ /phyi nang ma lus snod bcud kyang / /byang chub sems su rnam dag pas/ /skye med ye shes yum gyi dbyings/ /gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po ste/ /yab yum bde ba'i ngang du gsal/ /'di ni snying po byang chub

sems/ /bder gshegs kun gyis bka' stsal to/ /lus kun yongs su 'khyud pa yis/ /rdo rje pad+mar ldan byas nas/ /rang 'byung rnams ni bde mchog sems/ /phul bas myur du grub pa ni/ /oM ra ga pU dza ho/ /dngos grub blang zhing 'di brjod do/ /byang

chub sems kyis dbang bskur te/ /dngos grub bsgrub pa la gzung ngo / /bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi nang nas/ bsgrub pa chen po'i lung dang / gzungs kyi mtshan nyid dang / sbyor ba'i man ngag dang / gA na bsgrub pa'i lung dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi

yon tan dang / a mr-i ta grub pa'i lung ste/ bam po chen po gsum pa// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ sta na ma hA da ra pany+tsa/ bod skad du/ 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'o/ /dpal chen khro rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi phyed dang bas

phyag 'tshal na/ /de nas sta na'i lung bshad de/ /ye nas rgyu nyid dag pa las/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa yis/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu ru gyur/ /khams gsum de dag bsgral ba'i zhing / /A sa ma tsa la d+harma d+ha tu/ swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha~M/ ra~M ya~M kha~M ta tha phaT/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang / /dbang phyug chen po'i bsgral thabs ni/ /'tsho ba'i bdag po'i tshe dang srog /thugs rje'i ngang dang shes rab dang / /thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /'gro ba thams cad sbyong bar

mdzad/ /bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun/ /gnyis med phyag rgyar rol pa yis/ /dus la bab po sa ma ya/ /oM sarba pA pa kar he ha sa si stam/ tra~M ka ru ni hU~M dza dza/ ma tang gi ni rnam shes de/ /nges par gzugs la phab nas ni/ /ta gi zhal ni nub tu bstan/ /

dbang du bsdu ba'i las mdzad kyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlobs/ /khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing / /sta na chen po bya ba'i phyir/ /bder gshegs mang po kun 'dus shing / /byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis/ /nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral to/ /

gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad/ /sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci/ /gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba yis/ /yul las 'das pa'i sgo phye shig zhes brjod de/ /sgo dbye'o/ /ka ta ri ka na pra be sha /g.yon pa'i zhabs kyis ru tra'i gzugs/ /gnas kyi sgo 'di bcad

bzhin du/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su gsol/ /shi ba'i sdug bsngal 'dir byung ngo zhes lha chen po brgyad kyis dus gcig tu tshig de smras so/ /Ta ki brgyad kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dregs pa ma rungs lha chen khyod/ /sems kyi sgo kun da dbye yis/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i

spu gri yis/ /gnas kyi sgo kun des phye nas/ /sems kyis bdag pos gzung bar bya/ /ston pas gsungs pa/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba yin/ /sdig pa'i rkyen gyis bcom pas 'chi/ /bdag kyang dngos por lta bas 'jig /nga yi bstan pa 'di la gzung / /'on kyang 'chi

ba'i sdug bsngal bral/ /gzugs 'dzin rkang lag yul las bzlas/ /pho mo bsnol te mnan pa yang / /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su brkyang / /ta ka'i zhabs ni g.yas pa yis/ /ru tra ling ga'i steng du mnan/ /de ltar ling ga mnan byas

nas/ /thar byed chen po'i 'gying stabs kyis/ /rngom brjid chen pos 'di skad do/ /sa ma ya ke sha tsi ta dz+wa la hU~M phaT/ zhes mnan no/ /ma hA de ba ru tra dza zhes pa dang / khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams/ /rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis/ /'od zer tshul du bsdus

nas ni/ /de dag bdag gis gzugs la gzung / /spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyis/ /sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya'o/ /thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /brod pa can rnams 'ong ba ltar/ /skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu/ /bde bar 'ongs pa legs te 'ongs/ /

rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis/ /rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir/ /bo d+hi tsita ta'i dbyings nyid du/ /khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o/ /chos nyid skye 'gag med pa la/ /bde bar gshegs dang 'gro ba zhes/ /dbyings su gcig pas gnyis su

med/ /kun kyang ngo bo mnyam nyid de/ /thams cad snying po byang chub sems/ /ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig /bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i sku/ /thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad/ /ye nas de ltar de bzhin du/ /sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos/ /bdag dang bdag

gir so sor 'dzin/ /rtag chad mtha' gnyis ma spongs te/ /nor bas btags pa'i phung po lnga/ /log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyu bsags te/ /'khor ba'i rgyud lnga kha brims pas/ /mya ngan mi 'da' yun rings te/ /phung

po khams dang skye mched la/ /'khrul pa'i bag chags bag la nyal/ /bde 'gro'i lam la bsgribs pa'i rnams/ /'khor ba'i lam lnga rgyun gcad phyir/ /ngan song rnam par sbyong pa'o/ /ma tha ma tha sarba pre ta ga ti he tu~M hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba ti ra ya ba te he tu~M` hu~M phaT/

da ha da ha sarba na raka ga ti he tuM hu~M phaT/ de ltar ngan song rnams sbyangs te/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyi sgo gcad phyir/ /ra~M ya~M kha~M zhes brjod la/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te/ /mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur/ /dus la bab pa'i sems can de/ /las la bab pa'i

rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /skal dang ldan pa'i rnam shes de/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye/ /gsung gis sems can mtha' dag grol/ /thugs tshad med

bzhi dang ldan/ /nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /tshe dpag med par dbang bskur nas/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag sgrol/ /yang dag bsgral na bde chen thob/ /mi ldog sa la nges par phyin/ /phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong / /

rgyu drug gnas su mi skye phyir/ /dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag /oM A hU~M swA hA/ 'og min dga' ldan lha yul ru/ /ye shes rlung gis btegs nas ni/ /sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT gyis 'phang / /a nri su tri pri du/ gang yang rung ba'i rnam shes de/ /gsang ba'i dbyings

su hU~M gis bsdu/ /skur bskyed ye shes skur spros te/ /dbyings dang ye shes lhun grub pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams dang / /bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor du/ /rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan pa yis/ /'phags pa'i lam du rlung zhugs nas/ /chos kyi

'khor lo skor zhing gshegs/ /'jig rten lha yi gtso bo dang / /nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang / /sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod/ /stug pos brgyan pa'i sa 'das nas/ /pad+ma spyan gyi sa la bzhag /'chi

ba med pa'i chos sku thob/ /stong gsum ma lus bton pa bas/ /'bum gyi char yang mi phod de/ /rang sems ma bcos ye nas chub/ /skyes bu chen po rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsgral ba 'ba' zhig snying rje'i mchog /de nas ma trang ru tra de bsgral te/ /sngon 'byung ba yi

gleng gzhi dang / /gtan tshigs su dgongs nas/ phyi rabs kyi sngags 'chang rnams yid ches par bya ba dang / dad pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams drang ba'i phyir/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang / ma mo chen mo brgyad dang / rang 'byung gi mchod rten chen po brgyad/ 'di

man chad gtan tshigs dang bcas te bstan to/ /gong du bsgral ba'i bsam rgyud ni 'og nas zhib tu bstan no/ /'di yang bsnor te lung gcus nas bstan no/ /bdud dang dbang phyug gshin rje de/ /thugs rje tshad med bzhis bsgral nas/ /ro yi nyal thags gan

rkyal te/ /'dzam bu'i gling lo'i gling khams su/ /bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni/ /dur khrod chen po brgyad du gyur/ /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/ /lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon brkyang / /mgo dang lus snying yan

lag kun/ /gnas kyi dur khrod chen po brgyad/ /de ni dpal chen bzhugs gnas yin/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /ro yi srungs ma chen mo ni/ /ma mo chen mo brgyad bzhag go/ de yi gnas rten chen por yang / /mchod rten chen po gzi byin

can/ /rang 'byung re re bzhag pa yin/ /de ltar sa gzhi 'di kun yang / /bkra shis ya mtshan thugs rje can/ /chos dang dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas/ /cho 'phrul 'byung bar bka' stsal to/ /de yi lus snying ma ga ta/ /dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal/ /

ma mo chen mo ke'u ri gnas/ /mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i sa'o/ /mchod rten ming ni bde byed rten/ /de yi mgo bo lho phyogs kyi/ /dur khrod chen po bzhag pa ni/ /sing ga yul gyi gling phran yin/ /ma mo chen mo tse'u ri gnas/ /mthong thos rnam pa'i 'phrul

bag can/ /mchod rten ri bo ta la la/ /lag pa g.yas pa shar lho'i mtshams/ /dur khrod chen po bal yul yin/ /ma mo chen mo pu ka si/ /lhag par zas kyi longs spyod che/ /mchod rten kha sho byA g+h+ri kha'o/ /lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams/ /dur khrod

chen po sa la'i yul/ /ma mo chen mo be ta li/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas/ /de ni mthu dang dbang yang che/ /gyad yul chen po'i sa las ni/ /mchod rten ma la sa gan da/ /rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams/ /dur khrod chen po li yi yul/ /ma mo chen

mo tsan Da li/ /lha mo shang ki ni zhes grags/ /chu dang me grub rdzu 'phrul can/ /mchod rten ming ni ge'u to shan/ /rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams/ /dur khrod chen po kha che'i yul/ /ma mo chen mo pra mo ha/ /bde skyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs/ /mchod rten

ming ni ska ni ska/ /pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na/ /dur khrod chen po u rgyan yul/ /ma mo chen mo g+ha sma ri/ /'byor pa'i longs spyod lnga dang ldan/ /dngos grub can yang de na mang / /gzi'i mchod rten chen po ste/ /ming yang d+harma tsa kra'o/ /de yi nang grol

thams cad kun/ /dur khrod chen po za hor yul/ /rgya mtsho'i sgo gling ma ha do/ /lang ga pu rangs srin po'i gnas/ /ma mo chen mo sma sha ni/ /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /srin po srin mo sha za rnams/ /de dag kun la dbang sgyur zhing / /rin chen nor dang

dpag bsam shing / /'byor pa'i yo byad kun dang ldan/ /mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu'o/ /'jig rten kun du bstan pa yi/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad do/ /de ltar sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /de ltar gyur pa'i 'dzam gling du/ /skye shi gnas pa'i yul yin pas/ /phyi rabs sngags kyi sgrub pa pos/ /'jig byed chen po khrag mthung gi/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du/ /bskyed nas byin gyis brlabs pa

ni/ /sngags mchog bdud rtsir bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rgyu dang dam rdzas thams cad ni/ /sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i rgyu dang bzhi/ /dam tshig dam par bsrung ba'i rdzas/ /byin gyi brlab par bya ba'o/ /de nas 'jig byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de/ nges don

cig tu lam rgyud lnga ni 'bras bu chen po lnga yin te/ de dag thams cad 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis dus gcig tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ bdud yag sha ma hA ru tra zhes bya ba zhig /dus der bsgral zhing gnas spar ro/ /de la bdag nyid sku ni smug nag

'bar/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /pradz+nyA ke sha tsi ta dz+wa la hU~M phaT/ ma nu da ra~M to sha phyung / u ma da ram badzra ma hA mang sa/ tra ma kha'i zhes bsgral te/ e h+ye hi ma hA ru tra/ sha tu ma ka ra/ badzra ni hU~M phaT/ ma hA de baM ru tra hU~M dza dzA zhes brjod de/ sta na dang g+ha na chen

por byas/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems su dbang bskur ro/ /de na sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /dur khrod bdag po btul nas ni/ /'khor bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus/ /'jig rten gtso bo lha brgyad dang / /srin mo brgyad dang bu mo brgyad/ /dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa

brgyad kyis/ /'di skad ces ni khas blangs te/ /mgrin gcig tu ni rab smras pa/ /ho rdo rje 'bar ba'i me dpung gis/ /bskal pa bas kyang sreg mdzad pa/ /'jig tshul rngam pa'i khyad par can/ /dbu mang rtsub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing / /phyag mangs 'jig pa'i mtshon

cha bsnams/ /zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang / /'jig rten khams kun spa gong na/ /khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong gis/ /dpa' bo sgeg dang 'jigs su rung / /rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi bar ston/ /'bar ba'i tshogs chen sna tshogs can/ /

khams gsum lha chen thams cad dang / /'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa/ /e ma ho che mchog he ru ka /khro rgyal khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /thugs rje nan tan bdag cag gzung / /gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis na/ /bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying / /dum bu

brgyar ni gtubs 'gyur bgyid/ /de phyir 'bar bas bdag ma gtang / /zhes 'thun par smras so/ /khams gsum thams cad bsgral ba'i zhing / /rgyu drug gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas/ /mi ldog dbyings su yang dag

nyid/ /thig le chen pos dbang bskur te/ /zla gsang dbus na byang chub sems/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med/ /sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag /bde gshegs lnga'i sa bon te/ /rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad/ /phyi rol chen po lnga dag la/ /nang gi

rgyu 'bras ye nas dag /mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid de/ /dmigs su med pas dag pa yin/ /mang sa rin chen 'byung ldan po/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med do/ /snag pa rak+ta mtha' yas thugs/ /skye 'gag med de ye nas dag /don yod

dri chu las grub pa/ /dri med rgyu nas rnam par dag /kun kyang gtsang zhing dri med pas/ /thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga/ /lus pa med pas ye shes dang / /ma bcos ye nas de nyid do/ /de phyir sman chen bcud gyis mchog /bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/ /rtogs

pa'i klung du su 'dris pa/ /mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin/ /bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med/ /'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i rgyu/ /sprul pas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yin/ /rang gi lus la bsdu ba'i phyir/ /sku gsum rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur/ /de phyir bsgrub pa'i rdzas su

gsungs/ /de skad ces sman spyod pa'i lung du bka' stsal to/ /bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung / 'bum sder bzhugs pa'i nang nas/ lung a nu yo ga'i spyod pa bla na med bstan pa ste/ bam po chen po bzhi pa// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ kul pany+tsa bud+d+ha na ma:/

bod skad du/ rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma hA yo ga'i don du bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di bstan to/ /ri ni nyams dga' mdangs bzang ba'i/ /yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /byin brlabs mtshams bcad brtan byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor

'dom gang gru bzhi pa/ /dri sna lnga yis maN+Dal bya'o/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /maN+Dal brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin bri/ /de yi rtse mo brgyad la yang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri/ /de yi dbus su bsam pa yang / /srid gsum b+han+d+ha bzang kong

yug /ye nas ma bcos rang 'byung snod/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag la/ /de yi nang du blugs pa'i sman/ /ye nas rang byung bdud rtsi lnga/ /sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag /dag pa'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi'i dngos/ /stong las sbyar bas ye nas dag /btag dang

btsag dang gzhal ba yi/ /nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du las/ /stong khams khyab par don byas te/ /bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir/ /bka' bzhin bstan pa'i dngos grub blang / /

mu tig dkar po dri med ltar/ /sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya'o/ /'gu ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /gzhung bzhin brtan nas 'phro 'du bya/ /de dbus klu bdag sa bon gyis/ /dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya/ /dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni/ /le lo med pa'i

brtson 'grus kyis/ /bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'du bya'o/ /oM gyis ye shes 'od phyung zhing / /AHyis mes bsregs thal bar 'gyur/ /hU~M gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag /gsal la 'byung 'jug lha ne bos/ /rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung / /'od dang du ba dri dang

sgra/ /lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/ /mang du 'phel na bsgrub rdzas yin/ /de la ya mtshan bskyed mi bya/ /mtshan ma'i rtags dag ma byung na/ /bkang so'i cho ga rgya bskyed cig /spogs thags bskyar la rtsal shugs dbyung / /dam tshig chen po bkang ba'i phyir/ /

bsgrub rdzas rnams kyang bstar nas gzhag /de nas mchod cing dngos grub blang / /slob ma la yang dbang bskur ro/ /bla ma lung ldan des kyang ni/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do/ /gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /dag dang ma dag mi rtog rtog

las 'das/ /snga ma 'das dang da ltar phyis 'byung ba/ /dus gsum gcig la sku bstan phyi bshol med/ /dngos grub sna tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba can/ /su 'dod sbyin gyis da lta 'di la long / /skal par sbrebs dang gti mug mun nag la/ /sprin mthongs nyi

shar khud par dro ba bzhin/ /bdud rtsi rgyal po dbang chen 'di byin pas/ /rig 'dzin rgyal po gtso bo'i go 'phang thob/ /tshe dang skongs dang yid du 'ong / /bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs te/ /nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i/ /yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di

yis thob/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lung 'di las/ /dbang bskur gnang ba gang yin pa/ /'khor rnams kun gyis thob par shog /zhes bka'

stsal to/ /yang 'khor nye ba'i sras mchog dam pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas dbang mnos nas/ yang rig lnga dang rigs rgya mtsho'i gtso bo la lung gi don zhus pa/ rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i don ji ltar blta/ don gyi 'bras bu gang lags zhes gsol pa

las/ kun tu bzang po dang rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za/ /de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/ /klu dang bram ze gtsang ma za/ /de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/ /byol song rtswa mchog za ba yang / /ji srid

'tsho ba'i bar du za/ /de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/ /yang dag don gyi lung 'di nyon/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pas ni/ /chos sku gcig las tha dad pa'i/ /rigs lnga'i kha dog 'di bshad do/ /'di ltar rtogs na grol zhes bshad/ /

rang bzhin ye nas dag pa'i rdzas/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su rab rtogs na/ /gnyis med don gyis zin pa yin/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /dngos dang dngos med rtog pa'i mtshan/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa'i mtshan/ /mkhas pas dbus la gnas

mi 'gyur/ /ye shes sku lnga bstan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems ni dkar bas na/ /dri med dkar bas ye shes sku'o/ /rak+ta chags med dmar bas na/ /chags med rnam dag chos kyi sku'o/ /mang sa yid bzhin rin chen sngo/ /sna tshogs 'byung gnas mnyam nyid sku'o/ /

rin chen gser mdog snang mdzad de/ /mngon 'byung sprul pa chos kyi sku'o/ /dri chu dag byed ljang gu'i mdog / kun du don grub las rab sku'o/ /sku lnga lhun grub bdud rtsi 'di/ /so so'i lus la gnas pa yin/ /dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang / /mangs sems chu 'di rnams kun/ /sems

can rtog pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /gtso ru dang du blang bar bya'o/ /gtsang sme med par kun gyis spyod/ /'di dag grol bar ngas bshad do/ /the tshom med pas dngos grub thob/ /spyod pa'i skyes bu rnal 'byor pas/ /tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur/ /ces bcom ldan 'das

rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /'di yan chad ma hA yo ga'i don gyi lung dang bsgrub thabs bdud rtsi chen po 'bum sde las btus pa'i/ bam po chen po lnga pa// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li na ma: bod skad du/

bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs bstan te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa la zhugs te/ de nas bdud rtsi rgyal po yis/ /bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bstan

te bka' stsal to/ /dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i yul/ /dga' zhing bar chad med pa'i gnas/ /btsal nas nyid kyi dbang du bya'o/ /de nas rang lus bsrung ba'i phyir/ /lag cha phun sum tshogs pa yis/ /bar chad byed pa'i dgra bgegs bzlog /de nas bsgrub pa'i

yo byad rnams/ /'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad rnams/ /bsgrub pa dam rdzas yo byad dang / /rkyen zlog sman gyi yo byad dang / /de ltar phun sum tshogs ldan nas/ /ji bzhin bde bar 'dug nas ni/ /sa gzhi rab tu sbyang byas te/ /tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsam/ /snga dro'i dus nas

dkyil 'khor bya/ /maN Dal 'dom gang pa lnga bri/ /bsgrub pa chen po bya ba'i phyir/ /dri chen dri chu'i brkyang nul bya'o/ /dur khrod thod pa lnga nang du/ /tshil chen me mar re re yang / /me mar sdong bu lnga brgya bya'o/ /me mar lnga brgya gtams nas ni/ /de nas bsgrub pa brtsam bya zhing / /

rdzogs pa'i las ni rnam bzhi bya/ /zhi ba'i tshe na byang du blta'o/ /gA na'i tshe na nub tu blta'o/ /sta na chen po lho ru blta'o/ /rgyas pa'i tshe na shar du blta'o/ /yang na phrin las rnam pa bzhi/ /so so'i phyogs phyogs dag nas blta'o/ /de ltar 'dug stangs bstan nas ni/ /

shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /bsgrub rdzas thams cad bzhag par bya'o/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /me mar lnga brgya smos pa bzhag /nub gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /bsgrub pa yab yum gnas par bya/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rgyu mchog

chen po gzhag par bya/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /bram ze bkra shis gtsang ma'i rigs/ /bkra shis thod pa gzhag par bya'o/ /yang na b+han+d+ha dpal ldan rdzogs/ /zlum zhing 'khyil pa pad+ma 'dra/ /dbus na bu ga gcig yod pa/ /de yi nang du hrI zhes

bri'o/ /de yi nang du blugs pa ni/ /snying po tshim byed bcud kyi mchog /gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga/ /dri zhim bcud ldan thams cad kun/ /'di dag rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir/ /mang po 'dus pa mthu byin che/ /yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar/ /go tsi hwa dang leng

leng hwa/ /'gi'u wang tsi'u hwang rA sa yAn/ /ga pur mu tig lan tshwa rnams/ /'di rnams rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar/ /yang na gtso bo lngar sbyar ba/ /a 'bras rgun 'brum pa na se/ /ger rgya a ru ra dang lnga/ /'di ni nang gi 'bras bu lnga'o/ /sha lnga dag dang sbyar

ba yang / /dbang po lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar/ /de yi phrad du dgos pa yang / /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /gtso bo tsit+ta nyid dang lnga'o/ /shing tog rgun 'brum ka ko la/ /a 'bras pa na bum sha lnga'o/ /dri ni chen po sna lnga dang / /cha yi grangs dang mnyam ste

sbyar/ /nA ga ge sar shing tsha dang / /sug smel gan+d+ha pa tra dang / /kun tu ra dang dri sna lnga'o/ /yang na dri yi rgyal po lnga/ /rgya spos 'dza' ti pha la dang / /ga pur tsan dan li shi lnga'o/ /de bzhin spos lnga'i dam pa yang / /a ka ru dang du ru ska/ /pog dang sbrang rtsi

lce bog dang / /gser dngul zangs lcags g.yu dang lnga/ /bdar ram zhib tu btags te blugs/ /'di dag rab tu mnyam zhing bsog /'di dag sbyar zhing btag pa'i sngags/ /oM a mr-i ta mu sa la/ gra he ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi mchog /

dngos grub 'bras bu nges thob bo/ /'bras bu rnam lnga bsgral ba'i phyir/ /byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /me lce gla gli snying la sogs/ /gsang ba'i brda tshig dag gis ni/ /de dag rab tu sba zhing bsgrub/ /phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag /rgyu mchog chen po khrus

byas nas/ /mngon spyod mngon spyod ya mtshan gyi/ /'jig byed 'jigs byed chen po yi/ /e yi dkyil 'khor sum brtseg gi/ /steng du bzhag nas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dpal chen he ru ka /dur khrod bdag po chen po ni/ /che mchog shin du mi bzad pa/ /dbu mangs

phyag cha rtsub pa bsnams/ /smug nag sku ni 'bar ba can/ /zhal ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/ /phyag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/ /oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka /ra~M dz+wa la hU~M/ gsang ba'i yum yang yab dang 'thun/ /ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu drA a b+hi shiny+tsa hU~M/

zhes yum dbang bskur nas/ gzhan yang rigs dang mthun pa ru/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod par bya'o/ /de yang tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab/ /e h+ye hi ma hA ru tra hU~M phaT/ sarbed a a zhes brjod pas/ tsit+ta drang ngo / /yang nas yang du spar byas te/ /dug

gsum rtsa ba der gcad do/ /rgyu 'bras 'thun zhing sbyar ba yang / /yangs shing rgyud la goms pa dang / /chos sku zhi ba'i ting 'dzin yod/ /yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /nges pa'i don dbang thos par bya'o/ /'byung ba bzhi las skyed pa'i yum/ /tshul bzhi

dag dang ldan pa 'am/ /yang na mtshan bzangs sum bcu ni/ /lus la rdzogs par yod pa la/ /zla gsang dkar dmar rlung dkar lci/ /de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma/ /btsal nas bsgrub pa chen po bya'o/ /'o ma spos chus mgo lus bkru/ /dkyil

'khor nang du gzhag par bya/ /'dzag pa'i dus su sbyar ba yi/ /khrag chen po ni sems dang bcas/ /rA sa yA na'i gtso bor bya'o/ /bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod bstan pa/ /kun byed thams cad za ba yi/ /slob ma dpa' brtul gtsang sgra can/ /skyon drug rnam par spangs pa

yi/ /mi phyed pa ni dgu dang ldan/ /dam tshig thams cad ma nyams shing / /srog lus bu dang chung ma dang / /rin chen sna tshogs 'bul byed pa/ /sring mo shin tu brgyan pa yang / /slob dpon bla ma de la dbul/ /de ltar 'bul ba'i slob ma'i mchog /yud yang

pany+tsa yan chad kyis/ /rab tu 'bru ni gdams pas bya'o/ /thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa 'di/ /rang byung nga yis bstan pa'i phyir/ /re ba med pas blang bar bya/ /ma dag pa ni 'tshams gcad do/ /las kyi gtsor ni bkang ba dang / /sbyang dang 'tshams dang

bsal bar bya'o/ /nyi zla pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /bdag nyid dpa' bo 'bru lnga yis/ /gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya'o/ /dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum/ /ma thob bar du mi gtang zhing / /gtang na bar chad chen po 'gyur/ /gsang sngags bdud rtsi yon

tan 'di/ /sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub dgos na/ /mkhas pas bden pa'i don shes nas/ /don la the tshom ci ste za/ /zhes the tshom bcad la/ dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o/ /a hoH su kha d+harma gA ya ni/ a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hrI: zhes dngos grub blang ngo / /gnas

lnga dag tu bsam pa yang / /spyi gtsug dbus su zla ba ste/ /der ni oM dkar 'od ldan pa/ /'od zer lnga ni 'phros pa las/ /slar 'dus snang mdzad gtso bo ste/ /rtag pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o/ /lce la hri dmar 'od 'phros pas/ /slar 'dus mtha' yas

chos kyi gsung / /mnyam pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa'o/ /snying gar yi ge hU~M mthing ga /'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba'o/ /slar 'dus mi 'khrugs sems pa ste/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /yang na bdud 'dul sa gnon no/ /lte bar yi ge swA ser

po/ /'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba las/ /slar 'dus rin chen dam pa'i gtso/ /phyag rgya yid bzhin sbyin pa'o/ /gsang bar yi ge hA ljang gu/ 'od zer sna lnga 'phro pa las/ /slar 'dus don yod grub pa ste/ /zhi ba'i phyag rgyar mnyam rdzogs pa'o/ /rigs

lnga gtogs pa 'di kun yang / /rang 'byung gi ni dkyil 'khor yin/ /de ltar 'od zer lnga lnga yis/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'phro 'du las/ /khams gsum 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ /slar 'dus sman lnga nyid la bsdu/ /sman nyid phyag rgyar gsal

'bar nas/ /'od zer sna lnga slar 'dus nas/ /phyag mtshan so sor gsal 'gyur te/ /gser gyi 'khor lo zur brgyad las/ /dri chen bdud rtsi zhu ba'o/ /hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'bar nas byang chub sems su zhu/ /swA las rin chen 'od 'bar te/ /ma hA moM sa bdud rtsir

zhu'o/ /hriHlas 'od zer sna tshogs pa'o/ /pad+ma rak+ta thig ler zhu'o/ /hA ljang 'od 'phro sna tshogs pas/ /dag pa'i dri chu bdud rtsir zhu'o/ /de ltar 'phro 'du bya ba yang / /goms pas yang nas yang du bya'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la/ /bsam pa'i yi ge dam pa lnga/ /oM hU~M swA hrIH

A/ rtsa ba'i yi ge lnga po yang / /'od zer 'phro ba snga ma bzhi/ /de nas 'dzab bsgom bzlas pa'i sngags/ /dgu pa 'di ni 'dzab du drang / /oM badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hU~M tha/ de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa brkyang / /mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug /

rdo rje mtshon gang bcas pa dang / /mdzub mo gung mo mthe'u chung brkyang / /sbyar te lag pa'i mthil gyis ni/ /bdud rtsi snod gyi steng du gnon/ /de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab/ /ting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba las/ /bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dra ba yis/ /glal dang lud pas bar mi

gcad/ /de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab/ /badzra a mr-i ta oM A: hU~M hri thA/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga'o/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ ma hA a mr-i ta A be sha hoH/ zhes bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi rgyal pos bka' stsal to/ /bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung las/ 'bras bu chen po

lnga bsgral ba'i lung nges pa dang / de bsgral nas de sman du sbyar ba'i thabs bstan pa'i bdud rtsi chen po sa ma ya 'bum sde las/ bam po chen po drug pa// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta ka la sha sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung / dpal

bdud rtsi bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phan byed mgon la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas bstan te/ /shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi'i ri/ /drang srong chen po'i bsgrub lugs dang / /'phra men ma'i sbyar lugs dang / /rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i yul khams dang / /

shing dang nag kyi lha mo'i gnas/ /ri bor sman ljongs tsan+dan gnas/ /bzhugs pa'i gnas su bsgrub par bya'o/ /dug rnams bdud rtsir sbyar ba'i thabs/ /rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas/ /rA sa yA na la sogs rdzas/ /tshang bar bsogs nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /ri bor nags 'dab chu

ngogs sam/ /brag phug stong pa thibs po 'am/ /bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'i phyir/ /sa gzhi rab tu brtag par bya/ /mnyam zhing snum pa'i sa snag can/ /zug rngo srin brag med pa dang / /tshwa sgos sa dang ba tsha med/ /ma grug ma gas mnyam po la/ /bsgrub pa'i gnas

mchog der bya'o/ /rang 'byung khro bo chen po bcus/ /phyogs mtshams phur pas gtab nas ni/ /gnas dang sa gzhi dag par sbyang / /\u0f00 badzra kI la ya ma hA kro d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ tiSh+Tha

tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da hu~M phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hu~M phaT/ phyogs bcu dag tu mtshams bcad do/ /sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya/ /dri sna lnga dang rak+ta yis/ /byugs pa'i maN+Dal bzang du bya'o/ /bA su ta yis rgyu

phreng gis/ /thig ni bcu drug char yang gdab/ /de la thig le bcu drug gam/ /yang na phyag mtshan bcu drug dgod/ /de'i dbus su bzhag pa'i snod ni/ /thod pa ma gas ma chag pa/ /yang na rus sbal mgo yang rung / /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su gzhag /bdud rtsi sna

grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /btags te thod pa'i nang du dgang / /'khor lo lte ba'i dbus su gzhag /phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rnams su yang / /snod ni bzhi 'am brgyad bzhag la/ /rigs dang kha dog 'thun pa'i dar/ /ban+d+ha lnga yi kha nas dgab/ /yang na bum pa'i mgul

chings bya'o/ /rA sa yA na la sogs rdzas/ /ji snyed 'byor pas ma lus kun/ /dkyil 'khor de la bskor te gzhag /de bzhin dar dkar mthing yol gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor bar rab bskor nas/ /dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir mda' bzhi gzugs/ /me long bzhi dang rat+na bzhi/ /

ral gri bzhi dang phur pa brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor bar bskor te gzhag /ting 'dzin rnam gsum rigs bzhin bsgom/ /rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'bras bu las/ /de nyid byang chub sems su 'gyur/ /'byung lnga yum gyi dkyil 'khor dag /byang chub sems las rims bzhin

skyed/ /ra~M ya~M kha~M su bru~M/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi/ /gzhal yas gsal bar gyur par bsgom/ /dbus su byang chub sems chen po/ /shar du rdo rje dri chen tshe/ /lho ru mAng sa sha sna tshogs/ /nub tu pad+ma rak+ta'i tshogs/ /byang du dri chu sna tshogs te/ /'di rnams

rim bzhin bkod pa la/ /gtso bos sbyor ba tshul bzhin bgyis nas/ me long yu ba can gyi steng du/ byang chub kyi sems blangs te/ dbus kyi snod blangs la/ kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ byang chub sems kyis g.yab cing dbyangs 'di brjod do/ /byang chub sems 'di'i ye

shes rang bzhin te/ /dri med rnam dag char bzhin bab pa las/ /'gro ba kun skyed yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul/ /gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la/ /gnyis med sbyor bas rdo rje'i rigs chen 'grub/ /me long ye shes de nyid yin par bshad zhes brjod de/ dbus kyi ban+d+ha'i nang

du/ shel phor bzhag la/ byang chub sems thams cad dang / gdung dang go ro tsa na la sogs pa kun bsdus la blugs so/ /'gu ya lag gi phyag rgya yis/ /de yi steng du bzhag nas ni/ /sgrub pa po kun kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ byang chub kyi sems kyis g.yab cing / sngags

'di brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM A: hU~M badzra sa twa hU~M/ sarba e shud+d+he/ a mr-i ta su kha ma hA yo ga hU~M/ tsit+ta hu~M oM A: hu~M/ ak+sho b+h+ya: dwe Sha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod nas/ dbus su blugs la gzhag go/ lho phyogs su kha bltas te/ ma hA mAng sa'i snod blangs la 'di

skad brjod do/ /sems can rnams ni gnas la chags/ /nor bas bdag nyid gtsang mar 'dzin/ /don gyis sun ni ma phyung na/ /bsod nams thams cad dang bral ba'i/ /yi dgas skam thag chad pa yang / /bdag lus gtong bar mi phod na/ /lha la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /

lus can rnams la smos ci dgos/ /de bas 'di kun sun dbyung zhing / /rang 'byung bdud rtsi bstan pa'i phyir/ /lhas kyang lha'i bdag nyid bza'/ /mi la sogs pa de bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pas kyang spyad cing bza'/ /'di ltar bdag gzhan mi 'byed pas/ /blang dor med par

grol ba yis/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi don mthong na/ /thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes sku/ /bde gshegs rin chen rigs mchog 'grub/ /oM A: hU~M ma hA mAng sa/ sa ma ya ra ho ha~M/ rata na ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod de/ rin po che'i rigs yab yum spyan drang zhing brgya rtsa

brgyad brjod de/ ma hA mAng sa dang / sha sna tshogs bstabs shing lhor gzhag go/ kha nub phyogs su bltas te/ rak+ta sna tshogs kyi snod blangs la 'di skad brjod do/ /rA ga rak+ta pad+ma 'byung / /smad pa mi gtsang rdzas 'di dag /chags yul bde ba'i gnas yin te/ /pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig

'grub/ /so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes yin zhes brjod cing / nub phyogs kyi snod gyi nang du blugs la bzhag /oM A: hU~M ma hA pad+ma rak+ta mu la/ a mr-i tA b+ha rA ga ra ti/ sa ma ya hu~M su kha hri: zhes brjod de nub phyogs su gzhag go/ kha byang phyogs su bltas te dri chu'i snod blangs

nas 'di skad brjod do/ /kun 'byung zag pa gur gum chu/ /rdo rje dri yi chu yin te/ /chu las ma byung gang yang med/ /las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / /nan tan ye shes mchog kyang 'grub/ /oM A: hU~M a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ badzra ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod de byang phyogs su

gzhag go/ shar gyi snod dang dri chen blangs te 'di skad brjod do/ /smad pa mi gtsang snyigs ma 'di/ /rtog pa de nyid snyigs ma yin/ /tshe mchog 'dzin pa'i bdud rtsi ste/ /gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin pas/ /bde gshegs kun gyi thugs dam nyid/ /gnyis med

sku ru sbyor bas na/ /chos dbyings ye shes dam tshig 'grub/ /oM bai ro tsa na mo ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ ma hA yo ga a ti s+phA ra Na ba lan+ti/ a mr-i tA u tsi tha a d+hi tiSh+Tha oM zhes brjod do/ /de nas bsgrub pa po kun gyis thal mo sbyar te/ dbus kyi snod yum gyis blangs te 'di skad

brjod do/ /ye shes snying po can rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid 'di/ /snying po chos kyi don las 'byung / /byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin/ /smad par bya ba'i rdzas lnga po/ /gcig la yon tan lnga lnga 'am/ /gcig la 'ang yon tan gsum du dbye/ /

dam tshig rtsa ba bcwa lnga yin/ /yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/ /snod bcud dbus su 'dus nas ni/ /bcu drug por yang bstan par bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las/ /sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs su blta'o/ /rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag brgyad/ /

rdzas ni sems dpa' bcu drug ste/ /snod dbyings sems ma bcu drug yin/ /'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug kyang / /rang bzhin mi gnyis dbyings cig pas/ /phyag rgya thig le ldan par bsgom/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan pa/ /dpe byad bzang po brgya bcus brgyan/ /

rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /rgyu yang gsang la 'bras bu 'ang gsang / /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /mdzod ldan dpal gyi phyag rgya dang / /kha 'byed rdo rje phyag rgya ni/ /'khor lo rtsibs kyi dbus su gzhag /bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad/ /mig

dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /mtshan dang rnam shes yul dang bcas/ /'dus la ma byas rdo rje ste/ /dgongs pa 'dus pas rdo rjer bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab sbyar nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /oM A: hu~M sarba bany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra sa twa hU~M zhes brjod de/ bdud

rtsi rnam lnga byin gyis brlab cing bskul lo/ /de nam yang rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong du 'dus shing sbyar ba dang bskul ba'i tshig 'di brjod do/ /de nas yang snod stong par dgun chang dang / sbrang chang dang / rgya chang dang / bu ram chang dang / 'bras chang dang / chang sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod brjod

do/ /'bru rnams la yang chang med de/ /chu la chang gi rang bzhin med/ /mkhas pas 'bru dang chur sbyar na/ /mnyam nyid kyi chang du 'gyur/ /chang byin gyis brlab ba'i sngags/ oM a mr-i ta dza gad pra ba swAhA/ \u0f00 dzi ba swAhA/ sman chang du blugs la/ bkrug pa'i sngags/ mu sa la

mu sa la/ ro mchog go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /mi gtsang ba la'ang gtsang ba med/ /man ngag can gyi grub pa pos/ /mkhas pas gnyis med sbyar bas na/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi don thob 'gyur/ /kro d+hI shwa rI sho d+ha ya sa~M sho d+ha ya/ yang 'o ma sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do/ /

rta dang mi la sogs pa yi/ /ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa la/ /mkhas ldan chen pos rab sbyar na/ /yon tan zho dang mar ltar snang / /de bzhin rdzas rnams bsgyur bas na/ /mnyam nyid yon tan mar ltar 'grub zhes brjod de/ byang chub sems kyi snod du sbreng ngo / /de nas rin po che sna

tshogs bdar zhing 'di skad brjod do/ /dper na gser dang rin chen ltar/ /cig tu bsres dang so sor gnas/ /so sor gnas kyang rang rang gi/ /kha dog mtshan nyid so sor gsal/ /rin chen yon tan de 'dra yang / /bsdus nas yon tan rmad du 'gyur/ /de bas gnyis spras mdzes par

snang / /de bzhin rdzas kyi yon tan yang / /rang gi yon tan rin chen snang / /gnyis med mnyam par sbyar bas na/ /bla med yon tan rmad du 'gyur/ /thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi rA sa yA na sna tshogs bsdus te/ snod stong par chu sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di

brjod do/ /chu rnams sna tshogs tha dad pa/ /rgya mtshor phyin na lan tshwa'i ro/ /de dag thams cad bsdus pa'i dpal/ /rgya mtsho tsam du rlabs che la/ /chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig go/ 'byung ba lnga yi thugs rje las/ /sman dang bdud rtsi rnam lnga po/ /'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad pa/ /thugs rjes

byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /dngos po med las dngos grub blang / /byang chub sems kyi sprin yin pas/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur de skad ces brjod de/ sman lag tu blangs nas/ ngos ngos nas sman che ba'i yon tan brjod do/ /rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa yi/ /rtsa brgyad stong

las sbyar ba'i sman/ /rA sa yA na la sogs rdzas/ /rtsa ba 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud/ /gnyis med bde chen las 'byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/ /sha chen mchod pa rin po che/ /zas mchog tshe'i dri chen po/ /pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje chu ste bdud rtsi mchog /

ga pur shel gyi spos phor bri/ /rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /yon tan 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud/ /rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas/ /rgyud lnga sems can kun sgrol ba'i/ /dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste/ /thams cad rnal 'byor

bdud rtsi che/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir/ /gcig tu dpa' bo ro rnams dang / /gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod zhes brjod de/ de nas shes rab yum rnams

kyis/ sman lag tu bzhag la/ yang bkra shis pa/ don la dam pa 'di brjod do/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ /rnam par mi rtog snang ba las/ /kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mtshar zhes brjod do/ /sman snod bcud chas par lag tu blangs

la/ yum gyi gtso bo la bdud rtsi phul te/ gtso bos blangs te phyag rgya chen por bsgyur zhing bsgom mo/ /de nas bsgrub pa po'i gtso bos dpal chas su zhugs te/ ba yang nyo ba ti dang / ba yang shang gi ra dang / na ra si ra dang / thal chen gyi thig les brgyan te/ sro tsa a~M dza na dang /

dgug cing g.yab pa'i dam rdzas/ mchog ga hasti dang / brta sha ril dang / shun chen gyi 'breng ba 'dre brdab pa'i lcag dang / rkang gi gling bu bud cing ku sha'i glu blang / mchog gi tshar ma dang / shun chen gyi g.yang gzhi bting la/ gu gul gyi mgo ma yeng gis bskus la

rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas te/ mtshon re re'i steng du ta krid brgyad gzhag go/ byA g+h+ra tshar ma'i g.yang bzhi ta kis gyon la/ mdung la ba dan phyar nas thogs te/ dkyil 'khor yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad/ dbus su zla gam dmar po gcig bris nas/ de'i steng du sman

spungs la/ sgrub pa po yab yum yang sbyor ba tshul bzhin du bgyi/ lha mo bcu drug gi bsnyen pa brgya rtsa brgyad yan chad gdon no/ /de nas byin gdab cing / dbab pa'i phyag rgya yang bya'o/ /g.yab mo'i brda la sogs te brda sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi rdo rje badzra sha rI ra~M la sogs

pa dang / yang na mchog gi lag pa g.yon gyis/ sman dgug cing g.yab cing / mkhar gzhong gi nang du bsres te btsags la sman ban+d+ha'i nang du blugs la/ rdo rjes dkrug cing glu dang gar dang rnga dang / dam pa'i tshig gis bstod do/ /spos kyis bdug cing gar gyi bro thags

dang / rdo rje 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor du/ bdud rtsi dbus su bzhag la bskor ro/ /de nas ngos ngos nas kyang che ba'i yon tan brjod do/ /yang zhi ba'i lha'i dkyil 'khor yang / rigs so so'i yig 'bru kun sman la gtim zhing 'di brjod do/ /oM a mr-i ta sarba ma hA yo ga hU~M/

oM badzra sarba sa ma ya hu~M/ oM ma hA sarba a mr-i ta ma hA su kha hrI:/ oM sarba e shud+he/ kro d+hI shwa ri/ sarba sho d+ha ya/ oM A: hu~M badzrA a mr-i ta hu~M hrI: tha zhes rab tu yang bzlas so/ /de nas hom dang sbyin sreg dang / me'i phud kyang nang du blugs so/ /de nas sems sbyang ba'i

sman/ leng leng hwa dang / shel ga pur dang / snying zho sha dang / mkhal ma zho sha dang / sla gor zho sha dang / shu dag ku be ra dang / shu dag pra me dang / shu dag nab se dang / rA sa yA na dang / rA sa yA na ta na dza ya dang / khrus mkhan ut+pa la'i thig les brgyan la/ gdod sman

bsre zhing sbyar nas/ dkrugs la ban dar stsal te/ ban da gnyis kha sbyar la/ dar gyis bcings la/ mtshams su rgyas btab la/ bzod dkyil 'khor zla gam gyi dbus su gzhag go/ sngags dgu pa 'dzab du drang ngo / /'di mgo mjug tu tshogs kyi mchod pa bar

mi gcad/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'phro 'du yang bya/ sman bsgrub pa'i don dang / sbyar thabs bstan pa'i lung dang / las kyi rim pa'i skul tshig dang / yo byad du byas pa'i rnams pa bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las/ bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung gi bam po bdud rtsi

'bum sde las 'byung ba'i don/ bam bo chen po bdun pa// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn many+dzu shrI tIk+Sh+Na na ma: sid+d+ha~M/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rnon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal nyid sku rdo rje lta bu byang chub kyi

dgongs pa nyid la bzhugs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun tu bzang po ni/ dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i/ yum gyi tshal chen po na dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings zhi ba chen po la bzhugs so/ /rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyang / gsang ba'i yum

bzhi dang / 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / sems ma'i tshogs/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na/ sras mchog dam pa nye ba'i 'khor/ rigs kyi rgyal po ma lus pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / li tsa bi

la sogs pa'i mi rnams kun la dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus bskyed/ /the tshom med na nges par 'grub/ /bdud rtsi chen po rnam lnga 'di/ /spyad cing bcangs ba'i yon tan dang / /rang bzhin dang ni ngo bo dang / /mthu dang byin gyis

brlabs kyis 'grub/ /mi brjed rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin/ /nges par bsgrubs pa'i yon tan ni/ /nges pa'i man ngag gsum du bstan zhes bka' stsal/ nas/ sdud pa po chos kyi don/ 'jam dpal rnon po la gtad do/ /de nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis/ rdo rje dbyings

kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la 'di skad brjod do/ /e ma ho: sangs rgyas kun tu bzang / /gsang chen thig le nyid la rdzogs/ /ma rig mun sel ye shes sgron/ /dpa' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /rang 'byung dri med bdud rtsi 'di/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyis sngags pa'i mchog /mi shes dri ma kun bcom nas/ /nges pa'i dbyings la 'god mdzad pa/ /gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /snang mdzad rdo rje rgyal spyan dang / /mi bskyod nyi ma snang mtha' yas/ /don yod bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la/ /dgyes shing gus

pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyings phyug yum gyi tshogs rnams la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dud phyag 'tshal/ /lag na rdo rje rgyal po dang / /kun bzang blo gros chen po dang / /don rab sa snying la sogs la/ /rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i 'jig rten dbang

po dang / /'gro ba 'dzin mchog dam pa la/ /gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag la rang bzhin dri med sku/ /tshul bzhin phreng ba dbyangs dang gar/ /spyod mchog dga' sdug phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdug pa me tog mar me ho/ /gzugs mchog mnyes mdzad lha mo la/ /mos

pas 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs byed tshogs kyi bdag po mchog /rdo rje srin po 'dul mdzad pa/ /khro rgyal yab yum 'khor bcas la/ /gus pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams kyis legs so legs so/ /a la la ho:

zhes brjod nas gnang ngo / /de nas dbang byin te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la/ mkhyen rabs dang pos kun gyi mchod pa chen po mdzad do/ /de yang nyid kyis nyid la mchod de/ 'di man chad ye shes kyi

lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi chen por thim nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la mi snang bar byas nas/ ma hA su kha la sbas te bzhugs pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis

'phags pa 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen rab kyi dang po khyod la/ da nged kyi chos 'di bsdus te bshad do/ /'jam dpal rdo rje chos 'di lta ste/ /e ma ho: gsang ba las byung ba'i/ /ma rig mun sel sgron me'i mchog /dpa' bo khyod la skyabs

su mchi'o/ /nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus byos/ /zhes pa dang / 'jam dpal bdud rtsi 'di'i chos kyi don ni/ dper na me dang 'dra ste/ chung ste rdul tsam nas che ste srid pa'i ri bo yang sreg go/ de bzhin du bdud rtsi 'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po ni 'dzam

bu gling du thog ma nyid du ri'i rgyal po chen po brgyad la snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu ri bo che rnams la snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu ri nag po rnams la snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu gangs ri mthon po rnams la snang bar

byed do/ /de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu gling 'dir sa phyogs dma' ba rnams la snang bar byed do/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po de la/ blang dor med de mi rtog mi sems so/ /rnam par yang mi rtog mi sems so/ /rdo rje chos dang 'jam dpal nyi ma'i 'od rnams ni/ dbri bskol med do/ /

de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa la yang / de dang 'dra ste dbri bskol med do/ /phye ba dang bskyed pa dang / bskyungs ba yang med do/ /de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi 'di yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings su bstan pa yin pa'i phyir/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di

dbu las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan zhes smos pa yin no/ /de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen po'i lung 'di yang ma skyes mi 'gag mi rtog pas/ mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa dang / mi gnas pa la rnam par khyab ste gnas so/ /de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen po 'di

yang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar kun la khyab par gnas te/ skal ldan rigs lngas 'byung ba lnga la khyab cing / 'byung ba lnga nyid rigs kyi yum lnga'i tshal chen po ste/ yum lnga dang yab lnga yang gdod nas dag ste/ nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du shar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la khyab bo/ /de nas srid pa'i 'jig rten du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang klu rnams la khyab po/ /de nas mi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams

dang / rim pas nam mkha'i nyi ma bzhin khyab cing shar ba ste/ thugs rje'i bdud rtsi 'di yang srid pa gsum du nyi ma bzhin du shar bar bya ste/ 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phra rab snyed la/ bsam gyis mi

khyab pa'i lus phul bas ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di lus la bcangs pa bsod nams che'o/ /'jam dpal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba bas ni/ bdud rtsi 'di lus kyi mgul du btags pa 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/ /'jam dpal bskal

pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams la spyi bos bkur zhing phyag bya ba'i don ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di spyi bo la bskur ba'i yon tan ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad bkur ba yin no/ /'jam dpal bskal pa stong gi bar du sems can gyi don bya ba bas ni/

bdud rtsi chen po 'dis lan cig gis 'gro ba'i don byas pas/ dmyal khams brgyad kyi 'jig rten yang thar pa'i lam du 'dren pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin ni/ /kha dog

dbyibs dang mtshan ma med/ /'gog pa med cing dbye ba 'ang med/ /rtsa ba med cing rten pa 'ang med/ /bdud rtsi che la brjod pa 'ang med/ /nyon mongs dug dang bdud bzhi bcom/ /dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems/ /nges don de la 'dud par byos/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang

dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i lung 'di la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis slar la lan gsum du bstod pa/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te/ /mtshan nyid med pas nam mkha' 'dra'o/ /bya ba med pas grol ba ste/ /bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu zla bzhin du

dri bral bas/ /thams cad rtog pa yongs su spangs/ /bdag tu 'dzin med rnam par dag /bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam/ /bdud dang ngan song gsum las thar/ /len pa med cing gtong ba 'ang med/ /dri med dag pa'i byang chub

sems/ /bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas skyed pa'i rgyu/ /khams gsum sems can 'dren pa'i dpal/ /'gro ba drug gi sgrib sbyong ba/ /bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol nas/ phyi nang gi snod bcud ril sman rA sa

yA na dang / bdud rtsir gnas so zhes lung dang man ngag dag du bsdus te bka' stsal pa'o/ /bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung / lung gi rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i mchog las 'khor lo bskor ba'i nang nas lung gi bam po chen po brgyad pa'i 'grel pa chen po'i don/ bam po chen po brgyad

pa/ rdzogs s+ho/ //spyir bdud rtsi 'bum sde las myur shas tsam cig bi ma la mi tras bshad cing / lo ts+tsha ba dz+nyA na ku ma ras sgyur ba'o/ /rdo rje yang dbang gter gyi lags/ rdzogs s+ho// //rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod/ /mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang / /nam

mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar/ /srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang / /snying gi sgo ru bsgom par bya/ /snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni/ /gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te/ /phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas/ /rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom/ /oM badzra ki li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/

rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin rnams/ /srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig /srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha/ /ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ /ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las/ /'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa/ /sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur cig /thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don

du/ /byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba/ /sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas/ /dbang dang byin brlabs 'dir gsol cig /oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po hU~M kA ra dang / yum rdo rje sgra 'byin ma/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma phag gi mgo can dang /

smigs bu'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje rnam snyems ma/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma stag gi mgo can dang / bya rgod kyi mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+DaHhU~M/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po dang /

yum rdo rje sder mo/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma g.yag gi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed po dang / yum dur khrod kyi bdag mo/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma sha ba'i mgo can dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can no/ /

oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon po dang / yum rdo rje gtun khung ma/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma gzig gi mgo can dang / khwa'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M/ hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang / yum rdo rje gtum mo/

sprul pa'i 'phra men ma byi la'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hU~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / yum rdo rje mda' snyems ma/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma spyang ku'i mgo can dang / khra'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra

kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN Da li hU~M/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / yum rdo rje rlung 'byin ma/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma seng ge'i mgo can dang / pha wang gi mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par

rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje gsod chen ma/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang / zer mo'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ khro bo stobs po che dang / yum rdo rje bskyod chen ma/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang / byi ba'i mgo can

la sogs pa rnams kyis gtams pa'o/ /srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang / /dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir/ /ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol/ /khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang / /rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang / /kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol/ /

dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab/ /sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab/ /phyag gnyan chen mo'i dus la bab/ /shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab/ /bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab/ /khyed kyi phrin las dus la bab/ /sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab/ /mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab/ /

byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing / /dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa/ /rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni/ /gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs/ /bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams/ /khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas/ /mngon spyod

tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang / /lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang / /sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod/ /oM lA~M hU~M lA~M/ sta~M b+ha ya nan/ mo ha ga ya b+ha ga bAn/ shi kri bi kri/ shrI badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ dza: hU~M ba~M ho:/ sarba big+h+nAn/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya

hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M phaT/ hU~M kA ra hU~M AHdngos grub bar chad byed ba'i bgegs/ /gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams/ /zung cig rgyob cig rnam par chings/ /gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis/ /rings bar khug la smrar chug cig /phob cig rnam par gzir bar

gyis/ /nga'i dbang du gyur nas kyang / /bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis/ /hU~M pa ra bi d+h+wan hU~M phaT/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ ha sa ya/ ra na ha ta na hU~M phaT/ shri kri na a na ya hU~M phaT/

dz+wa lA pa ya dz+wa lA ba ya hU~M phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ bid+d+ha ya bid+d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs/ /khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab/ /sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i/ /mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod/ /ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/

ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang+ka te ya/ dza ya bi dza ye ya/ a dzi te a pa rA dzi ta ya/ ma ra sai n+ya~M pra marda nA ya hU~M phaT/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni/ /sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa/ /stobs chen khro bo chen po yis/ /glad pa

tshal ba brgya ru khos/ /nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs/ /nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed/ /hU~M ma ma ba shi ku ru/ ma tha ma/ ny+ya ka ra/ i nan dasti/ ma ma karma shri krang ka re ya/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi/ /lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung / /nga la bar chad

byed pa rnams/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos/ /sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/ tad thA ya tad thA ya hU~M phaT/ brdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun/ /bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams/ /rdo rje me dbal snying sregs nas/ /lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du lhogs/ /khro bo 'bar ba'i

gtun khung du/ /rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas/ /lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya/ /kha tham/ kha tham/ kha tham/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA hi/ khA hi/ khA hi/ hi hi hi/ ha ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi byin gyi

brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o/ /a b+hi tsAr+ya'i dus la bab pa'i brnag pa de kho na la'o/ /kI li kI la ya nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ bcwa brgyad/ dkar nag gi mtshams su'o/ /hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ tsam bzlas so/ /rdzogs s+ho// // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ DA ki nI ag+ni

dzi hwa dz+wa lA tan+t+ra~M/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud/ srid gsum 'jigs byed drag po rdo rje'i sku/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal gyur snying rje can/ /bdud las rnam rgyal ye shes lnga dang ldan/ /phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa

dus gcig na/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo gshin rje 'bar ba'i pho brang / gnod sbyin ut+pa la'i gdong gnas pa'i dur khrod/ srin po ma tang+ka ru tra ka'i 'chags/ bdud gtsug phud nag po'i khang pa/ rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa'i gnas/ 'byung

po dge ba kha T+wA~M ga'i shing nag po ti sha ka skye sa/ srin mo kang+kA la zangs kyi gshog pa me ltar 'bar ba'i zhing khams mi ro gsar rnying mang po yod pa/ nam mkha' las tri sh+'u la/ 'khor lo dang lce 'bab pa/ sa gzhi las ral gri dang / spu gri dang mdung rtse lnga pa skyes pa/ ri bo thams

cad keng rus su snang ba/ chu klung thams cad rnag khrag tu 'bab pa/ sa phyogs thams cad ni mi ro ut+pa la sngon po yi dri mnam pa/ nye 'khor na rngam pa dang / ngu ba'i nga ro rab tu 'jigs pa drag ste/ shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu skyi g.ya' ba'i gnas de na/ bcom ldan 'das

dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi bdag po/ thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang phyug /sku dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin/ drag po chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje snying rje chen po gtum zhing khro ba/ lus bskal ba'i me chen po ltar 'bar ba/ srid pa gsum dang /

bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa brgyad khri dang / sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas stong rtsa brgyad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes las grub pa/ lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis mchod cing phyag byas pa/ nyi ma stong gi gzi dang ldan pa/ dbu skra

kham pa gyen la rdzes pa/ spyan sdang mig me ltar 'bar ba/ shangs kyi rlung sgrom nas bskal pa'i rlung 'byung ba/ zhal gyi mche ba rdo rje zla tshes su gtsigs pa/ rin po che marka ta'i dbu brgyan pa/ rigs lnga'i rgyal ba mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa/ thod pa skam rlon gyi dbu brgyan dang

mgur chu can/ mchog dang glang gi ko bas brgyan pa/ lag na ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis thod du bcings pa/ klu tak+Sha kas rked cings byas pa/ klu kun nas gdugs dang / sog ma med kyis gdan khri byas te/ khro bo chen po'i cha byad du

byas nas bzhugs so/ /de'i 'khor ni tshangs pa dang / 'jug sred dang / brgya byin dang / ma hA kA li dang / drang srong me bzhi 'jug dang / thang la gnas dang / gshin rje rtel pa nag po dang / srin po rA ma Na dang / chu'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / gnod sbyin chen po

ku be ra dang / 'byung po dbang ldan dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / sa bdag lag chen dang / ma mo nag mo ral gcig ma dang / lto 'phye rab brtan dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung po

pho mo dang / gcan zan gyi tshogs ni seng ge dang / stag dang / khra dang / spyang ki dang / dom dang / chu srin dang / gung dang / gzig dang / lce spyang dang / sre mo dang / khyi li 'du dang / 'phar ba dang / sram dang / bya'i tshogs kyang bya rgod dang / chu glag dang / dur bya kAng+ka dang / gzhad dang /

khyung dang / bya rog dang / so bya dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / skye ga dang / srin bya dang / shang shang te'u dang / ne tso yang yod do/ /gzhan yang glang po dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrul gdug pa can dang / ru sbal dang / rnga mo dang / bse dang / phag rgod dang / ba men dang / khyi snya dang / sha ba

dang / gla ba la sogs pas bskor te bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de rnams kyi nang nas glang po che rab tu brtan pa gtsug na gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa/ mgo bo sum bcu rtsa gsum yod pa'i steng na/ nye dbang sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang

po brgya byin zhes bya ba/ spyi bo'i gtsug na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba/ lus la gser dang / bai DUr+yas brgyan pa/ des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad du byas nas/ glang po che'i stan las langs te/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ rgyal srid rin po che sna

bdun gyis mchod pa byas so/ /de nas brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang dbang po/ /yid bzhin nor bu rab 'dra zhing / /dngos grub tshogs la mnga' brnyes khyod/ /snying rje bdag po yin pas na/ /ma 'ongs sems can skal ldan gyi/ /rdo rje mkha'

'gro go 'phangs mchog /nag mo me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud/ /bdag ni khyod la dri bar 'tshal/ /deng 'dir ston pas skabs 'byed zhu/ /zhes gsol pa dang / dpal hU~M mdzad chen po des me 'bar ba'i gdan las bzhengs te/ rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas/ brgya byin la seng ge'i lta stangs kyis gzigs/ nas/ glang po che 'gying bag tu gom pa gsum bor te/ hU~M hU~M hU~M gi sngags bzlas te/ ye shes kyi phyag gis rdo rje lan gsum nam mkha' la dril te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /

de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /snying rje'i yid kyis brgya byin nyon/ /skal ldan dus mtha'i sems can rnams/ /mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro me lce'i rgyud/ /bdag gzhan don la 'jigs med pa/ /ngas bshad

khyod kyi yid kyis gzung ces bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor shin tu dga' ba dang / spro ba skyes nas/ la las ni me tog man+dA ra ba dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / tsam pa ka dang / bu ram dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang /

byug pa dang / kha zas dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / bsil yab dang / bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / phan la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pas mchod do/ /'khor la las ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa nang gi mchod pas mchod do/ /'khor

la las lha mo dang gnod sbyin mo'i cha byad du byas nas gsang ba'i mchod pas phul lo/ /de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khro chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /drag po hU~M mdzad rdo rje 'dzin/ /da ltar 'dod pa'i

khams 'di na/ /lha mo nag mo zhes bya ba/ /gtum zhing khro la lus kyang 'jigs/ /srid gsum skrag pa'i nus mthu can/ /dngos grub dam pa'i gzhir gyur 'di/ /dang po gleng gzhi rgyu'i rgyud/ /slob dpon slob ma gang gi rgyud/ /don dam kun rdzob lta ba'i rgyud/ /

dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum gyi rgyud/ /thang ka lha rten sku gzugs rgyud/ /dpon dang g.yog ni dam rdzas rgyud/ /bskyed dang rdzogs ni ting 'dzin rgyud/ /rje dang khol gyi sngags kyi rgyud/ /bca' ba phyag rgya bcu gnyis rgyud/ /mchod pa gtor ma sbyin sreg rgyud/ /'da'

bar dka' ba dam tshig rgyud/ /grub pa'i drod tshad mtshan ma'i rgyud/ /spogs dang gnad la dbab pa'i rgyud/ /mi 'bral 'grogs pa gzungs kyi rgyud/ /pra dang mtshan ma dbab pa'i rgyud/ /dbang bskur gnang ba sbyin pa'i rgyud/ /so so las kyi bye brag rgyud/ /mar me

dang ni bdud rtsi rgyud/ /thig le ye shes man ngag rgyud/ /lha srin sde brgyad bstod pa'i rgyud/ /'khor la yongs su gtad pa'i rgyud/ /tha ma lung du bstan pa'i rgyud/ /dgos 'brel nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang / /ston pas bka' stsol bdag nyan 'tshal/ /de skad

ces gsol pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rje bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin la sogs pa khyed rnams kyis/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud chen po zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so/ /khyed kyang rab tu nyon la yid la bzung cig /des rnam par phye ba

bstan par bya'o/ /sngon 'dod pa'i khams 'di nyid na/ ri rab kyi rtse byang shar gyi mtshams/ shing yongs 'du sa rtol zhes bya ba/ rtse mo na bya khyung ga ru Da gnas pa/ lo ma la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rang 'byung ba/ 'bras bu la rin po che sna bdun lo tog ltar smin pa/ /

yal gi rtse g.yu'i ze ba'i bar bar na/ lha dang lha mo dang / gza' dang skar ma dang / nyi ma dang zla ba'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rtsa ba'i ngos la khrus kyi rdzing bu bdun la/ re re la shing rta re re/ shing rta re re la bu mo bdun bdun bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog

mo re re la rma bya bdun bdun yodo shing rta de'i sa phyogs na/ sman gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lo tog gi rigs khri phrag bzhi rang skye ba tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / go shIR+Sha dang / sbrul gyi snying po rdzing bu lnga brgyas bskor te/ de lta bu'i shing de thun mong gi bsod nams kyis skyes

so/ /de'i dus la 'dod pa'i shing de ni lha rnams kyis dbang byed pa'i tshe/ ri rab kyi rtsa ba na 'od mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i gnas na/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sum brtsegs dang / thag zangs ris dang / he ran+na ke shun dang / rnam par snang byed dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs

pa bye ba dung phyur tsam/ shin tu mi sdug pa'i cha byad du byas nas/ rab tu rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mtshon cha thog nas/ ri rab kyi kha chos bzangs zhes bya bar lhags so/ /de nas ri rab kyi kha la lha ba su de ba dang / lha ma hA de ba dang / brgya byin nyid
