phag khrag dang / /rims nad khrag dang gu gul dang / /tsher ma dgu dang mche sder dgu/ /klu yi chu dang btsan dug dang / /rdar gri 'bum tri nang du stsal/ /yungs kar dag la thun sngags 'di/ /bdun khri bzlas la khrag gi nang du blug /ru ru tsa dug a

shug me ba ti ru tra kha shal mo/ che ge mo a mu ka rak+ta tsa ra nan/ mA ra ya mA ra ya ru ti ra~M/ A kaR+Sha ya a hU~M phaT/ de skad khrag la sngags bzlas la/ /ma mo las la bskul sngags gdab/ /de nas khrag gi zor mda' de/ /ro bkris dag gi

'ur rdor stsal/ /nam phyed dgra la 'phang bar bya'o/ /des ni gang la bya ba 'chi/ /tsa ra nag mo'i sgong thun ni/ /bya mo nag mo'i sgong nga yi/ /spyi bo brtol ba'i sgong stong du/ /rims kyi khrag dang btsan dug stsal/ /yungs kar thal chen mtshon dpal la/ /

srog gi snying po 'bum du bzlas/ /tha mar sgong thun gdab sngags bzlas/ /kha mun tra ba tra ba trag sha rag mo te kem dza: dzAH/ kha rag te kem b+h+yo b+h+yo: de nas sgo nga kha bcad la/ /hasta lag par bcug la 'phang / /mkhar la brgyab kyang 'jig par nus/ /

dgra la 'phang na the tshom med/ /byi sha nag mo'i dug thun ni/ /ma he'i rwa 'am ba men du/ /mda' dug btsan dug lo dug dang / /rims nad khrag dang chang blugs la/ /rwa ru nang nyid khar bcug la/ /dang la mkha' 'gro'i snying po dang / /las la

bskul sngags ming dang bcas/ /de nas dug gi dbal sngags bzlas/ /hU~M re ma ti ma ma ru lu rag Sha b+h+yo/ re ma ti byi shi ma ya sta yag sha kro d+ha che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ rwa rtse phra mo bcad par ni/ /dug gi khu ba mi mgos gtis/ /mi

mgo dug gis khengs tsam na/ /ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas bsregs la/ /khram bam phyag rgya bcas la ni/ /nam phyed khros te dgra la 'phang / /the tshom med par dgra brlag go/ tsit+ta nag mo'i snying thun ni/ /spyang gi stag dang sre mong snying / /khyi dang

'ug pa wa yi snying / /pho rog khrag dang sbrul gyi snying / /thod pa'i nang du stsal la ni/ /dang po ma mo dpon g.yog gi/ /gnad la bskul ba'i sngags bzlas shing / /ma mo bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsreg /de nas snying gi thun sngags ni/ /trag

rag sha tsi ta dung ro ta ma ta sma ra ra ta b+h+yo/ /de skad bzlas pa'i snying thun des/ /grong la brgyab kyang phung bar byed/ /nag mo 'bar ba'i thun drug 'dis/ /mkhar la brgyab kyang 'jig pa la/ /g.yul ngo chen por brgyab kyang zlogs/ /gzhan gyi

byad dang sngags kyang zlogs/ /dgra dang bgegs la the tshom med/ /yang ni bshad kyis brgya byin nyon/ /bstan pa gnyan po'i sku dgra la/ /ltas ngan bya nag dbab pa ste/ /dang po bya nag bzung byas la/ /bcu gnyis dbang gi rim pa bskur/ /

de nas bya la ma mo dbab/ /bya de mig rtsa rgod pa dang / /skad 'byin gshog pa gdeng ba na/ /ma mo phebs pa'i rtags yin pas/ /phyi dang nang gi mchod pa bya/ /phyag rgya dgu ni rab bstan la/ /dbang bskur dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /de nas ma mo

bskul sngags bzlas/ /las la bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsreg /sngags 'dis bya de spar la gtang / /oM k+Sha rag sha tsi ta kha rag ma tsit+ta tung tung dza sha yu ta ti b+h+yo/ re ma ti rAk+Sha si ru lu ru lu pra ma ma hA sti pra dung b+h+yo/ kar ma sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes

gtad do/ /des ni bya nag gang du smos par 'gro'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i las kyi rgyud las las so so ma mo'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyag na

rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye rig sngags gsang sngags bdag po gsang dbang po/ /phyag na rdo rje thig le bstan pa bsrung ba yi don du/ /bdud rtsi 'chang bzhin mar me gsod pa yi/ /skyes bu chen po mnga' bdag bshad du gsol/ /

zhes zhus pa la/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ lnga brgya tha ma me ltar 'bar ba'i tshe/ /nyams pa bsod pa'i sbyor ba bshad kyis nyon/ /dang po mkha' 'gro me lce bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /skabs su gsad pa'i las

la 'jug pa ni/ /dang la mtshan ma phebs pa'i bsnyen pa bya/ /gtor ma sbyin bsreg sti ras bu tsa bya/ /kham sa rkang rjes dri chu skra shad la/ /gang la bya ba'i snying gar ming / /dug dang bdud rtsi'i gtor ma'i nang du stsal/ /de nas ma mo zhag bdun gdab cing bstab/ /

bskul ba gnad la gdab pa'i dam rdzas bsreg /gnad la dbab cing las la bskul sngags bzlas/ /ting 'dzin khrag 'thung bdud mo'i bar du ni/ /snying gi 'od zer dag gis drangs byas te/ /bdud rtsi drangs pa'i sbyor ba ston pa ni/ /gsal ba dngos grub

spyi ste log pa yis/ /gsang sbugs bdud rtsi bdud mo'i zhal du drang / /thugs kyi dkar dmar pad ma'i sbu gur spro/ /bdag gi sbubs na thugs kyi dpal be'u rgyas/ /de nas mar me gsad pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ /bzhis bsdus dbus nas nri las 'od

'bar ba/ /bdag nyid bdud mo'i rang bzhin gsal ba la/ /spro ba'i rlung gis mar me gting nas sbar/ /bud pa'i rlung gis mar me khad kyis gsad/ /'dren pa'i rlung gis thig le'i rtse mor drang / /dang pos bkrag shor gnyis pas sum cha nyams/ /

gsum pas phyed la bzhi pas sum gnyis med/ /lnga pas mun khang ltar gyur bdag la gsal/ /mar me bdud rtsi lo grangs du lon thub/ /de nas dgra gzugs 'gu ling nag por gzhug /hom khung nang du rtsang nang phur bus bskor/ /nag mo ro

zan kha la me 'bar ma/ /ma bdud rgyal po lhag pa'i snying rje can/ /khrag 'thung re ma ti'i dmod pa ni/ /trag rag sha re ma ti'i hU~M a mu ka sri kram ma ra na ya ma rag mo ar+ya tsa tsa thi gi ma kha la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rag mo ti ki ma dza: dza:/

kha le dun b+h+yo/ /kha rag ti ki ma dza kha le dun b+h+yo/ ma rag thun ma b+h+yo/ che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags de ni khri tsho gnyis su gdab/ /yungs kar thal chen dag la sngags la gdab/ /'gu ling dur khrod snying ba'i gting du mnan/ /gang la bya ba de ni zhag

bdun len/ /mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las mar me bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang / /'khor ba'i rgyun lam

bcad pa dang / /ye shes nus pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ /thig le ye shes man ngag 'di/ /snying rje can gyis bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa'i tshe/ dpal phyag na rdo rje des gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye nas 'dzum pa'i

mdangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ye shes rdo rje thig le ni/ /thun mong ma yin shes par bka'/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis su bshad/ /don dam sems kyi spyod yul lo/ /kun rdzob las kyi phyag rgya dngos/ /rgyal rigs bu mo de la bsten/ /rang rig

rtsal gyis rlung g.yos te/ /rlung gi thig le ye shes me/ /rdo rje gsang bas sa bon bskul/ /rtog med gsang ba'i thig le la/ /mi bskyod mnyam par sems gtad na/ /mar me'i rtse mo lta bur brtan/ /gnas pa'i rtsa yi nam mkha' la/ /srog 'dren thig le

bsgoms pa'i tshe/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/ /bden gnyis byang chub don gsal nas/ /dang ba'i chu la gzugs bsnyan bzhin/ /rgyal ba'i go 'phang rang la 'char/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i rang bzhin grub/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i lha mo'i don/ /mkha'

'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ ye shes kyi thig le bshad pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bgegs kyi gtso bo dbang phyug rje/ /'gro ba thugs rjes

bskyang ba'i phyir/ /bcu drug rdo rje 'phrul gyi rgyud/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs phyi ma'i sems can rnams/ /dad dang spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul bcu drug bshad kyis

nyon/ /dang po lha'i rnal 'byor la/ /drod dang mtshan ma thob par bya/ /de nas 'phrul la 'jug pa ni/ /a nu sa ti'i ri lu sbyar/ /rma bya khrung khrung ne tso sha /nya dang spre'u dang byi la'i sha /rnga mo khwa ta ngang pa'i sha /ne'u le so bya mthing ril sha /de rnams

skams pa'i phye ma dang / /bil ba'i shing dang a ru ra/ /shing tsha sug smel rus sbal rus/ /ka ka ru dang me khyer srin/ /mi rus dang ni phag rgod khrag /mi rgod skra dang chu glag sgro/ /de rnams bsres la ri lu bya/ /sbrang rgod dag gis mgo

bsdus la/ /dur khrod thod pa'i bra bur gsal/ /phyag na rdo rje'i snying po dang / /ma mo'i srog snying bdun 'bum bzlas/ /bar bar bram ze'i me la bsro/ /de nas sna yi ri lu la/ /'od dang me stag 'phros tsam na/ /zangs sam lcags kyi ga bur stsal/ /de nas

rdo rje mkha' 'gro la/ /dug dang khrag gi sbyin sreg dbul/ /a bu sa ti'i ri lu de/ /rang gi lce la myangs ba na/ /rtag tu btsan dug 'thung bar nus/ /yang na ma mo mkha' 'gro la/ /so bya rog mo'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /a bu si ti'i ri lu de/ /rkang pa'i mthil du

bskus pa des/ /chu yi steng du 'gro bar byed/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro dpon g.yog la/ /chang dang bya rgod sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu yan lag bzhi la bsku/ /bdag ni nam mkha' dag la 'phur/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag la/ /mi sha'i mar khu sbyin sreg

dbul/ /ri lu lce la myangs pa na/ /skye ba snga phyi dran par nus/ /ma mo dag dang mkha' 'gro la/ /mar dang ra khrag sbyin sreg dbul/ /a bu si ti'i ri lu de/ /bud med gang gi dpral bar bskus/ /de ni bdag gi dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje nag mo chen mo la/ /

chang dang sbrang rgod sbyin sreg dbul/ /de nas ri lu mig la bsku/ /srid pa gsum ka dus gcig mthong / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen mo la/ /mar dang khwa ti'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu rkang pa'i mthil la bsku/ /nyin gcig dpag tshad brgyad khrir

phyin/ /rdo rje lha mo nag mo la/ /khrag dang mar khu'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lus mchan khung gnyis bskus na/ /rang lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /dpal ldan lha mo dpon g.yog la/ /'bras dang bu ram sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu khong par 'thungs pa na/ /

tshe lo stong ni thub par nges/ /dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo la/ /'bru dang mar khu'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu lus la bsrel ba na/ /nor gyi gter la spyod par 'gyur/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma la ni/ /til dang mi sha'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /a bu si ti'i ri lu de/ /

mi ro sar pa'i khar bcug nas/ /ma mo'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/ /mi ro langs nas dngos grub gter/ /gser dang dngul du 'gyur yang rung / /yang na de la ral gri sbyin/ /ci 'dod pho nya'i mngag gzhug byed/ /phrin las rnam bzhi gang bcol 'grub/ /

rdo rje dpal ldan lha mo la/ /go ro tsa na'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu nad pa'i lus la bsku/ /nad pa rnams ni 'tsho bar byed/ /yang ni rdo rje lha mo la/ /chang dang 'gi wang sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu bgyis pa lte bar bsku/ /srin bu dag ni

'tsho ba'o/ /rdo rje dpal ldan nag mo la/ /til mar ske tshe'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu me ru bsregs pa na/ /dgra la thog dang ser ba 'bebs/ /rdo rje lha mo nag mo la/ /mar dang mu tig sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu dpral ba'i dbyings su bsku/ /

rgyal po'i chad pa mi 'byung zhing / /me dang chus kyang mi tshugs so/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma kun la/ /me tog bu ram sbyin sreg dbul/ /ri lu lte bar bskus pa na/ /sbrul dang btsan gyis mi tshugs so/ /byad stems kyang ni bzlogs par 'gyur/ /mkha'

'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las rdzu 'phrul bcu drug gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan las langs te/ dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa/ bcom

ldan mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sku gsung ye shes lngar ldan lha/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /rig sngags gsang sngags dngos po 'dzin/ /srid pa gsum gyis bkur ba'i gnas/ /lha srin brgyad kyis mchod cing bstod/

nyon mongs bdud las rnam par rgyal/ /phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal lha mo la dge bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/ brgya byin gyis bstod pa/ de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis so so nas dpalha mo bstod pa/

de nas g.yog mo re ma ti la/ bdud ri ste 'gong nyag gis/ 'dul thabs kyi dbang gis sgo nas bstod pa/ lha la dbang bsgyur lha mo dpal 'bar ma/ /dbang phyug sras mo lha mo gzi ldan ma/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas kyi gtso mo ste/ /

lha mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud las dbang bsgyur bdud mo dpal 'bar ma/ /ri ti 'gong nyag bu mo re ma ti/ /nag mo rtse dgu gnas kyi gtso mo ste/ /bdud mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu

la dbang bsgyur klu mo dpal 'bar ma/ /gtsug na rin chen bu mo yid 'ong byams/ /rol mtsho bdun gyi gnas kyi gtso mo ste/ /klu mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gnod sbyin dbang bsgyur gnod sbyin dpal 'bar ma/ /gang

ba bzang po'i bu mo shang ka na/ /nags tshal dra ba can gyi gtso mo ste/ /gnod sbyin re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje des/ pad ma'i gdan las sku

bzhengs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sras mchog 'khor gyi dam pa brgya byin nyon/ /lha dang lha min mi dang nam mkha' lding / /bgegs dang gshin rje ma mo dang / /sha za lto 'phye dri za dang / /srin po grul bum bdud dam mi/ /sngags 'chang rnal

'byor gnod sbyin dang / /nga yi 'khor rnams rab tu nyan par gyis/ /ngas ni rdo rje ting 'dzin lhun gyis grub/ /ngas ni mtshan ma 'joms pa'i phyag rgya rnyed/ /ngas ni thun mong ston pa'i bdud las rgyal/ /ngas ni snying rjes 'gro kun dge la 'god/ /

ngas ni thabs dang shes rab kun la byed/ /ngas ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gsang rgyud 'di/ /thun mong ma yin me lce 'bar ma 'di/ /ngo mtshar thabs mchog dngos grub dam pa'i gzhi/ /ngas ni bshad zin khyod la rab tu gtad/ /skal ldan dad dang brtson

'grus yod la gtad/ /snying rje gzhol zhing brtul zhugs che la gtad/ /bden gnyis don rtogs yid rings brtan la gtad/ /brnag pa'i gzungs thub snod ldan yongs la gtad/ /zung shig chongs shig snod ldan rnams la shod/ /'di yi

don rnams rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /'dis ni mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po thob/ /'dis ni chos kyi dbang phyug go 'phang thob/ /'dis ni yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba thob/ /'dis ni ci 'dod thogs med dngos grub thob/ /blo dman

shes chung nyan thos rnams la gsang / /log pa'i mthar 'khyams mu stegs can la gsang / /dmu rgod mi mkhas bskur pa mkhan la gsang / /dad med snying rje spangs pa rnams la gsang / /ma rig rmongs pa'i le lo can la gsang / /

zhes bka' stsal nas/ /brgya byin gyis spyi bos blangs so/ /'khor la gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye bcom ldan

'das lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa mkha' 'gro ma lung bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ mkha' 'gro ma lha mo nag mo 'dis/ bskal pa mang po'i sngon rol nas/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i

zhal mthong ste/ /dman pa'i zhing 'dir sprul sku yis/ /lha mo'i tshul du sku bstan nas/ /'gro ba'i don la rab tu brtson/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa rab tu spangs/ /da ltar shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong / /de yi khol mo re ma ti/ /smon lam dbang gis

'gro don byed/ /bsgom pa'i lam la rab gnas nas/ /da ltar nyon mongs sgrib pa sbyong / /'di nas dus 'di phyi ma'i tshe/ /mkha' 'gro lha mo nag mo 'di/ /byang shar mtshams kyi 'jig rten khams/ /pad mo rnam par rol pa der/ /yang dag

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su/ /pad ma'i dpal zhes bya bar ni/ /ngas ni lha mo lung bstan to/ /de yi g.yog mo re ma ti/ /pad ma can gyi zhing khams de/ /bde ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /blo gros bshes gnyen bya bar ni/ /de 'dir

ngas ni lung bstan no/ /mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las yongs su lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //mchod na rgyal ba rigs lnga rtag tu mchod/ /srung na dam tshig nyi shu rtsa

brgyad srungs/ /dgra byung lha mo nag mo mtshon char phyung / /nyes chung kha 'thab tsam la mtshon mi dbyung / /nga yi dkor khang 'jig na mtshon char phyung / /dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod na mtshon char phyung / /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig na mtshon char
phyung / /dkon mchog sku dgra dar na mtshon char phyung / /zhes slob dpon pad mas slob bu glang dpal gyi seng ge la de skad ces bka' stsal zhing gdams so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra man+t+ra b+hi ru san+ti ma ra tan+t+ra nA ma: bod skad duH drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud zhes bya baH bcom ldan 'das mthus stobs kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di

skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyidaH ri rab chen po'i yang stengasaH lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog /rab tu rgyan pa'i pho brang chen po naH yum chen mo 'byung ba lnga'i
bdag mo dngaH gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs teH sku las 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu spros nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can dang / dregs pa can dang / gzi brjid can dang / drag shul can la

sogs pa dag gis gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing skyod par mdzad pasaH de dag gi sde dpon dang bcas 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnamasaH rlung gi shugs kyis skyod pa bzhin du lhags pa ni 'di lta ste/ gshin rje tshe

bdag nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa dang / bdud nag po chen po me'i kha rlangs can dang / yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma dang / srin po'i rgyal po gsod byed nag po yum dang bcas pa dngaH gnod sbyin chen po

gang ba bzang po dang / yum gnod sbyin mo sha za ral cig ma dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po dang / ru tra'i bdag po thar pa nag po dngaH rmu rje btsan po rgyal po chen po dngaH phyi rol lha'i bdag po kA la nag po dang /

khyab 'jug chen po kun du rgyu ba dngaH klu'i bdag po gzhon nu gtum po dang / lha'i rgyal po li phying chen po dngaH gnod sbyin chen po la ga rgyu ba dang / bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dngaH klu bdud chen po yam shud dmar

po dngaH gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / za byed dang / yi dwags dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / pho nya'i tshogs 'jigs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'dus soH/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par mdzad de/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag /gzugs su snyan pa rab tu

'jigs/ sgra ni mi snyan drag cing gtum: dri ni mi zhim rul myags gsungaH ro ni kha skyur tsha bar bro/ /reg bya tsha rtsub mi gdug spyod/ \u0f7f zhe sdang chen po'i me 'bar zhing nga rgyal keng rus brag tu gtamasaH

gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibasaH 'dod chags khrag gi chu chen 'brugaH phrag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugasaH sti ra chen po'i longs spyod laH stag gzig gcan zan lce spyang dang kAng ka dur bya 'dab chags tshogasaH

sha za khrag 'thung rus pa 'jomasaH bam dang rul dang myags pa dngaH bye dang bral dang gzhig pa dngaH zos dang 'thor dang rab tu 'thoraH brul dang zags dang brlag pa dngaH btso dang rgod dang glal ba dngaH 'jigs shing

gdug dang rngam pa dngaH rol pa'i longs spyod rab tu sprulaH kun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'chang zhingaH gsod gcod shag gtub lus kyis lasaH tshig rtsub brlang ba'i nga ror 'byinaH 'khros pa'i brtul zhugs drag po yisaH

ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'iH mngon par gcod la rab tu bkodaH 'di ltar mthong zhing snang gyur paH kun rdzob tsam du snang ba lasaH sems can gcig gi ba spu laH cung zad gnod pa yong med deH rang gi rnam
rtog bde bar spyodaH nges pa'i de nyid kho na'oH cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i/ gleng gzhi'i le'u steH dang po'oH // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po yisaH
dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kyisaH thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nasaH ma lus bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa'i/ /gsang bdag chen por dbang bskur phyiraH gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'changaH lnga brgya'i grogs

dang bcas pa yisaH so so gtso chen mdun nyid nasaH rang gi stan las rab tu langasaH mngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad/ /thugs kyi gnas pa'i sa bon las: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug kunaH ljang nag

rlung gis rab tu dgrogasaH khrag gi rba rlong 'khrug cing g.yoH sha rus gtams pa'i sa gzhi las: bskal pa'i me ri rab tu 'baraH ban+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khangaH gdug cing 'jigs su rung ba niH stobs chen
rnams kyang nyer mi spyodaH phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad lusaH phyi nang mtha' dbus kun la khyabaH bstan la rab sdang pha rol posaH phung po zhabs kyi gdan du gtingaH 'od gdan gtsang ma gsum dang

bcasaH che ba mchog gi skur mdzad deH rig can mthar gnas dbur mnan cingaH stong pa bcwa brgyad dag cing snangaH phyag gi dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgralaH ban+d+ha tsit+ta g.yas g.yon bsnamasaH thugs kyi dbang rtags dang
pos gzungaH thugs rje mi 'gyur mthing nag mdogaH mi 'jigs rig par mnan pa'i zhabasaH bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas pas gnonaH ma lus dbang du bsdud pa'i phyiraH ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'baraH 'bar

ba'i spyan gyis khams gsum gzigasaH gdangs pa'i shangs kyis srid gsum rngubaH shangs kyi rlung sgras stong gsum khyabaH rno dbal tshems kyis gdug pa sgrolaH ljags 'dril rkan sgra drag por brdebasaH khro gnyer

'od kyis dbang du bsdudaH dpa' ba'i chas kyis rab tu brgyanaH bsrung ba'i lha rnams sku la rdzogasaH stobs ldan de nyid mnyes mdzad pa'iH 'byung ba che la dbang bsgyur maH dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi maH gri gug

tri shul bdud rtsi g.yasaH ban+d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yonaH gtso bdag tshul 'dzin rab tu sgegaH dgyes mdzad rab tu rol pa lasaH 'dul byed sprul pa rab tu 'phroH phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams kun gyiH gtum

po gdug pa'i tshul 'chang ba'iH drag sngags bdag po ma lus kunaH rang nyid so so'i 'khor bcas pa'iH brten dang gnas la re rer snangaH rang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yoH \u0f00 badzra sarba duSh+TAn e ka ya

ma ma b+he ra b+ha gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT: bdud dang gshin rje srin po dngaH gnod sbyin lha dang log lta canaH rmu rje che dang phyi rol phyogasaH gdug byed mkha' la rgyu ba dngaH byol song ltos 'gro lus 'dzin dngaH nga rgyal
'chang dang sprul pa canaH thang khob gnas mtha' ma lus rgyuH lha bdud mi ma yin gyi gnasaH kha ba can du phyogs shing bsregaH las kyi lus kyi nus pa 'byinaH ma lus pa rnams thams cad kunaH
shugs drag rlung gis bskyod pa bzhinaH rab tu 'dar zhing mdun du gnasaH thugs rje bdag pos dgongs mdzad kyangaH gtum rngam 'jigs byed chen po'i skuH gsang tshig drag po gsung gi sgrasaH ma lus tshim
par bka' stsal paH e ma 'jig rten khams kun gyiH drag sngags bdag po dregs pa canaH sngon gyi rdo rje 'chang chen dngaH rang gi bka' las ma 'da' b.raH khyed rnams rang gi 'khor dang bcasaH so so'i

lus dang btags pa'i mingaH rigs dang brten dang byed pa'i lasaH sde dang cha lugs longs spyod rnamasaH 'jigs byed gnas 'dir myur du stonaH khyed rnams 'di las 'da' byed naH nga yi srog gi dam tshig gisaH khyed

kyi lus sems srog dang bcasaH ma lus bstan nas brlag par bya zhes bka' stsal nasaH drag sngags kyi tshogs 'di dag kyang bka' stsal toH \u0f00 sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaTaH ya ma rA dza mr-i ta ga s+ya ma maH

k+She ta mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH du phrag rA dza dug dun ma ting mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH rak+sha rag mo ma ma ra ti ka mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH yak+Sha a pa sma ra rak+sha mi ru sham pa mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH ma hA de ba shwa ra rA

dza mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH ma trang+ka ru tra kA la mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH mun mun pa tsa tsit+ta mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH tirti ka ma te ma hA de ba mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH biSh+Tu bi tra rok+ti dza mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH nA ga rA dza ku ma tsan+d+ha

mA ra hring hring dzaHdzaH rA dza b+hu long e sa ya mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH ma hA khu lo sa b+ho mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH badzra sA d+huH so a ma tsa mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH a b+hi shu tra~M li mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH nr-i hur thums dzaH/ sha

tru~M mA ra ya rbad zhes brjod cing sku 'jigs byed 'bar ba ni slar yang 'jigs su rung bar bstan toH sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma rungs pa'i sgra

chen po dang / 'od dang glog 'bar ba dang rlung gi shugs drag pos gang bar gyur to/ /bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas te/ rab tu 'dus nasaH

rang rang gi rigs kyi dregs pa dag phul te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du nye bar gyur nasaH bka' rab tu bsgrub par brtsol bar gyur to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las byin brlabs chen pos dbang du
bsdu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'oH // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi rgyal po me'i kha rlangs can zhes bya baH mdog nag poH kha nas me 'bar baH lag na khram shing dang bdud

zhags nag po thogs pa/ zhing lpags kyi gos gyon paH yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma zhes bya baH lag na khram shing dang thod pa rlon pa thogs shing gos su mi lpags gyon paH bdud rta nag po la khyo shug gnyis char
zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i tshogs dang bcas nas rings par lhags so/ /de bzhin du 'chi bdag gshin rje zhes bya ba/ mdog nag thod pa gri gug 'dzin: chung ma gshin

rje za byed maH gri gug thod pa phyag gis 'dzinaH khyo shug shing lpags rlon pa bgosaH ma he chu glang zhon nas ni: gshin rje pho mo'i tshogs dang bcasaH 'gal byed gzor zhing myur du lhagasaH srin po gsod byed yab

yum yangaH mdog nag zhing gi lpags pa bgosaH ral gri gri gug g.yas kyis bzungaH g.yon gyis mi mgo thod khrag thogasaH stag dang seng ge zhon pa skyodaH srin po'i tshogs bcas myur du 'khodaH gnod sbyin gang ba

bzang po dngaH chung ma sha za ral cig dang : mthing nag mgyogs byed rta la zhonaH zhing lpags gyon te phyag gnyis kyisaH ral gri dar nag zhing lpags bzungaH gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas te 'khod/ /drag sngags bdag po'i

sde dpon teH shar lho nub byang phyogs dag gisaH gnas su gtso la 'dud cing 'khodaH dbang phyug chen po zhes bya baH 'jig rten lha yi sngags dag gisaH dkar po ba dan shel gri thogasaH dar dkar gos can gnam ru zhonaH dregs

pa lha yi bdud 'khor bcasaH rings par bcas de shar phyogs 'khodaH thar pa nag po zhes bya baH mdog nag mchod gtor dug thun 'dzinaH dom nag zhon te zhing lpags bgosaH sde dang bcas te lho phyogs 'khodaH rmu

rje nag po zhes bya baH dar nag dang ni zhags pa thogasaH ber nag gyon te rmu rta zhonaH rang gi sde dang nub phyogs 'khodaH mu stegs nag po chen po yangaH kha T+wA~M dang ni tri sh+'ul bzungaH mi lpags bgos zhing ma he zhonaH rang gi

sde bcas byang du 'khodaH khyab 'jug rog ti zhes bya baH mthing nag khram shing dgra sta 'dzinaH sprin nag bgos shing 'brug sngon zhonaH gza' bdud 'khor bcas steng phyogs 'khodaH klu rgyal sog ma med zhes paH/ /gos
nag sbrul lpags na bza' canaH bum pa dang ni rus sbal 'dzinaH chu srin zhon te klu tshogs bcasaH 'og gi phyogs su 'khod cing 'dug /gzhan yang li byi lag dgu dngaH the se gtso dang yam shud kyiH

so so'i sngags kyi bdag po dag /dkar ser dmar ser mdog ldan zhingaH shel gri thogs shing lag dgu 'gyedaH dar dmar mdung rings lag gis 'dzinaH rta dkar bya rgod ra skyes dngaH rta dmar zhon te zhing lpags bgosaH

so so'i sde dang g.yog bcas shing / /phyogs kyi sgo bzhir gnas bcas 'khodaH gzhan yang lha klu gnod sbyin dngaH ma mo gshin rje srin po bdud/ /ru tra mu stegs 'gong the dngaH ging rmu gza' dang rgyan bran smanaH snang

srid lha srin dregs pa canaH ded dpon chen po rnams kyi 'khoraH phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / /yang gsang dang ni drag po dang / btags shing chags pa smras pa dang / las byed shan pa thor shod dngaH che grags rtsal

dang ma mo dngaH mun thibs stong 'khrugs srog gcod dngaH glen zhing dbang che la sogs rnamasaH bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi/ /bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub byed pasaH ma thogs dur khrod gnas chen duH 'dar zhing myur ba'i

shugs dang bcasaH rang gi nus pa rab bstan teH bka' nyan gsung sdod rjes 'brangs gnasaH de ltar 'khod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa'i bdag po sngags kyi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gis/ rang rang gi 'khor dang /

rigs kyi sde dang / mthu dang / longs spyod kyi khyad par dag kyangaH bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bstan nas/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen poH bdag cag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi

khams na gnas pa'iH ma rungs pa'i tshogs gdug pa can/ sdang ba/ gnod pa dang / shugs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang rtsod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / phan pa'i sems skye bar mi nus pa rnams kyis teH

rang rang gi khams dang / byed pa dang / rigs dang / las kyi bya ba dang / rten dang / nus pa dang / dbang gi khyad par dag dang / 'thun pa'i bstan pa mi bzad pa stobs dang ldan pa dag bka' stsal par gsol zhes gsol to/ /
drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'oH // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yisaH sku yi che ba rab ston cingaH gsung gi snying pos gnad skul teH

thugs kyi dgongs pa gtsor mdzad nasaH 'jig rten dregs pa can dang mthu stobs canaH 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ /hU~M 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen rnamasaH nga'i bka' bzhin nyan par bgyiH nga ni

chos sku bde chen teH ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grubaH snang ba'i sku la dngos po med/ /ye shes sku ste sku yi mchog /nga ni sngags gsung mthu chen teH ye nas tha snyad sgra dang bralaH brjod pa'i gsung la 'dzin pa
med/ /ma 'gags gsung ste gsung gi dpalaH nga ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste/ /ye nas mtshan med yang dag bralaH gnyis med thugs las rtsol ba med/ /skye med thugs te thugs kyi dpal/ /nga ni yon tan

tshogs chen te/ /lhun gyis grub cing bsam mi khyabaH smon med dgos pa ma lus 'byungaH dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhiH nga ni phrin las mdzad pa'i steH yongs rdzogs brtson pa'i bdag nyid canaH zhi rgyas dbang dang

mngon du spyodaH sna tshogs gzhan don lhun gyis rdzogasaH 'jig rten sngags bdag dregs pa canaH gtso chen dbang sgyur khyed rnams kyangaH nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyiH thugs dang ye shes gnyis su medaH gsung dang dbye ba

yod ma yinaH sku la so sor mi blta steH yon tan mnyam pa nyid du rdzogasaH phrin las gcig te thun mong bsgrubaH thog ma med nas da lta'i b.raH nyon mongs las kyi rgyu 'bras kyisaH gnas ngan len gyi phung por sminaH
nga rgyal dregs pa'i lus ngag semasaH stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogasaH che btsan dbang phyug ldan gyur kyangaH yang dag nges pa'i don ma rtogasaH don dam bden pa khong ma chudaH spros bral dge la

blo ma phyogasaH rang rig rgyal ba'i stobs ma snyedaH skye med dbyings kyi rtsal ma sharaH bde chen gnas kyi gdeng ma thobaH mtshon med bcud kyi ro ma myongaH chos nyid sku'i gzugs ma mthongaH ye shes glong gi sgo ma phyedaH

de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyisaH rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogasaH lus la bdag tu yong ma 'dzinaH ngag la brjod par ma smra cigaH sems la dngos por gang ma rtogaH gnas yul rigs khams sde dang dpungaH brten

rdzas longs spyod dbang skal rnamasaH nga dang nga yir gzung bya minaH thun mong dang ni tha dad cigaH de dag ma lus stong pa ste/ /stong pa nyid kyang de dag goH de las gud na gzhan med deH gzhan las gud na'ang de med cingaH ma skyes

ma 'gags mtshan nyid medaH ma phri ma bsnan ma slad cingaH ma bcos ma sgyur ma byung laH ma skyes ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'iH don chen de ni rang nyid lasaH phyi nang snga phyi steng dang 'ogaH phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus

dang semasaH kun nas rnyed pa ma yin teH 'di na 'ang yod pa ma yin noH sha khrag lpags dang rus pa dngaH snying dang glo ba snod rnams dngaH dbang po yan lag bcas pa laH bde chen dam pa de mi gnasaH de las gzhan

na'ang gnas min teH gnas ma grub la gnas zhes brjodaH gnas yod mnyam na der rtogs shigaH ji 'dra ci zhig ji lta buH gang nas 'ongs shing gang du songaH gang na 'dug cing ci zhig byedaH dbyibs dang kha dog ming dang mtshanaH

rigs dang khams la rab tu rtogasaH de la de yis der ltas pas/ /'thong ba med pa blta ba yiH gang la gang gis gar bsgoms pasaH bsgom dang bral la sgom zhes byaH ci la su zhig spyir spyod pasaH spyod dgu mi gnas

spyod pa cheH su las sus thob ci bsgrubs pasaH ma grub rang gnas 'bras bu steH ma lus med cing rnam pa yiH yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug goH zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyodaH dbang du bsdu ba phrin las yinaH rang la

rdzogs zhing rang gis grubaH thag chod pa dang bstan pa dngaH tshad ldan mthar phyin la bzla dngaH 'das dang ma 'das ston pa dngaH bshad dang nyan dang bsdud pa dngaH gnas dus yon tan skyon rnams niH rang gi de nyid
rtogs pas 'grub zhes bka' stsal toH drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las don dam pa'i gnas nye bar bstan pa'i le'u steH bzhi pa'o: : de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yisaH

dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs te: ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'iH chos nyid don gyi snying po niH gzung 'dzin mtha' bral don rtogs teH nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gisaH dregs shing gzir ba'i ru tra deH ma sgral ba ni nyes pa

steH thabs dang shes rab snying rje gsumaH 'thun zhing 'tshungs ldan sras kyis sgralaH dam pa'i don de ma rtogs paraH dngos por spyad pas 'khor bar ltungaH mkhas rtogs ldan pas spyad pa yisaH 'phags pa mnyes

shing sems can sgrolaH tshogs gnyis rdzogs te sku gsum thobaH rnam rig mthong bas la thag gcadaH brtul shugs drag pos bsgrub pa brtsamaH dbang du bsdu dang gdul ba'i phyiraH 'jig rten las kyis bsdus pa'i

rgyudaH nga dang ston pa rnams kyis bshadaH chos dbyings rang gnas dur khrod duH rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis niH sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du bsdudaH snyigs ma rab tu bdo ba'i dusaH bsdod cing gtsugs las ltos pa'i chosaH

skyon dang yon tan tshul du 'byungaH bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan canaH drag sngags stobs kyis bsgral byas nasaH rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyuraH dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i brten yin noH lha dang sngags dang ting nge

'dzinaH rdzas rnams rgyu dang rkyen du 'gyuraH ling ga nya'o dmigs pa'i brtenaH ming rus byang bus rnam shes dngaH bla tshe 'khor ba'i brten yin teH 'gugs 'dren gyis ni de dag 'gugasaH pho nyas las kun bsgrub

par byedaH sngags dang rdzas kyi dpal skyed cingaH thun rdzas rnams kyi myos pa dngaH rengs lkugs mtshon 'bebs brdul du lhogasaH nad du 'bebs shing snying nas 'dranaH lha dang 'byed cing rtsa ba gcodaH byang chub sems kyi
dngos po niH don po khrag gi lan bu'i mgoH kun gzhi til 'bru tsam zhig gnasaH rtsa ba rlung gnas 'dra bas teH phur pa me sbal lta bu yisaH bsdud shing bsregs te gcad pa yisaH dmigs pa brten dang bral

bar byasaH bkrags dang gzi mdangs rang la 'dusaH phrin las rnam gzhis gzir ba laH dge sdig ngo bo nyid du mnyamaH lta spyod ldan pas zhing bcus teH pha rol bla med gnas su bsgralaH bar ma do'i rnam shes niH

hU~M dang phaT kyi 'phro 'du yisaH sbyang dang spar ba'i las rnams byaH phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i sras su bskyedaH phung po lhag ma tsam nyid niH rten gsum gyi ni rab tu sbyangaH chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan par byaH 'dis ni pha rol bla na

medaH sprul pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dngaH rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yiH spyod pa rlabs chen spyad pa'o zhes bka' stsal toH drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las sgrol ba ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa'i
le'u steH lnga pa'o: : de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yisaH las kyi bye brag 'di gsungs teH thog mar 'di la bshis pa'i gnasaH dur khrod chu gling ri yi sulaH khros shing gdug pa'i gnas de ruH

rab tu mnag cing rdeng ldan pasaH dam tshig ldan pa'i sgrub po steH yongs su rdzogs pa'i slob ma yisaH sngon du bla ma mnyes byas shingaH lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldanaH rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru kaH nye dang ldan pa gnyis su medaH

tshad dang ldan par 'gyur ba steH yang dag nges pa'i brtags mthong nasaH rab tu 'bad par bya ba niH smin 'byor gdug cing shis pa'i saH las la mngag pa de dag laH dregs pa gtso 'khor dmigs pa'i brtenaH 'dom

gang la sogs tshad dang ldanaH lte ba las ni 'khor lo'i rtsibasaH bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad du 'godaH bar khyams phyogs gzhir sgo bzhir bcasaH rim pa gsum gyi thod phreng ldanaH rang gi rigs la sngags pa yiH

dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang brtagasaH thams cad ldan pa nyid du byaH dregs pa can rnams sku yi brtenaH bris sam rkos sam brtsigs pa dgaH rang gi gnas su mdzes par dgodaH gsung gi snying po 'ang de bzhin noH thugs

rten rang rang phyag cha 'amaH sngon nas bsags pa'i rdzas yin noH rang sngags bsags pa'i 'khor lo dngaH 'thun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnamasaH nang du mtshon pa'i brten du gzugasaH de dag tsit+ta so so ruH dmigs pa'i

snying po dril te bzhugasaH gsang zhing sbas pa'i rten du 'gyuraH de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams suH nga yi sngar bshad rgyu nyid laH e dbyibs bzhi dang brgyad bcu gnyisaH khru gang 'dzub gang mthur du brkoH gdug cing

drag po'i rdzas kyi byugaH gdug cing bsreg pa'ang de yis soH de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams niH rgyud med gzugs ngan ka pA laH seng ldeng gser shing yan lag skyesaH dpal ldan drag po'i phur pa dngaH shel nag gnam

ru gnag po dngaH gi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dngaH zla mi cig dang srid shing dngaH tsa ra ka dang 'grin snyan dngaH sa spyod chu spyod rnams kyi lusaH phyi dang bar dang gsang bas brgyanaH bsregs chen spyi'i mnyes pa'i rdzasaH rgyan

ldan gzugs dang rnga gling sgrasaH bsung chen dri dang sha khrag roH tsha rtsub reg dang 'bru bcud bshosaH sha chen dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i tshogasaH rab tu star zhing 'bad pas sbyaraH dpa' zhing brtul phod skyes bu yisaH nga'i sngon

gyi phrin las bzhinaH khro la khros pas zhi mdzad deH tha mas gnas pa'i 'byung chen lngaH drag po sngags kyi 'byung bar bsgomaH keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bamaH dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khangaH ban da gnas rigs gsum

gyi brtsigasaH ti ra gsar rnying tshogs kyis gtamasaH rag ta dmar po brub cing 'babaH tshil chen dud pa 'khyil zhing 'phyuraH dbang po don snying 'phyo zhing 'brulaH bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldanaH yan

lag nying lag rkang zhing rnyilaH shun dang lpags pa brgyangs shing 'phyaraH phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'ogaH bcus dang 'phyang ba bskum dang brgyangasaH rgyal mtshan dang ni za ra tshagasaH ba dan bla bres
lhab lhub dngaH phur pa dang ni ltab ma dngaH yol ko ka ma la rtams niH rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyanaH gzhal yas 'bar ba de 'dra baH rab tu sngags pa 'di las bshadaH dregs pa'i

bdag po yum dang bcasaH sbyor zhing dgos pa de nyid kyisaH bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyedaH 'phro dang chas kyi khyad par dngaH bsdu dang rang gi gnas su brtagaH skur gyur gang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo dngaH
byang chub sems kyi bya ba yisaH yum dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogasaH de yi las kyang sngar bzhin duH rgyal mdzad rang gi phyag rten duH dmigs pa myur lhags de yi 'khoraH bdud dang gshin rje
srin po dngaH gnod sbyin drags po'i klu dang lhaH rang rang chung mar bcas pa dgaH ngas bshad bzhin du 'jigs par bsamaH sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag steH lha dang ma mo rgyal po gingaH btsan 'gong

rmu dang mu stegs dngaH rang gi sde dang dpung du bcasaH ma lus dregs pa can gyi tshogasaH 'di las rab brjod gang yin paH de nyid du ni gsal bar byaH nga yi sku dang gsung dang thugasaH ye shes rigs kyi dbang
bskur zhingaH byin gyis brlabs nas rgyas btab steH de la rang bzhin gnas pa stimaH yongs rdzogs sku yis bstan pa bsgrubaH phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul zhing bstodaH rab tu mnyes pa rgya
cher byaH phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yisaH bsdu dang sbyor dang sgrol ba dngaH gnas dang ring dang rim pa dngaH bskyed dang dbab pa mnyes pa yiH gnas lugs lhun grub ma bcos pasaH drag sngags rol

pa ma 'gags spyodaH rang gi las la sbyar ba niH bdud kyi khram dang gshin rje'i ltoH srin po'i dmar dang gnod sbyin byadaH lha yi chang dang ma mo'i rimasaH gza yi ki kang klu yi dugaH tshe chad pa dang
khri mon bcugaH gcan zan 'dzums dang lcags sgrog tshudaH nad dang mtshon nyid khong zhugs dngaH dug 'thungs thog babs bzhin du dragaH thar zhes bya ba gdags su medaH bdud ni ma brtags srog la rgolaH
gshin rje 'khor ba'i 'khor los gcodaH srin po ral gri'i so yis 'gemasaH gnod sbyin gnam lcags thog gis 'jomasaH lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis soraH ma mo dpag med mda' bzhin 'bigasaH gza'

bdud stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdegaH klu ni sa 'og ral gyi sogasaH thams cad 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngagasaH mun pa gling 'khrugs bdud kyi skadaH ngu 'bod lta bu gshin rje steH ro len dur pa srin pos 'grenaH

lce mdung drag po gnod sbyin noH bka' chad drag stsal lha yi dmodaH ngu 'bod gdung ba ma mo steH 'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud doH klu yis sbrul nag dug gis 'jomasaH 'jig rten lha srin rang sgra yisaH phal
pa rnams la dmod par byedaH de ni drag sngags dmod pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dmod pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o: : de nas rdo rje

'dzin pa yisaH so so'i drag sngags dmod pa bstanaH phung shigs bdud kyi drag sngags niH rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ruH shel nag snying du nya'o stsalaH dur khrod ras nag rgya yis gdabaH tshon sna lnga lnga

'am nag pos bcingasaH gri lcags sbug ma srog rtsar gzhugaH yungs kar yungs nag til nag dngaH ske rtse shang tshe zi ra dngaH zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma dngaH dug khrag ngar dang bcas pa rnamasaH mu su ri yi thod

par bsduH bdud kyi srog tig sngags kyis mngagaH bdud po nag po kha mun de ba mi la choH ka la mu tri mA ra yaH dgra bo snying ling tsit+ta rbudaH nr-i bzlum khyigasaH bram bram ro la 'dusaH zer sprugasaH ro sprugasaH

bdud rjes chodaH bdud mos rolaH bdud bus gtoraH ba~M khyigasaH pra ma niH sha tru~M mA ra ya rbadaH mun pa gling khrugs zhes bya baH ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad deH rtag tu brjod cing sbug mar brabaH gang la dmigs

pa de myur duH snang srid bdud kyis srog nas 'drenaH mi nag go mtshon bcas pa dngaH sngags nag bud med mon dang rdoH khyi nag rta nag bya nag dngaH rgod nag dre nag shel nag dngaH ri nag mtsho nag shel nag tshogasaH

dmag dang 'khrug dang 'thab pa dngaH khrid dang gsod dang sha ba dgaH las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyuraH de nas nya'o stab cing sgralaH gri mtshon phur pa rnams kyis gtub/ /lhag ma bdud rtsi sha khrag sbyaraH

ku ku nag po'i zas su sbyinaH rol par mi byed skyar la bsgrubaH ru tras myos shing 'thib nas 'chiH 'chi bdag gshin rje'i drag sngags niH rgyud med pho mo ka pA laH za ma rtogs tu kha sbyar laH nang du de nyid tsit+ta

gzhugaH pho thod steng nas spyi bor phugaH bcing dang dgab pa drang ba dgaH sngar bshad rdzas kyis brab cing brdegaH ye ma me ta k+SheH ra tsa sa to meH ru tsa na yo niH ro ma tsa niH sa ma rA dzaH mu ka snying khrag /rtsa la

rbadaH ya ma dbugs la rngubasaH ro tsa ya mA rA dzaH rA dza ba~M ril rbadaH ya ma rA dzaHhri snying gong chodaH ya ma snyingaH ya ma khragaH ya ma du ba~M ril rbadaH gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i sngagasaH rab tu mngags

te tsit+tar brabaH sha khrag chen pos mnyes par byaH gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis: don snying rlon par ster ba dngaH snying dang thod pa 'phar ba 'byungaH de nas las la sbyar byas naH gang la dmigs pa myur du

sgrolaH gtum khro srin po'i dmod pa niH myur shi'i thod par de snying nangaH dmigs pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan deH ming sngags ldan pa btsal byas teH leb rgan kha dog dar gyis drilaH sngo dmar skud pa'i dra

bar gzhugaH sti ra gsar pa kha phye laH dbang po don snying nang grol gyiH srin po skang zhing dmod pa bzlasaH rag sha srin po sa mun dzaH rag sha ru tra hu ra hu ra b+h+yoH ru gnyan nag po dgra la b+h+yoH dgra bo mu le shin sod sodaH

hab le hob le kha thun b+h+yoH rag sha dzaH tri ta dzaH du ra du ra shan dzaH rag sha rbadaH nr-i mA ra ya sodaH dmod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brdegaH mi nag shan pa'i tshogs rnams kyisaH khrid dang gsod dang don snying steraH las

la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyisaH dgra bo'i don po myur du sgrolaH drag sngags gnod sbyin drag sngags niH rta dkar snying dang thod pa niH nya'o bzhugs pa'i snod du mngagasaH rag chen la phug mu sa laH snying sna khrag sna

sbyar bas mchodaH gnod sbyin srog tig dmod la brjodaH yak+Sha ba hu da ri dzaH ma ga la bag sha dzaH ru ru ma ru tra ma ti dzaH yak+Sha snying la shad shad du dzaH yak+Sha srog la breng thun dzaH ming shar tshogs dang 'od dang
sgra/ /rlung dmar dag dang bu yug 'ongaH gsang ba'i rdzas kyis drag tu brdegaH lhag ma bsregs cing rlung gis gtoraH de nyid khrag tu skyugs te sgrolaH drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags niH lha g.yag dkar

po'i snying nang duH brnags pa'i gzugs dang ming rus brisaH sngon dmar skud pas ske nas gdagasaH rje rigs thod pa'i nang du gzhugaH dar dkar gyis ni kha gcad laH tshon skud sna lngas bcing bar byaH bya rgod dar

ma'i sgro rtsa niH srog rtsar bcug la dkyil du brtolaH dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi laH dbusu gru gsum mthur du bruH lha rdo gsum gyi sgyed po laH gong gi thod pa gzhag par byaH 'thun rdzas gshos gtsang

sngon cha dngaH ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snyingaH bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dngaH ba dan dkar po rten du gzugasaH yungs kar sngags kyi mda' chog niH thun kyi rdzas su gzhag par byaH drag sngags snying gi nang

du brabaH stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bsaH lha rnams 'dus pa'i sngags rnams sbrengaH ma hA de ba ti dzaHti dzaH /sa ma phra ma na rag sha ka~M ka la ya hU~M/ de ba rA dza ma hA ni dzaH /dgra bo ma ra ya thun rbad thun rbad/ shag

sen dzaHdzaH shag sen dzaHdzaHhU~M hA~M/ tsa tur mu kha rag sha ma na/ kang ka ma ya hU~M/ ma hA de ba a mu ka mA ra ya sod/ 'jig rten grags pa mthu rtsal canaH lha yi bod rbad gsad gsum dril/ /drag tu bzlas shing snying nas brabaH rtags ni

rgyal po rje dpon dngaH skyes pa stag chas dar ma dngaH zhub can pho tshogs 'ong ba niH gsod gcod byed dang snying 'byin dngaH dngos su snying phyung 'phang ba 'ongaH rtags byung snying nas ling ka dbyung / /mtshon gyis gtub la me la bsreg /

thal ba nya'o byas nas niH thod par bcug la lha rten namaH 'jig rten lha chen gnas sar mnanaH lha yi dal yams dgra la phebasaH nad bdag ma mo'i drags sngags niH nr-i dri'i mo yi thod pa ruH de'i snying na ling ka gzhugaH mthing

nag dar gyis kha gcad laH thod pa tshon skud lnga yi bcingasaH dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum dbusaH thod pa bcug la bsgrub par byaH smug nag gsum gyi snying khrag gisaH ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchodaH yungs kar

yungs nag ske tshe sogasaH drag po'i thun rdzas 'tshogs tshang laH ma mo rnams kyi dmod pa mngagaH ma mo snying kha ragaH ma mo snying kha ragaH ma ma rag+shaH ma ma rag shaH trag rag sha snying khrag la hubs dzaH snying khrag

rtsa la dun dun/ trag rag sha ma ma dzaHdzaH dam dam dgra snying rbad bu nan ma ma nr-i snying tsit+ta la thun/ trag rag sha tra rag sha mo thun thun/ mugs mugs myogs myogs rbad rbad dzaHdzaHma ma thun/ snying khrag thun/ sha ti ta ma ma rag mo/ sa ma

ya b+h+yo b+h+yoH ma mo'i srog tig bsdus pa yisaH gsad pa las kyi ngan sngags 'diH gri lcags las byas spu gu 'amaH bya rgod sgro rtsa'i nang nas mngagaH ma sring mon mo phal mo dngaH byi mo la sogs bud med tshogasaH

bya nag rgod nag tshogs chen lhagasaH dngos su sha dang mgo sug steraH tsit+ta dngos su 'phar ba dngaH bsad brtags yongs su rdzogs pa dngaH snying la phur pas gdab cing bsadaH dug shing me la sbyin sreg byaH thun khrag

dmigs pa'i dgra la 'phangaH thal ba bsdus la nya'o byaH dur khrod dbus su gnas par byaH rims nad dag gis dmigs pa sgrolaH drag po'i gza' yi drag sngags niH mon pa nag po'i ra rog po'iH thod par snying nang ling ga bzhugaH

srog rtsar gri lcags sbu gu gzhugaH yungs kar yungs nag zangs lcags phyeH thun du sngags te thod par brabaH mA ra ba sha mi kiH du ru du ru/ ma ti dz+wa la ti dzaH tsa ba ma ni/ ru ru ra hu laH a tra ta tra pad ma sha ra sha ra shasta/

u mu ka mu ra ru phaT/ tri ling ka shang+ka du dri/ dzaHdzaHyag sha thun/ bum dril shi ni ba~M b+ha ba hi/ kha yag kha dun ti/ ru ti shu ta ti trig shu la pra ti/ mA ra ya dzaH/ dbang chen gza' yi drag sngags 'di/ /drag po'i rdzas la mngags te

brdegaH sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjenaH dkar gsum dmar gsum rdzas kyis mchodaH nyi zla klad la 'khor ba dngaH mon pa nag po 'ong ba dngaH sbrul chen gshog can 'khyug pa dngaH bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dngaH dgra

bo dngos su khrid nas 'ongaH rgod dang ri dgas gsod pa dngaH don snying nang khrol ster zhing rolaH de lta'i gsod rtags rdzogs pa dngaH snying dang ling ga hoM mer bsregaH thun rdzas dgra yi yul du gtoraH thod

pa klu yi brtan sar sbaH chu 'khyags ser ba drag tu dbabaH hur thums nad kyis glo bur 'chiH kha lkugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyuraH \u0f7fgdug pa klu yi drag sngags niH lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas suH

stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum brusaH dgra yi phra mes mgo bo 'amaH yang na 'dze can thod pa ruH dgra yi ming rus bris te gzhugaH gtsang ma'i snod du dkar gsum dngaH mngar gsum klu sman sna tshogs dngaH rtag tu

mchod cing mngags par byaH \u0f00 nag po ti pa tsa yaH nA ga rA dzaH dgra bo he khu la phe shan/ nA ga pos phosaH shig shig /hu ya hu ya/ ti ya ti ya/ ti pa tsa ti pa tsa/ a sha nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rA dza dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ shag

ti rbad/ srog ti rbad/ snying ti rbad/ snying la ril sham sham rbad/ \u0f00 shan nag po phe rag ud nA ga rA dza nan/ thi li nAn/ pho li nAn/ drag tu brjod cing bsgrub pa yisaH me chen 'bar dang chu chen brugaH ba glang sbal sbrul

sdom sdig tshogasaH shing gcod sa snyil brag ral sogasaH lus la shu ba skrang lo byungaH stobs ldan gnyen pos drag tu bcunaH de nas byang bltas chu mig tuH ba ling gtang zhing bden pa brdaraH thod pa ling gar bcas

pa mnanaH klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas la gtadaH phung po lhag med gtang bar bsamaH gnas su byin la bsrung bar byaH dgra ni 'dze dang rmugs pas 'chiH sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyisaH 'jig rten las kyis mnar

ba yiH bstan pa'i ru tra gdug pa canaH ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyuraH zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa'i sde so so'i las la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u steH bdun pa'oH //

de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yisaH 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyisaH so so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs dngaH sde dang las kyi byed pa bstanaH sngon gyi 'jig rten khams 'di nyidaH phung po nyon mongs la bsten

nasaH nga rgyal dregs pa'i dbang gis myosaH rang gzhan kun la 'tshe zhing rtsodaH gnas ngan len gyis kha khrid byasaH legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyodaH ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gisaH gti mug mun thibs bdud

dang kluH nga rgyal stobs kyi dregs pa bdagaH lha dang rgyal po gol sar 'gyuraH phrag dog gza' dang gshin rje'i rigasaH 'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin rigasaH zhe sdang btsan dang srin por golaH srog lus 'brel bas

bdud zhes byaH yi dgas gshin rje rdog rnams rjeH phra mor rgyu ba snang zhing dregasaH de yi don gyis srin por byungaH gang gis gnod pa sbyin byed paH de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid doH gang las bskyed pa ma mo steH
skyod byed nus pa lha yin noH gdug cing gtum pas mi 'chor baH gza' zhes bya bar brjod pa yinaH blun zhing myos pas klu zhes byaH 'gro ba rigs drug so so laH bdud dang lha dang lha min teH gnod sbyin

gza' dang rgyu skar bcasaH rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha yi sdeH ma mo srin po mi yi sdeH gshin rje yi dgas sde yin te/ klu ni byol song sde yin noH bdud ris pho dang mo'i rigasaH ye nas gnas dang blo bur

byungaH 'thab dang myos dang dregs par byedaH sred dang chags par byed pa steH gshin rje las dang zhi bas teH gzugs can gzugs med dbang can dngaH dbang med phyi dang nang khyad paraH las kyis rab tu bsgrims

pa yiH srin po sha za rgan mo canaH sprul pa dang ni gzu lums canaH rab tu rgyu dang gcig pu gnas/ /gnod sbyin gtso dang 'khor gyis brtagasaH grol ba dang ni rang rgyud deH /tha dad rigs ni bcwa brgyad deH gnod cing
'tshe ba'i bdag nyid canaH lha ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can dngaH gzugs med lha ma yin du gtogasaH rab tu gdug rtsub tshe bas niH lha min mi ma yin du gragasaH gang las byung dang gang las sringaH gang

gis skyed pa'i gzhir gyur paH ma mo zhes su grags pa steH las dang ye shes bsdus shing phyeH phra dang rags pa'i khyad par gyisaH che chung gtsol dang 'khor du snangaH mkha' la rgyu ba'i drag shul canaH las kyi phung

po kho na'oH rgyal po bla rje bram ze dngaH rmangs dang gdol pa can rnams kyisaH nyi shu rtsa lnga'i yan lag 'gyuraH tha dad rigs ni sde yin noH 'di dag thog ma'i las kyi dngosaH dngos dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid kyisaH

ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin byungaH bdag blta bag la nyal du gnasaH g.yo 'gul 'phra mo'i kun nas ldang / 'khrug cing 'tshe dang rtsod par sharaH bsod nams las dang de ma yinaH las kyi mtha' gnyis g.yang
sar lhungaH gnag cing mi dge zag par bcasaH kha na ma tho lung ma bstanaH log pa lus ngag yid gsum gyisaH gnas ngan len pa'i rgyun chags 'thungaH dus gsum phyogs dang bcas pa yiH/ / rjes
su 'gro dang bzlog pa yisaH 'khor ba brten gzhi dam po btsugasaH so sor ma rig srog la gcodaH longs spyod 'phrog cing rnam par 'tsheH gzi mdangs 'byor pa sde dang bcasaH gang yin 'joms shing
rlag nus laH rgyud la sdug bsngal skyed byed paH ma rungs nyes pa 'byin byed lasaH srog len tshe 'phrog gcod dang shaH myos 'thibs byi nad rims dang yamasaH gcog 'gyel gdug pa'i nad 'bebs shingaH

rme dang 'khrug pa rtsod pa dngaH thor shod las dang dmod pa yisaH rang gi sde las re re yangaH kun la khyab pa brgyad brgyad deH drug bcu rtsa drug yan lag bcasaH las kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyabaH dregs
pa'i bdag po so so yi/ /rang bzhin dgos pa'i bye brag gisaH dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa dgaH tshul bzhin srung ba'i dam tshig canaH drag sngags las kyi dmod pa laH brgya dang bcu gnyis bcu
drug gisaH nus pa rdzu 'phrul mthu la sogasaH rang gi rigs la gang sngags paH de dang de la rab sbyar bsaH las kyi mtha' la gang dmigs paH rdo rje can gyis yongs grub steH nga yi stobs dang nus pa
dngaH mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan tshogasaH lus ngag yid kyis rab 'bad paH gang yin de la mngon par 'byungaH de yi thun mong yongs 'grub cingaH mthar phyin pa yang len par byedaH 'di las ma 'ongs

rnyog pa canaH the tshom bskyed par ma byed cigaH nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyisaH 'di ni rab tu mngags pa'o zhes bka' stsal toH drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa can gyi sde rigs dbye ba bstan
pa'i le'u ste: brgyad pa'o: : de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yisaH las la sbyar ba'i rim pa gsungasaH dur khrod chu gling ri rtse dngaH chu 'dus ngam grog 'jigs su rungaH phung shul nags

khrod ma rungs paH dregs pa las kyi gnas yin noH mi rus mi bsod phung shul saH rdur zad phe ta rul chad saH sa smin dri chen ma rungs khragaH las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i rdzasaH rta nag dre nag ma he dngaH chu glang

dang ni stag seng dngaH rta dkar ne le rgod dkar dngaH dom nag rmu rta ban glang dngaH 'brug chen rma bya rus sbal dngaH bya khyi ku ku shel dang miH rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khragaH bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub semasaH

rang gzugs snying po 'khor lo bcasaH rgyan ldan shos cha 'thun pa'i rdzasaH dam tshig mchod cing brten pa'oH so sor sngags pa'i las khung duH thod ngan 'bru nag dug khrag g.yosaH rgyu gsum phu sa mtshon cha rnamasaH
gsang ba thun gyi rdzas yin noH rme khrag gsum dang dri ngan gsumaH srog chags gsum dang rme rdzas gsumaH thab rdzas gsum dang bsreg rdzas gsumaH rten sa gsum dang dril sa gsumaH bzhugs
sa gsum dang dbab sa gsumaH kun rdzogs rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yisaH chu drag dbab pa nges par 'grubaH rigs sul snod dang mchod rdzas dngaH gnas sbyong byang chub srid 'dor blosaH legs slangs yid kyis
'thun spyad pasaH gang la dmigs pa der gtad pasaH chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rten khang laH steng 'og gnas gsum bdag po gsumaH rgya mtsho'i gting dang ri rab zuraH bar snang khams dang nam
mkha'i dbyingasaH bsrung dang bzlog dang gsad pa'i lasaH dmags dpung bsdu dang dpal skyed dngaH rab tu 'khros dang sbyor ba zhigaH las kyis pha rol dmod pas bzlogaH ngan pa'i thod pa sna gsum dngaH
shis pa ma yin sa brgyad duH brten cing 'brel ba 'byung sbyor bsaH dmigs pa'i nus stobs gnon par byedaH khyad par las kyi bye brag gisaH rgyal po ya rabs rje dpon dngaH chung ma slob dpon mkhan

po dngaH rab byung khyim pa sngags spyod dngaH phyi rol phyogs dang chos kyi grogasaH che btsan dregs pas bsnyems pa dngaH nga rgyal ldan zhing skal pa bzangaH kun gyis bkur zhing brjod pa dngaH sems rgyud bsrel

dang yun gyis drinaH nye bar bstan cing slob sbyong gnasaH lhag pa'i lha yis rab skyangs teH thun mong nus pa'i stobs rnyed cingaH yon tan gcig gis rab bsdus pasaH tshar gcad dka' ba'i yul yin te/ /ma lus

gang la mngags pa yiH ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs pa'i grogasaH rab sngags brtson 'grus can gyis bsgralaH gzhan yang zhi dang rgyas pa dngaH dbang dang mngon par spyod rnams dngaH rdo rje 'dzin pa nga dang gzhanaH
mtshungs ldan rnams kyis bshad pa bzhinaH thogs med nus pa'i stobs kyis spyadaH de dag gsang ba'i dmod pa yangaH dregs pa sde brgyad so so yiH gal gnad snying po 'di dag goH ya ma du ha na ha na

tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta ru tra ma ma sod sod/ kha tri dza ma tri dzaHdzaHshog tri dzaHyag sha dzaHda tri dzaHsha tri pa tri dzaH/ tsit+ta pra ma ya a mu ka srog la dzaHdzaHb+h+yo/ tri tsa pa la ag shug me/ a b+hi sha /a b+hi shu/ tsag tra rig sha sa

ma ya dun thum ril li li/ myags myags myogs/ srog la thun rbadaH rag sha srog la phrig phrig /a pa ti li ki ni ya ma shri hri sti b+h+ri kri ta na kro ma ri pa tra srog la dun b+h+yo/ ma hA yag sha thum ril rbadaH ma ru tse d+ha sha 'gri

pa pra ma ling / gsod sgra gcod byed 'phrog byed kyisaH ma lus las la mngags par 'gyuraH nr-i hur thums dzaH sha tru~M mA ra ya rbadaH a mu ka mA ra ya nu ma ka ma ru sod sodaH gsad pa thun gyi dmod pa'oH byi sha mi ki du ru mi tri ka

ta dz+wa la a ta dz+wa la swA hAH tsa pa ti rA hu la ma hA kro d+ha ka pa shar shar ta shar ti hU~M phaT/ bi shu la du ma gi sha dz+wa la a naH ma hA tsan+d+ha rag sha hr-i da nr-i ma ya ru tra sa tri byi nA ga rA tsa be ga a nan+ta rag+sha ti san+d+ha rak+Shi ra tsit+ta b+ha mi ku ruH mu hri tsan+d+ha dum bu

dum bu/ kha la rag sha thum ri li li/ ma ma sa ma ya trag rag sha trag rag sha ma tri ga naH ma sa kha ya ku ru ti tse b+ha li mu ta da ra da ra/ tri ka ra mi triH dul dul/ snying khrag la ril ril/ rtsa la thun thun/ trag rag mo hril hril/

shag shag /shar shar rbad/ ma ma tsag sha trag tu phrom/ a se la mi byi ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha hril hril shar b+h+yoH mA ra ya ra~M hril shar b+h+yoH shel tra hU~M drag du rtsar shu ti phroM kar phroM/ phyir ma ti pa shad/ mi ki ri ra hu la shag

shag hril phobaH khrag la tsa ra mu sha b+h+yoH trag ram thun shag ril ram shar b+h+yoH bdud phroM kar shu ti phroM/ na ga hril sen shag sa du ma hril b+h+yoH pra ta pa sha ya ya ma snying ya ma khrag /ra hu la hril hril shag shag /ser ser/ tug tug /

ya ya/ phob phob/ mu ka ye/ ka pa yeH a pa yeH/ hri sti byi krin te/ dza pa ti ra hu la ma hA kro ta ka bab ta shar shal ta te hU~M phaT/ thig nig /shu ti phroM/ bdud phroM/ mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi reng sod/ rkyang rje rkyang

mo tsu ru tsu ru/ ho ho/ phroM phroM/ mu ra mu ra sha /du ru phroM/ thog hU~M hU~M sod sod/ rlung dang sprin dang rab rgyu dngaH phyogs dang brtags kyi tshad ldan pasaH dbab pa'i sbyor ba shes par byaH steng 'og bar gsum drag po'i lasaH gzhug

dang gtor dang bsreg pa'i dang / /bskol dang dgug dang sbreng ba dngaH bod dang dmod dang gdung ba dngaH gzir dang skor dang gzhig pa dngaH gcad dang dril ba'i las rnams kyisaH smin pa'i lo thog 'joms par byed/ /

nag po ti pa tsa ya na rag sha /rA dza d+he gu la phe sha rag sha nAn/ phos phos/ shig shig /hu ya hu ya/ tir+ya tir+ya kA la nA ga ban+d+ha dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ nag po ti pa tsa ya phe sha rag sha dzaH nA ga ka ka la phe sha rag sha dzaHdzaH/ a sha na

nA ga ti pa tsa ya dgra bo ma ra ya dzaH/ nA ga rA dza shag ti srog ti la rbadaH snying la rol/ sham sham rbad/ i sha na nAn/ phe sha rag sha u nAn/ nA ga nAn thi li nAn/ phi li nAn/ rtsi ri nAn/ a pa ra sod rmag /dul dul

kA la rngubs myogs thibs/ mA ra ya 'dus 'dus/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ru ru/ ra ra/ ti ti/ tri mo ti ti/ ga ru ga ra ga tor dza ma ra te gang / man dzaHphe shan rag sha u ta nAn/ b+ha shi ni/ sha ra le/ shu ru mu le/ d+ha

ta ma re na/ hu ya hu ya/ ra ti ra ti/ thi ri shag tsag gi/ nr-i mA ra tri ya ma du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal pa ba~M ril/ nag po ti pa rag sha nAn/ khug ro la ba~M/ dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH / nag po ti pa tsa/ snying la dzaH / shag shan nAn

khug thum ril rbad/ tsan dri rag sha ro la khug thun kA la snying la thum ril rbad/ kA la sho ro snying la trag sha ha ra ka /a mu ka mA ra ya thum ril rbad nAnaH khugs dang 'gro dang las byed pa'iH rang gi rtags dang ldan pa naH
dmigs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya/ zlog dang ma grub 'khyil pa dngaH 'byams dang bsdugs dang zad mthar gtugs/ /gnyen po 'dab ma sna sel dngaH bsdu dang spo dang mi zad gter/ /longs spyod thug pa med

pa yis/ dbyings kyi ngang du gtad par bya/ sde brgyad so so'i ming gi sngags/ rang skad dmod pa'i yan lag la/ d+he ba a byi sarba b+h+yo bzlog /pra la dun rtse phob/ badzra 'grig sho sa ma ya hri b+h+yoH bsan ti ma ru ru/

ya ma trig b+hu ta k+Shi pa lo hU~M/ bzlog bsgyur gdug pa'i drag sngags kyisaH las kyi mthar sgyur ma lus paraH nga 'am nga dang 'dra ba yiH rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyisaH phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyisaH

gang la mngags pa de dag sbyaraH gzhan gyis the tshom mi bya steH nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyisaH de la rig par snang ba yin zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las
dmigs pa'i khyad par las sbyar ba'i le'u steH dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /yon tan bstod pa 'di gsungs so/ /hU~M dur khrod chen po'i rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /

gtum drag me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na/ /gdug byed ru tra sti ra'i khri stengs na/ /mdangs ldan nyi zla pad ma'i gdan stengs na/ /dregs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso/ /bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po
ni/ /sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar/ /sa dgu rdzogs pas dbu dgu bstan/ /stong pa bcwa brgyad ldan pa'i phyagaH zhabs kyis brjid pa'i bdud bzhi gnonaH dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar bas/ /

khro zhing gzhad dang gtsigs pa'i zhalaH ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'baraH khams gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigasaH shangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngubaH snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gengasaH tshems
kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrolaH ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyabaH khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdudaH phrin las rigs kyis dbu la brgyanaH bcwa brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyisaH dbang bsdud rdo rje

dril bu 'dzinaH g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad naH dregs pa'i lha brgyad ban da g.yasaH /tsit+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnamasaH /'bar ba'i chas kyis sku la brgyanaH bsrung ba'i lha brgyad sku la rdzogasaH g.yas

g.yon zhabs kyi dregs pa gziraH ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshedaH log lta ru tra 'dul ba'i dpalaH 'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yumaH dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sbyoraH /gri gug tri sh+'ul bdud rtsi g.yasaH ban da

zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yonaH mthing nag 'od kyis kun tu khyabaH ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa 'diH /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bsgradaH sku mdog mthing nag khros shing rngamaH phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po yisaH rdo rjes

dung khrag dkrug cing gsolaH g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag bzhi yisaH /lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta rolaH /yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis maH sku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyoraH g.yas kyi nam mkha' stong khams 'degasaH

g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnonaH /zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char maH /dpal chen yab yum byin brlabs lasaH sprul pa'i dregs pa pho mo gtsoH bdud mo nag mo kha slangs canaH zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthingaH

khram shing tri sh+'ul g.yas na bsnamasaH g.yon gyis kha T+wA~M zhags pa 'phenaH na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsolaH zhabs gnyis gdug pa'i snying gar gziraH bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag maH khrag ba~M thod rlon phyag
na bsnamasaH sku la zhing lpags gsar pa bgosaH bdud rta nag po chibs su bcibasaH zhabs kyis dgra bgegs bshugs kyis sgrolaH 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po niH zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nagaH

phyag g.yas thod khrag gri gug g.yonaH btsun mo yum chen za byed maH gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnamasaH yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa gsolaH ma he khros dang chu glang bcibasaH zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gziraH

srin po gsod byed sku mdog gnagaH phyag na ral gri thod khrag bsnamasaH yum chen gsod par byed ma yangaH gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnamasaH na bza' shing lpags rlon pa gsolaH stags seng rol pa chibs su bcibasaH

gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yangaH /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngoH /dar nag 'phyar zhing zhing lpags brdegaH /yum chen sha za ral gcig maH /yul gyi tshul 'dzin sprul pa moH zhing lpags gyon te gyi ling

bcibasaH drag sngags bdag po chen po niH dbang phyug chen po lha yi gtsoH mdog dkar shel gri ba dan 'phyaraH na bza' dar dkar ber chen gsolaH chibs su gnam ru dkar po bcibasaH thar pa nag po ru tra'i gtsoH
mchod gtor dug thun phyag na bsnamasaH zhing lpags gyon te dom nag bcibasaH rmu bdud rje dpon nag po niH dar nag 'phyar zhing sti ra 'dradaH ber nag gsol zhing rmu rta bcibasaH mu stegs ka la
yag sha niH mthing nag kha T+wA~M tri shUl 'dzinaH zhing lpags bgos te ma he bcibasaH khyab 'jug rog ti nag po yangaH khram shing dgra sta phyag gis 'dzinaH sprin nag bgos te 'brug sngon bcibasaH klu
rgyal ba ru Na yi rjeH ser nag sbrul gyi na bza' gsolaH bum pa rus sbal phyag gis 'dzinaH chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibasaH rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya baH mdog dkar shel gri dar dkar 'dzinaH sras
mchog 'bar ba dmar po steH mdungs rings g.yas la shan gri g.yonaH rdo rje mdzes pa mdog dmar poH ru mtshon dgra sta phyag gis 'dzinaH khu le lag dgu 'bar ba yangaH mdog ser sprul pa'i lag dgu 'gyedaH

zhing lpags bgos shing sti ra gnonaH drag sngags bdag po gtso 'khor yangaH rang gi rigs kyi 'khor 'dul baH so so'i sprul pa bsam mi khyabaH gcod par byed pa bdud kyi sdeH 'chi bar byed pa gshin rje'i sdeH

gsod byed shan pa srin po'i sdeH gdug rtsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sdeH drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sdeH nad gdon 'bebs pa ma mo'i sdeH nam mkha' dbang sgyur gza' yi sdeH glen lkugs gdug pa klu yi sdeH /sde brgyad dmod

pa'i drag sngags canaH mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyabaH 'khor dang sde rigs brjod mi langaH phrin las longs spyod mi zad gteraH yon tan nus pa dpag tu medaH zhes sdang can la khros par stonaH /nga rgyal can la
lhag par stonaH /'dod chags can la mi gdug stonaH gti mug can la myos par stonaH ser sna can gyis 'phrog par byedaH phrag dog can la 'jigs par stonaH khyod kyis mi 'dul gcig med kyisaH /mchod

cing bkang ba'i thun rdzas bzhesaH /bcol cing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cigaH /bstod cing bsgrubs pas las mdzod dgyes par mdzodaH \u0f7fde nas rang gi snying po dang / /'jig rten dregs pa'i bdag po rnamasaH /so so'i

sngags kyi las la sbyaraH /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yisaH byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yisaH /bltos dang re ba kun spangs teH sangs rgyas bstan pa rab dmigs nasaH drag sngags bdag po nyer bsgrubs naH nga dang sangs
rgyas thams cad mnyesaH rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob cingaH sems can rnams kyi ston par 'gyuraH thun mong ba dang nye ba dngaH mchog 'gyur ring ba'i dngos grub kunaH dpa' bo de las mngon du 'byungaH
yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cingaH 'jig rten chos las rab sngags pa'iH /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dngaH /sa chen po la rtogs pa yiH /rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spyodaH mthu stobs nus pa
pa snyems pa yisaH gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shingaH rang gi dbang du khugs pa dngaH bsgo ba rtsod pa med par 'gyur zhes bka' stsal toH drag sngags 'dus
pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste: bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen posaH /nyid kyi sku 'jigs byed chen
po'i lugs su sku sprul teH thugs chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i gnas thams cad las 'od kyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig

rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad khyab par mdzad nasaH ma rungs shing gdug pa dang gtum pa'i sems dang bsam pa thams cad kyang ma lus par zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan
par gyur te/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / brtse ba dang / yid dga' ba dang bcas pas phyogs der snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis bcom ldan
'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol toH kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'changaH khyod kyi bstan pa gsang chen 'diH ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tuH rab tu
rgyas par 'gyur zhig naH bdag cag 'jig rten dregs pa canaH zhi ba'i sems su gnas byas pasaH rjes su spyod pa gang yin paH de la rgyas pa phan par bstanaH
phrin las dang ni lta spyod kyisaH khyab pa de las yongs rdzogs zhingaH grogs dang bran dang rmangs bzhin duH gang gis bsgo ba de bzhin bgyiH dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan dngaH rol pa'i ting
'dzin ldan pa laH bka' las 'da' ba mi spyod cingaH gsung bzhin bsgrub pa rab tu sproH bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyisaH ji ltar mngags pa'i las rnams niH bdag cag nus pas

myur du bsgrubaH byin gyis brlab pa gtsor mdzod cig ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing phyin par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer gyi bkod pa rnams rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad kyang nyid kyi sku'i dbyings
su bsdud shing sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o/ /
drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po slob dpon pad ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bdag bai ro rtsa nas
bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /rgyal po khri srong lde btsan gyi bla'i phyag dpe la zhal bshus pa las brgyud pa'o/ /ga ru De na wA bu na: prits+tsha// //
