@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ lo ka sto tra pU dza tan+t+ra nA ma no pi ka san+ta ka~M/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad

bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs kyi phrin las ma lus pa yang dag par bsgrub par mdzad pa/ mthu dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / gzugs kyis 'jigs par byed pa/ gtum po dang / drag shul can dang / dregs pa

can dang / stobs can dang / bzod par dka' ba dag myur du 'dul bar byed pa/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po de kho na nyid las phyung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtso bo sa chen

po mthar phyin pa la rab tu bzhugs pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i dbang phyug lha'i rigs rnams kyi bdag po chen po lcang lo can gyi gnas dang ri rab kyi gnas kyi gnod sbyin rnams kyi ded dpon chen po de/

'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzangs na bzhugs ste/ dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs bkye nas tshig 'di skad du bskul te/ kye kye gsang

bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /bstan pa dam pa bsrung ba yi/ /mthu stobs bdag por dbang bskur te/ /dam tshig chen po de gzigs la/ /sku gsung thug kyi gsang ba las/ /'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa yi/ /

sku mchog drag po'i gsung dang bcas/ /gtum po'i thugs kyis shugs phyung la/ /gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ /sprul pa snga 'phrul phrin las kyis/ /sngon gyi thugs dam rol par mdzod zhes bskul ma thag tu bcom ldan

'das de sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/ /nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chos nyid de bzhin las ma g.yos kyang gdul bar bya ba'i yul drag shul can rnams la gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu nam mkha'i

mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khro bo chen po'i gzugs 'di lta ste/ sku mdog mthing nag zhal dgu pa la/ g.yas kyi zhal ni kham nag gtsigs pa/

g.yon gyi zhal ni smug nag bsdus pa/ dbus kyi zhal ni mthing nag khro zhing rngam pa/ phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje 'bar bas g.yon gyi thod khrag dkrug cing gsol ba/ g.yas 'og ma brgyad na lha chen po bsgral ba'i mgo gcad de bsnams

la/ g.yon 'og ma brgyad na klu chen po brgyad kyi mgo bsnams paH de dag kyang g.yang gzhi dang bcas pa/ g.yas kyi spyan dgu gyen la bzlog pa/ g.yon gyi spyan dgu 'phred la gzigs pa/ dbus kyi spyan dgu mthur la sdang mig

mdzad pa/ khro gnyer drag po dpral bar bsdus pa/ shangs nas srid pa'i rlung drag po 'tshub pa/ zhal nas bskal pa'i me 'bar ba/ mche ba dmar po bar snang khams su gtsigs pa/ sma ra ag tshom sprin bzhin du gtib paH dbu skra ral

pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar zhing 'khyil ba/ snyan nas gdug pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa/ sbrul gyi chun pos yan lag dkris pa/ bdud dang ru tra bsgral ba dang glang po che'i lpags pa na bzar gsol ba/ stag gi lpags pas sku smad

dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig le dang ri mos brgyan pa/ thal chen gyi lus la byugs pa/ thod ba skam po dang rlon pa dang / sha khrag ra ri can gyis phreng bar byas nas brgyan pa/ zhabs brgyad kyi tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug

chen po dang / rgya byin chung ma dang bcas pa dag mnan pa/ yum chen mo rab tu gtum mo 'jigs byed ma rang gi sku dang mtshungs pa zhig dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ grangs med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa thams

cad kyang / oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ zhes bya ba'i gsung sgra drag po 'byin pa/ de dag re re las kyang sprul pa dang sprul pa'i yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang bar mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams

kyi dregs pa can lha'i tshogs dang / bdud dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / gza' bdud dang / klu dang / rgyal po dang / ging dang / ma mo chen mo rnams dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang / ru tra dang / mu stegs dang / srog

gi bdag po dang / nor gyi bdag po dang / tshe'i bdag po dang / sngags kyi bdag po dang / srid pa'i bdag po dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / dur khrod chen po dang / yul chen po dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mtha' 'khob kyi sa dang /

ri'i rgyal po dang / ri phra mo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu bran dang / yongs su 'du ba'i shing dang / nags tshal chen po dang / gnas phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can pho dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa dang / gtso bo dang /

'khor dang khyad par rgyu ba dang / bran dang g.yog gi tshogs dang bcas pa dag gisaH rang rang gi gnas nas myur ba dngang zhing skrag la 'jigs pa dang yang ba'i sems dang / dul ba'i sems kyis 'thon teH bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rlung drag

po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du rang dbang med par lhags par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa dang / khyad par du mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gling bzhi dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang /

rol pa'i chu klu'i gnas dang bcas pa/ ri rab chen po dang / ri bdun gyi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / lha'i gnas 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang bcas pa dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang /

byol song gi gnas na gnas pa dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sa'i cha na gnas pa'i dregs pa can rnams so so nas rang rang gi mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi byin dpag tu med pa/ gzhan dag gis nye ba'i thugs mi thub pa re re 'dug pa mthong ste/ de

dag thams cad tha dad du rang rang gi sde dpon chen po rnams la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/ /sde dpon chen po rnams ni 'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang gi 'khor dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/ thams cad kyi rang rang

gi gzugs dang longs spyod dang 'khor dang / rgyan dang bzhon pa dang gnas dang nye bar bde bar spyod pa phrin las khyad par ma lus par ston cing / ming gi snying po rnams mngon du phyung ste smras so/ /ma hA de ba e dzaH/ u ma de ba e dzaH/ d+hu pra

ma du phrag dzaH /dun+ti ma du dzaH/ ces 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yum bdud pho mo dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang rang gi ming phul ba'o/ /de nas gshin rje'i ded dpon rang gi tshogs dang bcas pas rang rang gi ming dang srog dang bcas pa phul

ba/ hrIHSh+Ti kr-iSh+Na ya ma pre ta dzaH/ ma ma ya mun+t+ri b+hi tri dzaH zhes phul lo/ /de nas srin po'i sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming gi snying poH/ rAk+Sha ra sha ra ma ti rak+Sha ma shu ti dzaH zhes phul lo/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor

dang bcas pa'i ming dang srog gi snying po yak+Sha ku be rak+Sha ta me yak+Shi ma sha dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi gnod sbyin lha'i sde dpon kha ba can gyi dbang pos rang gi ming phul ba/ /ga~M b+ha b+ha ta tra d+he ba ta ru ti dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi rgyal

phran gyi ded dpon lha'i the bcu gsum gyi bdag pos ming phul baH ga~M ta pa sha li ba ra tri saM ka ra sha dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas spyi bdud kyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po smras paH duspra sha~M dza a ka ru ka~M tsa dzaHzhes phul lo/ /

de nas ye shes dang las la grub pa'i dang dam tshig gi tshogs kyi bdag mo srid pa dbang bsdud ma dngaH ral pa gcig ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kun gyi rang rang gi snying po phul baH ma ma trag mu tra ra tsa e ka dza ti ru ru ro tiSh+Ta b+hat+to re tu ma ti

kha mun+t+ra pa tsa la me sha dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi lha btsan po dang / ru tra'i rigs kyi ded dpon chen po rnams kyi rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ de ba a b+hi shu tri ru tra ni ji ha~M sha~M tri dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi bgegs kyi

rgyal po dang / mu stegs byed pa dang / bdud rmu ba'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ bi nA ya ka tir+thi ta ka du mun mun baH zhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi srog gi bdag po dang / gnod sbyin klu'i bdag po rdo rje can

dang / bla'i rgyal po chen po dngaH lha'i dbang phyug nag po chen po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ ging+ka ra tri pa le rA dza badzra bu ru lu dza badzra la ru tri dza ma hA kA la yak+Shi dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi klu

dang gza' skar gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi srog gi snying po phyung ba nA ga tsi ta hu ya nA ga me k+She tra hu la g+hu he pa sha mi ke hU~M dzaHzhes phul lo/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa'i dbang phyug ma rungs pa'i

'khor dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi lus dang srog dang bcas pa/ /e a nri dzaHsa ma ya srog breng breng dzaHdzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dbugs phyung nas mi 'jigs pa

byin te 'di skad du/ kye ma 'jig rten grags pa'i tshogasaH khyed rnams nga la ma 'jigs shigaH nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyiH sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las bdagaH chos nyid zhi ba chen po yiH thugs rje

dang ni ye shes kyisaH dus gsum 'dus byas 'dus ma byasaH skad cig nyid la mngon du gsalaH ma 'ongs sems can don gyi phyiraH sna tshogs lus kyi gsang ba stonaH dregs pa'i sde dpon khyed rnams kyangaH thog ma

med nas da lta'i b.raH nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur teH gnas ngan len gyi bag chags kyisaH lus ngag yid kyis mi dger spyodaH 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chadaH na rag chen por lhung nas niH thar pa'i

dus med 'byung srid kyisaHde bas da lta'i dus mchog 'diraH nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyisaH sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dngaH mdzad pa'i phrin las rab son laH bsgo ba'i gsung bzhin nyan par gyisaH
las dang srid pa don yod laH mi dge'i bag chags dor bar gyisaH bslab pa'i gzhi bzung sems bskyed laH mthu stobs nus pa drag shul dgaH sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rjes su spyodaH rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka'

bzhin skyongasaH khyed cag rgyal po rje dpon dngaH bran g.yog tshul du lus brten paH dngos grub gsol zhing phrin las sgrubasaH gal te de ltar mi byed cingaH gsang ba'i tshig las 'gal byed naH khyed kyi lus sems
srog gi rgyudaH da lta nyid du ma rungs 'gyur zhes bka' stsal nas dam pa'i mtha' tshigs la bkod nas bzhag go/ 'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs rab tu 'dul ba gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //

de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i dbang phyug chen po yab yum la sogs pa'i dregs pa can gyi 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i bdag po
chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag /'jig rten gnas pa'i drag shul canaH 'dod chags zhe sdang sred len gyisaH gang gis mchod cing brten byas nasaH bdag cag rnams

ni dga' mgu rangasaH khyod kyi bka' lung rjes bzhin duH brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de dag laH phrin las spyod pa'i grogs bya'i phyiraH bdag cag so so'i gnas dang dusaH rang gi sde dang 'khor g.yog dpungaH 'thun pa'i

las dang longs spyod dngaH cha lugs rigs dang bsam pa dngaH khams dang byed pa'i tshul dag dngaH dam tshig sbyor ba'i khyad par dgaH bdag cag rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'iH rig pa'i tshul 'dzin don phyir ruH
ma lus rgyas par bshad du gsol zhes gsol pasaH de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnamasaH so so'i las dang gcig tu sbas pa dngaH

tha dad du sbyar ba dang / nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / rim pa dang 'chol ba dang / phyi dang nang dang / gsang ba dngaH sbas pa dang / 'tshogs pa dang / 'thor ba dang / 'thun pa'i rdzas dang / snying

po dang / ma ga pa dang / gnyer gtad pa dang / skul ba dang / rbad pa dang / bzlog pa dang / tshar gcad pa dang / gzir ba dang / spogs pa dang / las sna tshogs pa dag gi sgo nasaH rol pa chen po'i gsang

ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dam tshig chen po las phyung ste bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig 'jig rten dreg pa'i tshogasaH phyi ma'i tshe na snyigs ma'i dusaH dge sbyong chen po'i bstan pa 'diH so so skye bo rnams la snangaH

nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshulaH rdo rje 'chang ba rnams kyi skuH rgyud dag sa lam rdzogs la gsalaH spros med chos sku 'du 'bral medaH ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs bas 'grub 9\u0f7f1 bsam pa tshe snga smon pa yisaH
rigs drug so so'i bdag por snangaH las kyi dregs pas khyed rnams niH 'jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa yisaH gtum zhing dpa' la ches dpa' bsaH gdul zhing drag par nus pa lasaH zhi bas 'dul bar mi

'gyur teH rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu niH stobs ldan dregs tshogs kun 'dul baH khams gsum spyi la dbang sgyur byedaH nga dang gnyis mer sbyor ba yisaH las kyi bya ba rab rdzogs pasaH dur khrod chen po rab
'jigs pasaH byin gyis brlabs pa'i dben sa ruH sgrib byang bsod nams bsags pas dngaH bar chod bdud bzlog las la 'badaH 'thun rdzas sa la pho brang bzhengasaH dam tshig drag po'i rdzas kyis branaH
thod mkhar bang mdzod ldan pa 'amaH e khram grangs dang sbyar bar byaH dregs pa'i lus ngag yid gnas brtenaH ngas bshad tshul dang 'thun par dgodaH phyi rol sgo sogs brgyan 'jigs ldanaH dur khrod chen

po sngon du phyungaH tsa ra ma he chu glang dngaH seng ge glang chen rta nag dngaHbya khyi lug nag rnga mo dngaH stag dang bya rgod khyi phag gnagaH bdur bya chu srin nya rus sbalaH rgod dkar rgod gnag rta dkar dmaraH so

bya dre'u ba glang rnamasaH rgyal mtshan sha khrag snying dang bcasaH so so'i 'thun pa'i gnas su bshamaH 'bru bzang bshos dang dam tshig rdzasaH bdud rtsi sha khrag snying sbyar baH rin chen bcud kyis sbrengs ba niH grangs

mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir bzhagaH gdugs dang ba dan bla res dngaH lda ldi dra ba za ra tshagasaH 'di la shis shing 'thun pas teH stag gzig dom dred 'phar spyang dngaH kAng+ka dur bya bya rgod khraH mi rta ba glang ke le yiH

sha rgyus lpags pa mgo yis byaH mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wA~M gaH ral gri chu gri spu gri dngaH tri sh+'ul phur pa so mangs dngaH mtshon cha drag pos skor zhing masaH mdzes dang mi mdzes snyan mi snyanaH dri nga ba dang gdang

ba dngaH kha mngar tsha skyur rtsub pa dngaH tsha grang 'jam rtsub dro dang bsilaH gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams kyisaH ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gtaraH de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa desaH phyi nang gsang ba'i bsrung ba yisaH gnod cing 'tshe

ba tshar gcad deH bsod nams tshogs kyis rang rgyud sbyangaH gzhan phan byang chub sems kyis bsgrubaH chos rnams gnas lugs bzhin du sgomaH ma mthong ba la snying rje bskyedaH ngo bo skyed rgyu hU~M du sgomaH de las snod kyi

gzhi mo lngaH ye shes 'byung ba lnga ru bsamaH steng du rin chen ri rab kyiH dbus su dur khrod gzhal med khangaH thod mkhar e tra~M sum bcu paH gzugs brnyan bzhin du ting 'dzin skyedaH dbus su nyi zla pad+ma dngaH

ro bzhi snol ba'i steng nyid duH rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsung thugasaH nga nyid kun la snang bzhin bsamaH yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul maH gtso dang gnyis med sbyor ba lasaH thabs dang shes rab 'od zer lasaH
e dgu'i rnam pa sa bon tshulaH 'phro 'dus gri gug kha T+wA~M gsalaH de nyid gsal ba'i rgyud sbyangs pasaH 'dod khams dbang phyug gtso bo cheH lha mo yum dang bcas par 'gyuraH seng ge glang

chen zhabs kyis gnonaH zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rngamaH na bza' ljang nag klubs ber gsolaH gtso chen gri gug tsit+ta bsnamasaH yum gyis kha T+wA~M thod khrag bzungaH yab yum gnyis med thugs ka

nasaH ya man dun+ti rak+Sha ta yak+Sha lasaH phyogs bzhir bdud dang gshin rje dngaH srin po gnod sbyin sde dpon dngaH yab yum bcas pa gsal bar sproH gra he nA ga steng 'og tu ni bdud klu gza'iH sde dpon

yab yum spro zhing bskyedaH de ba tri dzaHdu tri taH gang bzang lha dang rnam rgyal dngaH spyi bdud sde dpon shar du skyedaH ma ma~M dza tiHd+ha ki lasaH ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo dngaH ral gcig ma dang 'gyogs byed maH

mo tshogs sde dpon lho phyogs su'o/ /ru traHa b+hiH ha~M sha~M lasaH lha sbyin btsan dmar ril btsan gyiH sde dpon nub kyi phyogs su skyedaH bi traH ti thiHrmu du lasaH bgegs dang mu stegs rmu bdud kyiH

sde dpon byang gi phyogs su bskyedaH tri ya~MHra tri sa tri na tri lasaH srid pa'i srog gi bdag po dngaH gnod sbyin klu tsha bdud rgyal poH sku lha gsang ba rdo rje legasaH nag po chen po chos bsrung rjeH shar lho nub byang sgo

bzhir bskyedaH phyi rol 'khyams su dregs pa canaH so so'i g.yog 'khor mang po dgaH bka' nyan gsung sdod tshul du bskyedaH rang rang sngags kyis bstan par byaH dbang po'i tshul du gsal ba dngaH 'jig rten rang

rgyud so so yiH gnas nas 'od kyis bkye ba dngaH gsang ba'i snying pos myur du bodaH ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul 'dra baH rang gi gzugs brnyan lus la bstimaH rang rgyud pa dang gzugs brnyan 'dresaH \u0f00 AH hU~M/

\u0f00 badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaTaH sku gsung thugs ldan byin brlab cingaH rdo rje 'chang bas dbang bskur byaH dur khrod gnas kyi sgo bzhi nasaH bka' nyan las byed sde brgyad kyisaH lus ngag gus pas
phyag 'tshal zhingaH phyi nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon tshogasaH 'tshe zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa canaH gzugs can gzugs med bcas pa yisaH dregs pa'i tshogs la mnyes par dbulaH sku yi cha lugs so so
yiH don brtags 'thun pa'i tshig gis bstodaH sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dngaH phrin las smos te thugs dam skulaH rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugasaH gsal bstan tshad dang ldan pa yisaH nam
mkha'i khams kun mthas khyab kunaH rang gi yul gsum gsal bar dmigasaH dregs pa'i sde dpon re re'i drungaH sdul snyed 'dul byed gnyen po gnasaH phal pa re re'i gnas drung duH sde dpon chen po de
bzhin bsamaH bka' nyan gsung sdod g.yo mi nusaH cung tsam 'da' bar mi spyod cingaH rang gi 'dod pa mi spobs laH skad cig tsam la don sgrub dmigasaH de nyid kyis ni gtso chen gyisaH bsnyen cing bsgrub
pa tshad rtags ldanaH yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas niH dregs pa'i ded dpon tshogs rnams kyisaH so so'i gzugs brnyan gsal btab steH rang gi ming gi snying po dngaH gcod 'phrog yi ge spos te bzlasaH

dus tshad grangs dang mtshan ma yisaH tshad bzung ma nor grub pa yisaH rtags la phab ste las la sbyaraH nga nyid rjes su sgrub byed pasaH dregs pa myur du dbang du sdud zhes bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten pa'i ded dpon
gyi tshogs nye bar sgrub pa'i rtsa ba'i las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u steH gnyis pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya baH 'di dag kun la ngas bshad pa'iH sde dpon chen po rang gnas nasaH bod dang bzhug
dang mnyes pa dngaH bstod dang thugs dam bskul ba dgaH tshig brjod 'di yis brtan par byaH thugs rje rnam dag dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nasaH chos sku stong nyid dbyings las ma
g.yos kyangaH 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyiraH khro chen dpa' gtum 'jigs byed skur bstan paH thugs dam dgyes bskul gsang ba'i yum dang bcasaH ma rtogs
shugs kyis 'dul phyir gshegs su gsolaH dregs pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten lha yi gtsoH 'dod pa'i lha mo bde chen 'byung gnas maH 'khor tshogs drag shul mthu stobs dpung gi bdagaH khro gtum

gdug pa'i rtsal 'chang dpal dang ldanaH rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin rjes su sgrubaH dam tshig rjes dgongs gnas 'dir gshegs su gsolaH badzra sarba duSh+Tan+ta a ta na ya e dza b+h+yoH a gats+tsha sa ma ya hring hringaH

dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'diraH lha chen nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs suH bcom ldan khro rgyal rngam brjid 'bar ba'i skuH yab yum da gyes par rol cing bzhugs su gsolaH snang srid dregs pa

ma lus ded dpon gtso/ /'dod khams bdag po dgyes mdzad yum dang bcasaH lha srin tshogs kyi gtso chen 'khor dang bcasaH phrin las 'thun pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsolaH badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e dza b+h+yoH

sa ma ya sti ta badzra hU~M dzaHdus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyi snying po mchogaH chos kyi sku las gzugs sku 'gro don sprulaH che btsan 'gran zla med pa khro bo'i rjeH dbang bsdud yum dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstodaH

phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus sras dang bcasaH dam bcas bstan pa'i tshul bsrung 'jig rten mgonaH zhing bcu sgrol mdzad phrin las drag shul canaH sde dpon sum bcu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ \u0f7f /badzra sarba

duSh+Tan a ta na ya e dza b+h+yoH na ma A ra li hoH dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum laH sku gsung thugs mnyes mchod pa 'bul ba niH gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bla re dngaH phreng ba phye ma lda ldi za ra

tshagasaH bdug spos me tog mar me chab bsil dngaH gzugs mdzes sgra snyan dri zhim ro bro dngaH reg 'jam 'dod yon ma lus ji snyed pa'iH 'phags pa'i thun mong mchod tshogs bzhes su gsolaH khyad par gsang

ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba niH dus gsum gnas su sbyangs pa'i sha rus khragaH dug lnga sman du grub pa'i dam tshig rdzasaH stobs mchog nus pa ba ling mchod pa dngosaH thugs rjes 'thun pa'i ngang gis bzhes su
gsolaH dpal chen yab yum bka' bzhin rjes sgrub pa'iH dbang phyug chen po yab yum mnga' bdag rjeH 'jig rten 'das kyang 'khor ba'i cha lugs 'dzinaH bka' yi bstan bsrungs sde dpon sum bcu laH

'dod pa'i yon tan mchod cing sbyin pa niH dkar dmar ser ljang la sogs mdogaH zlum po gru bzhi la sogs dbyibasaH che chung sbom 'phra ring thung tshadaH mdzes dang mi mdzes sdug mi sdugaH 'byung ba rten 'brel

rol mo'i sgraH glu tshigs bstod dbyangs snyan pa'i tshigaH spos sman bdud rtsi me tog driH bsreg sungs ba~M sungs dri dang ngadaH kha mngar tsha skyur bska ba dngaH lan tshwa spod dang bye skyu dngaH 'jam rtsub bsil yang tsha

dang broH so so'i yon tan tshogs dang bcasaH 'dod dgur 'bul gyis bzhes su gsolaH bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dngaH don snying lnga dang 'byung ba lngaH dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dngaH phung po lnga dang nang rol lngaH

'tshe zhing gsod dang bar du gcodaH gdug par sems shing log par ltaH mi mthun phyogs lngar bcas pa rnamasaH so sor 'bul gyis bzhes su gsolaH badzra sarba duSh+TAn a ta na ya e tsa dza b+h+yoH ma hA ba lin+ta:
a mr-i taH su ka taH mA~M saH rak+taH pi pa taH bA su taH la ma taH i da~M gr-i h+Nan+tu sa ma duH kha khaHkhA hi khA hiH bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul dngaH yum chen khams gsum

spyi 'dul 'khor bcas kyisaH sku mdog 'gyur med me long gzugs brnyan bzhinaH gsal zhing rtog med snang ba ma 'gags paH sku lnga lhun grub rdzogs pa'i dngos grub gsolaH gsung mchog 'gag med brag cha sgra brnyan

bzhinaH snyan dang mi snyan grags stong tshangs pa'i gsungaH gsung dbyangs nam mkha'i mthas khyab dngos grub gsolaH thugs mchog spros bral bsam 'das chos kyi dbyingasaH mi rtog bde chen thabs dang shes rab dngaH

rtsol med mi g.yo mchog gi dngos grub gsolaH yon tan brjod kyis mi lang sna tshogs yodaH 'das dang ma 'das mchog dang thun mong giH grub pa brgyad dang mthar thug dngos grub gsolaH 'jigs pa brgyad sogs

zhi dang 'byor pa rgyasaH log lta mos pa'i tshul gyis dbang du bdudaH mngon spyod dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i dngos grub gsolaH badzra sarba duSh+TAn a ta na ya e dza kA ya sid+d+hiH bA ka sid+d+hiH tsit+ta sid+d+hiH gu Na sid+d+hiH kar+m+ma sid+d+hiH

hU~M hU~M hU~MH bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul niH dbu dgu phyag ni bcwa brgyad deH sku mdog mthing nag khro zhing rngamaH g.yas kyi zhal gsum smu nag bgradaH g.yon gyi zhal gsum kham nag gtsigasaH

dbu skra ral pa me dpung 'baraH spyan dgu sdang mig bzlog cing bgradaH shangs nas srid pa'i rlung nag 'thoraH snyan nas stong gsum 'brug sgra 'diraH sma ra ag tshom me ltar 'baraH mche gtsigs srid gsum

rtsa ba gcodaH phyag dgu g.yas g.yon dang po yisaH rdo rjes thod khrag dkrug cing gsolaH g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'og ma naH dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral ba yiH g.yang gzhi mgo bor bcas te bsnamasaH g.yon
gyi phyag brgyad 'og ma naH klu chen brgyad kyi ban d+ha ruH dregs pa'i snying khrag bkang nas gsolaH dpa' bo'i chas brgyad sku la rdzogasaH zhabs brgyad brkyang bskum dor stabs kyisaH

khams gsum bdag po sde bzhi mnanaH yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul maH zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag skuH rdo rje 'phyar zhing thod khrag stobaH gnyis med thugs kyi phrin las kyisaH 'jig rten dregs pa bran
du 'kholaH lha srin sde brgyad las la 'gyedaH dgra bgegs gdug pa rtsad nas gcodaH khro rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal bstodaH dpal gyi bka' bzhin las mdzad pa'iH lha chen dbang phyug chen po niH zhal
gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthingaH phyag g.yas gri gug tsit+ta g.yonaH lha mo u mA de ba niH sku mdog mthing nag gtso la 'dudaH phyag g.yas rtse gsum thod khrag g.yonaH seng ge glang chen gdan la
bzhugasaH sde dpon dregs pa kun gyi gtsoH yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstodaH bdud kyi rgyal po'i sde dpon niH khram shing g.yas la dgra sta g.yonaH bdud rta nag po'i khri la bzhugasaH sbyor yum bdud
mo re ma tiH khrag bam g.yas la nad rkyal g.yonaH bong bu gwa dmar gdan la bzhugasaH gshin rje'i sde dpon chen po niH be con g.yas la thod dbyug g.yonaH sbyor yum gshin rje za byed moH phyag gnyis

srid pa'i 'khor lo skoraH yab yum ma he chu glang gnonaH srin po'i sde dpon glog phreng canaH phyag gnyis thog ser 'dril zhing 'phenaH srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig maH phyag g.yas phur pa khrag phor g.yonaH

yab yum 'brug dang rnga mo gnonaH gnod sbyin sde dpon me sbal niH phyag g.yas rin chen g.yon ral griH sbyor yum gnod sbyin nag mo niH phyag g.yas spu gri g.yon sbyang moH stag seng phag mo zhabs kyis mnanaH
bza' bdud ded dpon chen po niH phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon sbrul zhagasaH sku smad sbrul 'khril 'brug chen gnonaH sbyor yum thog gi bu yug canaH g.yas g.yon phyag gis thog ser 'bebasaH klu rgyan ded
dpon chen po niH phyag g.yas sbrul zhags g.yon nad rkyalaH sbyor yum klu mo nag mo niH sbrul mgo phyag mtshan yab kyi tshulaH yab yum chu srin rus sbal gnonaH phyogs bzhi steng 'og gnas bzhugs
pa'iH dregs pa'i ded dpon 'di dag niH kun kyang sku mdog mthing nag laH 'khros pa'i cha byad 'jigs tshul canaH dur khrod g.yang gzhi'i chas kyis brgyanaH rang gi tshogs 'dus 'phrin las mdzadaH yab
yum bcas la phyag 'chal bstodaH gnod sbyin lha yi rgyal po niH shel gri ba dan dkar po 'dzinaH rgod dkar ru bzang zhabs kyis mnanaH gnam rgyal chen po ded dpon niH phyag g.yas ldan dkar g.yon
shel griH rta dkar rdog dmar zhabs kyis mnanaH spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum rtseH phyag g.yas ba dan g.yon shel griH zhabs gnyis rdo rta rdo bo gnonaH dkar po'i ded dpon chen po gsumaH shar phyogs
gnas la phyag 'chal bstodaH srid pa'i ma mo ded dpon moH 'khor lo g.yas la me long g.yonaH zhabs gnyis 'brug mo mgo dgu gnonaH sngags kyi bsrungs ma chen mo niH tsit+ta g.yas la spyang mo g.yonaH
dre rta nag mo zhabs kyis gnonaH mkha' 'gro nag mo 'gyogs byed maH rgyu zhags g.yas la mtshon gru g.yonaH so bya nag po zhabs kyis gnonaH nag mo'i ded dpon ma mo gsumaH lho phyogs gnas la
phyag 'tshal bstodaH rdo rje bdud 'dul nag po niH g.yas g.yon phyag gis thun khrag 'phenaH brag btsan srog zan dmar po niH mda' gzhu 'phen zhing dar dmar 'phyaraH che btsan 'gong rgyal chen po niH

shag lang dang ni zhags pa 'dzinaH dmar po'i ded dpon rgyal po gsumaH kun kyang rta dmar zhabs kyis gnonaH nub phyogs skyong la phyag 'tshal bstodaH bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyalaH phyag g.yas kha T+wA~M g.yon thod

khragaH phyi rol skyong ba'i mu stegs gtsoH tri sh+'ul g.yas la thong khrag g.yonaH rmu bdud chen po phrag med niH mda' gzhu dang ni shang lang 'dzinaH nag po'i tshogs kyi ded dpon gsumaH bdud rta nag po zhabs kyis

gnonaH byang phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstodaH tshangs pa'i rgyal po srog gi bdagaH spu gri g.yas la nyi zhags g.yonaH seng ge dkar po zhabs kyis gnonaH bdud kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdagaH bdud zhags g.yas

la spu gri g.yonaH ban glang sna rings zhabs kyis gnonaH sku lha'i rgyal po yul gyi bdagaH phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon pa danaH ra dkar gnam ru zhabs kyis gnonaH nag po chen po tshogs kyi bdagaH phyag g.yas be con

g.yon thod khragaH rta nag mgyogs pa zhabs kyis gnonaH phyogs kyi sde dpon chen po bzhiH sku mdog dkar ser dmar nag mdzesaH sgo bzhir gnas la phyag 'tshal bstodaH sde dpon dregs pa 'di dag niH khro zhing gtum

pa'i tshul 'chang zhingaH na bza' g.yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i chasaH sna tshogs mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldanaH rang gi 'khor g.yog tshogs kyis skoraH sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam mi khyabaH mchod bstod chen pos khyed sgrubs

naH so so'i tshogs 'dul phrin las mdzodaH zhes brjod ting 'dzin ldan pa yisaH dregs pa'i ded dpon mchod cing bstodaH 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyisaH 'jig rten gtso bdag gzhung bzhin sgrubaH rdo rje 'dzin
dang gnyis su medaH zhes bka' stsal to/ \u0f7f 'jig rten gyi ded dpon nye bar bsgrub pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mchod bstod kyi le'u steH gsum pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya baH
'jig rten dregs pa dbang sdud cingaH tshar gcad las la skol ba'i phyiraH byin brlabs gnas pa'i dbang bskur bshadaH gsang zhing dben pa'i gnas dag tuH sngar bshad las kyi

pho brang bsham/ /yo byad rdzas kyi khyad par 'phagasaH ma lus par ni gzung bar byaH rdo rje 'chang ba rjes 'brang bcasaH mtshan nyid ldan pa mngon sum sbyaraH dus kyi grangs dang mtshan ma'i rtagasaH
bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'badaH gzugs brnyan bdag po slob ma rnamasaH khyad par gnas pa'i sta gon byaH bris dang skos pa la sogs pa'iH sde dpon rnams kyis gzugs brnyan dngaH phur pa
grangs dang mnyam par dgramaH gzhan yang bum pa mchod gtor dngaH dug gtor thun gtor thun rdzas dngaH sha khrag bshos chang bza' btung sogasaH rgyal mtshan ba dan mda' dang gzhuH dpa' ba'i chas

dang rol mo'i sgraH rab tu brdar zhing mdzes par bshamaH rdo rje 'dzin pas ting 'dzin bsaraH las kyi rgyal pos mchod bstod byaH rgyu dang mdangs kyis thugs dam bkangaH bshags dral bcugs spyang dbab pa

byaH mos shing spros bdag dang ba yisaH bdud 'dul gtso la skyabs su 'groH bstan pa bsrung bar sems bskyed deH bla ma sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzinaH he ru ka dang gnyis med laH gdug byed log lta 'dul nus pa'iH
mthu dbang chen po'i gzhung 'tshal gyiH brtse ba'i thugs kyis dgongs nas niH dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug tu gsolaH nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi buH dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugasaH gnas pa'i
bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyiraH spro bas 'jug pa khyod lags kyisaH mngon spyod brtul zhugs dam pa yisaH dam tshig chen po'i sar 'dug shogaH mgon po he ru ka dpal rjeH 'dul ba'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa

yiH drag shUl spyod pa'i pho brang duH mdzes pa'i me tog bdag dbul gyisaH rdo rje dam tshig 'di bzhes laH dregs pa 'dul nus dngos grub stsolaH pra ti gr-ih+Na puSh+pa hU~MHdpal ldan rdo rje 'chang pa'iH

rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu khyod niH thog ma med nas da lta'i b.raH bstan pa bsrung ba'i skal ldan teH sde dpon dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'diraH bstan la rab dga' sems kyis ltosaH badzra ya sa ma ya ma d+ha la

tsag shu pra be sha ya phaTaH rdo rje bdud rtsi dam tshig chuH 'di las dus gsum 'da' mi byaH grub pa'i 'bras bu gnyis yin teH tshul bzhin mi 'da' bros dor cigaH ma hA sa ma ya i da n+te nA ra kAn ShA ba mi la~MH

rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin cheH thugs rjes rtag tu byin brlab phyiraH 'di nas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi b.raH mthu stobs dngos grub stsal du gsolaH badzra sa ma ya tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hU~MH thog ma'i sangs rgyas sras

bcas kyiH rjes su sgrub pa bdag yin gyisaH 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'iH lha dang dregs pa mthu stobs canaH gtso dang 'khro du bcas rnams kyisaH sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dgongasaH rdo rje slob
ma rig 'dzin laH dbang bskur dngos grub rtsol mdzad paH nus chen rtags mtshan bstan du gsolaH rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan gyisaH khri stan chen po'i steng 'dug laH snod ldan slob ma mdun bzhag steH
dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i bum pa yisaH sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur byaH gnyen po gtso dang gdul bya'i yulaH dregs chen yab yum 'khor bcas kyiH mdzes pa'i sku gzugs sku yi dbangaH so
so'i tshig bstod snying po dngaH smon lam bcas pa gsung gi'oH rang rgyud gnas dag don rtags kyisaH chos skur dbang bskur thugs kyi'oH rigs sbyangs stobs la ngang gi gsalaH phur pa drag
shul rdzas kyi dbangaH mchod gtor bshos cha sku gsung thugasaH ma lus mnyes par byed pas teH yo byad tshogs kyi longs spyod spelaH rgyal mtshan ba dan sgra
dang bcasaH dus rnams kun tu mnga' thang rgyasaH sha khrag dug gtor thun rdzas rnamasaH dregs pa'i ded dpon dbang sdud cingaH pho nya phrin las bskul mdzad deH mngon spyod gdug pa tshar gcod dbangaH

'di dag kyang ni gzugs brnyan sgraH don ngo shes pas dbang bskur teH chos sku spyi dang dregs pa yiH sde dpon so so'i dam tshig rtsalaH thugs rje dang ni rtogs pa yisaH rang bzhin don gyis sgrol byed pa'iH
dpag med don chen 'dir 'dus teH tha dad mi gnas cig yin noH gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyisaH phyi nang 'khor bcas so sor snangaH ma lus dbang bsdu zil mnan phyiraH so so'i snying po tshad kyis
stimaH nga rgyal brtan po mdun du skyesaH don snying sha rus khrag sogs bza'aH dus gsum tshar gcad dbyings nas dbyungaH gzugs brnyan stims la rab tu gsalaH dbang bsdu las bcol 'dul ba'i
phyiraH zhabs 'og mnan te bran bzhin bsgoH dam tshig rdzas mchod sngar bzhin gsoH dam tshig dbab cing bstod skul bcolaH 'jig rten lha srin khyed rnams kyangaH nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyisaH

zhal mthong lung bstan mchog bstsal paH srid pa'i sa bon phra mo yisaH da rung 'jig rten las la spyodaH rang rgyu da rtsub mos phan gnod sbyoraH nga ni bka' yi dam tshig bzungaH ma 'ongs dus na bsgrub bya dngaH

sgrub par byed pa de dag dngaH mnyam par kun la dbang sgyur teH chos nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogasaH theg mchog ma 'dres cir yang stonaH ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i phyiraH rgyal tshab spyi bor bzhag
gnas paH kun tu bzang po nyid thob 'gyur zhes bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po nye bar bsgrub pa'i rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i le'u steH
bzhi pa'o// \u0f13 // de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs mnyes bya'i phyir/ /'thun rdzas gzugs kyis bkang ba ni/ /ri bo'i rtse mo'i chu bo'i mdo/ /'jig
rten dbang phyug 'du gnas suH skal med yul la mchod sbyin gnasaH thod mkhar ri'u mig dgu sogs samaH yang na gling bzhi ri rab brtsigaH 'bru dang sha khrag sna tshogs paH rin chen spos sman me tog
stsalaH dregs pa bdag po so so yiH gzugs brnyan rang gi 'khor dang bcasaH sku mdog phyag mtshan yongs rdzogs shingaH rang gi gdan khri bzhon par bcibasaH ri rab thod mkhar yang stengs suH lha
chen yab yum 'khor bcas bzhugasaH bang rim re'u mig dang po gsumaH bdud dang gshin rje srin po dngaH gnod sbyin gza' dang klu rnams kyiH sde dpon yab yum 'khor bcas dgodaH gnyis po la
ni dkar po dngaH nag po dmar po nag po'oH sde dpon bcu gnyis gnas su byaH gsum pa'i phyogs bzhir sgo bsrungs bzhiH 'khor bcas rang gi gnas su dgodaH tha ma gsum 'am bzhi pa laH
phyi nang gsang ba sbas pa laH gsang ba'i gter dang drag po sngagasaH las byed btags chags lha ma srinaH sde brgyad gzugs brnyan gnas su dgodaH gtso chen sum bcu'i 'thun rdzas niH rang gi

gdan nam zhon pa yiH srog chags gzugs ni lnga 'am bcuH brgya 'am stong ngam grub tshad byaH skyes pa bud med glang chen rtaH ban glang ra lug bya ra khyiH longs spyod skor rdzas sngar bzhin noH sde brgyad

phal pa kun la niH shes ldan mi dang byol song steH 'dab chags gcan zan ri dgas dngaH sa chur gnas dang dud 'gro'i tshogasaH mthong thos dran pa rnams kyi gzugasaH ji ltar nus pa'i grangs kyis skor/ /

'di dag bkang ba'i yo byad niH 'gro ba'i glud du 'bul ba niH rin chen ngar mi brgyan ldan dngaH nam mkha' sems kyi gzugs brnyan dngaH sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dngaH shing glud yul 'khor mtshon pa dngaH skyes

pa bud med phyag cha dngaH rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnamasaH dregs pa so so'i sku mdog dngaH 'thun pa grangs mnyam gnas su dgodaH mchod gtor bshos cha mar me dngaH gling tshad chung du de bzhin noH bzlog bsad

drag po zor gyi rdzasaH sbyin pa'i sa la zor phor duH gru gsum mnyam byas dug khrag dngaH thun rdzas sna tshogs btsal ba dngaH gdug pa'i shing gi rtsangs phur dngaH ban+d+ha dug thun gtor mar bcasaH bzhi brgyad bcu drug sum bcu gnyisaH

ci rigs sbyar te mdzes par dgodaH steng du zhing lpags g.yang gzhi 'amaH dar nag mtshon skud gdugs kyis dbubaH tha mar ras bzang yol bas breH de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yisaH gtso chen skyed cing rdzogs pa

dngaH dregs pa mchod bstod mnyes byas nasaH gzugs brnyan 'thun rdzas sngo ba niH rnal 'byor ting 'dzin nga rgyal gsaraH bdud rtsi mchod skyems rak+ta sbrengaH sha chen spos kyi dri bsung 'bulaH rnga chen gling bu rol mo

sgra chen sgragasaH mda' chen ba dan nag pos g.yabaH hU~M nga ni dpal chen he ru kaH gdul dka' ma lus 'dul bar byedaH 'jig rten dregs pa zas su zaH khams gsum srid gsum nga yi dbangaH snang srid 'khor 'das

nga yi branaH nga yi bka' bzhin 'dir 'dus shigaH nyon mongs dbang gi dregs pa yiH lha bdud gshin rje srin po dngaH gnod sbyin gza' klu rgyal po dngaH ging dang ma mo lha btsan dngaH rang gi sde dang g.yog du bcasaH dam

tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skongasaH ri rab chen po'i yang stengs nasaH lha chen dbang phyug chen po bzhengasaH btsun mo u ma de ba bzhengasaH na bza' dar nag ber chen

gsolaH chibs su seng ge glang chen chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH g.yas na pho rgyud pho nyar 'gyedaH g.yon na pho rgyud las la 'kholaH 'khor du 'jig rten dregs pas skoraH dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH

'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang / /rtsal gyi rgyal po seng ge dngaH stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen dngaH shes ldan mi dang cang shes rtaH theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i baH rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan dngaH thos gsang khyi dang

mkha' lding byaH khyed kyis bzhes pa'i skor du 'bulaH rin chen brgyan ldan dar mi dngaH sems kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha' dngaH sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dngaH shing ris yul mkhar mtshon pa dngaH pho glud mda' dang

mo glud 'phangaH rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnamasaH nyid kyi sku mdog dang 'thun pa'iH rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bulaH dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dngaH 'thun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dngaH snang gsal 'od ldan

mar me dngaH rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dngaH mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgraH zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i roH khyed kyi thugs dam bkang phyir 'bulaH lha chen yab yum 'khor dang bcasaH sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs

teH mdos glud 'thun rdzas bzhed pa'i skoraH sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes laH sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis bsrungasaH dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod kyis bstodaH rnal 'byor sku dgra khyed kyis sgrolaH sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'iH

stong phrag brgyad bcu'i bgegs rigs rnamasaH bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dngaH glo bur gnod pa brgyad bcu cigaH ye 'drog sum brgya drug bcu'i tshogasaH dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dngaH gshis ngan 'gum pa bcwa lnga dngaH

gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegasaH rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ltas ngan pa rnamasaH zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dngaH gdul dang tshar bcad las mdzod cigaH ri rab chen po'i shar phyogs nasaH sris pa'i

rgyal po skos rje niH bdud rnams kun gyi sde dpon bzhengasaH na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsolaH ral pa nag po mun ltar gtibasaH spyan mig nyi zla 'khyil ba 'draH rno sbal mche ba zla tshes gtsigasaH sma ra kham nag srid rtser

'baraH chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH khram thogs bdud sde g.yas nas rolaH shod thogs rtsis pa g.yon nas 'gyedaH snang srid pho bdud khyod kyi 'khoraH dam tshig dbang gi gnas 'dir bzhugasaH 'thun

pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH shugs ldan rta nag la sogs paH khyod kyis bzhed pa'i skor du 'bulaH rin chen ngar mi la sogs paH rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bulaH dam rdzas mchod gtor la sogs paH khyed kyi thugs

dam bskang phyir 'bulaH srid pa'i bdud rje 'khor bcas kyisaH sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs laH ji ltar bcol ba'i las mdzod cigaH bdud mo chen mo re ma tiH ma bdud kun gyi sde dpon bzhengasaH dpal ldan nag mo 'jigs gzugs

canaH nag mo sha zlog bdud kyi maH sku la mthing nag ber chen gsolaH chibs su bong bu gwa dmar chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyedaH nag mo stong sde las la 'dzudaH snang srid bdud mo khyod

kyi 'khoraH dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH cang shes bong bu la sogs paH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH srid pa'i bdud mo 'khor bcas kyisaH ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzodaH ri rab chen po'i lho

phyogs nasaH gshin rje ya ma rA dza steH gshin rje'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengasaH sku mdog nag po ral pa canaH gdug pa'i thod sbrul g.yang gzhis brgyanaH gcan zan gdug pa'i lpags pas dkrisaH sha za'i mgo gcad thod

du bcingasaH zhal bgrad mche ba rab tu gtsigasaH ma he nag po chibs su chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH gshin rje pho mo pho nyar 'gyedaH 'chi bdag gshin rje btsun mo steH gsod byed mon mo'i tshul 'dzin cingaH

gshin rje mo yi sde dpon bzhengasaH za byed dur khrod chas kyis brgyanaH g.yang gzhi nag mo sku la gsolaH chu glang nag po chibs su chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH yi dgas pho mo las la 'dzudaH snang srid gshin rje khyod

kyi 'khoraH dam tshig dbang gi gnas 'dir bzhugasaH ma he chu glang la sogs paH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH gshin rje pho mo 'khor dang bcasaH ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzodaH ri rab chen po'i nub phyogs

nasaH srin po nag po glog phreng canaH srin po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengasaH sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba laH glog dang 'od kyi phreng bas brgyanaH 'brug chen 'ur pa chibs su chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH srin po 'bum

phrag pho nyar 'gyedaH srin mo gsod byed las la 'dzudaH gcan zan gdug pa phyi nas rolaH 'khor du snang srid srin pos bskoraH srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig maH srin mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengasaH sku mdog dmar nag

'jigs su rungaH lus la khrag gis lwa nag gsolaH rus sbal dkar po'i thor tshugs canaH chibs su rnga mo gdong drug chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH srin mo kha 'bar pho nyar 'gyedaH gdong srin nag mo las la 'dzudaH

snang srid srin mo 'khor dang bcasaH srog gcod srin po yab yum 'khoraH dam tshig dbang gi gnas 'dir bzhugasaH 'brug sngon rnga mo la sogs paH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH srin po pho mo'i 'khor gyis bskoraH

ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzodaH ri rab chen po'i byang phyogs nasaH gnod sbyin yak+Sha me dbal canaH gnod sbyin kun gyi sde dpon bzhengasaH sku mdog mthing sngon 'bar ba laH me dpung tshub ma na bzar gsolaH stag seng rngam

pa chibs su chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH g.yas na me dbal 'bar ba laH g.yon na dud 'thul phyu ru ruH gnod sbyin stong sde pho nyar 'gyedaH zhub chas 'bum sde las la 'dzudaH 'jig rten gnod

sbyin 'khor gyis bskoraH gnod sbyin chen mo blo mon maH gnod sbyin bu mo gdug pa canaH nag mo rdo rje lcags mchu maH snyan cha rin chen ne'u les brgyanaH sku la ba ti nag po gsolaH chibs su lcags kyi phag mo chibasaH

khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH nor 'dzin mo ni pho nyar 'gyedaH klo mon nag mo las la 'dzudaH gnod sbyin mo ni 'bum sdes skoraH shan pa gnod sbyin yab yum 'khoraH dam tshig dbang gi gnas 'dir bzhugasaH stag seng phag mo

la sogs pa'iH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH gnod sbyin pho mo 'khor dang bcasaH ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzodaH ri rab chen po'i steng phyogs suH gza' bdud chen po mi bzad paH rog ti khyab 'jug

rA hu laH gza' bdud sde dpon chen po bzhengasaH mgo dgu smad sbrul mgo mangs lusaH chibs su 'brug chen glog 'gyu chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH 'brug sgra stong gsum ldi ri riH nam mkha' glog 'od khyugs

se khyugasaH gza' bran rgyu skar pho nyar 'gyedaH thog ser ki kang drag tu 'bebasaH gza' bdud stong gi 'khor gyis bskoraH gnam sman thog gi bu yug maH gdong mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengasaH sku mdog dmar skya mdzes pa

laH na bza' gu zu mdzes pa gsolaH 'brug sgra glog gi 'od la zhonaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH gza' chen nyi zla klad la skoraH rgyu skar tshogs ni zhal la 'charaH lha sman 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyedaH gdong zor ma mo
las la 'dzudaH zor gdong srin mo'i 'khor gyis skoraH gza' gdong gnam sman yab yum 'khoraH dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH 'brug chen 'ur pa la sogs pa'iH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs

dam bkangaH gza' bdud gdong mo sman dang bcasaH ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzodaH ri rab chen po'i 'og phyogs nasaH klu bdud nag mo mgo dgu poH klu rnams kun gyi sde dpon yinaH sku stod dud kha nag mo laH tsha

ba'i 'bu srin nyi li liH sku smad dug sbrul nag po laH grang ba'i sbal lcong phra la laH chibs su chu srin mgo dgu chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH klu rgyal stong ni pho nyar 'gyedaH klu bran 'bum ni las la 'dzudaH klu

bdud gdug pa'i 'khor gyis bskoraH klu mo yak+Sha nag mo niH klu bdud ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengasaH sku mdog dud kha 'jigs bag canaH sbrul nag gshibs pa'i ral pa lasaH mdze dang shu ba'i tsha tsha 'phroH sbrul gyi thul ba

na bzar gsolaH sbal sbrul nye'u tha ra raH ru sbal nag po chibs su chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH klu rigs lnga yi sprul pa 'gyedaH sa bdag gdug pa'i pho nya gtongaH snang srid klu mo'i 'khor dang bcasaH gdug pa klu

bdud yab yum 'khoraH dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH chu srin ru sbal la sogs pa'iH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH klu bdud pho mo yab yum 'khoraH ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzodaH ri rab

chen po mdzes pa yiH bang rim gnyis pa'i shar phyogs laH gnod sbyin rgyal po gang ba bzangaH srid pa lha yi sde dpon bzhengasaH mdog dkar ral ka 'bar ba gsolaH gnam ru dkar po chibs su chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul

ston pa niH gnod sbyin stong ni pho nyar 'gyedaH lha dmag 'bum sde las la 'dzudaH ba dan can ni g.yas nas rolaH go mtshon can ni g.yon nas rolaH gnod sbyin lha yi 'khor dang bcasaH skyes bu gnam rgyal chen po niH rgyal

phran kun gyi sde dpon bzhengasaH na bza' dar zab ber chen gsolaH rta dkar rngog dmar chibs su chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH rgyal bran stong sde pho nyar 'gyedaH grong rgyu phra mo las la 'dzudaH the rgyal phra mo'i 'khor dang

bcasaH spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum rtseH mi ma lha yi sde dpon bzhengasaH sku stod rgya che'i glag pa gsolaH 'bum bye sman gyi sham thabs canaH dbu la shel smog dkar po gsolaH chibs su rdo rta dro bo chibasaH khyod

kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH srid pa'i khyung chen klad na ldingaH stag seng tshang ma phyi nas rolaH sde dpon mched lnga pho nyar 'gyedaH ma sangs spun dgu las la 'dzudaH lha ma srin gyi 'khor dang bcasaH skyes bu dkar po sde gsum yangaH

dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH gnam ru rta dkar dro bo chibasaH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH dkar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcasaH ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzodaH bam rim gnyis pa'i lho phyogs

nasaH ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo niH snang srid ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengasaH na bza' dar nag gu zu gsolaH chibs su 'brug mo yid mgyogs chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH tshogs kyi rje mo pho nyar 'gyedaH sman mo lnga bcu

rtsa brgyad 'khoraH snang srid ma mo'i tshogs kyis skoraH e ka dza Ti ral gcig maH bka' yi bsrungs ma'i sde dpon niH sku la na bza' mthing nag gsolaH chibs su dre rta nag mo chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH srin mo

nag mo pho nyar 'gyedaH bal mo nag mo las la 'kholaH ma mo nag mo sna tshogs sprulaH smug nag 'bum gyis 'khor dang bcasaH dpal ldan nag mo 'gyogs byed maH mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengasaH na bza' mthing

nag gu zu gsolaH chibs su so bya rog po zhonaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nyar 'gyedaH sna tshogs mkha' 'gro las la 'dzudaH snang srid mkha' 'gro'i 'khor gyis skoraH dpal ldan nag mo sde gsum

yangaH dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH 'brug dang dre rta so bya sogasaH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skangaH nag mo sde gsum 'khor dang bcasaH ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzodaH bang rim gnyis pa'i

nub phyogs nasaH skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul niH gnod sbyin ru tra'i sde dpon bzhengasaH na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsolaH ral pa nag po mun ltar gtibasaH chibs su rta dre nag po chibasaH zhing lpags gyon pa pho nyar

'gyedaH ral chas bgos pa las la 'dzudaH snang srid ru tra'i 'khor gyis bskoraH btsan rgyal srog zan dmar po niH srid pa'i btsan gyi sde dpon bzhengasaH sku la dar dkar ras dmar gsolaH chibs su rta dmar glog

'gyu chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH dbu la bse rmog dkar po gsolaH btsan po kha bzhi pho nyar 'gyedaH mgyogs pa sde brgyad las la 'dzudaH snang srid dregs pa'i btsan gyis bskoraH skyes bu yam shud dmar po

niH btsan 'gong rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengasaH sku la zab dmar ber chen gsolaH chibs su rta dmar yid mgyogs chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH g.yas su bro brdung chi li liH g.yon na pyugs glu kyu ru ruH rta

zhon stong ni phyi na 'brengaH srid pa'i btsan 'god 'khor dang bcasaH skyes mchog dmar po sde gsum niH dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH dre nag rta dmar la sogs pa'iH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH

dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcasaH ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzodaH bang rim bzhi pa'i byang phyogs nasaH bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyalaH log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon bzhengasaH na bza' mthing nag beng chen

gsolaH chibs su rta nag 'gyogs pa chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH rgyal chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyedaH phyogs skyong tshogs ni las la 'dzudaH snang srid bgegs kyi tshogs kyis bskoraH dbang phyug gu lang nag po

niH mu stegs tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengasaH na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsolaH chibs su stag seng ma he chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH sa gzhi kun ni dmag gis 'gengasaH bar snang mtshon dang dar
gyis bkangaH nam mkha' glog dang 'od kyis 'gengasaH gcan zan 'dab chags rgyug cing ldingaH mu stegs nag po'i 'khor gyis skoraH rmu bdud nag mo bkrag med niH rmu bdud tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengasaH

na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsolaH chibs su rmu rta nag po chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH rmu bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyedaH rmu bran stong sde las la 'dzudaH snang srid rmu yi 'khor gyis skoraH skyes mchog nag

po sde gsum yangaH dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH stag seng ma he rta la sogasaH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH phyi rol nag po'i tshogs dang bcasaH ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzodaH ri rab chen

po mdzes pa yisaH bang rim gsum pa'i shar phyogs laH tshangs pa dkar po srog gi bdagaH lha chen ging gi sde dpon bzhengasaH srid pa gsum gyi myur mgyogs paraH sku la bya rgod thul ba gsolaH chibs su seng ge dkar po chibasaH

khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH ging chen bcwa brgyad pho nyar 'gyedaH ging bdud pho mo las la 'gyedaH mi rta ra lug bya dang khyiH stag dang bya rgod la sogs pa'iH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH bang rim gsum pa'i lho phyogs

laH gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi bdagaH sku la dom gyi glag pa gsolaH chibs su ba glang sna rings chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH skyes pa brgya dang bud med brgyaH nyan thos stong dang sngags pa stongaH 'bag seng mon

bu bsam mi khyabaH stag seng ba glang spra dang spreH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH bang rim gsum pa'i nub phyogs laH rdo rje mdzes ba zhes bya baH 'jig rten lha yi sde dpon yinaH ma thar shel gyi na bza' gsolaH

kun kyang shel gyi na bza' gsolaH ra dkar gnam ru chibs su chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa niH 'dzin ging bzhi bcu pho nyar 'gyedaH rang gi 'khor sde las la 'dzudaH tsa ra bya khyi la sogs pa'iH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH bang rim

gsum pa'i byang phyogs laH lha chen nag po chen po teH bstan pa bsrung ba'i sde dpon bzhengasaH na bza' ljang nag ber nag gsolaH chibs su bdud rta bra nag chibasaH khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa niH lha dmag

phyogs kyi dbugs 'byin cingaH lha min g.yul ngo rab tu bzlogaH phyogs skyong dpal mgon las la 'dzudaH mi rta ra lug bya dang khyiH nag po'i tshogs kyis thugs dam bkangaH dregs pa'i bka' nyan sgo bsrungs bzhiH rang

gi bka' nyan 'khor dang bcasaH dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bkangaH dbang chen sde bzhi 'khor dang bcasaH ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las mdzodaH bang rim tha ma'i phyogs

bzhi naH phyi yi lha srin sde brgyad dngaH nang gi lha srin sde brgyad dngaH sbas pa'i lha srin sde brgyad dngaH gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad dngaH yang gsang gter gyi lha srin dngaH drag po sngags kyi lha srin dngaH las byed myur

mgyogs lha srin dngaH brtags shing chags pa'i lha srin dngaH sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa laH khyed kyi thugs dam bkang ba niH shes ldan mi dang cang shes rtaH theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i baH rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan

raH thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding byaH khyed kyi bzhed pa'i skor du 'bulaH rin chen brgyan ldan ngar mi dngaH sems kyi gzugs ldan ngar mi dngaH sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dngaH shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dngaH pho

blud mda' dang mo blud 'phangaH rgyal mtshan ba dan rol mo rnamasaH nyid kyi sku mdog dang 'thun paH rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bulaH dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dngaH 'thun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dngaH snang gsal 'od ldan

mar me dngaH rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dngaH mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgraH zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i roH khyed kyi thugs dam bkang phyir 'bulaH 'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcasaH sngon gyi dam tshig rjes

dgongs teH mdo blud 'thun rdzas bzhed pa'i skoraH sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes laH sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungasaH dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed kyis stodaH rnal 'byor sku dgra khyed kyis sgrolaH sgrub

pa po la bar gcod pa'iH stong phrag brgyad bcu'i bgegs rigs dngaH bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dngaH glo bur gnod pa brgyad bcu gcigaH ye 'dreg sum brgya drug bcu'i tshogasaH dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dngaH

gshis ngan 'gum pa brgyad bcu gcigaH gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegasaH rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnamasaH zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dngaH gdul dang tshar gcad las mdzod cigaH zhes brjod rang gi

'thun rdzas stabaH bskang bzlog gsad dang gso la sogasaH ji ltar 'dod pa'i phrin las bcolaH gang la dmigs pa de bzhin 'grub zhes bka' stsal toH 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod

bstod rgya chen po'i sgo nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u steH lnga pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya baH dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kunaH ngo bo rang rig byang chub semasaH ma skyed dbyings las g.yos pa medaH 'jig

rten gnas dang 'thun 'jug cingaH mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bsaH 'jig rten mchod bstod zhes su brjodaH phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag steH snang dang srid pa'i dkyil 'khor kunaH gsang ba'i bdag po de nyid dngaH gnas

skabs mchod bstod phyi yin noH dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byungaH rang gi snang ba 'dus pa'i tshogasaH dbang po'i yul gyi longs spyod dngaH gtsang spra'i rtog pa sbyang pa'i rdzasaH 'dod chags bzhi dang 'bru bcud rtsiH gnyis med

pha rol snang byed paH rang gi ngang du mnyes byed cingaH so so'i mtshan dang dpe byad dgaH nges par bstan pa nang gi'oH sems dang sems la star ba'i tshogasaH thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor cheH ma bcos rang bzhin lhun

gyis grubaH lung nas ma lus 'dus pa lasaH chos gzhan med de yul nyid dngaH yul du 'dzin pa snang ba'i bdagaH gnyis med rtogs shing khong du chudaH mchod bstod rab tu gsang ba yiH lus las sprul zhing bsgrubs pas

skuH 'bru bcu sgra yi 'khor lo gsungaH rang grol snying po ma bcos thugasaH lha klu gnod sbyin btsan dang bdudaH srin po gza' dang mo rigs rnamasaH dregs shing gdug pa khro zhing gtumaH myur mgyogs rmugs shing 'thibs

pa dngaH drag dang dbyings pa so so'i sdeH ri rab bshos gtsang brgyan dang bcasaH 'bru lug snying rtse tsA ru'i dbyibasaH dkar dmar bcud ldan dmigs kyis mchodaH pha dang rgyal po grogs dang lhaH ma dang rje khol bran lta buH brten

pa rang gi tshul yin noH che btsan dbang gi dngos grub dngaH longs spyod 'phel zhing mngag par blangaH rgyud 'jam skyabs che bka' nyan zhingaH drag rtsal ldan zhing slar mi ldogaH shin tu nye ba yon tan steH rang la rtsub cing 'cha' ba dngaH

longs spyod mi 'byor mi 'phrod dngaH blo bur nad kyis gzir byed cingaH slar ldog bkra shis nyams pa dngaH bsgo ba mi nyan don med cingaH rang rgyud rtsub cing khengs pa dngaH rigs rgyud ma smin kun gyis brnyasaH bsams don mi grub

mnga' thang nyamasaH rgyud don sbas pa ma shes skyonaH khrims kyi bdag po lta bu'i lhaH gnad kyis bcing zhing bsgrub par byaH dbang chen pha dang mtshungs pa'i bdudaH mtshungs med grogs dang 'dra ba'i btsanaH gnod sbyin khrims

kyi gtso lta buH srin po srog la rgol ba'i gshedaH gza' rgod lag yan gzhon lta buH sdong bu dug sbrul lta bu kluH mo rgyud dbang chen rje dbon maH mtshungs ldan de yi gnyen pos bsgrubaH khugs su ma bcug bsgo mi nyanaH se

long gnad med bdud du 'gyuraH bcud phur ma thebs slar la ldogaH rang gi rab rol ma bzhar g.yelaH lto ba ma dkrugs las mi myuraH log non ma ldan bdag nyid stobaH dbang du ma 'dus sgo mi nyanaH gnad kyis man ngag
brgyad kyis niH mchod bstod sgrubs te phrin las bcol zhes bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi zab pa'i mchod bstod gnad kyi le'u steH drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan

yang rab bshad byaH 'jig rten dregs pa'i sde dpon rnamasaH drag po'i las la sbyar ba niH dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag tuH rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa sngon song nasaH so so'i 'thun pa'i rdzas bsar teH drag po'i las kyi khang pa niH

e dbyibs sum bcu ldan par bshamaH phyi nang gsang ba sku gsung thugasaH gnas byin brlab dang bskang dang mchodaH spyi dang so sor bsngags pa dgaH rab tu bde bar 'dod pas dmigasaH gzugs sgra bsam pa'i nus pa yisaH

lus dang lus kyi 'phrul 'khor dngaH srog dang srog gi gnyen po yisaH sems dang sems kyi ngo bo lasaH phyi nang kun tu bsngags pa steH 'phro 'du 'od kyis drang zhing dgugaH rang gzhan dmigs pa de la stimaH sha lus khrag sogs

ma lus bzasaH dregs pa'i sde dpon sku gsung thugasaH ma lus mnyes pa 'di yis byaH gang la dmigs pa tshad kyis sgrolaH ting nge 'dzin gyi brtul shugs kyisaH bul dang myur ba'i blo yi stobasaH 'di la the tshom mi bya steH

rdo rje 'chang chen gsang ba'i bka'aH gal te 'bar bas mngon spyod cingaH myur du 'pho bar bya ba niH rno sbal tsha rtsub dri nga ba'iH yam shing gdug pas dbyibs ldan brtsigaH rdol pa rigs ngan shan pa dngaH g.yung mo grogs bral

khyim gyi mesaH sbar zhing dug khrag mngar ba laH gzugs brnyan rdzogs par longs spyod pa'iH slar yang dmigs te lhag ma dbulaH gtso dang 'khor gyis rab phye ba'iH drag po'i tshig gis rab tu bgrangaH dregs pa'i bdag po so so

yiH che brjod gnad dang bcas pa yisaH stab cing sbyin pa rim bzhin byaH drang srong phrin las rdzogs par bskulaH thal chen dang ni drag po'i rdzasaH rme khrag gsum dang gsod byed gsumaH mtshon bral rin chen gsum gyi dbyigaH

rang byung bkra shis bzlog pa'i rdzasaH nang du 'du 'phror sbyar ba niH sgra tshig ting nge 'dzin ldan pasaH stobs chen 'khor los dbab cing 'phangaH dregs pa 'khor bcas las su dmigasaH gzhan yang mchod rdzas gzugs brnyan

byasaH rab tu bstan pa'i dmigs pas bstimaH 'gyu gnas sa dang chu phug dngaH sra bsher 'thab dang phung shul dngaH rgya mtsho'i dbus dang lam po cheH mtshon gyis brdegs dang rlung gi skyalaH bag med lhung zhing me chus 'jomasaH

lugs nas byung ba'i rten 'brel teH brnag pa'i yid kyis 'dzin phur gdabaH gdug byed 'khor dang zas su gtadaH ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs b.raH thar bar mi 'gyur las kyi gingaH byams dang snying rje'i sems ma rtogasaH

'di ltar mngon par spyad pa yisaH bstan la rab sdang phyir gyur pa'iH rjes 'breng log par lta ba rnamasaH tshar gcod sgrol zhing 'dul ba yi zhes bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i phrin las drag po'i las la sbyar

ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang gshad pa niH 'jig rten dregs ba rang gi gnadaH gsang ba'i snying po drag shul gzungasaH kun bsdus dril dang phye mas mnanaH badzra sarba duSh+TAnaH e ka pa ra asta na yaH

ma he shwa ra de ba de biH du phrag dun ting ma yaH pre ta bi kr-i sta na rak+Sha rak+Sho yak+Sha k+Shi taH biSh+Ti pa tra a se la dza nA ga gu ling sha dzaH tsa du tri tsa ra tsa la ma du triH ma ma ru lu man+t+ra rA dza du ma tiH ma kA la ru tra tIk+Sh+Na tiR+thi ka thaH a b+hi shu tri pa

sha li ha~M sha~M tri dzaH / rA dza ging+ka raH sa du tri nA tha kA la A gats+tsha/ hring hring dzaH bod pa'i sngags so/ /badzra sarba duSh+TAn e ka pa ra sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a gats+tsha/ ba lin+ta gr-ih+Na i ma~M ta gr-i h+Nan+tu ma hA ga Na pU dza kha kha khA hi khA hi/ 'di

dag sbyar bas mchod par 'gyuraH sarba A yu mi tra sid+d+hi pu tra brta ni sid+d+hi pu tra ba hu b+ha dra bA su d+ha ra rat+na rat+na puSh+Ti sid+d+hi/ ma hA dz+nyA na sarba d+harma gar+b+ha kA ya bA k+tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hiH pha la sid+d+hi ma hA sid+d+hi a be sha ya aH ha ha hi hoH rab

tu sbyar bas dngos grub blangaH sarba sha tru~M yak+Sha rbad rbad b+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'di yis rab tu rbad par byaH nr-i hur thu~Ms dzaHdzaH sha tru~M tsit+ta mA ra ya rbadaH rU pa ya kan+da rbud rbud phaT phaT mA ra mA ra thuMs thuMsaH ha na ha naH da ha da haH

pa tsa pa tsa/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+tha/ thun rbad thun rbad/ 'di yis dmigs pa rab tu gsadaH ma mA ra ya phri pre ta ka hring hringaH tri sha phA li ru pa ya/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ hu lu hu lu/ rbad nAn la~M nAn/ \u0f00 nAn hU~M nan/ sta~M b+ha ya sta~M b+ha ya

nAn zhes pa yis ni mnan bar byaH sarba mA ra ha ka ra~M ra~M/ dz+wa la ra~M dz+wa la ra~M/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ho ha ya ho ha ya/ raM tsa ya raM ku ya zhes pas ma lus bsreg par byaH mA ra sha truM thun b+h+yo thum ril b+h+yo na te thun/ A be

sha ya b+h+yoH dmigs pa 'di yis 'phang bar bya'o/ badzra uts+tsha Ta ya phaT a gri sarba b+h+yo bzlogaH sa ma ya rbad sa myags bzlog /pha rol nus pa 'di yis bzlog /ma hA b+ha ri sha ya/ a b+he sha ye pra tsa ya/ be rtsa

ya be tsa ya zhi bas lugs dbyung chu dbab pa'oH nA ga gra he bi tsa ya phro~M phro~M hril hril/ shar shar/ ra~M na tsag ne phro~M hril shar shar phob phob/ drag pos bzlog cing stab pa'oH ma hA shAn+ti~M puSh+TiM wa sh+ya~M ku ru mA ra ya dza ya karma ma li a

mu ki sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi kar swa sti swA hA/ phrin las thams cad rab sgrub pa yiH 'thun pa'i rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyisaH las kyi khyad par so sor dbyeH gnas sgyur dang ni grub pa'i mtha'aH snying rje byams pas rang bskul zhingaH

kun tu khyab pa'i mchod sbyin byaH zhi dang rgyas dang dbang du byaH drag bos sgral zhing tshar gcod pa'iH las kun rang gzhan don du spyadaH 'jig rten gnas shing srog dang snyingaH yi ge gsal bar rang 'byung gnasaH mngon du rgyu ba thugs ka steH ring thung pho

mo khrag dang dusaH chags sdang snying srog snying rje gtseraH rdo rje pad+ma rlung dang gnasaH thabs dang shes rab chos can dngaH chos nyid las dang 'bras bu yisaH mi 'chang gnad 'tshang bod dang drangaH grogs dang ldan pas

las la sbyar zhes bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi las sna tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i snying po gnad kyi le'u steH brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya baH 'jig rten dregs pa'i

gtso chen rnamasaH tshul bzhin rab tu bsgrubs pa yisaH grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams niH nyams dang rbad rtags rmi lam rtagasaH 'di la so sor 'byung 'gyur teH dga' zhing mdangs ldan stobs rnyed dngaH bde dang rtogs pa

spro bskyed cingaH mngon rgyu yid kyis gdeng thob kyisaH nyams nga bag tsha dogs med cingaH nus lan phrin las mthar phyin rtogasaH 'di dag la sogs rim par 'byungaH lus 'jam dbugs kyis mi gnod cingaH yang zhing brtan

la khyad par dga'aH nad dang gdon gyis brdzi mi nusaH 'byung ba'i nus pas mi skyod cingaH kha dog dang ldan sdug cing mdzesaH 'di la sogs pa lus 'byung gda'aH ji ltar bsgo ba bzhan gyis 'dzinaH rang dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis

gsungasaH 'thun pa'i tshul gyis mi dor laH snyan dang mi snyan ci brjod rnamasaH tshangs pa yi dbyangs bzhin du 'ongaH grag thos tsam gyis dbang du byedaH tshul mdzes 'jug pa dag gi brdaH gang la brtsams pa de 'grub cingaH ma

zhum mi spor mi 'dor bsaH dbang dang ldan zhing mi g.yo laH gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thobaH yid kyi yul du brda 'byung ba'iH snga phyi de ma thag pa'oH bag chags ma yin rmi lam niH rgyal po mkhan po slob dpon dngaH che

btsan rigs ldan brgyan bcas ldanaH gcan zan 'dab chags dud 'gro dngaH skyes ba bud med bus pa sogasaH rang gi gnas su lhags pa niH nye bar 'grub pa'i rtags yin noH bran 'bangs mngag pa'i tshul 'chang zhingaH

bka' bsgo las byed nyan pa brtagasaH ring ba'i gnas nas glu len cingaH rgyang mig blta ba g.yel ba'i rtagasaH rang la chad pa'i las rtsom zhingaH nyes lan 'ded pa bzlog pa'i rtagasaH zas skom 'dod cing 'khrig lan

bsnyagaH rang nyid gnod 'gyod ma skongs rtagasaH 'jom zhing dud mos 'debs byed paH ma dag lus snang nyams pa'i rtagasaH rang gi bsgo ba mi nyan zhingaH slar zhing tshur la 'khol 'dod paH gnyen pos dbang du ma gyur

rtagasaH mtshon cha brdung zhing tshad ma ldanaH nus med bya ba mi 'grub pasaH sngags kyi nus pa ma grub rtagasaH gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dngaH rang gi yod pa 'dod med rnamasaH mchod bkang thun rdzas ma tshang rtagasaH sha rus khrag sogs

longs spyod cingaH ngo mthon rab tu che ba naH las byas 'grub pa'i rtags yin noH pha rol dmag tshogs ma byung zhingaH sgo med khang par bdag zhugs laH ngan sngags gzhan gyis bzlog pa'i rtagasaH bye brag sde brgyad so so niH mi dang

dud 'gro 'dab chags sogasaH pho tshogs nag po bdud kyi rtagasaH mo tshogs brgyan bzang ma mo steH che btsan 'bag seng gtsug lag khangaH bus pa spra spre rgyal po'i rtagasaH mi rta khra spyang ri dgas niH brag btsan ri btsan rtags

yin noH chu gnas dud 'gro klu yi rtagasaH ma he ra lug mig mdangs dngaH mun pa bu yug gza' yi rtagasaH skyes pa chas bzang 'byor pa canaH ri mtsho la gnas gnod sbyin rtagasaH nya pa shan ba bya pa dngaH dmag gi go mtshon

srin po'i rtagasaH 'di dag sngar bshad bzang ngan sbyaraH bye brag sgrub pa'i rtags su 'gyur zhes bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po bsgrub pa'i rtags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad paH dregs

pa can gyi khyad par rdzasaH mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan sku yi rtenaH ming nas bod pa gsung gi rtenaH phyag mtshan dam pa thugs kyi rtenaH lug g.yag dkar po sbal sbrul nyaH glang rta sngon po rin po cheH g.yul bshams myur bsgral bya gcan

dngaH rnel bu shel nag bya nag dngaH rta lug khyi dang rgod gnag dngaH ra phag bya khyi dkar po dngaH kla klo ra rog dom khyi gnagaH sbrul nag bya rgod ra skyes dngaH rta ra bya khyi dmar po yiH snying khrag mgo dang rgyal mtshan niH lha klu gnod sbyin

srin po dngaH ma mo bdud dang rgyal po gingaH gshin rje gza' dang btsan rnams kyiH rim bzhin so so brten pa'i rdzasaH rab tu gsang ba nyid yin noH e ldan gdug bcas rgyud med kyiH thod pa mtshon cha phur pa dgaH dug khrag rin chen

drag po'i 'bruH kun tshogs rab tu gsang ba'i rdzasaH gru bzung snod ni sha khrag bcasaH ru bzangs rigs med myur song chuH myu gu sna tshogs dri ldan rdzasaH chu drag dpa' rabs dud pa'i rdzas yin noH mchod rten ri rab rgya gram bcasaH

rme rdzas ris ngan mgo bo gsumaH dmigs pa'i 'bab rdzas pad+ma niH slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas yin noH nad gdug ba~M ril mgo rkang rnamasaH rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas yin noH dug khrag tshogs dang mtshan ma nganaH dmigs pa'i brten

la 'phang ba'i rdzasaH ngan pa'i sa yi rten khang dngaH gdug cing rab tu tsha ba'i shingaH 'bru nag dug khrag sres pa'i rdzasaH gzhan yang dbang can dregs pa'i 'khoraH so so'i rigs dang sder bcas pa'iH 'thun dang mi mthun gtsang dang

rmeH bsngags pa'i kun rdzas shes par 'gyuraH ma 'ongs dus na rdo rje 'changaH rang gi rig 'dzin byang chub semasaH brtul zhugs can gyis 'grub pa yisaH dbus dang mtha' 'khob yul rnams dngaH sangs rgyas zhing gi 'jig

rten khamasaH kun nas sde dpon g.yog bcas pa'iH yid dang dngos po'i lus can rnamasaH khams dang rigs pa bsam pa dngaH skyed pa brten gnas yo byad dngaH ma lus rdzogs par rab tu rtogasaH shes ldan mig can rnams la stonaH

de tshe dregs pa'i gtso chen rnamasaH da lta nga yis gdams pa yinaH yang dag don la ma 'da' cigaH khyed rnams kyang ni dus nam zhigaH las kyi gnas ngan len spangs teH byang chub sa la myur 'gro yisaH de bas bka' yi dam mnos laH

ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin sgrubs shingaH gsang chen nga yi bstan pa'i tshulaH phyi rol phyogs la sogs pa yisaH nyams shing rmas par mi 'gyur bsaH rgyas shing bstan par khyod kyis byosaH zhes bka' stsal toH 'jig rten gyi sde

dpon chen po'i rten rdzas dang las kyi gnyer bsgo ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po'i sku'i rnam par

rol pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdus pa mdzad deH dgyes pa'i gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnamasaH bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'iH 'jig rten dbang chen gtso chen rnamasaH

mthar thug mya ngan 'das nas kyangaH dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyiH sten pa'i mtha' tshigs sgrub pa dngaH rnal 'byor lam gyi grogs mdzad phyiraH drag po'i sku gsung thugs nyid dngaH yon tan 'phrin las sna tshogs stonaH phyi

ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzinaH skyes bu brtson ldan rnams kyi niH gnyis su 'dzin par yong mi byaH yul snang phyi nang ma lus kunaH rang rigs sems kyi rgyal por bsgrubaH de ni ma bcos yul mi bralaH ma chad ma lhung bdag po medaH

gnyis med mnyam nyid lhun gyis grubaH nges 'gyur spang blang rtsol sems bralaH ma lus rtsa ba snying gi srogaH de nyid shes bya rab tu blangaH dbang gi rgyal po 'char bar 'gyuraH gal te nga dang dregs pa canaH so so rang rgyud ldan pa

yisaH gnyis 'dzin yid kyi rtogs spyod cingaH mtshan mar rab tu sgom byed paraH rkang med khams gsum sgrod 'dod cingaH mig med stong gsum blta dang mtshungasaH bdud bzhi dga' ba skyed par byedaH de bas rigs mchog

ma rnams kyisaH gsang bdag nga nyid shes par gyis zhes bka' stsal nasaH nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po chos nyid de bzhin nyid spros dang dral ba'i dbyings su thim par mdzad doH \u0f7f'jig rten gyi sde dpon

chen po 'khor dang bcas pa chos sku mthar thug tu sgrub par gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // mang+gA la~M// //
